58b4(phal chen): btul/ / rgyal ba bsam gyis mi khyab mi g.yo ste// rdo rje rdul 'dzin tshul ni 'di yin no// chos kyi dbyings ni 'byam klas kun bkang zhing // phyogs bcu rnams su rgyal ba'i gsung
58b5(phal chen): yang grag/ sangs rgyas spyod yul ting nge 'dzin las skyes// 'di ltar 'di la sprin 'byung rab tu 'jugade la chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni
58b6(phal chen): chos kyi chu bo mtha' med pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/ / chu klung gi lha ri dang chu kun la rten pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o//
58b7(phal chen): chu klung gi lha rdul thams cad dri ma med par rnam par dag pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang 'grogs pa'i snying rje'i tshul gyis kun tu rgyas par
59a1(phal chen): 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/ / chu klung gi lha nga ros khyab par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra yid du mi 'ong ba zlog cing phan pa skyed pa zhes bya'o//
59a2(phal chen): chu klung gi lha srog chags kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa skyob pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la 'tshe ba med pa'i byams pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// chu klung gi lha gdung ba med pa rgya
59a3(phal chen): mtsho gdung ba med pa'i 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gdung bar mi nus pa'i sgo kun nas ston pa zhes bya'o// chu klung gi lha dga' bde kun nas 'byung
59a4(phal chen): ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi 'jungs pa sel cing gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o// chu klung gi lha yon tan gyi shugs yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan
59a5(phal chen): gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ thams cad tshim par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// chu klung gi lha 'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/
59a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par byang bar byed cing khon du 'dzin pa dam po dang / khro ba'i shugs dang bar byed pa zhes bya'o// chu klung gi lha tshogs chen po rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi 'od
59a7(phal chen): kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad bde ba phun sum tshogs pa myong bar byed cing thar pa rgya mtsho la 'dzud pa zhes bya'o// de nas chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pas/
59b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthus chu klung gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod pa
59b2(phal chen): ngag/ sngan chad rgyal bas sems can don du sbyangs// 'jig rten bkang zhing nyon mongs gdungs pa'i rnams// sprin chen char bzhin rab tu zhi bar mdzad// bskal pa brjod du med par rgyal
59b3(phal chen): bas sngon/ / smon lam 'od kyis sems can dbyings sbyangs shing // 'gro ba yongs smin dbang po chos kyang mkhyen// 'khyil ba zhes bya chu klung lha dka' 'o// 'gro dang mnyam pa'i snying rje'i
59b4(phal chen): tshul bsgoms shing / / mgon po sems can nyon mongs dri ma sbyong // yongs smin sems can rgyal ba mngon du blta// de la dri med mig gi lha yang mos// de bzhin gshegs
59b5(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs snyan rgya chen ni/ / kun tu bsgrags pas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi// sangs rgyas dbyangs snyan thos nas dga' mgu'i yid// rnam thar 'di ni sgra dbyangs sgrog pas thos/
59b6(phal chen): bskal pa rgya mtsho 'gro la phan don du// sngan chad byang chub spyod pa spyad pa mthong // de phyir de ni phyogs bkang 'jig rten mdzad// lam rgyud skyob pa rjes su dran zhing dka'// rgyal
59b7(phal chen): sngan chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ / sna tshogs sgo nas sems can smin par mdzad// de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho sdug bsngal 'jil// zhi byang chu klung lha mi des dga' 'o// sbyin pa'o snyam
60a1(phal chen): tshad med mi zad mang / / 'gro ba 'dod pa kun la yongs btang zhing // rgyal bas 'gro ba'i 'jungs pa yongs su bsal// kun nas dka' dpal rnam thar de mthong ngo //
60a2(phal chen): thabs tshul rgya mtsho thams cad bsgoms pas na// yon tan mang po brgya phrag mang pos byung // rgyal bas 'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad de// rgya chen sgra dbyangs shugs ldan lha yang dga'//
60a3(phal chen): sgrib pa'i klong dang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dri// 'gro ba rnams la byams pa bskyed sbyangs pas// mkha' mnyam 'od kyi sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes// rnam par mdzes pa'i chu klung lha dga' 'o//
60a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas rang byung yon tan rgya mtsho ste// bsod nams zhing ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal 'dor// byang chub lam la rim gyis yongs smin mdzad// rgya mtsho'i tshogs dpal
60a5(phal chen): rnam thar 'di yin no/ / de la lo tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ro dang mdangs thams cad skyed cing / sems can thams cad sangs
60a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku rab tu 'thob pa ston pa zhes bya'o/ / lo tog gi lha dus kyi me tog rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas dga' ba chen po'i
60a7(phal chen): shugs kyi tshim pa skyed pa zhes bya'o/ / me tog gi lha rtsal dam pa'i stobs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pas shin tu dag pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o// lo /
60b1(phal chen): gi lha mdangs kyi ngang mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ snying rje mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'gyed cing rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// lo 'os
60b2(phal chen): gi lha sa kun gyi rtsa ba 'bras bu'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du lta zhing / sangs rgyas rnams la yon tan yang dag par bskyed pa ston pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lnga
60b3(phal chen): gtsug pud kha dog sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i me tog yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha yal ka dri ma med par grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/
60b4(phal chen): sems can la phan pa'i byams pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha spos sna tshogs shin tu grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos
60b5(phal chen): thams cad la spyod pa kun tu gnon pas rtsom pa zhes bya'o/ / me tog gi lha bzang zhing yid du 'ong bar snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhum pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba
60b6(phal chen): rnam par zlog cing chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / me tog gi lha kha dog rnam par dag cing 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi
60b7(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba la rnam par lta zhing chos kyis 'khor gyi dbang po tshim par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / de nas ma ga gi sa dang 'jam pa'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus
61a1(phal chen): tog gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rang byung ye shes sgron ma skyes pas ni// 'gro ba kun gyi
61a2(phal chen): skyabs dang mgon gyur te/ / ma lus 'gro ba'i bde ba yang dag skyed// bsod nams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bla na med// sangs rgyas mnyan na don yod yon tan sprin// 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal
61a3(phal chen): zhi bar mdzad/ / chos rgya chen po mi zad rab tu skyed// dus kyi dkyil 'khor lha ni 'di la 'jug/ bde gshegs stobs ni ma lus yongs su rgyas// 'gro ba dag na chos kyi legs pas
61a4(phal chen): mdzes/ / 'gro ba kun 'dul kun du rnam par snang // stobs dang gzugs kyi mthu yis de mthong ngo // sems kyi skad cig kun la 'gro mnyam pa'i// thugs rje rgya mtsho sngan chad rnam
61a5(phal chen): sbyangs pas/ / de phyir rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul mtha' yas so// de ni mdangs mthong lha yis rab tu mthong // thabs rnams kun gyi sgo nas don yod par// sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun tu
61a6(phal chen): khyab gyur cing / / 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs dag par mdzad// 'di ni thams cad sgo mo'i rnam thar to// 'gro ba 'di na mos yangs gang yod pa// de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i mthus
61a7(phal chen): byung ste/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'o// nags tshal rgyan gyi gtsug bud de la 'jug/ 'jig rten rnams la byams pa che bskyed de// sems can rnams la phan
61b1(phal chen): phyir nga byung skyes/ / lam rab dge ba'i zhing rab tu ston// zhi ba sna tshogs dpal gyi rnam thar to// phyogs su sems can yongs sprin byed pa'i tshe// bde gshegs
61b2(phal chen): spyod pa ji ltar rnam dag pa/ / byang chub shing las de dag sgra yang 'byung // spos zhis dpal gyi lha yis de thos so// rgyal ba 'jig rten yid du myong ba spong // dga' ba ma lus
61b3(phal chen): rnams kyang rab tu skyed/ / 'gro ba kun gyi dbang po rnam par sbyong // dge bar snang ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo // 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas shin tu 'phags// skye bo kun gyi bsam pa
61b4(phal chen): des mkhyen te/ / sna tshogs sgo nas 'gro ba yongs sprin mdzad// rnam dag kha dog 'od kyi rnamathar to// de la sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/
61b5(phal chen): bsam pa kun nas rnam par lta ba'i gnon pas 'gro ba rab tu gnon pa zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha tsan dan gyi nags tshal gyi shugs 'chang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ blta ba don yod pas sems
61b6(phal chen): can 'dren pa'i 'od ces bya'o/ / sman gyi lha 'od rdul med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bas rdul dang bral ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha
61b7(phal chen): ming kun du grags pa glang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ming bsgrags pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho yang dag par 'phel ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha spu'i grong kun nas 'od 'byung ba'i rnam
62a1(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ nad thams cad la snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha mun pa rnam par sel cing rnam par sbyong ba'i rnam par thar
62a2(phal chen): pa ni/ 'gro ba mdongs pa lta bu thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mig rnam par dag par byed pa zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha sgra dbyangs kun du 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bsgrag
62a3(phal chen): pas don gyi dbyings 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / sman gyi lha nyi ma'i 'od 'gro ba'i mchog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes su ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
62a4(phal chen): yang dag par skul ba zhes bya'o/ / sman gyi lha phyogs bcur rmongs pa med par lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa'i tshul gyis rnam par dag pa'i snying rje'i snying po zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha mdang
62a5(phal chen): bzang po kun tu 'gyed pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed cing / sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor ba zhes bya'o// de nas
62a6(phal chen): sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sman gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
62a7(phal chen): smras so/ / sangs rgyas ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rab tu mkhyen// thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs sgo dag nas// sdug bsngal kun las
62b1(phal chen): sems can rab tu 'grel/ / sangs rgyas chos nyid de ltar bsam mi khyab// de yi mthu ni thams cad don kyang yod// skye dgu rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad// tsan dan
62b2(phal chen): shugs dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to/ / sngan chad rgyal ba'i chos nyid dag la ltos// bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' med spyod pa na'ang // srid pa kun la chags pa gang yang med// de la rdul med
62b3(phal chen): 'od kyi lha 'jug go/ / rgyal ba bskal pa stong phrag brgya dag tu// mthong zhing mtshan thos de bzhin shin tu dkon// tshul rnams kun tu rang byung don yod de// de la rgyal mtshan mchog ni de
62b4(phal chen): ltar 'jug/ rgyal ba'i spu yi sgo rnams kun nas kyang // nang las rab tu 'grel pa'i 'od bkye bas// 'jig rten nyon mongs ma lus zhi bar mdzad// spu mdangs rgyun gyi rnam thar
62b5(phal chen): 'di yin no/ / sdug bsngal las dang nyon mongs sna tshogs pas// 'gro ba rtag tu mdongs shing rab tu rmongs gyur rnams// sangs rgyas ye shes 'od kyis rnam par spyong // de ni mun dang
62b6(phal chen): bral ba'i lhas mthong ngo / / rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas pa'i// chos kyi sgo mo thams cad kun kyang 'byung // de ni sems can ma lus kun kyang shes//
62b7(phal chen): 'di ni sgra dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to// rgyal ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// srid par sems can yongs su smin byas pa// de la 'gro kun mi mgon mngon
63a1(phal chen): du srung / / rka 'od zhi ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo // sangs rgyas thugs rje'i tshul ni rgya mtsho ga// 'gro ba kun lan don du de skyes so// 'gro ba kun la las
63a2(phal chen): rnams shin tu ston/ / de ni phyogasasu snang ba'i lhas shes so// sangs rgyas 'gro dbang rnams kyi 'od yangs pa// phyogs rnams thams cad ma lus kun tu gang // sangs rgyas
63a3(phal chen): rjes su dran pa'i gzi brjid bskyed/ / mdangs dang 'od du ldan pa'i rnam thar to// de la nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni// ye shes
63a4(phal chen): kyi rgya mtsho yangs shing mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/ / nags tshal gyi lha 'od kyi phung po sna tshogs kyi mig yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ dge ba rgya chen po kun nas spangs
63a5(phal chen): pa'i shugs shes bya'o/ / nags tshal gyi lha myu gu yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa sna tshogs kyi myu gu rnam par 'phel ba dang yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o// nags
63a6(phal chen): tshal gyi lha lo ma dri ma med pa'i 'phreng ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su sbyong zhing rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha
63a7(phal chen): yan lag rab tu 'phyang ba'i gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ shes rab dri ma med pa'i sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la dmigs shing kun nas rnam par dmigs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes
63b1(phal chen): bya'o/ / nags tshal gyi lha dge ba'i 'od sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o// nags
63b2(phal chen): tshal gyi lha sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra la bzod pa rab tu thob pas chos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// nags
63b3(phal chen): tshal gyi lha kun nas spos mang po ngad ldang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ spyod pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor spyod pas yongs su dag par byed cing phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya'o// nags
63b4(phal chen): chatshal kyi lha kun nas dpal gyi 'od rab tu 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba la phan pa'i don chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyis rgyas pa yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya'o//
63b5(phal chen): nags tshal gyi lha me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ro'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad la dka' bar lta zhing rjes su dran pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya'o//
63b6(phal chen): de nas nags kyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus nags tshal gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
63b7(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so/ / bsod nams stobs dang ye shes stobs rnams dang // sngon tshe byang chub spyod pas sangs rgyas byung // stobs rnams kun gyis rang byung pha rol phyin// 'gro ba kun na 'phag/
64a1(phal chen): shing rnam par mdzes// 'gro ba thams cad skad bzubs rdzangag// de bzhin gshegs pas ldan tshe rab tu sbyangs// rang byung de bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do//
64a2(phal chen): tshogs spungs 'od rnam thar 'di la 'jug/ sems can kun gyis bde gshegs mthong ma thag/ mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi lam yang yang dag ston//
64a3(phal chen): myu gu yid 'ong 'od kyi rnam thar yin// rgyal ba kun gyi ba spu'i yon tan 'khor// bskal pa rgya mtshor zad par mi nus te// 'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab//
64a4(phal chen): rnam thar 'di ni 'phreng ba'i dpal gyis mthong // sngan chad rgyal bas sangs rgyas gang gi rnams// zhing mang rdul snyed mchod pa de dag dran// kun tu shes rab dkyil 'khor rnam
64a5(phal chen): par sbyangs/ / yal ka 'od kyi brjid kyis 'di mthong ngo // 'gro ba kun gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho dag/ skad cig gcig gi sangs rgyas thugs su chung // rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med shin tu
64a6(phal chen): yangs/ / sna tshogs rgyan gyi 'od kyis 'dir thong ngo // bder gshegs gsung ni zhi ba rab zhir gsung // dga' ba yangs pa chen po rnam par bskyed// sems can mos pa ji bzhin de dag shes/
64a7(phal chen): 'di ni sgra rnams sgrog pa'i dbyangs kyis thos// phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams rgyas byas shing // sangs rgyas byin rlabs rgya chen rab du 'byung // rgyal ba'i sngon gyi spyod pa dag kyang ston// kun
64b1(phal chen): du dri zhim 'od dpal 'di la 'jug/ ma rungs sems can yon tan med pa'i rnams// myos shing 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba dag/ de dag la ni thams cad mkhyen lam ston// 'phags pa
64b2(phal chen): 'od kyi 'khor gyis 'di mthong ngo / / sems can ma rungs sbyor ba'i spyod pa rnams// bskal pa bye bas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan ni bder gshegs skad cig gcig gis lta/
64b3(phal chen): ri yi 'od kyi lha yis 'di mthong ngo // de la ri'i lnga rin po rmang rgya mo mato/ shin du rgyas par gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam gtan zhi zhing yangs la dben pa'i snang
64b4(phal chen): ba la rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ / ri'i lha nags tshal sna tshogs me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gtsug pu kyirnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba bsam kyis mi khyab pa'i dge
64b5(phal chen): paba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa'i byams pa sgom pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ / ri'i lha kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi
64b6(phal chen): bsam pa rnam par lta ba'i dbang po la 'jug pas mngon par snang ba zhes bya'o/ / ri'i lha rdul thams cad dang mi gnas pas dri ma med pa'i gtsug pud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bskal pa rgya mtsho
64b7(phal chen): mtha' yas par mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus kyis rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ / ri'i lha snang bas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rnam
65a1(phal chen): par bstan pa ston pa zhes bya'o/ / ri'i lha stobs la thub pa med pa'i snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gti mug yong
65a2(phal chen): su sel ba'i 'od ces bya'o/ / ri'i lha kun nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ chags pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rgyan gyis sdug bsngal yang dag par 'joms pa
65a3(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / ri'i lha snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i yon tan snang ba yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha
65a4(phal chen): tu mngon par lta ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rmi lam gyi mthar yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha kun nas sra ba rdo rje'i mtshams kyi mi/
65a5(phal chen): gi rnam par thar pa ni/ don rgya mtsho chen po mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa zhes bya'o// de nas ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ri'i 'khor
65a6(phal chen): dkyil 'tshang sod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul mi zad tshad med ltos// sngon mo spyod rab mtha' yas rgyal bas byun/
65a7(phal chen): rnam thar zhing gi rdul snyed bsgom mdzad pas// 'gro ba ma lus dka' ba'i shugs kyang skyed// sangs rgyas spu nas dri med dpal 'gyeb// yan lag mtshan brgyan 'gro ba kun bkang zhing /
65b1(phal chen): byams tshul mtha' yas 'jig rten kun la ston// nags tshal rgyas pa'i gtsug gi rnam thar to// sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' yas 'gro bar mngon// 'jig rten kun tu phyogs bcu bkang
65b2(phal chen): zhing 'phags/ / dbang po dang ba'i sems can rangs shing dga'// rnam thar 'di la 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan 'jug/ rang byung mkha' mnyam 'jig rten chos ma chags//
65b3(phal chen): bskal pa kun spyod brtson 'grus stobs mi skyo// sna tshogs khams 'gro sbyor bas ma lus 'dul// dga' ba dri med gtsug pung rnam thar to// 'jig rten kun ni mdongs gyur mun sdug
65b4(phal chen): zhugs/ / thugs rje de rab sangs rgyas 'od bkye zhing // 'gro khams yum rings nyal bsad par mdzad// rig nas dka' 'od lha yi rnam thar to// srid pa'i rgya mtshor spyad pa sngon
65b5(phal chen): spyod tshe/ / zhing rdul mnyam pa'i sems can gtso mchod pas// de dag dgyes bzhin sems can byang chub bkod// zhi ba'i sa 'di stobs 'chang lha 'jug pa'o// las kyi sprin sgrib
65b6(phal chen): g.yogs shing bsgribs pa'i rnams/ / srid par sems can sdug bsngal 'khor gzigs nas// de dag mun pa ye shes 'od kyis bsal// gzi brjid dpal 'od rnam thar 'di sems
65b7(phal chen): rgyal ba'i spu las sangs rgyas yon tan kun/ / phyogs dbyings sems can bsam pa bzhin du grag/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bskal pa kun tu gnas// 'od mang rdul gyi rma
66a1(phal chen): po'i lha 'jug go/ / sems can kun skyong dge brgya mtsho kun// de la phyogs bka' sangs rgyas mngon par snang // sna tshogs thabs kyis 'jig rten chos
66a2(phal chen): ston/ / rdul mngon mig gi lha yis de thos sa// ras sgo rgya mtsho mi zad tshad med pa// sangs rgyas gsung gcig sems can kun la gsung // bsal mthun brjod 'jig rten
66a3(phal chen): mngal ston/ / rdo rjes la mig 'di yi gnas la 'ju/ de la sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig skad cig
66a4(phal chen): cing sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lha bsod nams brten pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/
66a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi stobs dang shugs kyi rgyan ces bya'o// sa'i lha sems rin po ches rgyas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs bsgom pas rnam par
66a6(phal chen): dpyod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ / sa'i lha dus dus su dge ba'i mig rab tu ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing bde ba dang rtsa ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o//
66a7(phal chen): sa'i lha gser gyi mig gi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshul ston pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha spu las spos kyi 'od rnam par
66b1(phal chen): 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par sgom pa brjod pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sgrog pa'i rnam par thar
66b2(phal chen): pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad smra ba'i sgra rgya mtsho'i byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha me tog gi glong sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum
66b3(phal chen): tshogs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ / sa'i lha kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i byin gyi rlabs kun nas
66b4(phal chen): rgyu zhing 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / sa'i lha khyim dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi tshul la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi rgyan bsgom pa 'byung
66b5(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / de nas sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la
66b6(phal chen): rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngan chad skad cig skad cig bder gshegs kyis// brjod du med pa'i snying rje'i sgo rnams dang // byams pa'i
66b7(phal chen): sgo yang mi zad bsgoms pas na/ / de phyir sangs rgyas sku ni mi shigs sra// dus gsum gtogs pa'i sems can bsod nams dang // ji snyed byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dang
67a1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i spu gcig de snyed bsod nams 'od/ / bsod nams de mthong rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'byung ba med cing byon pa gang yang med//
67a2(phal chen): ting 'dzin zhi ba rgya mtshor rab tu zhugs// sems can rgyan gyis 'di rab tu ston// 'di ni sna tshogs shing gi ze ba'i sa yin no// sngan chad thub pas spyod pa sdud pa dang /
67a3(phal chen): 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnam par bzlog pa ni// rin chen bkram pa'i 'od kyis yin te// rnam par de la dga' bar lha lta'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni mtha' yas te//
67a4(phal chen): 'jig rten kun tu skad cig skad cig ston// dus chod yang dag ston pa'i sa yi lha// dga' bar sangs rgyas yul la rnam par lta// sangs rgyas gsung ni mtha' yas bsam
67a5(phal chen): mi khyab/ / sems can kun bsgrags nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad// gser 'od mig gi dpal ni rab dga' bar// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mngal lta//
67a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas sprul pas rnam pa kun gzugs su// phyogs kun chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par mdzad// spu las dri zhim 'od kyis yi lha// sangs rgyas sems can 'dul
67a7(phal chen): ba de la lta/ / phyogs rnams yid 'ong dbyangs kyis gang byas shing // 'gro ba 'di ni phyi mtha'i bskal par brjod// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs sa yi lha// rab tu
67b1(phal chen): dka' bar sangs rgyas dbyangs la nyan/ / rgyal ba'i spu las sems can mnyam pa yi// spos kyi 'od bkye 'jig rten kun bkanga' zhing // sems can ma lus yongs su
67b2(phal chen): snyim mdzad pa/ / me tog gtsug pud 'phyang bas yang dag mthong // de bzhin gshegs sku rdo rje lta bu ste// mtshams su mi phyed sra ba'i ri bo 'dra// 'gro ba kun gyis sangs
67b3(phal chen): rgyas bskyod mi nus/ / rdo rje rdul gyi lha ni des dka' 'o// de la grong khyer gyi lha rin che rtse mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can la phan pa yang dag par sbyar ba
67b4(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / grong khyer gyi lha rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni 'gro ba'i dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'dul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// grong khyer
67b5(phal chen): gyikyi lha rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad bsod nams dang dga' ba myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha smos pa'i mya ngan thams
67b6(phal chen): cad spong bas rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skyob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / snying rje snying po zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha sgron ma shin tu rgyas pa'i mig gi rnam par thar
67b7(phal chen): pa ni/ / shes rab kyis kun tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ thabs kyi sgo kun nas ston pa
68a1(phal chen): mthu zhes bya'o/ / grong khyer gyi lha bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams 'byung bas snang ba zhes bya'o//
68a2(phal chen): grong khyer gyi lha lus dri ma med pas mnyam pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can rmongs pa thams cad la rmi lam rnam par ston pa'i 'od ces bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha spos kyi
68a3(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i dri rnam par sel cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer
68a4(phal chen): gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i 'od ces bya'o// de nas grong khyer gyi lha rin po che'i
68a5(phal chen): rtse mo'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus grong khyer gyi lha'i dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mgon po
68a6(phal chen): chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ / snang ba brnyes shing phyogs su rnam par mdzes// sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba kun la mngon du snang //
68a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad dbang po sna tshogs te// de dag ma lus rgyal bas 'gro bar mkhyen// rnam thar 'di ni rab tu thob pa'i phyir// sna tshogs 'od 'byung lha yang rab tu dga'// rgyal
68b1(phal chen): bas bskal pa mtha' yas yang dag spyad/ / sngan chad rgyal bas chos kyang yang dag bzung // dga' ba'i yid kyis rtag tu de dag blangs// rnam thar 'di ni dga' ba'i 'od kyis thog//
68b2(phal chen): 'gro ba 'dir ni thugs rje byams bskyed cing // de bzhin gshegs pas sngan chad sems can rnams// kun gyi mya ngan mtha' yas rnam par bzlog/ nyon mongs yongs su skyong ba
68b3(phal chen): 'di la dka'/ / rgyal ba'i shes rab rgya che mtha' yas te// tshad med nam mkha' 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab rnam spyod pas// mar
68b4(phal chen): me me tog 'od kyi lha dka' 'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro mnyam sku gzugs rnams// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rnams la bstan// de 'dra'i tshul la rab tu bsgom pa yis//
68b5(phal chen): mngon du 'od 'phro'i lha de rab tu dga'// bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen mtha' yas pa// sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su sbyangs// de 'dra'i rnam par thar la rnam
68b6(phal chen): lta bas/ / bsod nams dpal gyi 'od de rab tu dga'// srid par rab tu rmongs pa'i sems can rnams// 'khor gyur rab rib mdongs pa gzigs pas na// de dag lan phyir
68b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas mngon du byung / / dri med 'od kyis namathar 'di thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs la ltos// 'gro la sprin 'dra mtha' dang dpung yang med// de dag bstan
69a1(phal chen): cing 'gro ba rnam par 'dul/ / spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo // sems can rmongs pa mun pas mdongs gyur cing // rnam pa sna tshogs sgrib
69a2(phal chen): pas bsgribs gyur pa/ / sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par kun shes 'gyur// rtse mo'i 'od kyi lha ni 'di la 'ju// de la snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan
69a3(phal chen): gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa yang dag par 'byung zhing sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyan ston pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha ri
69a4(phal chen): rab spo'i rin po che'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad dang mngon sum du byang chub kyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub cing 'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs
69a5(phal chen): kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la sangs rgyas ston cing / rmi lam gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa
69a6(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ dka' ba thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i rgyan ces
69a7(phal chen): bya'o/ / snying po byang chub kyi lha 'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed cing / snying po byang chub phun sum tshogs pa rnam
69b1(phal chen): pa sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o/ / snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi 'phreng ba 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bzhin du chos tshul zab mo dran pa ston pa
69b2(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / snying po byang chub kyi lha rin po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba yang dag par myong ba mtha' yas pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o//
69b3(phal chen): snying po byang chub kyi lha mthu dam pa spos kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha rdo rje sna tshogs kyi sprin
69b4(phal chen): gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ snying po byang chub rnam pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha pad+mo'i shing snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub kyi shing
69b5(phal chen): yongs su zhi bas phyogs rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs rnam par ston pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sna
69b6(phal chen): tshogs yang dag par rgyu ba zhes bya'o/ / de nas snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus snying po byang chub kyi lha'i 'khor
69b7(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bskal pa mang po mtha' dang dpung med par// de bzhin gshegs pas ji
70a1(phal chen): ltar sngon spyad dran/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsgrubs pas na// de phyir de yi bsod nams nam mkha'i tshad// zhing rnams mtha' yas chad
70a2(phal chen): med 'dra med par/ / mi zad gtong ba'i sgo nas sngon btang bas// ri bo sngo yi 'od kyi lha de ni// bde gshegs dran zhing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// bde gshegs sgrub pa
70a3(phal chen): rnam pa mtha' yas pa/ / de dag zhing rnams kun tu rab tu rgyu// 'gro bar sangs rgyas rmi lam bzhin ston cing // sprin gyi sgra dbyangs lha de rab tu dga'// mtha' yas bskal par
70a4(phal chen): dka' ba rab spyad de/ / dang ba'i spyan gyis 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// rgya mtsho'i spyan yang yongs su sngon btang ste// de la me tog mig gi lha dga' 'o// yon tan rin chen 'od 'gro mtha'
70a5(phal chen): yas sprin/ / 'gro ba kun tu snying po byang chub nas// rab tu bkye ba'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyis// 'od 'phro 'gyed pa'i lus kyi lha yang dga'// sems can rnams kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ste/
70a6(phal chen): de la rgyal ba chos kyi char yang 'bebs// ji ltar mos par nem nur rnam par sel// de yis gtsug pud 'phyang ba dga' ba thob/ rgyan gyi char 'bebs mig bzang lha de ni// sems kyi skad
70a7(phal chen): cig gcig gis tshad med pa'o/ / chos don dbyings kyi bye brag mtha' yas pa// rgya mtshor tha dad yang dag shes pas 'jug/ zhing rnams brjod du med pa thams cad du// 'gro ba kum la
70b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas legs brjod pas/ / de phyir yon tan sangs rgyas zhing kun grags// de ni rjes su spos mig lha yang dran// mtha' yas shing gi rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs//
70b2(phal chen): byang chub shing la kun kyang ma lus bstan// rdo rje sna tshogs sbyin gyi lhu de ni// byang chub shing la dga' bar rnam par lta// sangs rgyas ye shes snying po byung chub la// phyogs
70b3(phal chen): rnams kun tu mtha' dang mu med de/ / pad+mo snang zhing gsal ba'i lha de ni// rnam thar rnam yangs 'di la rab dka' 'o// sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs dgabs ma mi khyag/
70b4(phal chen): snying po byang chub 'di ni kun kyang grag/ yang dag bsgrubs pas byung ba de dag ni// thams cad sna tshogs snang ba'i 'od nyan to// de la rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal
70b5(phal chen): kyi phyag rgya'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba yangs pa rin po che'i char gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro pad+mo snang ba'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
70b6(phal chen): sku 'od zer gyi kha dog pad+mo'i dra ba thams cad du ston pas dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rkang gis 'gro me tog gtsug phud kyi dpal dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems kyi skad cig
70b7(phal chen): thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs dang rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / rkang gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnon pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ gom pa
71a1(phal chen): 'dor ba thams cad du sems can mtha' yas pa 'dul ba'i rgyam ces bya'o/ / rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig gcig gis
71a2(phal chen): pad+mo'i dra ba sna tshogs sprul pa byed cing rin po che'i char pa dang / dbyangs dang / snang ba kun tu 'gyed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba'i
71a3(phal chen): shugs dang nyams bde ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / rkang gis 'gro shing tsan dan gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du spos kyi ngad sprin
71a4(phal chen): du ldang ba zhes bya'o/ / rkang gis 'gro pad+mo yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ pad+mo'i gseb thams cad nas yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dbyangs 'byung bas snang ba bskyed pa zhes
71a5(phal chen): bya'o/ / rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus kyi 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi dra bas snang ba byed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro me tog mang po'i
71a6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa nga rgya mtshos yang dag par skul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgyas
71a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthus rkang gis 'gro'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dka' ba rgya mtsho'i tshul
71b1(phal chen): kyi shugs bskyed cing / / bskal pa mtha' yas sngan chad spyod pa mdzad// zhing rnams kun rdul shin tu phra mnyam pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgyes pa'i thabs kyis
71b2(phal chen): mchod/ / skad cig sems la pad+mo brjod yas pa// dri zhim sna tshogs mngon par sprul mdzad nas// zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba gshegs mdzad pa// snang ba'i 'od zer
71b3(phal chen): lha des rab tu mthong / / 'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid bsam mi khyab// 'khor rnams kun tu 'byam klas mtha' yas pa'i// rnam par 'phrul ba mi zad rab tu ston//
71b4(phal chen): me tog gtsug pud lha des de mthong ngo // phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus pa// thams cad kun tu gshegs shing bzhud pa yis// sems can mtha' yas
71b5(phal chen): yongs su smin par mdzad/ / shin tu mdzes pas dga' bar de mthong ngo // sems can snyed kyi sprul pa kun 'phros pa// re re'i sku yis chos kyi dbyings kyang 'gengs//
71b6(phal chen): rin chen dri med 'od kyang rab tu gtong // rkang 'gro dpal gyi mtshan gyis 'di mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas te// 'khor du rgyal ba chos kyi char yang
71b7(phal chen): 'bebs/ / bde gshegs de yi 'khor na dgar gnas shing // dga' sgra dbyangs kyis rnam thar de mthong ngo // sangs rgyas dbyangs ni mkha' dang mnyam pa ste// dbyangs kyi yan
72a1(phal chen): lag yon tan kun dang ldan/ / 'jig rten kun bkang sems can rnam par 'dul// tsan dan shing gi 'od ni de la nyan// sru rtse kun nas rgyal ba rnam
72a2(phal chen): 'phrul dang / / dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i mtshan gyi rnams// sgra bsgrags thos shing dga' ba skyer 'gyur te// de ni rdo rje 'od kyi lhas mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs sku bsam
72a3(phal chen): gyis mi khyab ste/ / gom pa gom par yon tan rgya mtsho ston// de dag sems can ji ltar mos pas mthong // rdul gyi 'od kyi lhas ni de mthong ngo // 'jig rten mgon po rnam 'phrul rnam
72a4(phal chen): mang gis/ / phyogs bcur sems can yang dag bskul bar mdzad// me tog 'khor mang rkang pas 'gro ba'i lha// mthong zhing dga' ba yangs pa rab tu 'thob//
72a5(phal chen): de la lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas rnam par dpyod pa
72a6(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'od zer phyogs su snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu med par sangs rgyas kyi 'od rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o//
72a7(phal chen): lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgras 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad la rjod cing yang dag par bskul bas dga'
72b1(phal chen): ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rgyan bzang po'i me tog gadrug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs
72b2(phal chen): kun nas rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spyod yul mtha' yas dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'gro ba rnams la
72b3(phal chen): yang dag par ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o/ / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha snang ba'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad gso ba dang 'dres pa'i
72b4(phal chen): mdangs kyi dga' ba zhes bya'o/ / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spos dri ma med pa'i sprin las char 'bab pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
72b5(phal chen): pa'i dri ma mngon par sel ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha srung 'dzin yongs su sdud pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las dang rmongs
72b6(phal chen): pa rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o/ / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgo kun nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi gnas su rgyal ba
72b7(phal chen): rnam par dmigs par mngon du ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dpal mi g.yo ba'i 'od kyi rnam par pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs
73a1(phal chen): thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing yang dag par sbyong ba zhes bya'o/ / de nas lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i
73a2(phal chen): 'od kyis/ / sangs rgyas kyi mthus lus kyi ris su gtog pa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// /
73a3(phal chen): rirab rdul phran shin tu phra snyad kyi// bskal pa de dag pa snga'i bskal pa ni// rdul ces bya bar 'od mdzes 'od zer rgyal// mchod de smon lam btab pa bdag gis dran// sangs
73a4(phal chen): rgyas sku las 'od 'phro rab bkye ba/ / de yi 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyu// rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba sems can 'dul// 'od 'phro 'od zer lha yis de mthong ngo // dbyangs
73a5(phal chen): kyi yan lag yon tan kun rgyas pa'i/ / sangs rgyas gsung ni zhing rnams kun tu sgrog/ 'gro ba ma lus thams cad yang dag skul// dbyangs kyis 'dul ba de la dga' bar
73a6(phal chen): nyan/ / rgyal ba'i sku ni rab tu zhi la ltos// sku gzugs du ma'ang mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste// 'gro ba kun na'ang bzhugs par rab tu sdang // me tog gtsug gis ji bzhin nyid du
73a7(phal chen): mthong / / 'dren pa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// sems can de dag dad pa ji bzhin du// la la bzhugs dang bzhengs dang gshegs par mthong // de yang spyod la
73b1(phal chen): 'byung ba'i lhas mthong ngo / / rgyal ba'i tshems kyi mtshams rnams thams cad nas// dri zhim 'od 'gro sgron ma'i sprin bkye bas// 'gro ba kun gyi nyan mongs zhi bar 'gyur// drim
73b2(phal chen): spos kyi sprin gyis de mthong ngo / / sangs rgyas mgon po 'gro ba'i skyabs su byung // nyon mongs rmongs shing sdug bsngal gzir ba'i rnams// mgu bar mdzad cil nyon mongs thams
73b3(phal chen): cad bcil/ / snang ba'i 'phreng ba 'chang bas 'di mthong ngo // 'dren pa bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu dkon// rang byung 'jig rten don mdzad skyes pa ni// 'jig rten kun gyi dbul
73b4(phal chen): ba rnam par sel/ / khrel yod dpal gyi 'od snang de skad smra// sems can nyon mongs sgrib pas nyon mongs shing // bdud kyi lam gyis dkrugs te 'phyan pa'i rnams// de dag rgyal ba'i
73b5(phal chen): rnam thar lam ston to/ / bsrung zhing skyong ba'i dpal gyis de mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ltos// sangs rgyas sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings mnan cing // 'jig
73b6(phal chen): rten dbang po gnas su sems can 'dul/ / kun sgo'i mig gi dpal gyi spyod yul lo// de la lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon
73b7(phal chen): tan mtha' yas pa dang gzugs kyi sku rnam par dpyod pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/ / lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ba spu las
74a1(phal chen): khyima'i dkyil 'char ci sprin sku tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / lag na rdo rje ri rab me tog 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po bstan pas
74a2(phal chen): yon tan mtha' yas pa'i lus su 'phrul pa zhes bya'o/ / lag na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyi dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs mtha' yas rbad med pa'i rjes
74a3(phal chen): su song ba zhes bya'o/ / lag na rdo rje dbang po shin tu mang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
74a4(phal chen): rlabs kyis yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya'o/ / lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dbyings rab tu phye ba thams cad ma lus pa la
74a5(phal chen): yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ / lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ shing gi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rgyan yid du 'ong bas brgyan pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje
74a6(phal chen): seng ge'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor yangs pa'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'od ces bya'o// lag na rdo rje 'od 'phro smra/
74a7(phal chen): po dpal gyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can ma rungs pa'i rgyud la lus 'jigs yi lanya ma ston cing kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rin chen gtsug phud pad+mo
74b1(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug gnor bu rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par 'bebs pa zhes bya'o// de nas
74b2(phal chen): lag na rdo rje mthu chem kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su
74b3(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / chos rgyal chos kyis mdzes pa yi// chos nyid de la rnam par ltos// yon tan mtha' yas sku gzugs kyis// 'jig rten kun tu rnam
74b4(phal chen): par mdzes/ / sangs rgyas ba spu thams cad nas// 'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas
74b5(phal chen): rnam 'phrul de dag gis/ / chos kyi dbyings su khyab byas shing // 'gro ba kun la mngon sum du// mi zad sku ni shin tu ston// sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// zhing rnams kun
74b6(phal chen): tu rab tu sgrog/ gsung gis sems can thams cad kyi// bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'gengs// 'jig rten dbang po kun gnas na// thub pa rab tu bzhugs par snang // de dag thams
74b7(phal chen): cad 'khor rnams la/ / 'dren pa dag ni chos ston mdzad// rgya mtsho chos kyi sgo bskul bas// gzhan dang gzhan gyi tshul dag gis// thams cad chos kyi bye brag don// rgyal ba zad
75a1(phal chen): med rab tu ston/ / rgya chen mtha' med tshul dag la// rgya mtsho 'khor rnams rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas 'od zer rab 'dres pas// kun gyis 'dren pa
75a2(phal chen): mthong bar gyur/ / zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun mchod pas// bsod nams rgya chen nam mkha' bzhin// kun 'dren 'dren pa rab tu mthong // sangs rgyas
75a3(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul ma 'dren pa/ / thams cad zhing du ston pa mdzad// 'gro la sangs rgyas mngon sum du// byang chub snying por rnam par mdzes// 'od zer sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi// 'od
75a4(phal chen): 'phro sprin ni kun tu snang / / chos dbyings kun tu khyab byas shing // sangs rgyas spyod yul rab tu ston// / bam po lnga pa// de la byang chub
75a5(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ tshul gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
75a6(phal chen): cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / / 'gro ba la mthar thug par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pas yon tan
75a7(phal chen): kyi tshogs thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa nas sar smon lam rgya mtshos rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /
75b1(phal chen): sgo thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings su bdag gi lus kyi sprin rdul snyed mtha' yas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / zhing thams cad du rang gi ming bsam gyis
75b2(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo sgrog pa'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubs su byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa
75b3(phal chen): mtha' dang dpung med pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / dus gsum gyi bskal pa skad cig gcig tu ston pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam
75b4(phal chen): par thar pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'i yul phan tshun du 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / gang 'di chos kyi dbyings
75b5(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus med pa rang gi lus kyi sprul pas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan
75b6(phal chen): tshun du ston pa rgya chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dag go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnam par thar pa'i
75b7(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/
76a1(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgyal bas dri med rnam par sbyangs// mtha' yangs rdul bzhin yon tan tshad kyang med// sngon
76a2(phal chen): gyi rgyal ba'i sras po dri med pa/ / de la bsam yas chos sprin char yang phab// ji ltar rgyal ba gdan la bzhugs snang ba// de bzhin rdul sbubs ma lus kun na'ang sde//
76a3(phal chen): 'on kyang bde gshegs gshegs dang 'pho ba med// zhing rnams kun tu yul mang rab tu ston// sa yi tshul la 'jug pa tshad med de// spyod pa thub pas byang chub sems dpa'
76a4(phal chen): bstan/ / bsam gyis mi khyab tshul ni kun gsungs pas// rgyal sras rnams ni chos kyi dbyings la 'jug/ chos dbyings 'jug tshul rnam pa rgya che ste// mtha' yas phyogs su
76a5(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus med sgo/ / rdul phran sbubs su rgyal ba 'phrul pa spos// 'gro ba'i bsam pa kun kyang rab tu mkhyen// phyogs rnams thams cad zhing rnams kun tu yang // 'jig rten
76a6(phal chen): gtso mtshan 'gro dang mnyam par byung / / thams cad tshul sgor sangs rgyas don yod de// 'dul bas sems can thams cad rnam par sbyor// rdul sbubs kun tu mtha' dang dbus med pa'i//
76a7(phal chen): rnam 'phrul yangs pa rang byung shin tu ston// sngan chad thub pa'i byang chub spyod pa rnams// ji bzhin kun kyang snying po byang chub brjod// yangs dus bskal pa ji snyed yod pa'i rnams// skad
76b1(phal chen): cig skad cig sangs rgyas ma lus ston/ / der ni sems can 'byung zhing 'jig pa'ang bstan// 'jig rten gatsho za'i ye shes bsam yas ltos// 'byas klas mi zad mtha' yas la
76b2(phal chen): bgrangs pas/ / rgyal sras thams cad sangs rgyas sa lha ste// thams cad skor yang sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med// rgyal sras kun gyis shes par slab min// sangs rgyas
76b3(phal chen): mtha' 'drarnam par martog ste/ / chom nyid mi gnas chos kyi sprin dag gis// sprul pas spyod na kun du rgyas mdzad cing // shing mchog kun drung byang chub 'chang rgya bstan// sangs rgyas sa
76b4(phal chen): rab tu brjod pas na/ / chos gnas thams cad ma lus brjod pa min// 'gro ba thams cad ri ri'i sgo ga nas// sangs rgyas tshas rnams kun la rab tu 'jaH/ de la bya
76b5(phal chen): sems dpa' dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ phyogs kyi dbyings thams cad du mngon par byang chub sems dpa'i 'char rgya dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i rgyan
76b6(phal chen): byed pa zhes bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' yom tan 'ang mchog kun tu sgron ma'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems skad rtsig thos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo zad mi shes pa ston cing /
76b7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings pas ma gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par 'dul bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'bar ba seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnamam ma man
77a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / zhing yang dag par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi 'od zer
77a2(phal chen): kun tu 'od 'phro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyis rnam par spyod pa don yod pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par
77a3(phal chen): thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ye shes kun tu snang
77a4(phal chen): ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su kun nas song zhing chos kyi dbyings la rnam par spyod pa'i sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'
77a5(phal chen): gtsug na rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa la rab tu zhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa shin tu 'byung ba
77a6(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i gsang kun tu 'jam dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa nI/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mchod par nye bar 'gro ba'i snying po zhes
77a7(phal chen): bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mi zad dri med kun tu gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes
77b1(phal chen): bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku med pa las sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o//
77b2(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brji kyi 'od yid du 'ong bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya
77b3(phal chen): mtsho'i phyogs thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji snyed gang dag phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing // rgyal bas de kun skad cig dgongs pas sbyangs//
77b4(phal chen): 'gro bar kun tu zhi ba med pa'i gsung // sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen skor// skad cig dgongs pas chos dbyings kun bkang ste// mtha' yas spyod yul dbyings rnams rgyal ba ston// 'gro
77b5(phal chen): ba kun lam snying po byang chub tu/ / byang chub 'tshang rgya rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// bskal pa brgya phrag stong rnams tshad med du// de bzhin gshegs pas snga na chad spyod spyad de// nam mkha' 'dra bar
77b6(phal chen): byas nas rab bkye zhing / / sangs rgyas zhing 'di sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs// mtha' dang dbus med bskal par la la yis// skyo ba med par rgyal ba'i yul bsams kyang // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
77b7(phal chen): stobs la mtha' dbus med/ / phyi ma'i mtha' yi bskal pa kun tu 'gengs// rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul yul la rnam par ltos// phyogs bcu'i zhing rgyan de dag rnam dag pa// rgyal bas 'dir ni kun
78a1(phal chen): kyang rab tu bstan/ / skad cig skad cig sna tshogs gzugs kyang snang // bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa dag tu// rgyal ba'i ba spu gcig mtha' shes par dka'//
78a2(phal chen): tshal rnams kun skor sangs rgyas chags pa med// 'gro ba 'di na rgya chen bsam yas mdzes// sngon tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro kun tu// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rgya chen bsnyen bkur bas/
78a3(phal chen): de bas 'jig rten gtso la phyogs dbyings rnams// kun nas mchod pa mang po rgya chen 'byung // phyogs rnams bkang ste sangs rgyas byung ba dag/ rdul gyi sbubs su tshad med zhing yang ston/
78a4(phal chen): de dag yul du mi zad mtha' yas pa'i// bskal pa rgya mtshor byin gyis rlob pa mdzad// sngon tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro don spyad// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho tshad med rab skyed cing // 'dra
78a5(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho kun nas 'khor ba yi/ / 'khor rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun kyang sbyangs// sangs rgyas mtshan med sku med rdul dang bral// de bzhin nyid gnas chos dbyings snying po ste// 'gro ba
78a6(phal chen): kun na mtha' yas gzugs su snang / / 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal kun zhi mdzad// de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni//
78a7(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa'i shugs kyis sems can gyi khams kyi tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho
78b1(phal chen): dri med 'od kyi snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems skad cig la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyim sna tshogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o//
78b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'byung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gro ba rnams la mngon sum du yon
78b3(phal chen): tan dri ma med pas yongs su dag pa sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyag gi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying
78b4(phal chen): po byang chub tu thob ma 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi phyogs yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo rnam par gnon pa 'od zer gtsug pud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/
78b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang tha mi dad par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ye shes sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba'i rnam
78b6(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrub par bskal pa mtha' yas pa dag tu byin gyis rlob cing rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs brtson 'grus rdo rje
78b7(phal chen): yangs pa'i snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu 'bar ba'i
79a1(phal chen): 'od kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi thog ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par
79a2(phal chen): bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad yon yan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu
79a3(phal chen): gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams yangs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od mchog yon tan 'byung ba'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo chos kyi dbyings
79a4(phal chen): thams cad la kun nas rab tu gnas par rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od can dpal gyi zla bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems
79a5(phal chen): dpa' rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang // sa yi dkyil 'khor rgya chen kun kyang
79a6(phal chen): yongs su rgyas/ / tshad med sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas zhing yangs rnams kyang rnam par sbyangs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun rgyas byas te// sangs rgyas sems
79a7(phal chen): can khams sbyin 'dul mdzad pa/ / skad cig dgongs pas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' yas 'gro mnyam bsam pa tshim par gsung // bskal pa rgya che mi zad mu med par// rgyal ba 'dra
79b1(phal chen): la mngon sum kun nas bzhugs/ / mgon pos sngan chad ji ltar sbyangs tshul du// rgyal bas spyod yul rnam dag rab tu bstan// chos rgyal de dag ji ltar rnam 'phrul pa// phyogs
79b2(phal chen): rnams rgya mtsho ma lus kun na snang / / snying po byang chub kun na'ang rgyal ba dag/ 'khor gyis bskor cing chos rnams gsung ba snang // 'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad tshim mdzad cing //
79b3(phal chen): 'jig rten dag na sangs rgyas tshul kun mdzes// dbang po ji bzhin chos kyi char pa 'bebs// sangs rgyas chos sku yangs pa rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyid ltar mtshan nyid lus med de/
79b4(phal chen): rgyal ba dri med 'od gsal chos kyi sku// ye shes zhi ba'i sku ni tshad med de// phyogs dbyings kun bkang chos kyi char yang 'bebs// chos rjes thams cad stobs kyis rnam par dag
79b5(phal chen): bde gshegs ye shes mkha' 'dra mtha' yas te/ / rgya chen 'gro ba mtha' dbus med bkang zhing // rgyal ba stobs la 'jug pa rab tu ston// sangs rgyas 'od kyis chos dbyings kun bkang
79b6(phal chen): zhing / / sangs rgyas spyod pa thams cad rdzogs par bstan// rgyas pas sngon tshe ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa// de bzhin ye shes sa rnams rgyal bas bstan// phyogs rnams kun
79b7(phal chen): tu rang byung rnam par mdzes/ / smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa ma lus ston// ji ltar sngon tshe rgyal bas yongs sbyangs pa// rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba kun nas sgrog/ sangs rgyas
80a1(phal chen): yul ni phyogs su zad pa med/ / dbus dang mtha' med gzhal med mtha' yas dbyings// phyogs dbyings kun tu chags med brnyes pas na/ sangs
80a2(phal chen): rgyas zhing rnams kun na shin tu mdzes/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri dang / pad+mo'i ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi ngos dang /
80a3(phal chen): 'khor lo'i lte ba thams cad dang / me tog gi ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / stegs bu'i ngos thams cad dang / rta babs kyi sgo thams cad dang / nor bu'i gzugs kyi ngos
80a4(phal chen): thams cad dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgo thams cad dang / 'od zer sgron ma'i sgo thams cad dang / seng ge'i khri'i rgyan gyi sgo thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
80a5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'thon par gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po
80a6(phal chen): zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems
80a7(phal chen): dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo glos dang / / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal dang / byang chub sems
80b1(phal chen): dpa' mig brgya pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam mkha'i tshul pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid
80b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / de dag la sogs pa
80b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing / 'di ltar nor bu'i rin po che'i me tog gi sprin thams cad ni rab tu
80b4(phal chen): 'byin/ spos kyi sprin thams cad ni shin tu 'gyed/ rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin thams cad ni mngon par 'byin/ yul mtha' yas pa'i spos kun tu 'phro ba'i bdug pa'i sprin
80b5(phal chen): ni rnam par 'gyed cing / nor bu nyi ma'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ni rab tu gtong / sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i sprin ni rab tu sgrog/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba
80b6(phal chen): kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sgron ma'i sprin gyis ni rab tu snang bar byed/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi shing gi yal ki las me tog gi dog pa ni rnam par sbyong / rin po che'i 'od dri ma med pa zad mi shes pa'i nor bu'i
80b7(phal chen): rgyal po'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/ rgyan mdzes pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu 'bebs shing / de lta bu dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang
81a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed cing lhags par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar kayas phyog
81a2(phal chen): su bskor ba byas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i char mngon par phab nas/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/
81a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du bltas nas/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod par gyur to//
81a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang spyod yul rgya mtsho rgya chen po yongs su dag pa rnams so// sgo kun nas chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
81a5(phal chen): spyod yul chags pa med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snang
81a6(phal chen): ba rab tu thob pa rnams so/ / sgo kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i dbyings rab tu thob pa rnams so// gzugs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho rab tu 'dzin pa rnams so// dus
81a7(phal chen): gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams so/ / dga' ba'i shugs rgya chen po rab tu thob pa rnams so// bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor mu med pa yongs su dag pa rnams
81b1(phal chen): te/ chos dbyings dang nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag go/ de nas byang chub
81b2(phal chen): sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo glos rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/
81b3(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnam par sangs rgyas mnyam nyid mkhyen// chags med brnyes pas nam mkha' lta bu ste// phyogs rnams zhing kun rab tu snang
81b4(phal chen): byas nas/ / 'byam klas 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par mdzes// bde gshegs rang byung mtha' dang dbus med de// thams cad phyogs kyi chos dbyings kun rgyas par// dbang phyug chen
81b5(phal chen): po kun gyis mchod bskor cing / / shing gi rgyal po kun gyi drung na bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis// skad cig sems la mi zad yon tan gzugs//
81b6(phal chen): rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan dag thob pas mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni mtha' yas so// bskal pa rgya mtshor sngan chad spyod pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa
81b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'dir/ / sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can smin byas pa// de dag rgyal ba de yi chos 'dzin to// yongs dag dri med 'khor rnams 'khod pa dag/ thams cad sangs rgyas
82a1(phal chen): / lta gang rnam par gnas// pad+mal snying pa 'jo'i gdan bzhugs pa// tshogs kyi nang na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// sangs rgyas gang la bzhugs pas
82a2(phal chen): khri/ / rin chen nor bu'i rgyal ba'i 'od 'phro zhing // chos 'dra smin rnams mtha' yas rab tu byung // snying po du ma'i me tog 'phreng sbyangs pa'o// rin chen 'od 'dza' sman Na/
82a3(phal chen): / 'od byer blams na rab 'bar/ rtababs rnam pa sna tshags rnams kyis bcan// rtsub pa bzugs mngon pa sa tu mdzes// sa dbya ya du 'ong ba rab tu 'an/
82a4(phal chen): rim chen tshon du sna tshogs pad+mo 'phyang // nor bu'i rgyal pos skar khung kun nas brgyan// sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par rab tu mdzes// bla gas rin chen mang pos yongs su gzung /
82a5(phal chen): rdo rje 'od 'phro snang ba'i snying pos brgyan// gtsug na nor bu'i byang chub sems dpas bzung // sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par shin tu mdzes// phyogs bcur sprul pa'i dra ba rab bkye zhing //
82a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam sgra yang sgrog/ gzugs brnyan zhing rnams kun na sdang // thub pa de 'dra'i seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
82a7(phal chen): sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'di ni bde gshegs
82b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas byin rlabs te/ / byang chub spyod pa sngan chad spyad pa dang // sangs rgyas mchod pa'i mchod pa du ma dag/ rgyal ba'i gdan las de dag thams cad snang // spos 'od snang ba
82b2(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po can/ / me tog snying po seng ge'i gdan gyi 'khor// rgyan rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan gyur pa dang // 'khor rnams de dag thams cad kun kyang snang // skad cig skad
82b3(phal chen): cig rgyan gyi kha dog kun/ / rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas gdan las snang // sems can ji ltar mos pa de dag kyang // 'khod cing sangs rgyas tshad med gdan la lta// rin chen lnga ldi pad+ma
82b4(phal chen): mang brtags pa/ / phye zhing byang chub sems dpa' mang po rnams// sna dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab 'byin cing // sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs la bstod pa byed// sangs rgyas bsod
82b5(phal chen): nams tshad med nam mkha' bzhin/ / 'di dag rgyan kun de las rab tu phyung // sa rnams re re'i rgyan rnams gang yod pa// 'gro ba kun gyis de dag bsam mi nus// mi phyed mtshams kyi rdo
82b6(phal chen): rje sna tshogs pa/ / 'khor yangs rnam dag shin tu mnyam pa ste// nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram// byang chub shing gi sa yi 'khor kun tog/ sa phyogs gang na rgyal ba'i gdan
82b7(phal chen): yod pa/ / kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen sna tshogs te// me tog mngon gtor rin chen rnam par bkram// gser tshon mdzes pas de ni rab tu brgyan// sa yi lha mo de dag rab dka' zhing //
83a1(phal chen): skad cig sems kyi mi za sa yang ston// kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du mngon lta zhing // kha dog thams cad rgyan gyi sprin gtong ngo // rin chen gron ma mang po gsal
83a2(phal chen): bar 'bar/ / spos mang dri zhim mang po rtag tu 'byung // dus dang tshod kyi rnam pa mang ston cing // lha rnams kun kyang sangs rgyas mchod pa byed// phyogs rnams btsun zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de
83a3(phal chen): dad sa rgyan phun sum tshogs yod par/ / de dag kun kyang sa dkyil 'di na snang // sangs rgyas byin rlabs mnyam pa med pas byung / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po ches
83a4(phal chen): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gtsug pud kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngan chad
83a5(phal chen): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dag tu/ / zhing kun phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba'i rnams// snying po byang chub 'khor gyi sa 'di la// mi zad sa dang de dag rab tu snang // rnam thar yangs pa gang na snang
83a6(phal chen): ba yi/ / sa la rin chen mdzes kun rnam par bkram// rin chen mang pos dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor// sangs rgyas 'od kyis sprin kyang rab tu snang // sa rnams kun brgyan shing gi dam
83a7(phal chen): pa'i drung / / kun nas nor bu'i rgyal pos rgyan byas las// bsod nams 'od kyi dbyangs kyi 'drug sla 'byung // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshul yang rab tu brjod// rin chem mang po sgron ma
83b1(phal chen): char phab cing / / rin chen mdzes par bkod pa rnam par mdzes// sgra dbyangs kun gyi 'brug sgra shin du sgrog/ sa yi lha rnams sa yang yang dag ston// rin chen 'od 'gro sgron
83b2(phal chen): ma rnam par snang / / 'od zer sprin ni sa las rab tu byung // nor bu dra ba sil ma kun nas bkram// rin chen sna tshogs rigs kyis yan lag brgyan// sa rnams kun nas
83b3(phal chen): mdzes pa 'di dag ltos/ / rin chen mang po tshon bzang rgyan du bkye// 'gro ba dag la chos kyi rgya mtsho sgrog/ de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa mthong // ma lus phyogs na sangs rgyas
83b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi/ / byang chub shing gi phun sum tshogs pa dag/ sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di na kun snang ste// de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa brjod// sangs rgyas gdan las chos rnams
83b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho yi/ / chos sgro bde bar gshegs pas gang gsung ba// sems can kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin du// sa 'khor rnams kyang kun nas rab tu 'byung // dri zhim 'od rnams rtag tu 'byung
83b6(phal chen): bas na/ / de dag ji bzhin snod kyi 'gro la 'gengs// srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed// sa 'khor de nas de 'dra rab tu sgrog/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul phun sum gang dag dang // dri med
83b7(phal chen): sa ni gang gis mdzes gyur pa'i/ / phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams re re zhing // bskal pa bye ba dag tu'ang brjod mi nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas
84a1(phal chen): rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
84a2(phal chen): smras so/ / 'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa tshim mdzad cing // sangs rgyas chos kyi gzhal med khang na mdzes// 'byam klas phyogs rnams kun tu mngon sum du// sangs rgyas 'gro gtso gzhal
84a3(phal chen): med khang na snang / / rin chen kun gyis snying po rab tu brgyan// rgyan rnams kun gyis de bzhin mdzes shing 'bar// sangs rgyas pho brang 'od ni bsam mi khyab// de na bzhugs shing sangs
84a4(phal chen): rgyas rab tu mdzes/ / ka ba'i rgyan ni nor bu sna tshogs te// phyogs rnams kun sgor rta babs sprin kyang bres// stegs bu'i 'phreng ba kun nas rgyan du bkod// gser gyi dril bu'i sprin
84a5(phal chen): kyang rnam par brgyus/ / me tog bla re rnam pa sna tshogs ltos// rin chen shing sdong dar gyi bla re bres// nor bu thams cad sgo nas 'phreng ba 'brul// de na ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu mdzes//
84a6(phal chen): spos dri rgyal mtshan rin chen dra ba ste// 'od zer sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun tu yog/ rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun nas shin tu bres// de na sangs rgyas rab tu 'phags pa bzhugs// phyogs
84a7(phal chen): rnams kun sgo sprul pa'i sprin gyi rnams/ / dbyangs kyis 'jig rten khyab par grags byed cing // 'byam klas phyogs kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba// sangs rgyas pho brang 'di na
84b1(phal chen): de dag grag/ me tog shing dang rin chen spungs spel ba// 'phags par phyogs rnams kun tu mngon par mdzes// de la dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyang // gzugs
84b2(phal chen): brnyan gyur par de dag rab tu snang / / phyogs rnams kun du rin chen mang bkye ba// de dag sna tshogs mdzes par rnam par 'bar// phyogs rnams kun tu skar khung mdzes par
84b3(phal chen): brgyan/ / rta babs mda' yab sna tshogs mang pos brgyan// de la dri med 'od zer kun nas snang ba yi// sangs rgyas pho brang rnam pa bsam yas te// gzhal med khang mang thams
84b4(phal chen): cad de la snang / / de dag kun na'ang rgyal ba bzhugs shing mdzes// phyogs rnams kun na 'khor rnams ji snyed pa// rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dir ni kun zhugs kyang // mtha' dang dpung med mu
84b5(phal chen): yang de bzhin med/ / rang byung sangs rgyas pho brang de na bzhugs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis/ sangs rgyas
84b6(phal chen): kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa de dag thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas zhing rdul shin tu phra snyed kyi// bsod nams rgya
84b7(phal chen): mtsho rnam par rab sbyangs te/ / sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul smon lam yang dag byung // snying po byang chub dri med rnam par mdzes// spos zhim thams cad rtsa nas yang dag rgyu// yid bzhin nor mchog
85a1(phal chen): rgyal pos kun nas brgyan/ / rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu rgyal pos bris// shing spong rtsa ba rin chen kun las byas// rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu 'khor lo 'byung // lhun
85a2(phal chen): rnams thams cad rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ / yal ka stug po sprin ltar kun nas 'khyil// snying po byang chub de na rgyal ba mdzes// yal gdog pa kun nas mngon pa ste/
85a3(phal chen): 'khor rnams snum 'jam phyogs rnams kun tu 'phags// me tog 'bras bu rgyun rnams kun kyang 'gyed// snying po byang chub rgya che bsam mi khyab// 'od rnams bkye ba phyogs
85a4(phal chen): su rnam par mdzes/ / dri ma med pa'i 'od 'bar zad mi shes// yal ka'i sgo nas sprin kun char yang 'bebs// snying po byang chub smon lam yangs pas byung // me
85a5(phal chen): tog nor dang rin chen mi zad nor/ / mu tika nor dag phyogs dang phyogs rnams kun nas brgyus// phye ma nor gyi gnas kyi sprin 'gyed de// snying po byang chub phyogs rnams kun tu
85a6(phal chen): 'byin/ / bde gshegs snying po byang chub 'di la ltos// pad+mo'i dra ba nor bu dri med mang // rin chen 'od zer dkyil 'khor kun nas 'gro// dril bu'i dri ba'i sprin gyi sgra dbyangs 'byin//
85a7(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i shing bzang gzugs rnams gang yod pa// 'byam klas zhing gi ma lus thams cad dag/ byang chub shing la de dag kun nas snang // de drung sangs rgyas dri med rnam par mdzes//
85b1(phal chen): yal ga kun nas rin chen mi zad nor// byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang rtag 'byung zhing // bsod nams rgya chen dkyil 'khor char phab ste// phyogs bcur rgyal ba mchod phyir
85b2(phal chen): de dag 'dong / / de bzhin gshegs pas sngan chad cir gyur dang // byang chub spyod las byung ba 'di dag ltos// yal ka kun las rin chen nor mi zad// sangs rgyas yul kun bsam
85b3(phal chen): kyigyis mi khyab bo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya pa pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug bud kyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas
85b4(phal chen): nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul pa// de dag rin chen sgo nas kun kyang grag/ de ni mtha' dang dpung yang med pa ste// /
85b5(phal chen): snying po byang chub 'di la kun snang ngo // me tog mang po'i 'phreng ba sbyangs bkye zhing // 'od zer sprin gyis phyogs rnams kun bkang ste// byang chub shing la gnas pa'i lha tshogs rnams//
85b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas lta zhing rtag tu mchod pa byed// spos kyi rgyal mtshan nor bu sna tshogs 'bar// spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug spos rtag tu 'byung // 'khor gyi rgya mtsho kun la khyab par zhim//
85b7(phal chen): shing gi rgyal po de phyir phyogs su mdzes// pad+mo 'phrul pa sdug cing gser mdog 'dra// rgyal ba'i sprin sgra rtag par rab tu 'gyed// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus khyab byas shing //
86a1(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel// rgyal ba'i 'khor ni tshad med rgya che ste// phyogs rnams kun nas snying po byang chub la// gzugs brnyan snang
86a2(phal chen): zhing dri med 'od mchog 'gyed/ / byang chub shing gi rnam 'phrul 'di dag ltos// smon lam sgra dang dbyangs kyi mar me rnams// rin chen sna tshogs yal ka kun las 'bar// srid
86a3(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho kun na sngan chad du/ / rgyal ba'i spyod pa ji ltar byung ba ston// byang chub lnga rnams zhing gi rdul snyed de// de dag thams cad snying po byang chub gnas// thub pa'i byang chub shing la
86a4(phal chen): skad cig cing / / rnam thar gzhin dang gzhan mang de dag ston// rang byung spyad pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe// sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa// de dag mtshan bcas sngon gyi
86a5(phal chen): sbyor bcas pa/ / thams cad rin chen sgo nas rab tu snang // phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed snod gyur pa// de dag thams cad 'di las sgra 'byung ste// de dag cis 'dul rnam dag ci 'dra
86a6(phal chen): ba'ang / / snying po byang chub 'di las kun brjod do// byang chub shing rnams mtha' yas phyogs kun na// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyan gyi spri ma can dag/ mtha' yas sna tshogs rgyan can thams
86a7(phal chen): cad kyang / / sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs sbyangs pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phrogazi brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi
86b1(phal chen): mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// srid pa'i rgya mtshor byang chub spyod mdzad tshe// mos pa'i
86b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yongs su smon dag cing / / gnas dang gnas min stobs rnams thugs chud pa'i// bde gshegs sa stobs rnam par dag par mthong // bskal pa kun tu rgya mtsho las sbyangs te// /
86b3(phal chen): mnyam nyid chos bsgoms ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas 'od las de bzhin phyogs bkang zhing // las rnams rgya mtsho de bzhin rab tu brjod// sna tshogs thams
86b4(phal chen): kyis 'byam klas stobs spyong tshe/ / bskal pa snga mar 'gro ba'i dbang po bzhin// yongs su smin byas de bas 'khor kun kyang // sems dag sangs rgyas dbang po'i stobs la 'jug/
86b5(phal chen): 'jig rten kun gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang // bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ba rnam spyod pa// de dag ji bzhin rgyal ba chos ston te// rang byung mos pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ston to//
86b6(phal chen): phyogs rnams ma lus zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang // 'byam klas sems can khams dang chos kyi khams// nam mkha'i khams rnams mnyam nyid mkhyen mi rtog/ rang byung
86b7(phal chen): spu rtser khams mkhyen stobs kyang ston/ / bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen kun tu 'gro// skad cig gcig gis dus gsum ma lus 'gengs// phyogs dang zhing dang bskal
87a1(phal chen): pa 'gro bkang zhing / / sems can kun la stobs 'jug mngon par bstan// bsam gtan rnam thar stobs sa mtha' dbus med// ting 'dzin rgya
87a2(phal chen): mtsho'i tshul ni 'gro kun snyed/ / thams cad rgyal ba'i sku la bstan pas na// sems can bsam pa'i gnas kyi nyon mongs sel// sangs rgyas ye shes dus gsum bsgribs
87a3(phal chen): pa med/ / skad cig kun la dus gsum spu rtser ston// zhing dang sems can sangs rgyas de bzhin chos// de ltar rgyal bas rjes su dran stobs bstan// thub pa'i spyan ni nam
87a4(phal chen): mkha' mnyam pa ste/ / des ni chos dbyings ma lus gsal bar gzigs// thams cad tshul gyis chags med gzhal yas so// brnyes pas ye shes spyan ni rnam mang bstan//
87a5(phal chen): 'jig rten kun gyi sbyor mang ji snyed dang // 'gro ba'i bag chags bag nyam ma lus par// thabs sgo kun nas nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing // rgyal ba 'jig rten gang bar kun nas byung //
87a6(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs kun nas sgrog pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i
87a7(phal chen): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / rgya chen sangs rgyas byin rlabs phyogs kun du// sangs rgyas ston kyang rtog pa mi mnga' ste// pha rol phyin pa rgya chen yongs bkang ba/
87b1(phal chen): byang chub spyod pa rgya chen de dag snang // 'gro ba rnams la thugs rje che bskyed cing // sbyin pa'i mthar phyin sngan chad spyad pas na// de phyir thub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis rgyas// 'gro
87b2(phal chen): ba kun gyis blta zhing dga' ba ste/ / bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po mtha' yas sngon// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs sbyangs pas// de phyir bskal pa phyogs su dri med cing // shin tu
87b3(phal chen): 'phags par 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel/ / ma log mnyam pa nyid la dad bskyed de// sngan chad bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam sbyangs pas// 'gro dang mtshungs mnyam yon tan
87b4(phal chen): kun ston te/ / de bas phyogs su 'od rnams shin tu 'phro// bskal pa ma mtsho mang por sngon spyod tshe// 'gro ba rnams kyi bsgribs pa thibs po bsal// de phyir phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun
