87b5(phal chen): bkang ste/ / shing rab drung na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// bsam gtan yan lag rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe// bskal pa yangs par rgyal bas rab tu spyad// de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal med
87b6(phal chen): dga' ba bskyed/ / nyon mongs dri ma sgrib pa kun kyang sel// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung du sngon spyod cing // shes rab mthar phyin rgyal bas sngon bkang ste// 'gro ba'i gti mug mun
87b7(phal chen): pa yongs su bsal/ / de bas rgyal ba kun tu rnam par mdzes// 'gro ba kun mnyam thabs sgo thabs cad kyis// yang dag byung zhing 'gro ba rnam sbyangs pas// phyogs rnams kun na kun
88a1(phal chen): la mngon par bzhugs/ / phyi ma'i bskal par 'gro ba mngon du lta// smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab skyong tshe// bskal pa rgya mtsho shin du rgya che
88a2(phal chen): zhing / / phyi mtha' bskal par 'gro ba'i sprin mnyam par// spyad pas de phyir 'gro ba kun na mdzes// rgyal bas chos kun stobs kyi mthar phyin pa// bskal pa kazhal
88a3(phal chen): yas mang por yongs su sbyangs/ / de phyir rang byung stobs kyi pha rol phyin// phyogs kyi zhing rnams kun na de phyir 'phags// thams cad mkhyen nyid nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pa'i//
88a4(phal chen): ye shes kun gyi sgo nas sngon sbyangs pas// de phyir chags med ye shes pha rol phyin// phyogs bcu kun na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin
88a5(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs
88a6(phal chen): rgyas rdzu 'phrul yul ni phyogs rnams kyi/ / 'gro ba'i rgyud dbyings nam mkha' mnyam par snang // sa rnams yangs pa ji ltar sngon bskyed pa// de bzhin kun kyang rin chen
88a7(phal chen): sgo nas brjod/ / dang po'i sa dga' ba'i shugs kyi yul// phyogs dbyings kun gyi bde gshegs rnams mthong zhing // gzhal med bskal par dri med yongs sbyangs pas/
88b1(phal chen): chos dbyings yangs la ye shes rab tu byung // thams cad chos la dri med sa gnyis te// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por rnam spyad cing // rgyal ba tshad med rgya mtsho mchod byas nas//
88b2(phal chen): 'gro ba tshad med dri med sbyangs pas byung // bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od ni sa gsum ste// snying po bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor lha mthong brtan// gang du de skyes rin chen sgo dag nas//
88b3(phal chen): chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen rab tu thos// 'od 'phro rgya mtsho ldan pa gzhal med sa// mthu yi 'khor 'od snying po snying rje ste// zhing rnams kun tu sgrib dang mnyam pa'i lus// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs
88b4(phal chen): kun nas rnam sbyangs pa'o/ / dka' rgyal snying po mnyam dbyings mnyam nyid de// zhing rnams kun tu 'gro zhing zhi la gzhol// sangs rgyas chos yul kun nas rab tu skyes// de yang rnam
88b5(phal chen): dag ji bzhin rgyal bas bstan/ / shes rab rgya mtsho yangs pa'i sprin la spyod// 'byam klas chos kyi mthar thug rnam pa kun// zhing rnams kun la mngon sum nam mkha' 'dra// de 'byung
88b6(phal chen): byang chub shing chen 'di las grag/ chos dbyings mkha' dang 'dra ba'i lus can te// 'gro ba kun 'gengs 'gro ba kun snan byed// 'byam klas thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par dag/ ring du
88b7(phal chen): song mchog de ni rgyal bas bstan/ / thams cad chos dang smon lam spyod mang dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyang mnyam rtogs pas// bskal pa kun tu 'gro mchog mi g.yo ste//
89a1(phal chen): gzhal med sa de'i sprin kyang rab tu klog/ tshad med yul can stobs kyis rab tu snang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'gro zhing stobs la 'ju// 'di ni rdul med
89a2(phal chen): dge ba'i blo gros sa/ / bskal pa rgya mtshor byang chub shing las brjod// chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen sa bcu ste// dus rnams kun 'gengs nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'dra// sangs rgyas yul
89a3(phal chen): gyi sgra dang dbyangs kun tu/ / rgyal ba'i byin gyis 'di las rab tu graH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa gti mug med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis//
89a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa du mar 'khor rnams gnas pa ni// dad pa sna tshogs yongs su dag
89a5(phal chen): pa'i sems/ / rgyal dang yul rnams kun la rab tu zhugs// de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// phan tshun smon lam rnam dag spyod yul te// dag pa mtha' yas bya ba
89a6(phal chen): rab tu byas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul thams cad kyang // gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgo nas rab tu mthong // bde gshegs chos kyi sku la zhugs pa dag/ la las rgyal ba'i
89a7(phal chen): chos sku de nyid la/ / kun tu sprin 'dra gzhal med chags med pa'i// mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mthong // la las rgyal ba'i gzugs sku de nyid la// phyogs bcu kun
89b1(phal chen): tu rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing / / yon tan mtha' yas 'od ldin rab 'bar ba// 'gro ba dang tshul sprin du gyur par mthong // la la rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med 'jug/ dus gsum mnyam
89b2(phal chen): nyid mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sku/ / 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stobs la rab tu 'jug par mthong // sangs rgyas gsung ni thogs pa med 'byung ste// phyogs kun
89b3(phal chen): zhing rnams ma lus rgyas 'gyur zhing / / 'gro ba snod bzhin skul bar byed pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la la la 'jug/ la la sangs rgyas snang ba sna tshogs 'jug/ sna tshogs
89b4(phal chen): snang bas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing / / rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu snang mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'od ni la las der yang mthong // ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rab bkye ba'i// 'od zer rgya mtshor
89b5(phal chen): sprin la la la 'jug/ sngan chad rgyal ba'i spyod pa bstan pa la// la la dka' zhing rgyal ba shes par byed// la las bsod nams sna tshogs mtshan gyi rnams// bde gshegs bsod nams
89b6(phal chen): byung ba ji bzhin mthong / / pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe// ji ltar dag gyur mtshan kyang la las mthong // sgo rnams kun nas rgyal ba tshad med de// mtha' dang dpung med chos kyi dbyings
89b7(phal chen): bkang zhing / / sangs rgyas byin rlabs rab tu brjod pa kun// rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas yul ni la las mthong // de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'jig
90a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams me tog go rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang snying po rgya mtsho thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ / rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul
90a2(phal chen): to/ / rab tu 'gal to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go/ rab tu ldeg go// kun du ldeg go/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem kun tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'u
90a3(phal chen): 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag thams cad re res kyang mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char
90a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par rab tu phab bo/ / 'di ltar spos kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char thams cad rab tu phab bo// rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi
90a5(phal chen): sprin dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i dra ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin dang / rin po che kha dog sna tshogs
90a6(phal chen): dang mu tig thams cad kyi sprin dang / / spos dang can dan rin po che thams cad kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i gdugs thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu'i rgyal po'i sgra dbyangs bzang po yid du
90a7(phal chen): 'ong ba'i sprin dang / nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba mang po'i sprin dang / rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mdzod thams cad kyi sprin dang / rang rang gi lus las rgyan thams cad 'phyang ba'i
90b1(phal chen): sprin dang / de lta bu dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
90b2(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par phab bo/ / ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams rab tu dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis
90b3(phal chen): brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang / mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sprin gyi char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag tu
90b4(phal chen): rab tu phab par gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams mos pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / dmigs pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi chu
90b5(phal chen): gyi sgo rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan dang / tshogs gzhan dang gzhan dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / dga' ba'i shugs kyis spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / phyogs
90b6(phal chen): kyi tshul gzhan dang gzhan dang / chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / yul dang stobs la
90b7(phal chen): 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sgo gzhan dang gzhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa khong du chud par byed do// 'di na ji/
91a1(phal chen): lta ba bzhin phyogs bcu chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthaklas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na yang de bzhin no// sha
91a2(phal chen): du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi tshul rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po'o// /
91a3(phal chen): bam po drug pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas
91a4(phal chen): sa ni ji lta bu zhing yangal/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la byin gyi rlabs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs
91a5(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni ji lta bu zhi yanga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi stobs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
91a6(phal chen): la sangs rgyas kyi mi bsnyengs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas
91a7(phal chen): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas
91b1(phal chen): kyi mi 'phrogs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas
91b2(phal chen): rgya snyan ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ / sangs rgyas bcom lnga'i 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi shangs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ljags ni ji
91b3(phal chen): lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sku ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni ji lta bu
91b4(phal chen): zhig mnga'/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/
91b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
91b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa rgya mtsho thams cad na ji
91b7(phal chen): lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshogs rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
92a1(phal chen): theg pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu gnas pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su
92a2(phal chen): ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu
92a3(phal chen): yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho
92a4(phal chen): rnams ni ji lta zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya
92a5(phal chen): mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la yang thugs
92a6(phal chen): brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sems can rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad
92a7(phal chen): grang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan mdzad grang
92b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnams par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi shin tu bstan pa
92b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang snyam pa dang //
92b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs gyis mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // mtha' yas rgya chen
92b4(phal chen): bskal par rab spyad de/ / byang chub shing drung rang byung yang dag skyes// phyi mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i smin gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pas sku ni byin gyis brlabs// 'gro ba ma
92b5(phal chen): lus kun gyi the tsom gcod/ / mos pa'i stobs ni yangs pa rab tu bskyed// sems can sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi bar mdzad// sangs rgyas bde la 'gro ba thams cad 'god//
92b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas zhing rdul snyed// de bzhin gshegs la lta zhing kun nas gnas// de dag bsam pa spyod yul ji bzhin du// the tsom bsal bar chos rnams rab bstan
92b7(phal chen): gsol/ / rgyal ba kun gyis ni ji lta bu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi rgyud rnams dang // sangs rgyas byin rlabs mtha' dang dbus med pa// de dag tshul ni rnam dag bstan du gsol// de bzhin gshegs
93a1(phal chen): pa'i spyod yul ci yis 'jug/ rgyal ba'i mkhyen la ji ltar 'jug pa dang // rgyas chen mtha' yas stobs rnams rnam sbyang ba// rgyal sras kun la yang dag bstan
93a2(phal chen): du gsol/ / sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ji ltar mtha' yas dang // mi bsnyengs chos nyid ji ltar rnam sbyangs dang // rdzu 'phrul mthu yang mtha' dang dbus med pa// 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams la
93a3(phal chen): bsgrag tu gsol/ / ji ltar chos rgyal pho brang mnga' mdzad cing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul ji ltar mi 'phrogs dang // sangs rgyas chos gzhan rgya chen de dag kyang // thugs brtse'i slad du yang rab bstan du
93a4(phal chen): gsol/ / rgyal ba'i spyan ni ji ltar tshad med cing // snyan dang shangs dang de bzhin ljags dang sku// sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar mtha' yas pa// 'di dag tshul la 'jug pa bstan gsal/
93a5(phal chen): zhing rnams rgya mtsho ji ltar sems can khams// chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho de dag dang // sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa// 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras la bstan du gsol/
93a6(phal chen): pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang // rnam par thar la 'jug tshul rgya mtsho dang // chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho dag/ byang chub snying por thams cad bstan du gsol//
93a7(phal chen): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ zhal gyi sgo tshems kyi mtshams
93b1(phal chen): kye gseb nas 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bkye ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i ze ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings su
93b2(phal chen): dbyangs sna tshogs kyis rgyan byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ 'od shin tu phra ba'i sprin kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu
93b3(phal chen): 'phrul dang snying po byang chub kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang bas chos kyi
93b4(phal chen): dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'byung zhing 'khyil ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i rdo rje
93b5(phal chen): dri ma med pa mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
93b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang
93b7(phal chen): 'khor gyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ / 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog shin tu ston pa dag ste/ de dag rab tu 'phros nas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing
94a1(phal chen): gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
94a2(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nas 'od zer gyi sgo de dag thams cad kyi mthus/ gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
94a3(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to/ / 'od zer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// bskal pa
94a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod spyad de/ / phyogs rnams mtshor sangs rgyas kun kyang mchod// sems can rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas nas// rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mngon sangs rgyas//
94a5(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun tu snang zhing mngon par mdzes// spu rnams kun nas sprul pa'i sprin rnams 'gyed// des ni sems can snod bzhin bskul byas nas// byang chub sbyor ba chags med rnam
94a6(phal chen): par dag/ srid pa'i rgyud na sngan chad 'khor ba'i tshe// rgyal bas sems can yongs su smin mdzad pa// de dag skad cig gcig gis rab tu bkrol// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag mtha'
94a7(phal chen): yas so/ / rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun tu 'od kyang snang // byang chub shing ni yal ga rin chen 'phyang // 'od rnams bkye ba kun du rnam par brgyan// byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab der sangs rgyas// /
94b1(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun tu sgra ni rab tu sgrog/ sems can kun gyi sems bzhin tshim byas te// sna tshogs thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par 'dul// de las chos nyid zhi sgra rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams
94b2(phal chen): stong gi rdul snyed sngan chad du/ / spyod tshe pha rol phyin kun rgyas par mdzad// stobs rnams kun la sangs rgyas rab bzhugs kyis// rgyal ba de yi zhal ltar kun kyang deng // zhing gi rdul snyed phyog
94b3(phal chen): rnams thams cad nas/ / rgyal sras mang po rab tu dga' ste lhags// mchod pa sna tshogs char ba rab 'bebs shing // thams cad 'khod de rgyal ba mngon sum lta// gsung dbyangs gcig las
94b4(phal chen): mtha' yas mdo yi rnams/ / rgya mtsho dag kyang sangs rgyas shin tu ston// 'gro kun yid bzhin chos kyi char 'bab kyis// rkang gnyis gtso bo de la ltar yang deng // dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam
94b5(phal chen): gang yod pa/ / skad cig thugs la de dag mngon sum ste// rgyal ba byang chub shing drung ston mdzad kyis// rgyal ba'i drung du sbyar te 'dong bar gyis// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ye shes mtsho//
94b6(phal chen): 'od zer kun gyi sgo nas rab tu snang // de yi chos nyid ji lta ci 'dra de dag ltos// sangs rgyas 'gro kun mngon sum chos ston to// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag nas de bzhin
94b7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul ba'i rnams/ / byang chub sems dpa' rang rang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
95a1(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dab chags su shar
95a2(phal chen): phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dpal dri ma med par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po
95a3(phal chen): che'i 'phreng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi chu bo rnam par sangs rgyas pa nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho
95a4(phal chen): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi
95a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing rin po che'i
95a6(phal chen): char gyi 'od zer pad+mo'i sprin bcus rnam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i ri bo'i zom gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
95a7(phal chen): nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor rgya sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par
95b1(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sil snyan sgra thams cad 'byin pa'i sprir bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phye ma'i shing gi mdzod kyi sprin bcus nam
95b2(phal chen): mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos dang bdug spos gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
95b3(phal chen): pa dang / spos thams cad shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa mchod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba
95b4(phal chen): snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te/ me tog
95b5(phal chen): snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sang ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dod par gyur to/ / de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su
95b6(phal chen): lho phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad snang bas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig
95b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'od mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mkhyen pa'i 'od dpal gyi ri'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshonas
96a1(phal chen): b yang chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan
96a2(phal chen): cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i snying
96a3(phal chen): po'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
96a4(phal chen): pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i
96a5(phal chen): rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi yal ma
96a6(phal chen): sna tshogs kyis snying po byang chub kyi rgyan byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sgo kun nas blo che'i 'od zer dang sangs rgyas kyi
96a7(phal chen): sprul pas snang bar byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad dang ma 'dres par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs
96b1(phal chen): brnyan ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro shin tu sdug pa'i sgronams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rjes su
96b2(phal chen): sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha'i kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin bshags pa'i gzhal med
96b3(phal chen): khang gi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis des gsum
96b4(phal chen): gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa nor ba'i rgyal po'i sprim 'jig rjen
96b5(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra mo snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyim te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas
96b6(phal chen): lho phyogs su brten te/ in+d+ra nI la dang / 'dzam bu nA da dang / pad+ma ra ga sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo grang bangs re 'khod par gyur to//
96b7(phal chen): de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su nub phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya yod de/ 'jig rjen gyi
97a1(phal chen): khams da dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gos kyi stan yongs su 'byung ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos mngon du snang ba'i yon tan rin po ches brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya
97a2(phal chen): mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das
97a3(phal chen): gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing nor bu'i
97a4(phal chen): rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang spos 'od 'phro ba'i khang pa brtsegs
97a5(phal chen): pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
97a6(phal chen): brlabs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas
97a7(phal chen): yongs su brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'phro ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs
97b1(phal chen): pa rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan cing rgyan du ma yang dag par ston pa'i khang pa
97b2(phal chen): brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyogs thams cad rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin
97b3(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dang / dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog
97b4(phal chen): par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / / de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa
97b5(phal chen): byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po lo ma sna tshogs gser las
97b6(phal chen): byas pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ / de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su byang phyogs na/ 'jig
97b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya pad+mo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ut+pa la'i rgyan na/ de bzhin
98a1(phal chen): gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byin
98a2(phal chen): pa'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ spos dang /
98a3(phal chen): nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / sgo thams cad nas lo ma'i dog pa'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam
98a4(phal chen): mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / shing gi gzugs thams cad las rgyan mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
98a5(phal chen): brlabs pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu nar ba'i me tog gi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor
98a6(phal chen): thams cad kyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
98a7(phal chen): lus phyed yang dag par ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sngon gyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i shing gi sprin
98b1(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i gos kyi mdzod kyi nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas
98b2(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad rab tu sgrog cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra kun tu gtong ba'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de
98b3(phal chen): dag la sogs pa shing gi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom
98b4(phal chen): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri nor bu sgron ma'i pad+mo'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas
98b5(phal chen): yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung dang shel gyi kha dog tshon gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
98b6(phal chen): yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sgron ma bzhugs
98b7(phal chen): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar me zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams
99a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i
99a2(phal chen): pad+mo'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / seng ge'i khri nor bu'i rgyal po kun tu mngon pas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus
99a3(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rgyan mang po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
99a4(phal chen): brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri
99a5(phal chen): phyogs kun nas 'phreng ba rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri spos kyi me tog pad+mo'i 'phreng ba rin po
99a6(phal chen): cha thams cad kyi snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i
99a7(phal chen): rgyal po'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rgyan dang 'phreng ba thams cad 'phyang zhing rta babs dang stegs bus rab tu brgyan
99b1(phal chen): pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ga'i khri shing thams cad kyi yal ga las nor bu rin po che dang phye ma 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi sprin
99b2(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri spos dang rin po che'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying
99b3(phal chen): po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa seng ge'i khri'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha'
99b4(phal chen): kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten te/ seng
99b5(phal chen): ge'i khri nor bu rin po che snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo sna tshogs kyi snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ / de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams
99b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya'i 'od zer kun tu snang ba gser gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
99b7(phal chen): de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dpal dri ma med par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dga' ba'i shugs dpal gyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas
100a1(phal chen): b yang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun tus sgron ma'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan
100a2(phal chen): cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thams cad kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
100a3(phal chen): rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i ze ba can gyi me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / spos rin po che'i bla re thams cad kyi sprin bcus nam mkha'
100a4(phal chen): kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas
100a5(phal chen): kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / 'od dang / sgra dbyangs rab tu ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad gzugs
100a6(phal chen): brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi dog pa lta bu rin po che'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas
100a7(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dril bu sna tshogs kun tu sgras khyab par byed pa'i dra ba'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / pad+mo'i dra ba mtha' yas
100b1(phal chen): ba sna tshogs rin po che'i snying po can gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gser gyi ze ba 'od 'phro zhing snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam
100b2(phal chen): mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas
100b3(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing /
100b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te/ seng ge'i khri pad+mo sna tshogs rin po ches rab tu brgyan
100b5(phal chen): pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ / de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams na//
100b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi ma'i 'od rab tu 'bar bas kun nas snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang seng ge ltar
100b7(phal chen): snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug
101a1(phal chen): bud rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong
101a2(phal chen): bar gyur te/ sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / 'od zer snang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i me tog gi
101a3(phal chen): gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig mang po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par
101a4(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo nas rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
101a5(phal chen): pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i tshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od
101a6(phal chen): kyis rab tu brgyan cing dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i shing gi yal ga thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs
101a7(phal chen): kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / / nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma rnam par snang ba'i lte ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
101b1(phal chen): pa dang / spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma mang pos kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs
101b2(phal chen): kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po rnam par bstan pas kun tu rgyan gyis khyab par byed pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha'
101b3(phal chen): kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gdugs kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
101b4(phal chen): rlob pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brten te/ seng ge'i khri in+d+ra nI la yid du 'ong
101b5(phal chen): bar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ / de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su nub
101b6(phal chen): dang byang gi phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi kham rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i skar mda' 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las
101b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems
102a1(phal chen): dpa' 'od zer dang gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/
102a2(phal chen): rin po che thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i
102a3(phal chen): gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus
102a4(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'od zer gyi sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
102a5(phal chen): pab dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzugs brnyan gyi khongs su chud pa'i 'od kyi dkyir 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i yal
102a6(phal chen): ga'i sgo kun nas sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu sgrog pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i rigs kyi
102a7(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sems skad cig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil
102b1(phal chen): 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngor lam 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu gtong ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin
102b2(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i sgra sgrog pa/ nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus
102b3(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nam mkha' kun
102b4(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ seng ge'i
102b5(phal chen): khri 'od zer 'bar ba mi zad pa'i gzi brjid kyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ / de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang
102b6(phal chen): 'dab chags su 'og gi phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo dri zhim dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin
102b7(phal chen): po che'i seng ge snang zhing 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od zer bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
103a1(phal chen): k yi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu
103a2(phal chen): 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / spos thams cad kyi 'od
103a3(phal chen): zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
103a4(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod pas khyab par byed pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rnam
103a5(phal chen): par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
103a6(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bskal pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par sangs rgyas yang dag par 'byung zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba brjod pa'i 'od zer
103a7(phal chen): gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che zad ma shes pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
103b1(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od zer gyi sprin bcus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa
103b2(phal chen): byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'og gi phyog su brten nA/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag
103b3(phal chen): mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ / de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dab chags su steng gi
103b4(phal chen): phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan yid du 'ong
103b5(phal chen): ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas
103b6(phal chen): b yang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo bros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas
103b7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu rin po che kun
104a1(phal chen): nas 'od kyi dra ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rgya chen pos rnam par snang bar 'od
104a2(phal chen): 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos thams cad 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
104a3(phal chen): rgyan thams cad 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha'
104a4(phal chen): kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / shing dang ze ba rnam pa sna tshogs su 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rdo rje smra/
104a5(phal chen): tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par bin gyis brla bas pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa brjod cing 'od 'phro ba'i
104a6(phal chen): sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig gi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs
104a7(phal chen): pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das
104b1(phal chen): la phyag 'tshal nas steng gi phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgrog pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//
104b2(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul
104b3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'
104b4(phal chen): re re zhing yang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing 'ongs par gyur te/ phyin nas
104b5(phal chen): gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul cing / skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// 'khod pa'i rjes la
104b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad re re nas/ 'od zer gyi sprin rin po che thams cad ltar kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu
104b7(phal chen): byung bar gyur to/ / rin po che re re'i sgo nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i snying po can la 'khod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to//
105a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubs gang bar byas nas/ rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang zhing
105a2(phal chen): 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad du rab tu 'jug par gyur to/ / zhing re rer yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mthong zhing shes par
105a3(phal chen): gyur to/ / sems kyi skad cig re re la yang rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig
105a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re'i lha'i gnas thams cad du skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to/ / sems kyi
105a5(phal chen): skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to/ /
105a6(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu brjod cing rnam par
105a7(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to/ / sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par
105b1(phal chen): bya ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsgrag pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'gro ba
105b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag rnam par bstan cing brjod pa'i sgo ga nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi
105b3(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin thams cad kyi char dbab pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to/ / sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi
105b4(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi dbyings snang bas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to/ / sems
105b5(phal chen): kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi skus chos kyi dbyings gang bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa dang / 'od thams cad kyi sgo dag nas
105b6(phal chen): yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to/ / sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' kun
105b7(phal chen): tu bzang po rab tu gnas pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to/ / de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par
106a1(phal chen): skul ba byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag tu bdal te/ zhing re rer yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi ngan song
106a2(phal chen): gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar byed do/ / sems can phyin ci log la nges pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni yang dag par nges pari phung po la rab tu 'god do// sems
106a3(phal chen): can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / mtho ris su skye ba la rab tu 'god do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
106a4(phal chen): sa la rab tu 'god do/ / sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi
106a5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni sngan chad ma bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar byed do/ / zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa
106a6(phal chen): yang dag par 'thob pa la yang dag par skul lo/ / zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan chos thams cad kun nas snang
106a7(phal chen): zhing gzigs pa la yongs su sbyangs te rab tu 'god do/ / zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed stobs thams cad kyis rab tu gnas pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs
106b1(phal chen): zad mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs
106b2(phal chen): parnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang brgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa la rab tu 'god do/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od zer gyi sgo tham
106b3(phal chen): cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to/ / 'od zer thams cad sgo nas sgra 'byung ste// ji snyed byang chub spyod par 'jug pa dang // rgyal sras yon tan phun sum gang yod pa'i//
106b4(phal chen): dbyangs kyis phyogs rnams kun tu bkang zhing sgrog/ bskal pa rgya mtshor skyo med spyad pa spyod// sdug bsngal kun las 'gro ba kun 'grel kyang // yid la skyo med zhum pa gang yang med//
106b5(phal chen): 'di yi tshul la rgyal sras rab tu zhugs// chos kyi sgo rnams kun la rab spyod cing // tshul 'dir bskal pa rgya mtsho zad par byed// mtha' med dbus med lhag ma gang yang med//
106b6(phal chen): de dag chos nyid zhi ba rab tu sgrog/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa// rgyal sras de dag 'gro la phan don du// de dag thams cad ma lus yongs su sbyong // de dag spyod pa'i rgyan ni 'di
106b7(phal chen): 'dra'o/ / rgyal ba kun gyi 'khor du nyer phyin te// phyogs rnams kun na gzugs brnyan lus 'chang zhing // rgyal sras ye shes rgya mtsho'i blo gros can// de dag chos nyid zhir 'jug 'di 'dra
107a1(phal chen): 'o/ / 'od zer sgo rnams re rer mtha' yas pa'i// bsam yas zhing rnams de dag rab tu 'jug/ spyod pas mig ni kun nas yongs dag ste// rgyal sras de dag spyod yul//
107a2(phal chen): 'di yin no// skra rtse gcig tu de dag rab gnas shing / zhing rnams dbyings kun kun nas bskyod byas kyang // sems can rnams la 'jigs par mi byed de// sa 'di rnam dag tshul 'chang dag
107a3(phal chen): gi'o/ / tshul rnams kun la bsam gyis mi khyab lus// de dag kun tu zhing rnams sna tshogs sprul// skad cig sems la 'chi 'pho skye ba snang // rgyan 'di sems la chags med rnams
107a4(phal chen): kyi'o/ / dus gsum bskal pa gang yod ma lus par// skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu ston// sgyu ma lta bu lus med dngos kyang med// de 'dra'i chos nyid chags med bros
107a5(phal chen): rtogs so/ / bzang po'i spyod pa mchog la zhugs pa rnams// 'gro ba kun la yid du 'ong ba'i lus// rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te// 'od zer kun gyi sgo nas dbyangs kyang
107a6(phal chen): sgrogade nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa thob par bya/
107a7(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi snang bas phyogs rnams par ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o// 'od zer rin po che thams
107b1(phal chen): cad kyi kha dog sgron ma'i sprin du 'dral ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu snang ba de byung nas/ tshul thams cad kyi phyogs 'byam klas pa rab tu snang bar byas te/ phyogs thams cad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho
107b2(phal chen): rnams rab tu snang bar byas nas/ sems can rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan nas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po thams cad rab tu bskyod pa'i
107b3(phal chen): rgyan gyi tshul thams cad kyis rab tu bskyod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad dang mnyam pa dag tu spros nas/ sems
107b4(phal chen): can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta bu rgya mtsho dag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi char dus gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa phab ste/
107b5(phal chen): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rab tu bstan nas/ sems can thams cad ma lus par 'khor ba thams cad las rab tu gdon par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa ji
107b6(phal chen): bzhin du 'byung ba dang mthun pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam ma lus pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams
107b7(phal chen): cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dag tu dga' bar phrad pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pad+mo
108a1(phal chen): chen po chu ba rin po che thams cad las bsgrubs pa/ nang rim nor bu'i rgyal po'i mdzod sna tshogs las byas pa/ lo ma rin po che thams cad kyi rigs kyi char 'bebs
108a2(phal chen): pa/ ze ba'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan spos rin po che thams cad las byas pa/ snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi tshon gyis rab tu mdzes par bris pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag cing
108a3(phal chen): 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i sprin dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba/ sems kyi skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pa'i sgra rab
108a4(phal chen): tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin gyis thams cad du gang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam
108a5(phal chen): thams cad du rab tu ston pa'i dbyangs 'byin par gyur te byung ngo / / pad+mo chen po de byung ba'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs shes
108a6(phal chen): bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar g.yas
108a7(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ pad+mo chen po de'i snying po la 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu
108b1(phal chen): za ba snyed po de dag kyang ze ba'i 'phreng ba de dag la 'khod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhing tshad med
108b2(phal chen): pas rab tu dga' ba'i shugs shin tu skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes can/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
108b3(phal chen): rab tu zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pa/ ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad mi shes pas
108b4(phal chen): kun tu khebs par byed pa/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kun tu bsgyur ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dus gsum khyab par byed pa'i
108b5(phal chen): spyod yul gyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'chang ba/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu 'jog cing / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i
108b6(phal chen): mur thug par ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi lus dang ldan pas de bzhin gsheg
108b7(phal chen): pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas sku ni chos kyi dbyings kyis
109a1(phal chen): gsal/ / 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba mngon sum ste// ji ltar mos pa'i sems can rgyas bkang nas// snying po byang chub de la rgyal ba bzhugs// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran
109a2(phal chen): mchog snyed kyi/ / rgyal ba spu rtse kun la rab bzhugs te// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa mchog ston to// spu gcig rtsel zhing mang rgya mtsho ste/
109a3(phal chen): byang chub snying por pad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings rgya chen thams cad kun bkang ste// spu rnams kun la rnam par 'phrul pa ston// zhing rnams re re dag na rab bzhugs shing //
109a4(phal chen): zhing rnams 'byam klas kun tu rgyas mdzad pas// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams// kun kyang snying po byang chub drung du 'dong // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi//
109a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong // chos dbyings 'byam klas rtag tu rgyas par 'gengs// zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan
109a6(phal chen): rab tu ston/ / chos dbyings rdul rnams ye shes spyod yul can// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du yang dag byung // byang chub sems dpa'
109a7(phal chen): ye shes mchog yul can/ / chos sprin nyan cing rab tu mkhas pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams kun na gnas// zhing rnams kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod//
109b1(phal chen): mtsho'i chos la rnam par snang bar spyod// de dag rgyal ba'i sa rnams rgya mtshor zhugs// sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba// de dag smon lam rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug/ sangs
109b2(phal chen): rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang / / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa de dag shes// sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing // de dag rnam 'phrul rgya chen kun la zhugs// zhing rnams
109b3(phal chen): kun gyi rdul phran mang snyed kyi/ / lus kyi sprin ni rtag par rab tu ston// sems can kun bkang 'od kyis kun la skyob// bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs// de
109b4(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
109b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu zab// dus rnams kun tu de 'byung ste// chos dbyings thugs su chud pas na// 'jig rten mgon zhes rab tu brjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// 'dres pa med/
109b6(phal chen): cing gnas pa med// sems can thams cad yid bzhin du// gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong // chos rnams thams cad mngon sangs rgyas// chos rnams kun la rab tu bzhugs//
109b7(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs// zhing rnams kun na rnam par mdzes// kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par// sems can thams cad yid bzhin du// sems can mchog gi 'od rnams dang /
110a1(phal chen): de bzhin sku yi sprin kyang mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dag las// mi zad sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rnams// zhing rnams kun tu rab sgrog cing // chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu snyom
110a2(phal chen): spu rnams re re kun nas kyang / / phyogs bcu 'od zer dra ba dag/ sangs rgyas gsung ni rab 'byin cing // gdul dka' thams cad rnam par 'dul// sangs rgyas 'od zer sgo rnams nas// sgra dbyangs
110a3(phal chen): zab mo rtag tu 'byung / / sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho ni// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' dang dbus med rab tu bskor// ye shes zab mos
110a4(phal chen): shes bya ba/ / rgya chen phyogs su rab tu ston// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing // yang dag sangs rgyas ston pa
110a5(phal chen): mdzad/ / sku rnams re re kun las kyang // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul mnyam pa// sangs rgyas sems can mnyam byung zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
110a6(phal chen): chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab par// sangs
110a7(phal chen): rgyas sku ni rnam par mdzes/ / rgya chen gsung ni rab byung ba// zhing rnams rgya mtshor shin tu sgrog/ 'jig rten thams cad kun 'jug par// 'jig rten mgon po shin tu mdzes// 'gro ba kun gyi
110b1(phal chen): bsam mkhyen cing / / byin gyi rlabs ni rab tu ston// sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun la mngon// sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin// thams cad gzigs pas sangs rgyas kyi// rnam par 'phrul
110b2(phal chen): pa thams cad mthong / / mtha' yas 'od mnga' sangs rgyas sprin// chos rnams rgya mtsho'i 'brug kyang sgrog/ ye shes rnam rgyu'i tshul bzhin du// rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug/ 'jug pa rnams
110b3(phal chen): la 'byung ba med/ / 'byung ba yod par rnam par bstan// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// chos rnams 'byung ba nam mkha' bzhin// 'pho dang gnas pa mi mnga' ste// 'on kyang
110b4(phal chen): rgyal ba kun na snang / / sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings las byung // de phyir sangs rgyas rab tu brjod// yul na bzhugs med rang bzhin med// de la 'byung ba mi mnga' ste// sku dang mtshan
110b5(phal chen): kyang de bzhin med/ / rgyal ba gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'o// 'gro ba kun tu chos kyi sprin// bsam pa kun la rab tu byung // yang dag sangs rgyas rnam kun tu// sems can rgya mtsho 'dul
110b6(phal chen): bab mdzad/ / 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi// snying po byang chub kun na snang // 'khor gyi rgya mtsho thams cad na// zhing rnams kun gyis rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dag la/
110b7(phal chen): yon tan rgya mtsho zad mi shes// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// de dag yon tan zad pa med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od kyis/ sangs
111a1(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sar// byang chub sems dpa'
111a2(phal chen): gang bzhugs pa/ / de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyi// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad mthong // ye shes lus kyis zhugs pa rnams// zhing kun rdul gyi sbubs su yang // de bzhin gshegs pa
111a3(phal chen): thams cad dang / / bdag nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo // gzugs brnyan zhing rnams thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'byung // kun tu byin gyi rlabs rnams dang // rnam
111a4(phal chen): par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang // spyod pa gang gis rnam sbyangs pa// de dag zhing rnams thams cad du// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul mthong // kun tu
111a5(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid gyur cing / / kun tu lus kyis rab gnas te// ye shes lus kyi rjes song na// sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs pa'i rnams// chos kyi
111a6(phal chen): dbyings la rnam par mdzes/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi spu dag tu// rgya mtsho'i zhing la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing dag tu// byin gyi rlabs rnams rab bstan pas// gzhan dang gzhan
111a7(phal chen): byi lus dag dang / / ming gis kun na rab tu gnas// byang chub snying por rnam 'phrul dang // byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag/ skad cig sems kyis
111b1(phal chen): ston par byed/ / zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad dang // bskal pa bye ba bsam yas dag/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag rnams// skad cig sems kyis rnam par ston// sangs
111b2(phal chen): rgyas zhing rnams thams cad na/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa rnams// sangs rgyas sku la rnam spyod kyang // mtha' ma rnyed par mi rung ngo // de nas byang chub sems
111b3(phal chen): dpa' seng ge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros kyis/ / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgya
111b4(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// chos dbyings tshul rnams thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon du yog/ 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho dang //
111b5(phal chen): phyogs bcu kun na gang yod pa// thams cad kun tu 'khor lo 'khor// de ni smon lam rnam 'phrul pa'o// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba// gzhan dang gzhan gyi ming dag gis// zhing rnam
111b6(phal chen): gnas pa kun tu yang / / chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'khor// rnam par snang mdzad byin gyis brlabs// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dag/ brjod cing
111b7(phal chen): zhing rnams kun tu 'byung / / zhing kun rdul la sku yi rnams// thams cad chos char rab tu 'bebs// 'dres pa med cing 'byung ba med// 'jig rten dag na rnam par mdzes// bskal pa bye
112a1(phal chen): / bgrangs med par// zhing kun rdul phran sbubs dag tu// rnam par snang ba mdzad pa'i gsung // sngon gyi spyod pa rab tu sgrog/ zhing rnams thams cad rdul snyed kyi/
112a2(phal chen): 'od zer dra ba phyogs bcu na// sangs rgyas 'od zer kun sgo nas// byang chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul// kun tu ma 'dres sku dag gis// chos dbyings yongs su rab gsal te// 'gro rnams
112a3(phal chen): 'dul ba ji bzhin du/ / gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong // dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi// mgon po ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gyi mtshan kyang sgrog/ sangs rgyas
112a4(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul la ltos/ / da ltar byung dang 'das pa dang // sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa// de dag kun gyi bsam yas pa// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu grags// de nas
112a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar mes/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
112a6(phal chen): dag smras so/ / gang gis byang chub sems dpa' yi// ye shes tshogs 'di kun non cing // ye shes rtogs pa rnyed pa'i rnams// de dag 'di yi tshul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam
112a7(phal chen): ba'i dbyangs/ / zhing rnams kun tu rab tu 'byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te// byang chub sems dpa'i ched du brjod// skad cig re re'i sems kun la// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par
112b1(phal chen): rgyu/ / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing rten// chos rnams rgya mtsho kun la zhugs// rgyan gyi pha rol phyin pa rnams// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// sangs rgyas thams cad sku dag tu// zhing
112b2(phal chen): rnams kun na gnas shing spyod/ / rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang // chos rnams kun ni rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams kun kyang khyab par byed// ye shes chags med spyod yul lo// sangs
112b3(phal chen): rgyas tham cad spyod yul du/ / lus pa med par kun bkang zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam spyod pas// sangs rgyas spyod yul rnams la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes bsnyags dbyangs//
112b4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings ni rab sgrogs pa// chos dbyings rjes su shes pa'i rnams// dbyangs kyi rgya mtsho rnams la spyod// bskal pa rgya mtshor ma 'dres par// sgra dang dbyangs rnams shin tu sgrog/ dus
112b5(phal chen): rnams thams cad shes pas gsal/ / dbyangs kyis de dag sa la zhugs// sgra ye shes la rmongs pa med// sems can sgra yang spyod yul te// thams cad mkhyen pa kun gyi yang // rnam par
112b6(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i dbyangs shes so/ / sa nas sar yang phyir gyur cing // stobs kyi sa la rab gnas te// bskal pa bye bar spyad pas na// chos nyid 'di la rab tu 'jug/ de nas
112b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros kyis/ / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di
113a1(phal chen): dag smras so/ / gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// chos rnams de dag mtshan nyid med// ye shes sa ni thob pa'i rnams// 'jig rten gtso bo rab tu mthong // shes rab
113a2(phal chen): snang ba'i kun 'od can/ / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag rnams// sangs rgyas thams cad kun gyi yang // sku yi rnam par 'phrul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings la rnam spyad cing //
113a3(phal chen): lus kyi dngos la rab 'jug ste// zab mo'i chos rnams rtogs gyur nas// smon lam dag gis yang dag byung // bsod nams rgya mtshos byung gyur cing // ye shes sa la rnam par gnas/
113a4(phal chen): chos la rnam spyod khong du chud// spyod pa'i mchog la rab tu spyod// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi drung dag tu// chos kyi dbyings la spyad pas na// rang bzhin
113a5(phal chen): lus ni rab tu mthong / / zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad du// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// thams cad gzigs pa'i chos kyi rnams// rgya mtsho kun la rab tu spyod//
113a6(phal chen): bdas 'thong bab ni lus dang rdul// gcig tu 'dres par mngon par byas// maskyes mtshan nyid med pa 'o/ 'di rnams can du'ang rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten kun gyi brnam sathun
113a7(phal chen): par/ / sems can kun la mngon gsum du// lus kyi sprin ni bstan byas shing // byang chub don du sems can 'dul// sangs rgyas thams cad mthu yis na// byang chub sems
113b1(phal chen): dpar brjod pa ste/ / gang gis mthon po mthong ba yi// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs shin tu zab// mgon po ji snyed gang bzhugs pa'i// byin rlabs mtha' dang dpung med de// chos dbyings rab tu gang byas nas/
113b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam 'tshang rgya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug pud rab tu 'phyang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur
113b3(phal chen): rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams kun tu sangs rgyas kyi// gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgra 'byin te// chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// yon tan sprin ni
113b4(phal chen): rab tu brjod/ / yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba ste// gzugs kyi sku yang rab bstan cing // chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug/ dga' dang mos pa'i shugs rnams dang //
113b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas stobs rnams thams cad la// rab tu gnas shing de dag ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug/ shes rab chung ngus chos 'di dag/ kun nas shes par mi nus te// ye shes
113b6(phal chen): mig ni rab sbyangs shing / / 'di yi tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// rab tu gnas dang byin rlabs dang // chos kun rnam par spyad pa dang // rab tu 'jug dang ldan pa yi// mnyam pa nyid la rab
113b7(phal chen): tu zhugs/ / chos rnams mtha' yas glong gi rnams// chos kun mtshan nyid rnams la ste// kun mkhyen nyid la rab zhugs shing // chos kyi rgya mtsho kun la spyod// sangs rgyas zhing na
114a1(phal chen): kun 'khod cing / / thams cad kun na rnam par mdzes// 'ongs pa med cing 'phos pa med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de 'dra'o// gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'i sku rnams ni/
114a2(phal chen): sems can rgya mtsho'i nang na snang // mos pa ci 'dra yod pa'i rnams// de bzhin mgon po kun gyis mthong // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang // spyod pa mang po sus sbyangs pa// de dag thams/
114a3(phal chen): cad pa spu la'ang // rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag mthong // lus kyi rnams ni re res kyang // chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu khyab// 'khor lo kun na 'khor ba ste// chos kyi 'khor lo bsam mi
114a4(phal chen): khyab/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe
114a5(phal chen): tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad nas// 'od zer sprin mang phyogs rnams bcur// kha dog mtha' yas 'bar ba'i 'od// sems can bsam pa kun la 'phro/
114a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// snying po byang chub kun na bzhugs// bdud rnams thams cad rab btul te// 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes// thams cad rdul na'ang ma 'dres
114a7(phal chen): par/ / 'od zer dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams gzhan dang gzhan lam du// zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu ston// zhing gi rnams ni rgya mtsho'i glong // phyogs kyi rnams kyang
114b1(phal chen): kun tu gnon/ / zhing rnams thang chen mnyam zhing dag/ in+d+ra nI lar kun nas gnas// spyi'u tshugs dag dang snrel zhi dang // pad+mo'i dbyibs dang khyad byung drung // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
114b2(phal chen): khyad par du/ / gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas// chos kyi dbyings rnams gar phyin par// thug pa med par gram 'dal ba// de dag kun gyi 'khor rnams su// shin tu bstan pa'i
114b3(phal chen): chos 'byung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dbyings na// 'khod pa'i zhing rnams bsam mi khyab// de dag kun tu chos nyid 'di// 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ston// tha dad med pa'i chos
114b4(phal chen): kyi dbyings/ / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// gcig gi tshul gi rnam pa yis// chos bstan pa ni kun tu 'byung // sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// tshul rnams thams cad rab
114b5(phal chen): tu brjod/ / dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul dag gis// mi zad tshul rnams rab tu bstan// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun na yang // rgyal ba rnams ni mig yor 'drar// snying po byang chub rnams na
114b6(phal chen): snang / / 'byung ba dag kyang yod pa min// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
114b7(phal chen): brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// blta nang blta zhing sangs rgyas rnams// sku gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dga' ba rgyam
115a1(phal chen): kun kyang 'byung / / chos kyi shugs ni rab tu 'phel// mtshan rab kun nas sangs rgyas rnams// phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu byung // rdul rnams kun tu 'jug pa yis/
115a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas sprin kyang de bzhin bstan// skad cig skad cig sems kun la// sangs rgyas 'od ni dpal gyis 'bar// rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang /
115a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che// rgya mtsho chos las 'byung ba rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa// 'di yi yul la rnam par spyod// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la//
115a4(phal chen): gang rnams shin tu gnas gyur pa// de dang de rnams zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul kun las// ye shes zab mo rnam gnon cing // chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ni// mos brgya
115a5(phal chen): mtsho shes pa ste/ / smon lam kun gyis byang ba 'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dang gsung // chags pa med la rab tu zhugs// spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// spyod yul kun kyang
115a6(phal chen): khong du chud/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gnas shing // ye shes spyod yul gyur pa'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings la rab brtson pa// rgyal ba rnams kyis gnon to// skad cig sems kyis zhing
115a7(phal chen): gi rnams/ / sangs rgyas zhing kyi rdul mnyam pa// de dag chos nyid ji bzhin du// rdul gcig steng du rnam par spong // zhing rnams ji snyed thams cad na// zhing gi rnam 'phrul gang yod pa/
115b1(phal chen): chos nyid 'di la zhugs pa'i rnams// zhing gcig tu ni sdud pa byed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi
115b2(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad du// de dag gsung ni zab mo 'byung // dbyangs kyi yan
115b3(phal chen): lag kun rgyas pa/ / chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs so// brjod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyis// sems can kun gyi skad dag tu// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu yang // chos rnams bstan
115b4(phal chen): pa rab tu 'byung / / zhing rnams kun tu ma lus par// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mthong zhing // sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang // byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug/ rdul
115b5(phal chen): rnams re re'i steng nas kyang / / chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa byed// chos kyi sku ni tha dad min// nam mkha'
115b6(phal chen): bzhin te chags pa med/ / gzugs kyi skur ni rnam dmigs pa// mig phor snang ba'i mtshan nyid do// mig yor yul la mi gnas te// nam mkha' bzhin du dngos po med// mnyam pa
115b7(phal chen): nyid 'di rtogs gyur na/ / ye shes rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku ni ma skyes te// gzung ba med cing byung ba med// nam mkha'i mnyam pa nyid dang mtshungs// gzung du med las
