116a1(phal chen): 'di bstan to/ / zhing rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams// de dag spu gcig rtse la tshogs// ye shes mig dang ldan pa yis// spu rnams kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong /
116a2(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad smon lam ste// chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing // bla med chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ zhing rnams kun na rtag tu 'khor// ji ste bskal pa bsam yas par// spu rtse gcig
116a3(phal chen): tu rnam sprul pa/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdzad kyang // de yi mtha' ni rnyed par dka'// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub tu phyogs bcu nas byang chub
116a4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa re rer yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub dag tu
116a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun nas 'dus par gyur to/ / 'di na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi snying po byang chub de
116a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa dag tu kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na rab tu ston to/ / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba
116a7(phal chen): las/ de bzhin gsheg pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // bam po bdun pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
116b1(phal chen): dada' chen po kun tu bzang po seng ge'i khri do'i snying po can de nyid la 'dug ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying
116b2(phal chen): p o zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par btags pa'i tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings chags pa med cing rgya che
116b3(phal chen): ba khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i glong mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song zhing / shin tu 'dal ba'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi sgo'i dbyings ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag
116b4(phal chen): par 'byung bas rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyogs thams cad du yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lus kyis kun nas yog par byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying po can dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
116b5(phal chen): 'byung ba'i ye shes snang ba rgya mtsho'i glong / phyogs thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya bas mngon du yang dag par ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par
116b6(phal chen): thar pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snying po can/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang
116b7(phal chen): ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su grub par byed pa/ bskal pa thams cad du smon lam rgya mtshos rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
117a1(phal chen): cang kyi chos kyi 'khor lo ston cing rjod pa'i byor gyi rlabs la mnyam par bzhas par gyur to/ / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi napa
117a2(phal chen): dru du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
117a3(phal chen): klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' btugs pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi khams su gtogs pa/ dus gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
117a4(phal chen): 'byung ba'i khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos non pa'i ris su gtogs pa/ shin tu phra zhing bsgribs pa med pa dang / phyogs rgya chen po rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
117a5(phal chen): mtsho'i ris su gtogs pas rnam par non pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs thogs pa med pas chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings sangs rgyas kyi sku
117a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdul ma lus pa kun tu gtogs pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi/
117a7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa dag tu rdul phra mo re re la'ang zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs nas/ zhing re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi
117b1(phal chen): khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i zhabs kyi drung du yang lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ ting nge 'dzin sangs
117b2(phal chen): rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag go/ / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting
117b3(phal chen): nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i rjes la/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams
117b4(phal chen): cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal bstan to/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' sprul te/ rigs kyi bu khyod de
117b5(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po 'di la mnyam par gzhog pa legs so legs so/ / kye rgyal ba'i
117b6(phal chen): bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyod kyi
117b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pas yongs su dag pa'i yang mthus 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
118a1(phal chen): ye shes rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dbye ba dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus par sdang bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi kun
118a2(phal chen): nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chags pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su gnon pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad
118a3(phal chen): la chags pa med par 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad sgo kun nas rab tu brjod pa dang / chos kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
118a4(phal chen): yongs su gzung ba dang / chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyi tshul rnam par blta ba dang / sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
118a5(phal chen): kyi gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i dbyangs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
118a6(phal chen): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes
118a7(phal chen): kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'jig
118b1(phal chen): pa dang 'dul ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ / chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab
118b2(phal chen): mo tha mi dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar
118b3(phal chen): bsgrubs so/ / sems can thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// 'jig rten gyi khams mang po thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos kyi
118b4(phal chen): dbyings thams cad du lus yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang sgra dbyangs kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i
118b5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa la nye bar bsgrubs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag dang rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na lus
118b6(phal chen): 'khod pa thams cad la yang nye bar bsgrubs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sprul
118b7(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par mdzes par brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi 'dra ba'i me tog sna tshogs shin tu rgyas pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
119a1(phal chen): par dag pa'i sprin 'gyed pa/ rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin gyis rnam par gsal bar gyur pa/ phyogs thams cad du spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od kyis rnam par snang ba
119a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su sgra 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa/ byang chub sems
119a3(phal chen): dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba rnam par ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i
119a4(phal chen): snang ba yang dag par ston pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba rnams brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bor bzhag go// 'dir ji lta
119a5(phal chen): bapa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs na yod pa thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i
119a6(phal chen): spyi bo la phyag rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams rab tu bzhag go/ / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis reg ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la ting nge 'dzin de las ldang
119a7(phal chen): ba'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dus gsum thams cad du sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
119b1(phal chen): / las ldang ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings dang / dus gsum du mnyam pa'i rdul thams cad kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
119b2(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi sgo dang / sems can ma lus pa'i gnas thams cad dang mnyam zhing sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ming gi
119b3(phal chen): 'khor lo las ldang ba'i sgo dang / sems can phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin
119b4(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus med par 'byam klas pa'i sgo dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas langs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ting nge 'dzin de
119b5(phal chen): las langs ma thag tu/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang so so re re zhing ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs par gyur to//
119b6(phal chen): gzungs rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang
119b7(phal chen): rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ / so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams
120a1(phal chen): mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ / chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs su rnam par snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba'i yon tan gyi
120a2(phal chen): snying po can rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ye shes ma 'dres pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin
120a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i rtse mo thams cad la zhing gzhan dang gzhan rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi
120a4(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba dang / byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
120a5(phal chen): mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na yang
120a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor rgya mtsho rnams dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi khongs na yod pa kun tu yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnams rab tu zhugs par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi
120a7(phal chen): mthu dang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid rab tu thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ma lus par bag langs tsam du g.yos te/ rin po che
120b1(phal chen): thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gnas shing / chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra yang shin tu grag par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du yang nor bu'i rgyal po
120b2(phal chen): chen po bcu'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po mtshan dang ldan pa'i gser dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo//
120b3(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyis rnam par gsal bar byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i phyogs bcur rin po che'i 'khor lo rab tu 'grems pa'i sprin gyi
120b4(phal chen): char mngon par bab bo/ / 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che'i snying po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams
120b5(phal chen): cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ / 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par snang bar byed cing snying po byang chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi char mngon
120b6(phal chen): par bab bo/ / 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur snang ba'i sprul pa 'gyed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon
120b7(phal chen): tan gyi 'khor lo dang mthu rab tu grag par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ / 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu
121a1(phal chen): rgyal po ba mon sa yid du 'ong bas phyogs thams cad khyab par byed pa'i sbyin gyi char mngon par bab ste/ nor bu'i rgyal pa'i sbom gyi mar bcu po 'di dag mngon par bab bar gyur te/
121a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun na kun
121a3(phal chen): tu bzang po de/ / pad+mo yid du 'ong la rab tu 'dug pa mthong // kun tu rnam 'phrul rnam pa 'di 'dra ston byed pa// ting 'dzin yul la 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus med do// lus rnams thams cad nas
121a4(phal chen): kyang kun tu bzang po de/ / sprul pa rab tu 'gyed cing chos dbyings rtag par 'gengs// ting 'dzin kun gyi tshul dang ming dang rnam 'phrul pa// thams cad dbyangs kyis chags pa med pa rgya chen sgrog
121a5(phal chen): ting 'dzin thams cad gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam 'phral gyis/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung dag tu// rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul yangs pa gang byas te// zhing rnams kun tu rnam
121a6(phal chen): par 'phrul pa mang po ston/ / zhing kun rgyal ba kun gyi zhabs drung ji bzhin du// de ltar zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran la// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus ston// rnam par
121a7(phal chen): snang mdzad smon lam dbyings la rab tu zhugs/ / kun tu bzang po'i lus ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// thams cad zhing la mi gnas de bzhin nyid la gnas// lus kyi sprin ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam
121b1(phal chen): par kun brtse zhing / / sems can kun la bsam pa bzhin du de dag ston// sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la zhing rnams gang yod pa// mtha' dang dbus med kun la rab tu zhugs pa rnams// kun tu
121b2(phal chen): bzang po'i smon lam gnas pa dag la bstan/ / rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa tshad kyang med// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rdul bral mtha' dang dbus med pa// tshad med thams cad lus kyi nang
121b3(phal chen): du kun chub cing / / dbyangs la zhing mang dra bar rnam 'tshang rgya ba ston// skad cig sems la bskal pa mang po de bzhin ston// zhing rnams thams cad 'byam klas pa na rnam gnas shing //
121b4(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dam par ston par rab tu snang // phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus spyod// kun tu bzang po de la rnam lta kun kyang mthong // rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes
121b5(phal chen): stobs la zhugs/ / ting 'dzin sa ni tshul rnams kun gyis rab tu gnon// chos rnams 'byam klas gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs// rang gi byang chub spyod pa sngan chad spyad pa ston// de ltar
121b6(phal chen): zhing rnams kun tu bsam yas rnam 'phrul pa/ / phyogs rnams rgya che kun tu bkang ste rab tu bstan// ting 'dzin rnams la 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir// rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin las yon
121b7(phal chen): tan legs sgra 'byung / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor yod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus thal mo sbyar te// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la lta zhing dbyangs kyi nga
122a1(phal chen): ro gcig tu de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / rgyal ba thams cad chos las skyes pa ste// smon lam kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu byung // de bzhin nyid mnyam nam mkha'i
122a2(phal chen): snying po ste/ / chos kyi sku yis rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun la bzhugs med kyang // kun tu bzang po'i 'khor rnams kun na snang // phyogs bcu kun tu yon tan grags pa khyab/
122a3(phal chen): ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mnga'// rgyal ba thams cad sku thob phyir spyod pa/ phyogs bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho yod pa rnams// rdul sbubs kun tu de dag chung byas shing // zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu
122a4(phal chen): mdzes/ / zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na// rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa dang // chos rnams kun la spyod cing gnas pa'i rnams// rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par kun kyang snang /
122a5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rnams lus kyis khyab byas shing // zhing rnams 'byam klas kun la shin tu zhugs// sems can rgya mtsho'i don du de spyod cing // rdul phran kun la chos kyi dbyings su zhugs// chos
122a6(phal chen): kyi dbyings la de ltar zhugs nas kyang / / rdul phran kun la mi zad tha mi dad// nam mkha'i dbyings ni lus kyis gang byas shing // rgyal ba'i chos rnams yangs pa rab tu ston// yon tan rgya mtsho 'od kun
122a7(phal chen): gzhal du med/ / rnam yangs stobs chen 'od zer yon tan sprin// 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i don du spyod byed cing // rgyal ba'i spyod lam gzhal du med pa ston// gang gi don du bskal pa rgya mtsho dag/ mtha' yas
122b1(phal chen): par ni bzang po'i spyod spyad pa/ / de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// thams cad chos kyi sprin las rab tu brjod// zhing rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // stobs bcu rnams kyang ji
122b2(phal chen): lhalta 'byung 'gyur dang / / sems can rgya mtsho ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba// sems can rnams la sgra dbyangs gtong zhing ston// 'khor rnams yangs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang // kun tu bzang po khyod la
122b3(phal chen): mngon sum gnas/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang bar gyur pa yi// chos kyi 'khor lo do ring khyod kyis bskor// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// kun tu bzang
122b4(phal chen): po'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
122b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam par bltas/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la rnam par
122b6(phal chen): bltas/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ dus rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams
122b7(phal chen): cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa
123a1(phal chen): thams cad la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dra zhing 'jig pa yongs su dag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes ni bsam
123a2(phal chen): gyi mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las 'byung ba rgya mtsho mkhyen pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya
123a3(phal chen): mtsho thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa'i ye shes
123a4(phal chen): ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
123a5(phal chen): bsam pa dang / dad pa dang / dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi skad cig gcig la dus thams cad kyi
123a6(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa'i ye shes
123a7(phal chen): ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par dgod pa
123b1(phal chen): rab tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu bstan pa yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
123b2(phal chen): rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par snang ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang ba mas sungs ni sam gyis
123b3(phal chen): mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha' yas pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho kha
123b4(phal chen): dog sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dpal rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis
123b5(phal chen): mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyu kyi gsung dang dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu 'grub pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
123b6(phal chen): cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum yongs su bstan pas/ sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / gdul ba mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
123b7(phal chen): rnams kyi gdul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la brtson pa don yod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu bzhugs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs
124a1(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ni bsam gyi mi khyab bo//
124a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs la thub pa med pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
124a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi bsnyengs pa zil gyis mi non pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la tha mi dad par spyod pa ni
124a4(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga'
124a5(phal chen): chen po'i ye shes rnam par dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'phrogs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas
124a6(phal chen): kyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pas/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin
124a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du
124b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rjes su bsab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dad pa rgya mtsho tha dad
124b2(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam
124b3(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
124b4(phal chen): thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil
124b5(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho rnams de bas kyang shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / mos pa'i tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung
124b6(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / snying po sgo kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / ye shes
124b7(phal chen): kyi mig dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang bar byed pa'i snying po shes rab chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor
125a1(phal chen): lo thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i gzungs kyi stobs yang dag par bskyed pa dang / snying po byang chub thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / de bzhin
125a2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul snang ba'i 'od chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
125a3(phal chen): smras so/ / yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi ye shes zab// mtha' dang dbus med des ni zhing rnams khyab// sems can bsam la sbyor ba ji bzhin snang // rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo'o//
125a4(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab rgya mtsho'i zhing yod pa// bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pas// sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin bya'i phyir// sems can nang na rgyal ba rnam par mdzes// sems can
125a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'byung ba bsam mi khyab/ / sangs rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin tu zab// srid pa'i gnas can dad pa chung ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub shes par mi nus so// gzhan du gang rnams shin tu
125a6(phal chen): sems brtan cing / / dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su bzung ba dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la rab tu 'jug/ gang rnams sems dag
125a7(phal chen): g.yo med sgyu med cing / / snying rje'i bsam can khong nas byams dga' dang // dad pa che zhing rlabs chen de dag ni// 'di dag thos shing dga' ba thob par 'gyur// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam
125b1(phal chen): sa ngag dang / / chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la// gnas shing spyod pa rab tu sus spyod pa// de dag rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'di shes so// gang gis rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul 'di mthong ba'i/
125b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas thob bya legs par thob// gzhan gyi yul gyis shes par mi nus te// 'di ni kun tu bzang pos rtogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs shing // 'gro ba
125b3(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus med 'di dag na/ / kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo rab 'khor ba// rnam par snang mdzad yul dang mthu yin no// bdag gi lus su zhing rnams thams cad kyang // rab tu zhugs shing de zhugs
125b4(phal chen): zhing rnams kun/ / de dag spu rtse kun tu blta bar gyis// rgyal ba'i spyod yul shin tu bshad par bya// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam spyod pa rnams// mtha' dang dbus med mngon par bsgrub
125b5(phal chen): pa dang / / kun tu mig gi yul dang lus ldan pa// de dag mgon po'i spyod yul 'di nyan to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bcu po 'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu
125b6(phal chen): bstan pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
125b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu rkyen shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
126a1(phal chen): ma ma'i byibs dang ma pa shin tu bdun pa dang / d-iH/ jig rten gyi khams rgya ma tsho'i ldan shin tu bstan pa da 'ad/ ga rten gyi khams ma
126a2(phal chen): rgyan shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung
126a3(phal chen): ba shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho shin tu bstan
126a4(phal chen): pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa shin tu bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
126a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo //
126a6(phal chen): gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba
126a7(phal chen): snyed phrag bcus byung ngo / / 'byung ngo // 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang / sems
126b1(phal chen): can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang / sems can rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang /
126b2(phal chen): bsod nams kyi rtsa ba skal ba mthun pa bsags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pas rnam par
126b3(phal chen): bsgrubs pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten
126b4(phal chen): las 'das pa dang rgyu mthun pas mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi smo ma lam gyis smon
126b5(phal chen): par 'phrul pa'i sgo'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi
126b6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad byung ngo / / 'byung ngo // 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rte mkhams
126b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas ye shes yul na
127a1(phal chen): bsam yas pas/ / byin rlabs rnam 'phrul de dag 'di lta'u// zhing rnams rgya mtsho bstan pa mtha' dbus med// rnam par snang mdzad chos kyis yongs su sbyangs// byang chub
127a2(phal chen): sems dpa' kun gyi bsam pa bzhin/ / smon lam rgya mtsho bsam yas rnam sbyangs shing // sems can las rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pas// phyogs kun zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung //
127a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi rnam 'phrul dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgos// smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon bsgrubs shing // nam mkha'i dbyings la 'byam klas zhing
127a4(phal chen): 'byung ngo / / spyod pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med rnams// spyod cing tshad med bde gshegs yul la 'jug/ phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun sbyong zhing // bskal pa mtha'
127a5(phal chen): yas zhing rnams re rer spyod/ / sems can bsam dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// las kyis zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad byung // nyon mongs las kyis de dag nyon mongs bcas//
127a6(phal chen): mos dang bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam dag rgyan can rnams// rin chen rgyus byung sna tshogs dri med pa// dad pa rgya mtsho rnam par spel ba'i phyir// rgyal sras
127a7(phal chen): rnams ni phyogs bcung zhing rnams skyong / / chos dbyings rdul gyi khongs su rgyal sras rnams// kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa spyod pa dag/ rdul gyi khongs su mtha' yas zhing ston te// rnam dag
127b1(phal chen): mkha' bzhin mtha' dang dbus kyang med/ / nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra'i rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste// snying po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na// pad+mo'i stan 'khod kha dog mtha' yas kun//
127b2(phal chen): de dag zhing bcas lus kyi nang na 'khod// skad cig sems kyis dus gsum byung ba yi// zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang ston// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dus gsum zhing bstan pa//
127b3(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho'i zhing mi zad// tshul gyi khyad par mtha' yas sna tshogs pas// rdul rnams kun la mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams// sangs rgyas skad cig gcig la byin gyis rlog
127b4(phal chen): rgyan gyi rnam pa tshul kun rab tu mkhyen/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la gnas pa shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
127b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho kun la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas
127b6(phal chen): la rab tu gnas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad
127b7(phal chen): kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi mdog la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
128a1(phal chen): la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sgyu ma lta bu'i las kyis byung ba lha ma yin dang mthu bo
128a2(phal chen): lta bu'i lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams
128a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis byung ba'i rgyan
128a4(phal chen): rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas te/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten
128a5(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa'i don 'di nyid yongs su
128a6(phal chen): bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'di dag rin chen rang bzhin dri med pa// rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu kun 'bar
128a7(phal chen): 'od zer rgya mtsho'i 'od ldan ltos/ / 'di dag rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rgyu yis dbyibs legs 'khor bar rnam par snang // de dag gis ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings rnams gzhi kun rab tu
128b1(phal chen): khyab/ / zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri med 'od can nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas/ snang ba'i snying po 'od can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dag la legs par gnas// 'gro ba de dbus rgyal ba 'khor la chos
128b2(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo bzang po bskor/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas yul yin sems can rgya chen shin tu mgu byed pa'o// la la me tog sgron ma kun tu rgyas pa'i mu tig nor bus brgyan// 'od zer dra ba'i kun
128b3(phal chen): nas sprin 'bar spos 'phro sprin gyi 'od can te/ / zhing mang mtha' dang dbus med rgya chen pad+mo'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab brgyan zhing rnams 'byam klas kun kyang rab
128b4(phal chen): tu mdzes/ / zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil 'khor dbyings rnams la la sangs rgyas byin la gnas// yangs shing rin chen mang ldan rgya che de dag byang chub sems dpas gang // lag na rdo rje
128b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho mang tshogs lha dbang lus la de bzhin gnas/ / de na bcom ldan rnam par snang ba mdzad kyi 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor// nor bu'i shing dang spos kyi 'od 'phro'i sprin rnams mnyam pa'i dbyings/
128b6(phal chen): la gnas// chu yi phung po dag dang rdo rje rgya mtsho brtan la'ang de bzhin gnas// la la gos dang brag dang rgyal mtshan me tog rgya mtsho dag la gnas// kun na'ang rnam 'phrul 'di dag rgya chen rnam par snang
128b7(phal chen): mdzad ston pa mdzad/ / zhing rnams ring dang thung dang klong gi gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs te// sna tshogs rgyan can snying po dri ma thal ba yongs dag dri med snang // rnam pa sna tshogs de dag smon lam
129a1(phal chen): @#/ rgya mtsho'i dbyings la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun nas log par rtag tu nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'byam klas la la spyi'u tshugs yod da
129a2(phal chen): med la gnas/ / byang chub sems dpa'i cod pan rin chen 'khor los gzung bas dag par gnas// de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen thams cad kun nas rab tu snang // rin chen sangs rgyas
129a3(phal chen): gsung rnams kun tu gtong ldan las kyis de dag sprul/ / chos kyi dbyings mnyam zhing rnams 'byam klas mig yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dra// mig 'phrul rnam phye rnam dag dri med sems kyi shin tu
129a4(phal chen): bskyed pa ste/ / nam mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang // las kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan// skad cig sems kyis
129a5(phal chen): zhing rnams 'byam klas 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i rnams/ / zhing rdul kun la kun tu bzang po rtag par rab tu sgrub byed cing // de na bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba smin par bya phyir spyad pa spyod//
129a6(phal chen): chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun tu rnam 'phrul rgya che ston// rdul rnams kun na chos dbyings yangs pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang gnas// sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin gyis
129a7(phal chen): brlabs pas kun kyang yog cing yongs su rgyas/ / ji ltar rdul phran gcig la rnam 'phrul de bzhin 'gro ba kun na'o// rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen rab tu ston pa mdzad/
129b1(phal chen): zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad mig yor lta bu sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra// snang ba med cing 'byung med phyogs bcu dag na 'gro dang 'ong ba med// mkha' la gnas pa de dag rtag par 'byung zhing
129b2(phal chen): 'jig par de bzhin 'gyur/ / shin tu yangs pa de dag smon lam rnam sbyangs las kyis yongs su bzung // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
129b3(phal chen): rnams kyi dbyibs ni rnam pa sna tshogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas zlum po'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas la la ni kun nas
129b4(phal chen): gru bzhi'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni nam mkha'i rnam pa du mar rnam par phye ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil
129b5(phal chen): ba'i dbyibs su 'dug go/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od 'phro ba'i ri'i dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni shing sna
129b6(phal chen): tshogs kyi lhun gyi dbyibs su 'dug go/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni me tog sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la
129b7(phal chen): la ni khyim sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
130a1(phal chen): 'byam klas pa la ya ni mtshan sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchom
130a2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs
130a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho zhing la ltos// rnam phye sna tshogs mtha' yas
130a4(phal chen): dbyibs su gnas/ / dbyibs kyis rnam par bya ba sna tshogs te// phyogs rnams kun na zhing rnams rgya mtsho snang // la la zlum po la la zur gsum ste// de dag la la phyogs
130a5(phal chen): na gru bzhir gnas/ / nor bu pad+mo 'khor lo yan lag brgyad// kun kyang las rnams rgya mtshos rnam par bris// rdul med 'od kyi dbyibs dang tshul 'dzin cing // gser las
130a6(phal chen): grub pa rnam phye sna tshogs te/ / sgo mang mtha' yas pa nas rgyu zhing 'jug/ las rnams rgya mtsho bsam pa dag pas gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs snying po can// nam mkha'
130a7(phal chen): 'di la ji ltar sprin gnas bzhin/ / de dag rin chen mang gzhi rnam par bya// de dag kun na sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes// zhing rnams 'di kun sems kyis rnam par brtags// sna tshogs
130b1(phal chen): rgyan dang snang bas kun nas gnas/ rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// bde dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa ni//
130b2(phal chen): rnam par dag dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin te// chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu yod pa yin// de ltar las rnams rgya mtsho bsam mi khyab// skra gcig rtse la bsam gyis mi khyab zhing // thams cad
130b3(phal chen): rdul snyed sna tshogs dbyibs su gnas/ / kun na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// 'khor rnams rgya mtshor chos rnams rab tu ston// rdul gcig rtse la phra dang yangs pa'i rnams//
130b4(phal chen): thams cad rdul snyed kha dog kun dang ldan// kha dog dbyibs rnams kun kyang rnam par brtags// de dag kun na rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor// rdul rnams kun la rab tu zhing bstan pa//
130b5(phal chen): de dag smon lam rnam par sprul pa yin// nam mkha'i dbyings su las kyis sprul pa ni// sna tshogs sems dang bsam pa rnam par brtags// sems can kun mnyam rdul rnams
130b6(phal chen): thams cad la/ / sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa dag/ rnam par snang mdzad chos nyid de yin te// rdul phran kun la zhing rnams shin tu gnas/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag/
130b7(phal chen): de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun dag ni gzhan dang gzhan du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams
131a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi ldan can no//
131a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khazla rgya mtsho la 'ani 'od kha dog sna tshogs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad kyi mdog gi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la
131a3(phal chen): la ni rdo rje'i gzhi mi shigs pa'i lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni
131a4(phal chen): rin po che'i mtshan nyid lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nyi ma'i nor bu'i dkyil 'khor
131a5(phal chen): gyi lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che shin tu phra ba 'dzin pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni snang ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams
131a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog 'od 'phro ba'i rnam pa'i lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dri dang kha dog sna tshogs kyi spos kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
131a7(phal chen): la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi cod pan gyi lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan
131b1(phal chen): thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni sems kyi rnam par rtog pa gang cig gis dmigs pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi
131b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rin po che'i dbyibs kyi lhan can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams
131b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs rnam par dmigs pa'i lhun no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu
131b4(phal chen): bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid la rab tu gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams
131b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni/ / rin chen rang bzhin kun nas gnas// rdo rje bzhin du mi shigs sra// rin chen pad+mo rnams la gnas// la la 'od zer rang bzhin te// dag cing
131b6(phal chen): gzung med 'od zer 'byung / / rgyan rnams kun gyi 'od zer gyis// sna tshogs mkha' bzhin dri ma med// la la 'od kyi rang bzhin te// dag cing 'od gsal zer la
131b7(phal chen): gnas/ / 'od kyi sprin can sna tshogs 'od// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la ni// mig yor lta bur gnas pa ste// brjod du med
132a1(phal chen): @cing gzung du men/ / sngon lam dbang gis rab tu byung // la la nor bu mu tig rgyu// snying po thams cad rnam par 'dud// mu tig 'khor lob gzhi dag pa
132a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang / / rin chen 'od 'phro byung ba'i zhing // 'od 'phro'i sprin gyis mngon khebs shing // rin chen thams cad sna tshogs ldan// thams cad las kyis
132a3(phal chen): sprul pa yin/ / la la mtshan las byung ba ste// gzhi kun mtshan gyis kun tu bris// cod pan rnam pa sna tshogs bkod// sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par sprul// rgya mtsho'i sems
132a4(phal chen): las byung ba yi/ / zhing rnams mos pa nyid la gnas// yul na mi gnas sgyu ma bzhin// yongs su rtog pas yang dag bskyed// sangs rgyas sku yi 'od zer gyi// nor bus sna tshogs
132a5(phal chen): kun tu gnas/ / sangs rgyas sprin rnams rnam par snang // sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu sprul// la la kun tu bzang po yis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho shin tu sprul// nam mkha'i
132a6(phal chen): rgyan rnams thams cad dang / / smon lam rnams kyis rnam par bris/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams
132a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phros pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
132b1(phal chen): kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo rjes su brjod cing rab tu 'byung ba'i rgya dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi las rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho las rab tu
132b2(phal chen): byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i glong yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad
132b3(phal chen): gzugs brnyan sna tshogs rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste// sems kyi skad cig la bskal pa mtha' yas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang /
132b4(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang spos thams cad sprin rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/
132b5(phal chen): snying po byang chub kyi rgyan dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dag
132b6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do//
132b7(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs
133a1(phal chen): kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rgya che mtha' yas te// rnam dag las kyi rnam pa
133a2(phal chen): tshogs gnas/ / phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnams kun kyang // sna tshogs rgyan can yangs par kun nas gnas// kha dog sna tshogs yangs pa'i zhing gi rnams// rgya mtsho rtag
133a3(phal chen): par phyogs rnams kun tu 'byung / / rgyan dang rin chen 'od 'phro sna tshogs sprin// sgra 'byin zhing gi dbyings rnams khebs par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rnams/
133a4(phal chen): de dag kun kyang rgya mtsho'i zhing na grag/ sna tshogs rgyan dang smon lam sprin gyi rnams// de dag zhing mang rgya mtshor sgra yang 'byin// 'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag/ rgyan gyi
133a5(phal chen): sprin rnams kun nas sgrar 'byin te/ / sems can de dag rnam smin ci 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byin gyis kun nas sgra yang sgrog/ dus gsum byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa yi// rnam
133a6(phal chen): 'phrul zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang / / dmigs pa re re la yang sangs rgyas kun// de 'dra'i zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rgyan la ltos// 'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang /
133a7(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i da ltar byung ba ji snyed pa'i// bskal pa de dag rgyan mang yangs pa yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho re re dag na snang // dmigs pa kun la sangs rgyas sprin gyi rnams//
133b1(phal chen): 'gro dang mnyam pas 'jig rten kun tu 'gengs// rnam par 'phrul zhing sems can rnam par 'dul// 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to// spros 'od sprin dang de bzhin me tog glong /
133b2(phal chen): / rgyan rnams sna tshogs thams cad kun nas kyang // rtag par kun tu khyab par rab tu 'byung // 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to// phyogs bcu kun gyi snying po byang chub rnams// sna tshogs
133b3(phal chen): rgyan can kun kyang ma lus par/ / thams cad rgya mtsho'i zhing 'di dbyings dag na// nam mkha'i sprin bzhin rnam par ston pa snang // rgyal sras kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi// zhing rnams mthas
133b4(phal chen): yas 'byam klas rgyan gyi rnams/ / 'gro ba'i grangs snyed bskal pa rgya mtshor rnam sbyangs pa// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun nas rab tu snang / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams
133b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la brtan pa'i dge
133b6(phal chen): ba'i rtsa bas skal ba mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bsod nams rgya chen po'i sprin rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i
133b7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu brtan pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
134a1(phal chen): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa
134a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu dgod cing gzud pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang 'byung ba rgya mtsho la rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
134a3(phal chen): smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang / 'di lta ste/
134a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshul yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig
134a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul
134a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'di nyid rnam par bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams
134a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad sna tshogs rgyan/ / smon lam tshul rnams rgya mtsho kun gyis byung // kha dog mtha' yas las kyi rgya mtshos dag/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho rtag tu 'od mang 'gyed/
134b1(phal chen): sngan chad dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing // skal ba mnyam pa'i las dge yongs sbyangs te// snying rje byams pas 'gro yangs kun bkang zhing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa
134b2(phal chen): 'di kun sbyangs/ / chos sgo kun tu ting 'dzin sa kun gyis// sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho yongs sbyangs te// bsam gtan tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyang zhing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho
134b3(phal chen): sna tshogs yangs pa byung / / mos pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas stobs bskyed cing // rgyal ba'i mnyam nyid ma nor rtogs byas nas// bzod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams yongs sbyangs shing //
134b4(phal chen): rnam dag kha dog mtha' yas zhing rnams byung // bsod nams sprin ni nam mkha' mnyam bskyed cing // 'gro ba kun phan 'de don spyod spyad de// bsod nams rgya mtsho sems can kun bstan
134b5(phal chen): pas/ / 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung // zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed tshad med pa'i// pha rol phyin pa ma lus kun sbyangs to// smon lam mthar phyin mi zad
134b6(phal chen): goms byas pas/ / dri med rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yangs pa 'byung // 'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yod tshad med dang // chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs sbyangs te// sna tshogs thabs
134b7(phal chen): sgos sems can sbyangs pas na/ / 'di 'dra'i yid 'ong rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'byung // rgyan rnams kun gyi tshul dang sa sbyangs shing // rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho kun zhugs nas/
135a1(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal mtsho bskams pas// zhing gi mtsho yangs 'di kun dag par 'gyur// stobs rnams rgya mtsho gzhal med yongs sbyangs shing // 'gro ba
135a2(phal chen): 'di 'dra tshad med rnam sbyangs te/ / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yangs kun bsnyen bkur bas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam mang rnam par dag/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig
135a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku chung ngungar kun
135a4(phal chen): tu ston to/ / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad gzugs kyi skus gang bar ston to// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad mi ring ngo // sangs
135a5(phal chen): rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad ring ngo / / sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni 'jig rten gyi
135a6(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob bo/ / sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni tshul gcig gis bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni
135a7(phal chen): tshul bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob bo/ / sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sems can gyi khams nyung ngu rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba
135b1(phal chen): la la ni sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re reng sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
135b2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/
135b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba 'byung ba thabs rnams sna tshogs kyi/ sgo nas zhing rnams
135b4(phal chen): rgya mtshor rab tu 'byung / / de dag sems can bsam pa ji bzhin mkhyen// sangs rgyas thabs kyi sgo mang rgya mtsho'o// sangs rgyas chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab ste// mig yor ma
135b5(phal chen): yin mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs/ / gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu// sems can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin ston la ltos// sku tshe thung bar la la rnam par ston// la la bskal
135b6(phal chen): pa bsam yas byin gyis rlob/ / chos kyi sku ni phyogs rnams kun gyi sgo// rab tu mdzes par 'gro nang 'di na bzhugs// la la zhing rnams rgya mtsho bas ma yas dag/
135b7(phal chen): sbyong zhing 'byam klas phyogs bcu kun na yang // la la zhing gcig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad// smon lam ma lus kun kyang tshul gcig go// la la bsam gyis mi khyab theg
136a1(phal chen): pa'i rgyan/ / sems can yid bzhin sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// la la theg pa gcig kyang rab ston te// rgyal ba'i thabs ni gcig kyang mtha' yas so// rang byung
136a2(phal chen): la la byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ / sems can mi mang lam la gzhog pa mdzad// la la skad cig gcig gis sems can rnams// rgya mtsho bsam yas byang chub don du 'dul// la la spu
136a3(phal chen): sgo nas bsam yas pa'i/ / sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sprin rnams rab tu 'gyed// 'gro ba kun tu de dag mngon bkang zhing // thabs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul ba mdzad// la la sangs rgyas
136a4(phal chen): gsung gis kun bkang zhing / / zhing du sems can yid bzhin rab tu sgrog/ bsam yas bskal par de dag gsung sgrog cing // sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul// la la zhing
136a5(phal chen): rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ / 'khor rnams yongs dag kun nas 'khod bcas pas// zhing mang rgya mtsho phyogs su gang byas shing // sangs rgyas mkha' la sprin ltar khyab par bzhugs//
136a6(phal chen): de ltar sangs rgyas thabs ni bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu rgyas bkang zhing // 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon sum ste// sna tshogs rgyan mang du ma'i tshul dang ldan/
136a7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du
136b1(phal chen): shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa tshad med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la
136b2(phal chen): la ni bskal pa dpag tu med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ / zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa mtshungs pa med
136b3(phal chen): par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ / zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa kun nas mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa kun nas mu med par byin gyis brlabs
136b4(phal chen): pa'o/ / zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa gzhal du med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa brjod du med par byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig
136b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
136b6(phal chen): bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par
136b7(phal chen): bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten rgya mtsho bskal pa tha dad de// sna tshogs tshul 'jug rgyan rnams gzhan dang gzhan// phyogs bcu'i
137a1(phal chen): zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang / / bskal pa'i tshul ni rgya mtsho grangs kyang med// bskal pa mi mthun 'gro ba kun dang mnyam/ phyogs dbyings 'jig rten
137a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i khams na snang / / bskal pa mtha' yas la la ring dang thung // bskal pa sna tshogs rgyal ba'i sgras kyang bsgrags// rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'di dag phyogs dbyings
137a3(phal chen): snang / / byin rlabs bskal pa zhing rdul snyed dang ldan// la la gzhan rnams bskal pa gcig gis 'jug/ la la bskal grangs smon lam du mas byung // bskal pa la la
137a4(phal chen): dri me da la la nyon mongs can/ / la la rnam dag la la nyon mongs rnam par gnas// bskal pa'i ming ni smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis byung // sems can 'du shes rnam pas
137a5(phal chen): tha dad tshul la 'jug/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed sngan chad spyod spyad pas// 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho shin tu yangs shing dag/ de dag kun nas sangs rgyas yul rgyan tshad kyang
137a6(phal chen): med/ 'di dag rgya chen bskal pa'i 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams// bskal pa'i 'od dang 'od zer rin chen ming sna tshogs// bcom ldan 'das dang 'od mnyam 'od 'phro'i mig snang ba// snang da/
137a7(phal chen): dri med bzang po bskal pa'i ming la 'jug/ bskal pa 'di dag rnam dag bskal pa kun las byung // dri med bskal pa la lar sangs rgyas gcig skye'o// bskal pa la lar mi yi gtso bo
137b1(phal chen): mtha' yas 'byung / / bskal pa'i tshul rnams thams cad sa tshul zad mi shes// smon lam stobs mthus bskal pa sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur// bskal pa la la mtha' yas rnams kyang
137b2(phal chen): bskal pa gcig tu 'dus/ / bskal pa la la gcig kyang bskal pa bye ba'i mthu// bskal pa rgya mtsho kun kyang sna tshogs sgo nas 'jug/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi nang nas sgra
137b3(phal chen): yang 'byin/ / bskal pa la la bskal pa kun gyi rgyan kyang 'byung // ming gi rgyan rnams rnam par dag pa'ang de la yod// bskal pa la la sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu yis byung // bskal pa'i
137b4(phal chen): tshul rnams kun gyi 'di ni rgyan yangs yin/ / zhing dang bskal pa rgya mtsho tshul ni gcig gis dag/ zhing gi rdul rnams kun kyang tshad med gzhal du med// skad cig yud tsam nyi ma'i
137b5(phal chen): grangs kyi bskal par 'gyur/ / 'di dag thams cad sems can 'du shes rnam par 'byung // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha'
137b6(phal chen): yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag bskal pas 'jig
137b7(phal chen): cing 'du ba la rab tu 'jug par gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa kun nas gnas pa dang /
138a1(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po bsags pa rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
138a2(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste// byang chub sems dpa' mos pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa rnams skye bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnam
138a3(phal chen): par dag la kun nas nyon mongs par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sems can rgya mtsho rgya chen po byang chub kyi sems la gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu dag par gnas
138a4(phal chen): pa dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan du 'dong pas bskal pa rgyan tha dad pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub
138a5(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'dus pas/ bskal pa mtha' yas pa rgyan shin tu mang por kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
138a6(phal chen): las 'da' bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi rgyan nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas gnas pa
138a7(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi
138b1(phal chen): k hams mtsha sal pa rgya mchomatha yas pa rgyud kyi rnam rgyamatsha sa pa tshul kyi sa rmom pa ba da tu sa @
138b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
138b3(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i chos nyid 'di dag ltos// chos kyis byung ste ji ltar gnas pa ltar// de dag 'byung zhing
138b4(phal chen): 'jig par 'gyur bar yang / / zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu snang // sems can nyon mongs mi bzang ldan pa dang // las dang nyon mongs ngan pas bsgribs pa'i rnams// de dag
138b5(phal chen): bsam la zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams/ / kun nas nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yin// sems can rnam dag bsam pa ldan pa dang // bsod nams brtan dang rnam dag spyod yul can// rnam
138b6(phal chen): dag yul la nyon mongs ldan gyur rnams/ / de dag mos pa sna tshogs spyod yul gyis// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus dag na// bskal pa de ni rnam par dag par snang // sems
138b7(phal chen): can nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yang / / de yi chos nyid bsam yas yangs pa yi// byang chub bsam pa ji ltar bskyed pa dang / de dag bsam pa ji ltar rnam 'phel bas// de bzhin bskal pa
139a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho mang po dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyan yongs su spyong // bye ba mang po mtha' yas mi zad pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu kun tu yang // can
139a2(phal chen): la rnam pa tha dad yod pa min/ / bskal pa tha dad tshul gyi bye brag snang // rdul rnam re re sbubs su dus kun tu// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa yi// rgyal sras ji tshul 'dong ba
139a3(phal chen): de bzhin du/ / zhing rnams rgya mtsho de tshul dag par gyur// gal te rgyal ba rnams ni skye 'gyur na// zhing rnams rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan par 'gyur// bsam pa yongs dag de bzhin rgyas
139a4(phal chen): 'gyur te/ / 'di ni zhing rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o// gal te rgyal ba mya ngan 'das gyur na// de tshe de zhing rgyan rnams 'grib par 'gyur// sems can rnams kyang snod du rung ba min//
139a5(phal chen): zhing gi rgya mtsho de yang nyon mongs ldan// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul yangs pa dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab gang tshe ston pa na// de tshe zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po dag/ kun kyang rgyan
139a6(phal chen): gyis rnam par brgyan par 'gyur/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad du shes
139a7(phal chen): par bya ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar
139b1(phal chen): t shag sa kyil gi yas pa kh
139b2(phal chen): ams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byung ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di smra na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang chub thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rgyas par 'gengs
139b3(phal chen): pa tha mi dad pa dang / / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam
139b4(phal chen): dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin dang mtshan gyi 'khor
139b5(phal chen): lo tha mi dad pa dang / 'di ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bskal pa mtha' yas par brjod cing rgyas par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs
139b6(phal chen): tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul shin tu
139b7(phal chen): phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba tha mi dad pa dang 'di lnga ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul 'byam klas pa thams cad la dus gsum gyi
140a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po ston cing brjod pa tha mi dad pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul 'jig
140a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu zang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho shin tu bstan
140a3(phal chen): pa 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rdul gcig stang na
140a4(phal chen): zhing mang rgya mtsho ste/ / kun na rgyan mang rnam dag kun yod kyang // gnod pa med cing 'dre ba gang yang med// 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'di la ltos// rdul rnams kun la bsam
140a5(phal chen): yas sangs rgyas bzhugs/ / sems can kun gyi bsam pa yid bzhin du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad khyab byas kyang // de dag thabs la tha dad gang yang med// rdul rnams
140a6(phal chen): kun la shing dbang mtha' yas pa/ / sna tshogs rgyan phyung kun nas bres sbyangs te/ phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing du mngon bkang yang // de dag tha dad 'gyur ba nam yang med// rdul phran
140a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho rdul phran re re la/ mi yi gtso bo 'khor rnams kun bskor cing / 'jig rten kun tu bkang ste 'phags bzhugs kyang // gnod pa dag dang 'dre ba'i nyes pa med// rdul
140b1(phal chen): gcig la ni mtha' yas 'od kyi sprin/ / phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun bkang zhing // bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub spyod bstan kyang // rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams tha dad gang yang //
140b2(phal chen): med// rdul rnams kun la kha dog bsam mi khyab// sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun tu gang byas te// sangs rgyas sprul pas sems can rnams 'dul yang // 'byam klas phyogs
140b3(phal chen): na tha dad gang yang med/ / rdul rnams kun la rgya mtsho'i chos brjod de// de dag 'khor lo tshul bzhin 'khor mdzad cing // thabs dang mthu yi sgo mo sna tshogs kyis// thams cad
140b4(phal chen): brjod kyang de la tha dad med/ / rdul gcig la ni rgyal ba kun gyis gsung // 'gro ba snod du gyur la de dag brjod byas te// rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal par byin brlabs kyang //
140b5(phal chen): de dag gsung gi yan lag tha mi dad// zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams// thams cad rdul sbubs gcig tu rab tu 'dzud// rgyal ba rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mthul
140b6(phal chen): ltos/ las kyi dngos las de dag skyes pa min// rdul gcig la ni dus gsum rgyal ba dag/ ji ltar byung ba de dag thams cad snang // de dag gshegs dang byon pa gang
140b7(phal chen): yang med/ / 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa'i
141a1(phal chen): phyogs gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o/ / // bam po brgyad pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
141a2(phal chen): de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas te/
141a3(phal chen): bskal pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu
141a4(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung du smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams
141a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa de ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu gzung ba ste/ de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og ma ni
141a6(phal chen): gzhi kun nas rton pa zhes bya ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bas brgyan pa'i gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya ba
141a7(phal chen): yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnam par dag pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i mthu zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i gzhis
141b1(phal chen): ton to/ / de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro mnyam par ston pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i gzhis nyon to// de'i steng na rlung gi
141b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgyan kun nas rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod de/ / 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi me tog gi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhi kun nas dri ma
141b3(phal chen): med cing yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ me tog thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i seng ge'i khri'i gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs su sgra sgrog cing kun tu rgyu ba
141b4(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ mu tig dang man shel gyi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i
141b5(phal chen): rgyal po'i shing dang me tog sna tshogs kyi glong gi gzhis rton to/ / de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzin pa'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/ spos kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ri rab kyi
141b6(phal chen): sprin gyi gzhis rton to/ / de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor khyim du kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi gzhis rton to//
141b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyi steng ma ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid bzang po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ste/ nor bu kun
142a1(phal chen): nas snang ba'i rgyun dang ldan pa'i spos kyi rgyu rgya mtsho'i gzhis rton to/ / spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas snang ba'i gzhis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de las pacwo/
142a2(phal chen): chen po spos kyi rgyal mtshan khyer ba'i 'od zer dang / ze ba sna tshogs shes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ pad+mo chen po de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis
142a3(phal chen): brgyan pa kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/ rnam par dag pa/ shin tu brtan pa/ rdo rje dang nor bu thams cad kyi khor yug gis bskor ba/ rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pa/
142a4(phal chen): shing gi rgyud rgya mtsho sa la rab tu gnas pa 'di 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan
142a5(phal chen): pa 'di nyid kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i phyogs 'di nyid brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad ba 'di
142a6(phal chen): dag smras so/ / gzhi rgyan me tog 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho de// rin chen kun gyi snying po kha dog sna tshogs te// rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i sngan chad sangs rgyas kyi/
142a7(phal chen): drung du sngon tshe rgya mchod sbyangs pas dri ma med// rgya chen snying rje'i sprin gyis khams rnams kun bkang zhing // zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i lus kyang kun bkang nas// sngon gyi bskal pa
142b1(phal chen): rgya mtshor spyod pa spyad las na/ / 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams de yangs shing rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang bas smon lam che mdzad de// 'od snang btang ba mkha' yi dkyil na gnas
142b2(phal chen): pa ni/ rlung gi phung pos btab kyang mi bskyod mi g.yo ste// nor bu kun rgyan sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snying po'o// me tog mdzod bkye gtor ba rin chen yid 'ong bzhin// sngon gyi
142b3(phal chen): smon lam dbang gis mkha' yi dbying la gnas/ / rgya mtsho rgyan rnams thams cad sna tshogs brtan par gnas// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu 'od kyi sprin kyang gtong // nor bu
142b4(phal chen): thams cad sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnams/ / byung zhing 'od zer sprin 'bar phyogs rnams kun tu 'dong // 'od zer me tog tshon dang 'od zer 'khor lo'i tshogs// phyogs rnams
142b5(phal chen): ma lus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab par te/ / rin chen kun gyis 'od zer sprin rnams 'akye ba ni// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed// sdug bsngal thams cad
142b6(phal chen): bcil zhing byang chub mchog la 'god/ / 'jig rten rgya mtsho thams cad 'od 'phro rab tu 'bar// 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs rnams// rin chen kun dang sku
142b7(phal chen): rnams kun nas rgyal ba 'gyed/ / brgya byin dag dang tshangs pa'ang 'khor lo sgyur 'dra dang // 'gro ba kun gyi lus su lus rnams kun kyang gnas// sprul pas 'od 'akye chos kyi dbyings
143a1(phal chen): kyi tshad mnyam pa/ / 'od zer sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad mtshan kyang sgrog/ 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi bsam pa tshim byas nas// tshul rnams sna tshogs sgo nas
143a2(phal chen): sems can rnam par 'dul/ / 'jig rten rgya mtsho me tog snying po de nang na// rdul phran kun gyi khongs na chos dbyings thams cad kyi// rin chen 'od bkye sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'bar
143a3(phal chen): bar snang / rnam par snang mdzad rnam par 'phrul pa'i zhing la ltos// bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal byas te/ smon lam yangs pa'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings
143a4(phal chen): mnyam dang / / bzang po'i spyod pa brnyes shing ye shes sa ldan pa'i// dgongs pa las ni rgyan mdzes de dag byung ba yi// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya
143a5(phal chen): ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pas snang ba zhes bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o// / kye rgyal
143a6(phal chen): pa'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho ga ni dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i khor yug chen po ni nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo nyi ma'i gzhi la brten pa ste/ nor bu'i rigs rgyas
143a7(phal chen): spos kyi tsan dan thams cad las grub pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad lhun shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa/ nor bu'i spos zhim po gzi brjid kyi 'khor lo rnam par
143b1(phal chen): snang ba'i snying po can nor bu'i rgyal po rdo rje sra zhing mi shigs pa ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra ba rin po che'i chu thams cad kun nas 'byung ba/ rin po che'i shing gi nags tshal
143b2(phal chen): rgyan thams cad me tog shin tu rgyas pa/ spos kyi rtsi mchog bzang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ sdes kyi me tog dpal can shin tu bzang bas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu'i
143b3(phal chen): rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dra bas kun nas bres pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa rgyan bzang po'i rnam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu
