143b4(phal chen): brgyan pa'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang khor yug gi rgyan dang yon tan yongs su dag pa 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs
143b5(phal chen): kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho gang yod pa// mtha' dang dbus med sna tshogs rnam pa
143b6(phal chen): can/ nor bu mang pos rnam dag mtha' yas mdog/ de dag sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pas byung // dri med khor yug rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni// nor bu mang po de bzhin spos
143b7(phal chen): mang dang / / mu tig gsal ba'i tshogs la rab tu gnas// kha dog mtha' yas rin chen rnams kyis brtan// snying po nor bu'i sprin can sna tshogs sra// 'dzam bu chu klung
144a1(phal chen): 'od 'phro snying po'i tshogs/ / 'od 'phro dam pa phyogs su snang zhing 'tsher// khor yug dri ma med pa rnam par mdzes// nor bu rdo rjes 'dus byas shin tu sra zhing 'chan/
144a2(phal chen): mtshams rnams mi phyed nor bu sna tshogs 'phrul// mtshan ldan nor bu rin chen rnam bkod pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs su dag par snang // spos chu'i sprin gyi kha dog mtha' yas te/
144a3(phal chen): rin chen tsan dan me tog kun tu dgram// pad+mo sna tshogs gos kyis kun nas yog/ rin chen rtsi mchog dri zhim rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs shing gi sprin gyis kun nas brgyan// nor bzang
144a4(phal chen): kun gyis kun nas gzi brjid 'bar/ / 'od zer sprin gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// gos kyi mdzod kyis shin tu 'bar bar gnas// spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug pa'i gdugs 'chang
144a5(phal chen): ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' mang pos chos dbyings gang // sgra dbyangs mang po rgya mtsho thams cad 'byin// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad chos 'khor lo// rin chen mdzes pa de dag
144a6(phal chen): thams cad dang / / nor bu dag dang kun nas 'od 'phro'i shing / kun la rnam par snang mdzad sku gsal ba// gzugs brnyan tshul du nang na yod pa snang // thams cad gzugs su
144a7(phal chen): sku rnams mtha' yas te/ / sangs rgyas sprul mang kha dog mu med pas// thams cad phyogs dang chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing // sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul// thams cad rgyan
144b1(phal chen): las sgra dbyangs kun 'byung ste/ / rnam par snang mdzad smon lam 'khor lo yi// zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag byas pa// de dag de las rnam par 'phrul zhing grag/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs
144b2(phal chen): rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i khor yug gi rgyan rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o// // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la
144b3(phal chen): khor yug chen po de'i nang na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa chen po'i gzhi ni nor bu mang po'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra la brtan pa/ rin po che'i rigs
144b4(phal chen): thams rud las grub pa rgya mtshos rnam par phye ba mi shigs pa'i snying po can/ mi mtho mi dma' ba'i thang mnyam zhing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od
144b5(phal chen): thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'i nor bu'i gzugs sna tshogs kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/ rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa
144b6(phal chen): rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mo thams cad kyis gzhi byas pa/ dmigs pa thams cad du sna tshogs su gyur pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po spos kyi mdzod thams cad kyis
144b7(phal chen): gzhi mnyam par bdal ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing gi rgyan gyi sprin gyi dra ba rnam par dris pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi 'od
145a1(phal chen): dang / nor bu'i dra ba mig 'phrul lta bus rnam par phye ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa sa'i dkyil 'khod de'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten rgya
145a2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa'i
145a3(phal chen): phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi ni rnam dag mnyam//
145a4(phal chen): 'khor lo'i dra bas bsgrubs pas mi shigs sra// rin chen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gzhir gnas shing // rin chen sna tshogs kun gyis kun tu gang // yid 'ongs ni rdo rje gser gyi gzhi
145a5(phal chen): rin chen chu ba ri bo'i 'khor los bsgrubs/ / pad+mo dkyil 'khor gzhi yin me tog sa// tsan dan phye ma rin chen kun tu bkram// 'od zer sna tshogs rin chen me tog rnams// 'od
145a6(phal chen): 'phro 'gyed pas phyogs su sprin kyang 'bar/ / sangs rgyas 'od snang nor bu rnam par bkram// sa kun me tog yid du 'ong bas yog/ thams cad sprin ni phyogs na stug lding bas// mi zad
145a7(phal chen): yangs pa kun nas khebs par 'dug/ zhing rnams thams cad phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas chos ni snyan par rab tu sgrog/ rin chen nad snang sangs rgyas smon lam kun
145b1(phal chen): shin tu dus ring rtag tu kun tu ston/ / sngan chad spyod pa ci 'dra spyod pa dag/ kun kyang nor bu'i 'bru las gsal bar snang // de yi rgya mtsho nor bu sna tshogs gting // de yi nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul
145b2(phal chen): snang / / sangs rgyas spyod yul de dag zhing gi rnams// rgya mtsho kun gyi rdul phran re rer snang // me tog snying po tshon gyi 'khor los bsgrubs// der ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag 'dong zhing // byang chub
145b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i smon lam kun kyang sgrog/ snying po byang chub 'khor du rnam 'phrul lo// rin chen 'od zer 'od dang ldan pa dag/ sa yi nor bu rgyan las rab tu 'byung // sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di
145b4(phal chen): yang rtag tu ston/ / chos dbyings nam mkha' lta bu kun tu 'gengs// sangs rgyas kun yul ye shes rgya chen dang // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sus shes pa// de dag phyogs rnams
145b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho kun tu yang / / zhing rnams rgya mtsho dbyings kyi 'phral la 'jug/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po re zhes bya ba las// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa'i gzhi'i rgyan
145b6(phal chen): shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi sa'i dkyil 'khor de la spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas
145b7(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag kun kyang gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po dang spos thams cad kyis klung rab tu bsgrubs pa'o//
146a1(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba'i dra bas kun nas bres pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang mdog tu snang ba'i spos kyi rgyus
146a2(phal chen): yongs su rgyas pa'o/ / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi glong du 'khyil ba'o// tsan dan gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang
146a3(phal chen): smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byin pa'o/ / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par snang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin me tog sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bur rab
146a4(phal chen): tu 'gyed pa'o/ / kha dog dang dbyibs mtha' yas pa'i gdugs kyis khebs par rnam par 'phrul pas brgyan pa'o// dmigs pa thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams mang po rgya chen po thams cad
146a5(phal chen): snang ba'o/ / phyogs kun nas rin po che'i them skas kyi 'phreng ba bcur rab tu bkye ba'o// mu tig rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu khyud kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// rin po che shel gyi rgyal mtshan
146a6(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa bcus kun nas brgyan pa'o/ / 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa chu klung gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kha dog mtha' yas pa bcus kun nas
146a7(phal chen): bskor ba'o/ / 'di lta ste/ nor bu thams cad kyi pad+mo yid du 'ong ba'i grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ nor bu rdo rje shin tu sra ba gling bzhi'i
146b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa'o/ / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog puN+Da ri ka dang spos kyi chu yongs su rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ rin po che
146b2(phal chen): shing gi 'phreng ba rin po che 'bar zhing kun nas 'phyang ba'i nor bu'i dra ba can gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o/ / tsan dan dang / spos dang / nor bu
146b3(phal chen): mang po sgra thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag gis rnam par snang bar byas pa chu klung gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis 'gram shin tu brgyan pa'o// 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang /
146b4(phal chen): gos dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu mang po thams cad kyi sgra 'byung bas rgyan shin tu rgyas pa'o// rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu thams cad kyi ra ba bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong brjod du med
146b5(phal chen): pas kun nas bskor ba'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
146b6(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa stengs de na spos kyi chu bo yis// rgya mtsho nor bus brgyan pa rnam brjod de// gzhi rnams rin cher gos
146b7(phal chen): kyis kun bting ba/ mi shig rdo rje lta bu sra zhing mdzes// spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po mang po dang // nyi ma'i nor bu 'od 'phro stug sprin dang / pad+mo rin chen 'phreng ba'ang kun nas bres/
147a1(phal chen): gzhi rnams dri med yid du 'ong ba'o// spos kyi chu yis yongs su rgyas pa ste// rin chen 'od zer sna tshogs me tog glong // sgra dbyangs rab tu gtong ba'i dbyangs kyis kyang /
147a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu klog/ them skas 'phreng ba yid du 'ong dang ldan// gzhi ni rin chen nor bu mang pos brgyan// stegs bu kun bkod rin chen pad+mo yi// sprin sdug
147a3(phal chen): dra ba rnam par bres pa ste/ / rin chen nor bu'i shing gi 'phreng ba dag/ rin chen gser gyi kha dog yid 'ong 'bar// 'od kyi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang // rnam par 'phrul mang dbyangs
147a4(phal chen): su rab tu sgrog/ spos chus yongs gang rin chen bsgrubs pa ste// me tog pud+d+ha ri kas kun nas bskor// spos dang 'od dang 'dug spos 'od zer 'gyed// de dag 'od kyi dkyil la
147a5(phal chen): rnam par yangs/ / rin chen rgyal mtshan mu tig 'bar ba can// gos dang nor bu sna tshogs kun 'phyang zhing // rin chen nor bu'i dril bu dra ba dag/ thams cad mkhyen par 'jug
147a6(phal chen): pa'i sgra yang sgrog/ pad+mo'i gong khyer rnams kyis kun nas bskor// kha dog mtha' yas nor bus rnam par brgyan// phyogs rnams kun nas mu khe sprin bkye ba'i// grong khyer rgya mtshos
147a7(phal chen): de dag rab tu brgyan/ / dra ba bzang pos kun nas bskor ba ste// rin chen byas pa'i gzugs bzang khyim gyi rnams// rnam pa du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i// rgya mtshos
147b1(phal chen): bzang zhing mdzes par rab tu brgyan/ / sngan chad rnam par snang mdzad kyi// sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yongs sbyangs pa// shin tu rgya che mtha' dang dbus med pa'ang // de dag kun na
147b2(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa byed/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang spos chu'i chu klung g.yas phyogs su 'khor zhing 'bab bagling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'khor
147b3(phal chen): byas pa ste/ spos chu'i chu klung de dag thams cad 'khor kun nas rdo rje'i pad+mo kha dog dang dri mtha' yas pas bsgrubs pa'o// nor bu'i 'khor lo dang / nor bu'i 'od rnam par dag pa
147b4(phal chen): sna tshogs kyis mtha' kun nas dkris pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bus rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o// sems can
147b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa'i dril bu'i dra ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ / spyod pa'i 'od kyi glong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu
147b6(phal chen): rab tu 'byung ba'o/ / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad nang na snang zhing 'od shin tu 'bar ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lta bur snang ba thams cad kyis shin tu rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o//
147b7(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par snang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po'i me tog shin tu rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o//
148a1(phal chen): dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo dbyangs su sgrog pa'o// spos kyi chu dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi
148a2(phal chen): 'od dang / 'od zed kyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba ste/ chu klung de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu zla ba snyed do// de nas byang chub
148a3(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi rgyan dang yon tan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par
148a4(phal chen): bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chu klung dri ma med pa'i chus rgyas shing / gzhi ni nor bu'i rdo rje pad+mos byas// rin chen mang po'i sil bus gzhi
148a5(phal chen): bkram zhing / / kun nas brgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong // tham skas 'phreng bas de dag kun nas bskor// pad+mo 'phyang ba'i mu khyung 'khoram can te/ me tog brgyan pa'i mu tig
148a6(phal chen): 'phreng ba dang / / me tog lnga ldis sna tshogs kun nas bres// nor bu'i chu bo spos chu 'byung ba ni// rin chen kun gyi kha dog mdog ltar 'bab// rin chen nor bu me tog mdzes par 'kho
148a7(phal chen): sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsung skad rjod/ / de dag rtog pa nor bu zla ba ste/ rin chen sna tshogs thams cad dpa' grong ngo // phyogs rnams bcu po kun tu rtag par yang // spos dang 'dus
148b1(phal chen): 'od 'gro'i rgyan 'byung ngo / / chu bo rnams las rin chen thams cad kyi// 'od zer 'phro ba kun tu rab tu 'byung // me tog nor bu'i phung po gdugs rnams kyang // rin chen kun gyi zer du rab tu 'bar//
148b2(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan mang po dang // sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rin chen rnams las snang // rin chen 'khor lo'i gzhi rten yid 'ong las// spos chus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang
148b3(phal chen): 'bab/ / rin chen gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba yis// yog cing sangs rgyas gsung du sgra sgrog 'bab// rgyal ba kun gyi byang chub spyod pa dang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog rab tu 'dzud// sangs
148b4(phal chen): rgyas smon lam sgra dbyangs rnam pa dang / / sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi sbyor ba dag/ rnam dag nor bu'i ngos dang ngogs kun nas// sgra rnams sgrog pa kun na rab tu snang // chu bo thams cad dpa' glong
148b5(phal chen): dag las kyang / / byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen 'bar ba dag/ chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu rgyas byed pa// 'byam klas phyogs rnams kun na rab tu snang // chu klung de dag thams cad dri med cing //
148b6(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po sprin gyis kun khyab pa// mdzod spu'i dpal dang sangs rgyas gzi brjid 'bar// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snang / spos chu'i chu klung de dag gi bar
148b7(phal chen): dag kyang sa sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa ste/ chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i me tog pud+d+ha ri ka'i 'phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu
149a1(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o/ / chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i shing gi 'phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par
149a2(phal chen): phye ba'o/ / shing gi gseb thams cad nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyi sprin rtag par rab tu 'byung ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprin dang 'od rnams kyang rab 'byung ngo //
149a3(phal chen): shing gi bar de dag thams cad kyang 'od shin tu 'bar ba ste/ spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam bskal pa thams cad du
149a4(phal chen): byin gyis rlob pa'i sgra sgrog pa'i sprin gyis yongs su gang ba'o/ / spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i sprin gyis mngon par khyab pa'o// spos kyi rgyal po yid du
149a5(phal chen): 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyas pa'o/ / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i kha dog yang dag par ston pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang ba'o// gos kyi tshogs sna tshogs sprin
149a6(phal chen): lta bus mngon par yog pa'o/ / nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis yog par byed pas rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul
149a7(phal chen): pa'i 'od kyis mngon par gang ba'o/ / nor bu'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan shin tu ston pas rgyas pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa chu klung gi bar de
149b1(phal chen): dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi bar gyi rgyan
149b2(phal chen): yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chu klung bar rnams
149b3(phal chen): shin tu rnam par dag/ rin chen rgyan can gser gyis rnam par bris// yal ga me tog sprin rnams 'phyang lding ba'i// shing gi 'phreng bas kun nas mngon par khyab// shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor
149b4(phal chen): sgo dag nas/ / rin chen mang po'i sprin rnams kun kyang 'byung // me tog 'od mang rin chen snying po can// phyogs rnams kun sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed// gzhi rnams nor bu mngon par bkram pa ste//
149b5(phal chen): me tog rnam bris rin chen 'bru dang ldan// kun nas rin chen sprin gyis khyab pa ste// rgyan dang sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan snang // sangs rgyas 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po yis// sa rnams
149b6(phal chen): thams cad kun nas rnam par gang / / phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar zhing snang ba'i sprin// rdul phran kun la gzugs brnyan gyur par snang // nor bu'i rgyan gyis shin tu rnam par rgyas//
149b7(phal chen): mu tig gsal ba'i dra bas rnam par phye// nor bu'i 'khor lo kun nas rab tu bkod// kun na rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul pa snang // 'byam klas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis// sangs rgyas
150a1(phal chen): sprul pa 'akye ba kun na snang / / sangs rgyas mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing // stobs bcu mnga' ba'i chos nyid rab tu sgrog/ rin chen sna tshogs put+tA ri ka yis/
150a2(phal chen): chu rnams kun rgyas snying po nor bu spos// de las mi zad 'od zer rgya mtsho rnams// rab tu 'byung ba'i pad+mo sna tshogs 'byung // dus rnams gsum po'i rgyan rnams thams cad kyang // nor bu re
150a3(phal chen): ngag 'bru yi nang na ste/ / 'byung ba med cing gzung du'ang yod pa min// de ni sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad thams cad du// rgyan dang sprul pa thams cad
150a4(phal chen): rab tu 'gyed/ / sngan chad sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis// de dag 'gro zhing 'ong bar snang ba med// rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad dag la yang // rgyal sras thams cad spyad pa rab spyod pa/
150a5(phal chen): rang gi zhing dang lung bstan sa yi rnams// bsam pa rnam dag tshul bzhin de dag mthong // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
150a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i dmigs pa dag
150a7(phal chen): la'ang dmigs pa re re zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dang rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
150b1(phal chen): / kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag cing / yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/
150b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams cad kyang // rin chen rgyan can 'od zer gnas pa
150b3(phal chen): ste/ / sdug cing gsal ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog/ rin chen thams cad 'od kyang rnam par 'bar// mu tig nor bu'i sprin mang zad mi shes// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan phyogs su rnam
150b4(phal chen): par snang / / zhing na yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu ston pa byed// sangs rgyas gsung gi sprin ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste// nor bu'i rgyal po thams
150b5(phal chen): cad snyan par sgrog/ rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi spyod pa rnams// rin chen rnams las rtag par snang zhing grag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri med 'od// rgyan rnams thams cad nang na rnam
150b6(phal chen): par snang / / 'khor rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid 'chang ba dang // sprul pa rnams kyis zhing gi rgya mtsho gang // sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams ni sgyu ma 'dra// de dag la ni byon pa gang yang med/
150b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas yul rnams byin gyis brlabs pa yi// zhing rnams kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// zhing rnams 'byam klas par ni rnam 'phrul zhing // ji snyeng zhing du de dag kun rgyu ba// de dag
151a1(phal chen): nor bu kun la rab tu snang / / de ltar zhing gi rgya mtsho rnam par sbyangs// sprul pa rnams ni mig yor 'dra ba ste// thams cad dag na chos nyid 'di yang snang // 'di ni rnam par
151a2(phal chen): snang mdzad spyod yul te/ / smon lam rnam par 'phrul las byung ba'o// bzang po'i spyod pas gang rnams byung gyur pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' shes mchog rgya mtsho can// de dag rdul
151a3(phal chen): phran kun la rang rang gis/ / rang gi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zham ring du// bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam yas su// de dag spyod yul
151a4(phal chen): thams cad mthong bas na/ / skad cig sems la de dag thams cad ston// zhing rnams mnyam med 'byung ba med pa ste// de dag mkha' 'dra mnyam zhing mtshan nyid med// smon lam stobs
151a5(phal chen): kyis kun tu gnas pa ste/ / sems can rnams la phan phyir rab tu sbyangs// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa gang
151a6(phal chen): zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyid po de dag la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing
151a7(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
151b1(phal chen): srid kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa de dag thams cad kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/ phyogs gzhan dang
151b2(phal chen): gzhan la lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan yod pa/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du 'du ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan
151b3(phal chen): du ma 'dres pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang byin gyi rlabs gzhan dang gzhan yod pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni pad+mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu
151b4(phal chen): gnas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i me tog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni
151b5(phal chen): rin po che'i 'phreng ba mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po can gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni spos chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten
151b6(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni me tog thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so//
151b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho glong du gyur pa'i chu bo la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i
152a1(phal chen): nor bu'i cod pan sna tshogs kyi rgyan la rab tu gnas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can gyi lus sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten
152a2(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung nor bu'i rgyal po la rab tu gnas so/ / de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa'i gnas shin tu bstan pa ni
152a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
152a4(phal chen): 'byam klas pa la la ni ri rab kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni chu klung gi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun tu 'khor ba'i
152a5(phal chen): dbyibs lta bu'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'khor lo'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi
152a6(phal chen): khams 'byam klas pa la la ni mig mangs ris kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni shing gi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni khang pa
152a7(phal chen): brtsegs pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni rdo'i rgyal mtshan gyi dbyings lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni phyogs 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs
152b1(phal chen): lta bu'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni khang pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni pad+mo'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni
152b2(phal chen): rta babs kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can gyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sprin gyi dbyibs lta bu'o//
152b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyings lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams
152b4(phal chen): 'byam klas pa la la ni dra ba sna tshogs bkye ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sgo kun nas yog pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la
152b5(phal chen): ni dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs rnam par phye ba shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul
152b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed do/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag ni lhun gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni phyogs thams
152b7(phal chen): cad kyi nor bu'i sprin gyi lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che dang spos 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams
153a1(phal chen): kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog kha sprod las bsgrubs pa'i lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi lhun ma no//
153a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi kha dog gi
153a3(phal chen): lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung
153a4(phal chen): ba'i sgra'i lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
153a5(phal chen): spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i sgra'i lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni
153a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi tshul thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i sgra'i lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni
153a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lhun can no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la sa ni/
153b1(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dge ba 'byung ba'i sgra'i sman can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i sgra'i lhun can no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag
153b2(phal chen): la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
153b3(phal chen): pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas
153b4(phal chen): te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing gi rgyud rgyan shin tu brtan par grub// dri med dri bral 'od 'gyeng snying po can// nor bu pad+mo rgya mtsho kun la gnas// la la gang+gA'i rgyam
153b5(phal chen): dag la gnas/ / rnam pa sna tshogs tshul gyi gzhi gnas shing // dbyings kyang sna tshogs kha dog gzugs kyang mang // ri rab grong khyer shing gi dkyil 'khor dang // zhing rgyud thams cad la la
153b6(phal chen): phyogs kun lta/ / la la 'od lus me tog snying po can// nor bus byas pa kun nas sprid dang rtsa// la la'i rgyud gsal mu tig 'od zer lus// nor bu'i gzhi gnas kun kyang mi shig sra// 'byam
153b7(phal chen): klas la la kha dog sna tshogs gsal/ / 'od 'dra 'od 'phro ma mar sprin gyi mdo// la la'i rgyud ni sgra dang skad kyi lus// de las sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs mtha' yas 'byung // la la'i rgyud ni smon lam
154a1(phal chen): @sgra'i lus/ / spyod pa rnam 'phrul sprin gyi grwa yi lus// la la bsod nams yangs dang las kyi sgra// la la'i lus ni rgyal ba'i yon tan sba// zhing gi rgyud rnams rgya mtsho bas ma yas pa/
154a2(phal chen): kun nas mi zad du ma'i sgo nas 'jug/ rnam 'phrul yangs pa mi zad rgyan gyi rnams// tshad med kun gyis phyogs kun rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams kun tu zhing rnams 'du 'gyur te// yangs
154a3(phal chen): pa'i tshul gyis shing gi byung thugs par/ / phyogs bcwa tu 'du ba blang ba yang // 'gro ba mad cing 'jug pa med pa min// tshul gcig gis ni rgyud rnams kun kyang bags/ @
154a4(phal chen): cad ma lus re rer rab tu 'du/ / de la tha dad gang yang mi dmigs te// gzhi med kun 'gengs mtha' dang dbus kyang med// zhing rnams tshul gyi rgyud la rnam 'phrul pa// sangs rgyas
154a5(phal chen): rnam snang mdzad pa kun nas snang / / smon lam sgra ni rgya mtshor rab brjod cing // zhing gi dbyings na sems can kun kyang 'dul// zhing rnams sangs rgyas sku yis kun khyab snang //
154a6(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab byang chub sems dpa' gang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mi mnyam stobs ston cing // sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i
154a7(phal chen): mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ zhing gi rgyud kyi gnas shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad pa'o// // bam po dgu pa//
154b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i dbyibs de na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho mig 'phrul gyi rnam pas rnam par phye ba gzhi kun la rab tu gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi
154b2(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la gang chen mtsho'i dbyings kyi spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nang na
154b3(phal chen): spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbus ma ni ze ba yid du 'ong zhing 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya ste/ de'i nang nas nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rnam par dmigs pa'i gzugs/
154b4(phal chen): brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo chen po gzhi spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan can zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste// de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas
154b5(phal chen): rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ dmigs pa thams
154b6(phal chen): cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de dag las thams cad kyi 'og ma ni dpal 'byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten khams te/ de ni
154b7(phal chen): r do rje thams cad kyi rgyan dang 'od kyi 'khor lo'i sa mtshams nor bu rin po che'i ze ba mang po la rab tu gnas pa nor bu'i 'khor thams cad dang rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan thams cad
155a1(phal chen): kyis rab tu yog par gyur pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang gzhan/
155a2(phal chen): dang gzhan la gnas pa// rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can dag ste// de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshul rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten
155a3(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs kyi pad+mo dpal gyi rgyan ces bya ba rgyan thams cad kyis mtshams can/ rim po
155a4(phal chen): che'i pad+mo shin tu mang ba la rab tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig gi 'bru rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/
155a5(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
155a6(phal chen): seng ge'i 'od zer mchog gi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po
155a7(phal chen): tshe thams cad kyi rgya kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba spos kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis mtshams can rin po che'i me tog gi 'phreng ba sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor
155b1(phal chen): kazi brjid bzang po'i nyi ma'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ yan lag brgyad du dma' ba'i dbyibs can/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor
155b2(phal chen): gyis bskor ba/ / rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi dpal gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
155b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer sna tshogs kyi yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyis mtshams can//
155b4(phal chen): kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje brag gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i 'od zer dang rin po che 'bar ba mtha' yas par snang ba'i
155b5(phal chen): 'od kyi nor bu'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa gcig tu dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/
155b6(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od zer stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
155b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od shin tu bkye ba'i me tog sil ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i
156a1(phal chen): rgyan gyis mtshams can/ shing dang nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i rin po che'i 'khor lo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ phyogs thams cad
156a2(phal chen): nas grA du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i dbyangs su sgrog pas kun nas yog pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams
156a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dga' ba'i stobs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
156a4(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
156a5(phal chen): drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che shI la'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rdo rje'i khyim
156a6(phal chen): gzhal med khang rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas gru bzhi'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'khor lo nor bu gtsug gi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de// de na de bzhin
156a7(phal chen): gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das na/ 'jig rten
156b1(phal chen): gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od zer me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/
156b2(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ me tog pad+mo sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang rin po che'i kha dog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas
156b3(phal chen): pa/ kha dog thams cad kyi gos dang / mu tig dang / stegs bus kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs dang / yon tan
156b4(phal chen): grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa
156b5(phal chen): yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyis zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/
156b6(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po sgra thams cad gtong ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i pad+mo la 'dug cing nam mkha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa// mig 'phrul gyi
156b7(phal chen): dbyibs lta bur bdug pa/ 'od kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya chen po'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal
157a1(phal chen): mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa
157a2(phal chen): zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i 'khor
157a3(phal chen): lo'i shing gi rgyan gyis mtshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi sprin 'bar ba'i sgra'i rgya mtsho'i gzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/
157a4(phal chen): seng ge'i khri'i sprin rin po che yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyan can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi gzi brjid thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes
157a5(phal chen): bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten
157a6(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan mtha' yas pa dang / mu tig gi 'bru rab tu 'phyang ba dang /
157a7(phal chen): rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis mtshams can rin po che'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i nor bu'i rgya mtsho la ra
157b1(phal chen): gnas pa/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ spos dang / nor bu dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi ri rab kyi sprin ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yog pa yod pa/
157b2(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
157b3(phal chen): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs
157b4(phal chen): shing rnam par dag pa/ rdo rje ltar mi shigs shing sra ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ me tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs
157b5(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas rin po che'i bla res kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan chos nyid tshad med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig
157b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i mdog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra
157b7(phal chen): ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ 'od zer gyi rgyan kun nas snang ba'i sa mtshams can/ spos kyi chu'i rgya mtsho me tog gi grong can gyi
158a1(phal chen): gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog 'khyil ba'i dbyings ltar 'dug pa/ gos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
158a2(phal chen): tshangs pa'i dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 'jig
158a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pa/ rdo rje'i gzhi'i sa mtshams can/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor
158a4(phal chen): kha dog sna tshogs can gyis shin tu bzung ba/ pad+mo'i dra ba la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa/ nam mkha' lha'i khang pa can gyis brgyan pa 'di yod de
158a5(phal chen): de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di bzhugs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i stang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das
158a6(phal chen): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam la rdul med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing
158a7(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis mtshams can rin po che'i gos sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i sprin
158b1(phal chen): kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
158b2(phal chen): kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i mar me zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad
158b3(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan mang po thams cad kyi bla re'i sa mtshams can/ me tog gi dra ba rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs dpal
158b4(phal chen): gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i shing dang spos chu'i sprin rgya mtshos kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pas kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba
158b5(phal chen): bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
158b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che mi zad pa 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams can/ spos dang
158b7(phal chen): 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs can gyi pad+mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs rus sbal gyi mgo ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba'i 'khor lo'i tsan dan gyi sprin gyis kun nas
159a1(phal chen): sog pa yod / den de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi nyim dri ma med pa'i ldan zhes bya ba bzugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdu shin tu
159a2(phal chen): snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyis rab tu brgyan gyis snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bdod
159a3(phal chen): ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ dbyibs sems can thams cad kyi lus ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi snying po
159a4(phal chen): 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs yan lag brgyad du 'dug pa/ khor yug thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan dang / me tog dang / shing gi dra bas kun nas yog
159a5(phal chen): pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
159a6(phal chen): gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/
159a7(phal chen): gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan gyi rnam pa thams cad kyi sa mtshams can/ me tog gi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs mu tig gi 'phreng ba bskyil ba lta bur
159b1(phal chen): 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad kyi spos kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal tshad med pa'i tshul dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes
159b2(phal chen): bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs yongs su dag cing snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig
159b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i sprin mi zad pa rab tu
159b4(phal chen): 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams can/ spos dang 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i ri ra ba kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor bu'i ze ba 'khyil ba ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i
159b5(phal chen): dbang po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ / de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun tu snang ba'i
159b6(phal chen): 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro 'khyil ba'i dpal yang
159b7(phal chen): dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i nyi zla rnam par snang ba'i
160a1(phal chen): sa mtshams can/ dbyibs lha'i dbang po thams cad ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyan gyi rnam pa du ma dang rin po che sna
160a2(phal chen): tshogs thams cad dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ nor bu sgron ma'i 'bru'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bsod nams kyi sprin gyis
160a3(phal chen): shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas
160a4(phal chen): pa gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/ lhun gzhan dang gzhan can/ phyogs 'byam klas pa gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang
160a5(phal chen): gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du yongs su 'du ba/ gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam par ma 'dres pa/
160a6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang byin gyi rlabs gzhan can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas
160a7(phal chen): bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun
160b1(phal chen): / nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'khyil pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
160b2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
160b3(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phung po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu rnal
160b4(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs 'byam klas pas sangs rgyas kyi
160b5(phal chen): zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
160b6(phal chen): snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khyad khyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sems can sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang lus kyi
160b7(phal chen): dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
161a1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin
161a2(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sa la mngon par lta ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi
161a3(phal chen): zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su
161a4(phal chen): bskor ba ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi
161a5(phal chen): khams 'byam klas pa de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa rnam par gdag sa pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/ /
161a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i rnam par gdags pa shin tu bstan
161a7(phal chen): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba chu klung gi 'khor dang bcas pa chu klung gi grong
161b1(phal chen): dang bcas pa'i khongs na 'dug go/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer ming du 'ong ba de dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs lobs na spros chu'i rgya mtsho gang chen
161b2(phal chen): mtsho dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing kun nas 'khyil ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba spos dang rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad la
161b3(phal chen): rab tu gnas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i pad+ma chen po la rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra rgya mtsho mngon par sgrub pa'i nga re'i lhun can yod do// de thams
161b4(phal chen): cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim gyi rgyan gyis rgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/
161b5(phal chen): / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ 'khor kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/ pad+mo 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de
161b6(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rnam par snang ba'i mdzod spu'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng du 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
161b7(phal chen): r ten gyi khams zer ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba
162a1(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs kun nas dkyil 'khor du 'dug pa/ mu tig grong khyer dpal gyi dpal gyi seng ge'i khri'i sprin
162a2(phal chen): gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyis mtsho mtha' yas pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
162a3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i spos zhim po dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor
162a4(phal chen): pa rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang dril bu'i dra ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi
162a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid sprul pa med par kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams
162a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi'i kha dog dang 'od yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba
162a7(phal chen): snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ spos chu kha dog mtha' yas pa rin po che'i tshon dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor bu'i 'khor
162b1(phal chen): lo ltar 'dug pa mu tig nyi ma'i tshul kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor legs par byung ba rnam par snang mdzad
162b2(phal chen): bzhugs so/ / de'i rting 'jig rten gyis khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i las kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
162b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdus shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ spos dang rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa pad+mo'i dbyibs
162b4(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ 'od zer rdul dang bral ba dang spos chu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyis shugs kyis dgyes pa mi zad pa'i blo gros shes bya ba
162b5(phal chen): bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig
162b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cig kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyis brtag par bsgrubs
162b7(phal chen): pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zur gsum gyi dbyibs su 'jug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan gyi 'od dang 'od zer gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de banan
163a1(phal chen): gshegs pa dge ba dri ma med pa kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
163a2(phal chen): khams rin po che'i pad+mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdus shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ pad+mo'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya
163a3(phal chen): mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa
163a4(phal chen): spyan rnam par dag pa me tog gi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i
163a5(phal chen): dbyibs dra ma med pas yang dag par bsags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing
163a6(phal chen): rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i 'od mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che rim gyis gzhol ba'i 'od 'phro ba snang ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu spos kyi char 'bebs
163a7(phal chen): ba'i lus sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pa'i blo gros shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig
163b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i 'od bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin tu
163b2(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dga' ba 'khyil ba'i
163b3(phal chen): dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' yangs pa'i spyan zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
163b4(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs rdul dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
163b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ sil snyan thams
163b6(phal chen): cad kyi sgra dang nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser shin tu 'bar ba'i ri reb mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig
163b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i kha dog gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
164a1(phal chen): kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ brgya byin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i
164a2(phal chen): rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ nyi ma sprul pa'i me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal shin tu 'phags pas chos
164a3(phal chen): kyi dbyings su rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po
164a4(phal chen): gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po
164a5(phal chen): che'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mkhar gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ snying po byang chub kyi me tog rin po che shin tu byas pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na
164a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sgron ma kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
164a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/
164b1(phal chen): rin po che'i gos kyi glong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog gi ze ba 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs sgrog pa'i sprin gyis kun nas
164b2(phal chen): yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'bar ba'i pad+mo la rnam par rol pas shin tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
164b3(phal chen): gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i snying pos bsgrubs pa'i dam pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba
164b4(phal chen): snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ gling bzhi'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rani po
164b5(phal chen): che'i 'od 'phro ba rab tu stug po 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi
164b6(phal chen): brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me longs mdog ltar rnam par snang ba
164b7(phal chen): zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rdo rje'i pad+mo rgya mtsho la rab tu
165a1(phal chen): gnas pa/ lA ma yin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa'i lus mig yor gyi sprini rin po che'i cod pan rab tu 'bar ba'i lus can gyis kun
165a2(phal chen): nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i stobs bdud rtsi'i sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba
165a3(phal chen): snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan mchog ltar yid du 'ong ba'i zla bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
165a4(phal chen): 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i tsan dan rin po che'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa / yan lag brgyad du rnam par bkod pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa
165a5(phal chen): mu tig gi me tog mang po shin tu rgyas pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa thugs su chud pas shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal gyi gzi
165a6(phal chen): brjid yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing
165a7(phal chen): kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor bkun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rimatsha
165b1(phal chen): 'od kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ spos mu'i glong gi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ dri zhim po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de
165b2(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu gsal ba'i dbyangs nam mkha' rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu
165b3(phal chen): phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi mdog bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
165b4(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas dran pa'i glong gi dbyings su 'dug pa/
165b5(phal chen): sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs thams cad 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu zhal ston pas shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces
165b6(phal chen): bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i dpal gyi dbyangs
165b7(phal chen): shes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ gser gyi seng ge'i khri
166a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ seng ge'i khri pad+mo kha dog sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/
166a2(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mu med par rnam par snang bas grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das
166a3(phal chen): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po
166a4(phal chen): che'i gos dang spos kyi rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam
166a5(phal chen): par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi sgron ma nam mkha' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de dang
166a6(phal chen): 'dab chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgyud sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi gtsug rnam par
166a7(phal chen): zos pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i sgra ldan can rab tu gnas so/ / de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yid du 'ong ba spang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten
166b1(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi snying po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa nor lu
166b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rin po che dam pa thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus su sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba pad+mo sngang
166b3(phal chen): babazhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan mthun par bres pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba
166b4(phal chen): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig
166b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od rin po thams cad kyi kha dog tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu sprul pa'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs
166b6(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi snying po rdo rje'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
166b7(phal chen): gshegs pa 'od zer rdo rje rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so/ / gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnyog pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/
167a1(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs la thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad+mos rab tu
167a2(phal chen): brgyan pas shin du dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grong khyer gyi blo gros rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig
167a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams bde ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur snyan pa rnam par grags pa'i ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten
167a4(phal chen): gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral ba'i dra ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
167a5(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal gyi rgyal mtshan rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi me tog pad+mo kun tu rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba
167a6(phal chen): bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan du mas rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyis kun tu khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dpal gyi
167a7(phal chen): rgyal mtshan zhe bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las bsgrubs pa'i rgyan kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam pa
167b1(phal chen): bzang po'i ring dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i rgyal po zhes
167b2(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad pa zla ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/
167b3(phal chen): 'a rnams marjod tsam med pan ces byaman la shegs pa mas pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gzi ces kya 'ang
167b4(phal chen): dede'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs nam mkha'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
167b5(phal chen): bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i grong gi 'jeng ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi
167b6(phal chen): mtshan nyid gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo'i chen gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad
167b7(phal chen): rnam par 'dul bas dga' ba mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ze ba yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
168a1(phal chen): gshegs pa grags pa chen po dang yon tan yangs pa'i dbyangs rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
168a2(phal chen): rgyan gyis kun tu brgyan pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ma 'dres pa'i 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten
168a3(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mi zad pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu
168a4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ pad+mo'i rgyan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/
168a5(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo snang ba'i bla re'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so//
168a6(phal chen): de'i lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dpal rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rab tu
168a7(phal chen): brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rjes su sgrog pa'i lus can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams
168b1(phal chen): rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba pad+mo rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis gaskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa ring po chernams
168b2(phal chen): cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i chu'i glong rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che'i go cha dang mdzod spu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rgyan gyis mi dmigs pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyis kun
168b3(phal chen): nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
168b4(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa la chags pa med pa'i
168b5(phal chen): 'od kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'khor lo gzhi mnyam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
168b6(phal chen): gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi shing gi ze ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
168b7(phal chen): gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad rnam par dag pas gti mug med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
169a1(phal chen): @dkyil 'khor rnam par shin tu phye ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba yangs pa skye ba tshangs pa'i dbyungs thugs pa
169a2(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od srab pa'i rgyan rab tu nang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la rnam par
169a3(phal chen): rol pa'i ye shes shin tu yangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang dbyibs mu med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
169a4(phal chen): gshegs pa ye shes thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i blo zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba
169a5(phal chen): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs
169a6(phal chen): yongs su dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs yongs su sbyangs pa'i mtshan gyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// /
169a7(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba shin tu 'byam klas pa zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i spyan chags pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
169b1(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i gdan brtan pa bsgrubs pas dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes
169b2(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la ye shes kyi sku shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
169b3(phal chen): zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs shin tu rgyas pa rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu mkhas pa'i
169b4(phal chen): sgron ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i nags tshal zab mo'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis
169b5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa zab po rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang 'od tha dad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
169b6(phal chen): pa kun tu snang ba'i me tog gi sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i sgo sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
169b7(phal chen): gshegs pa yon tan kun nas mchog tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i mdzod spus bsgrubs pa'i ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
170a1(phal chen): gshegs pa dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs zab mo'i gang chen mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
170a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phyogs su gsal bas sems can gyi rgyan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rtse mo// 'bar
170a3(phal chen): ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa'i ye shes mchog gis chos kyi dbyings la mngon par 'phags pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na
170a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi pad+mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dri ma med pa'i mdzod kun nas snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
170a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bus bsgrubs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
170a6(phal chen): nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan dang / spos dang / nor bu dang / shing thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa
170a7(phal chen): dbyibs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu 'byung bas sprul pa
170b1(phal chen): chen po'i dri ba rnam par snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che in+d+ra ni las rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan can ces
170b2(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang bas phyogs rnam par snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba spos thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi pad+mo'i sprin la rab
170b3(phal chen): tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang gsung mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ba yod de/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi mdzod phyogs su mi
170b4(phal chen): zad pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod kha dog mtha'
170b5(phal chen): yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zur du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ rgyan mig 'phrul lta bu thams cad kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
170b6(phal chen): snang mdzad pad+mo'i spyan rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
170b7(phal chen): khams dge ba'i tshogs kyis rab tu grol ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i seng ge'i blo gros chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig
171a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i gdan yongs su byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
171a2(phal chen): pachos kyi dbyings su dpal gyi 'od zer 'byam klas pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgra mnyam par
171a3(phal chen): sgrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu rgya che ba'i grags pas kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rdo rje ltar brtan pa'i rkyen gyi rnying
171a4(phal chen): po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma ltar shin tu phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dbang phyug gi me tog gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
171a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshon gyi 'khor lo'i gzhi dang snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
171a6(phal chen): pa dga' ba yangs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs
171a7(phal chen): chen po'i dpal bzang po'i ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams blta na don yod pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs
171b1(phal chen): rab kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i rgyan dang dbyibs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i zla ba smon lam gyi tshul gyi 'od zer
171b2(phal chen): ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / // bam po bcu pa// / gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog sna tshogs rab tu bkye ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod
