200a7(phal chen): sa ni 'jig pa'ang med/ / skad cig skad cig sems kun la// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis// zhing rnams rab tu 'byung ba'i rnams// shin tu ji med dag la stos
200b1(phal chen): zhing rnams la las yi dngos/ / sra bar de dag byung gyur cing // sna ba med cing 'od kyang med// sdig pa'i las kyi gnas yin no// zhing rnams la la rdo rje'i dngos// kun
200b2(phal chen): nas nyon mongs 'jigs pa che/ / bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal mang // bsod nams chung ba'i gnas kyang yin// zhing rnams la la lcags kyi dngos// la la zangs kyi
200b3(phal chen): dngos su gnas/ / sdig pa'i las kyis kun tu gang // ri dang brag gis mnyam pa med// 'jig rten de na dmyal ba yi// sems can sdug balngal skyabs med pa//
200b4(phal chen): mun pa rjes su rnyed gyur cing // me lce rgya mtsho'i nang na 'bar// 'on kyang byol song skye gnas su// las ni mngon par byung gyur te// bdag gi las kyi nyes pa yis//
200b5(phal chen): sdug bsngal tshor ba rab tu myong // gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams na'ang snang // skom dang bkres pas rab tu mnar// me yi ri yis gdung ba yi// sdug bsngal tshor ba'ang
200b6(phal chen): myong bar gyur/ / la la rin chen bdun las byung // la la sna tshogs gzugs su gnas// dge ba'i las kyis byung ba ste// sna tshogs khyim gyis rab tu brgyan// mi dang
200b7(phal chen): rnams la la ni/ / mtho ris dag gi 'jig rten na// dge ba'i bsod nams 'bras bur ldan// dga' ba de myong ba de dag gos// spu yi rtsi mo gcig la yang // zhing rnams skyes
201a1(phal chen): bsam mi khyab/ / sna tshogs dbyibs kyang tha dad de// de dag 'dres pa gang yang med// rang rang so so'i las kyis na// sems can khams rnams bsam
201a2(phal chen): mi khyab/ / 'du shes sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i rnams// bde dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong // zhing rnams la la mtha' yas 'od// sems can mang don kun nas gnas//
201a3(phal chen): yongs byung rdo rje ut+pa la// sna tshogs rnam dag dri ma med// zhing rnams la la 'od zer dngos// 'od kyi 'khor la kun nas gnas// tsan dan gser la yongs su byung //
201a4(phal chen): 'od 'phro sprin gyi mdog dang mnyam// zhing rnams la la nyi zla'i dngos// spos kyi gos kyis kun nas g.yogs// la la pad+mo gcig la ste// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su
201a5(phal chen): rgyas/ la la mtshan gyi mdog dang 'od// zhing rnams rin chen dri ma med// mig 'phrul 'od kyang rab tu 'gyed// 'od zer dra bas snang bar byas// zhing rnams la la rdo rje dang /
201a6(phal chen): pad+mo'i dngos su spos la gnas// la la nor bu'i 'od kyang yin// zhing rnams yongs su dag la ltos// me tog glong las la la byung // bsam gyis mi khyab zhing la ltos//
201a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu khyab// byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dang mnyam// la la me tog shing rnams dang // lo ma'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs te// nor bu'i sprin gyi kun tu
201b1(phal chen): / / zhing gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag/ zhing rnams la la bcwo'i dngos// snang ba bzang pos rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i gsung yang yin// zhing mjam
201b2(phal chen): bsam mi khyab/ / rin chen cod pan sna tshogs dang // byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rnams dang // gdan las de bzhin la la byung // 'od dang sprul pa'ang rab tu 'gyed//
201b3(phal chen): tsan dan phye ma sna tshogs dang // mdzod spu rnam par snang ba'i 'od// sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'od zer rnams// zhing rnams 'byung ba rab tu brjod// la la rgyan dang 'od gcig
201b4(phal chen): par/ / zhing rnams dri ma med par snang // la la rgyan rnams thams cad kyis// rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu brgyan// la la zhing rnams bcu dag gi/ rgyan gyis mngon
201b5(phal chen): par rab tu brgyan/ / la la zhing rnams stong dag kyang // rnam par brgyan cing rab tu gnas// zhing gi rgyan mang bye ba yis// zhing rnams la la rnam par bris// rgyan/
201b6(phal chen): dang tshul rnams tha dad par// sna tshogs mig yor lta bur snang // brjod du med pa'i zhing gi rnams// rgyan gcig la yang rab tu snang // 'od ni gzhan dang gzhan bkye
201b7(phal chen): ba/ sangs rgyas smon lam mthu las byung // smon lam rgya mtsho rnam mang bas// zhing rnams la la rnam par sbyangs// de dag rgyan mang thams cad du// zhing gi rgya mtshoni
202a1(phal chen): tu snang / / kun tu ba'ang zin sngon lam gyis// zhing rnams yongs su gang sbyangs pa// de dag kun la dus gsum gyi// zhing gyi rgyan rnams kun kyang snang /
202a2(phal chen): zhing gi rgyud kyi rnam sprul pa// kye ma rgyal sras khyed ni ltos// ma 'ongs pa yi zhing rnams kyang // rmi lam bzhin du de dag snang // ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi//
202a3(phal chen): 'das pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho yang // zhing gcig nang na thams cad snang // mig yor bzhin du sprul pa yin// dus su ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rnam sprul
202a4(phal chen): zhing rnams gang yod pa/ / zhing gi rgyud ni 'di la snang // kun kyang nang na yod par gnas// zhing gi rdul gyi rtse mo la// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa// shong bar
202a5(phal chen): de dag kun na snang / / mig yor mtshan nyid med pa'o// la la rgya mtsho'i dbyibs su 'dug/ zhing brgya mang po de dag ltos// ri rab ri yaM dbyings 'dra dang // 'jig
202a6(phal chen): rten khams ni bsam mi khyab/ / zhing rnams la la rnam par bris// mig yor dbyibs su gnas pa ste// sna tshogs shing gi dbyibs su gnas// sangs rgyas kyis kyang kun tu
202a7(phal chen): khyab/ / zhing rnams nor bu'i 'khor lo'i dbyibs// la la pad+mo'i dbyibs su gnas// yan lag brgyad pa sna tshogs mang // sna tshogs kha dog dri ma med// la la khri yi dbyis
202b1(phal chen): / lta bu// grwa yi dbyibs dang khyad khyud de// la la grong khyer dbyibs su 'dug/ tshangs pa'i lus su rab tu gnas// lha yi dbang po'i gtsug pud dbyibs// zla ba khas
202b2(phal chen): ltar la la gnas/ / nor bu'i ri yi dbyibs su 'khod// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbyings kyang 'dra// spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i glong lta bur// 'jig rten khams rnams rab tu gnas//
202b3(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbyibs 'dra ba// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sbyangs// 'khor lo bkra shis dbyibs lta bu// 'jig rten la la dkyil 'khor te// mdzod spu'i
202b4(phal chen): spyi gtsug dbyibs lta bu/ / la la mig gi tshul yang 'dra// sangs rgyas phyag gi dbyibs lta bu// la la rdo rje'i dbyibs su 'dug/ 'od 'phro ri yi dbyibs kyang 'dra// byang chub
202b5(phal chen): sems dpas kun tu gang / / zhing rnams la la seng ge'i dbyibs// nor bu'i go char mngon bsgrubs pa// gzugs dang dbyibs ni du ma ste// gzugs rnams kun gyis rab
202b6(phal chen): tu gnas/ / zhing gi rgyud ni gcig la yang // zhing gi dbyibs rnams mi zad pa// rab tu gnas pa byin rlabs dang // sangs rgyas smon lam rnams kyis byung // zhing rnams
202b7(phal chen): la la bskal pa tsam/ / la la bskal pa bcu pa ste// zhing rnams la la rdul mnyam pa'i// bskal pa bye bar brjod pa yin// la la bskal pa gcig la yang // zhing rnams mang po
203a1(phal chen): 'byung bar snang / / tshad med grangs kyang med pa yi// 'jig pa de bzhin bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas med// zhing rnams la la sangs
203a2(phal chen): rgyas bcas/ / la la'i zhing na sangs rgyas gcig/ la la sangs rgyas mang po'o// sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing rnams dang // 'jig rten gzhan gyi khams su yang // sangs rgyas
203a3(phal chen): sprul pa gshegs mdzad cing / / rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// 'pho dang 'byung dang sku tshe dang // byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya dang // bdud kyi sde dag 'dul ba dang // chos
203a4(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ston/ / sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du// gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun kyang ston// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// 'jig rten kun na tha mi dad /
203a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas zhing rnams re rer yang // rgyal ba gcig ni skye 'gyur te// lo grangs bye ba phrag stong du// chos kyi dam pa rab tu ston// sems can snod du ma gyur la// sangs
203a6(phal chen): rgyas ston pa mi mdzad de/ / sangs rgyas bsam dang ldan pas ni// de nyid gcig kyang kun tu mthong // sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing gi rnams// zhing rnams re re dag tu yang //
203a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba rnams ni rab tu skye// rgyal ba so so de dag na// sprul pa mang po rab 'gyed cing // chos kyi dbyings ni khyab mdzad nas// sems can
203b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad/ / zhing rnams la la 'od med de// mun pa 'jigs pa shin tu che// reg na sdug bsngal spu gri 'dra// blta na mi bzad spyi yang g.ya'// zhing rnams la
203b2(phal chen): la lha 'od can/ / la la khyim gyi 'od can te// la la nyi zla'i 'od dang ldan// zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams la la rang gi 'od// shing gi 'od can dri ma med// gang du
203b3(phal chen): sdug bsngal mi mthong ba/ / de dag sems can dge bas byung // la la ri yaM 'od can te// zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od// la la mar me'i 'od can te// sems can rnams
203b4(phal chen): kyi las kyis byung / / zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas 'od// byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang // zhing rnams la la pad+mo'i 'od// 'od 'phro 'od can rab tu mdzes// zhing
203b5(phal chen): rnams la la me tog 'od/ / spos chu'i 'od dang ldan pa'ang yod// spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro can// smon lam dbang gis rnam par sbyangs// zhing rnams la la sprin 'od
203b6(phal chen): can/ / nor bu'i go cha'i 'od kyis gsal// sangs rgyas byin gyi brlabs kyis snang // yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs ldan// rin chen cod pan 'od dang ldan// rdo rje gser gyi 'od
203b7(phal chen): kyis snang / / yongs su dag pa'i sgra dbyangs can// de dag na ni sdug bsngal med// thams cad rgyan gyi 'od can dang // zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od// la la snying po
204a1(phal chen): byang chub 'od/ / 'khor rnams kun tu rab tu snang // sangs rgyas sprul pa'i snang ba can// sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon par yog/ kun tu 'od kyis rab tu snang
204a2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ / zhing rnams la la 'jigs sgra can// mi bzad 'jigs pa'i nga ro can// rtsub cing brlang ba sgra rnams dang // yid myong 'jigs pa chen po sgrog
204a3(phal chen): dmyal ba byol song skye gnas dang / / gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnams// mya ngan rgya mtsho zhing gi rnams// nyon mongs ldan pa'i sgra yang 'byung // la la dag na yid 'ong
204a4(phal chen): sba/ / dga' bar byed cing ston 'dems pa// dge ba'i las dang 'bras bu'i dbyangs// zhing gi 'khor na rab tu sgrog/ la la brgya byin lha dbang dbyangs// gzhan dag
204a5(phal chen): tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te/ / 'jig rten kun gyi dbyangs su yang // la la'i zhing na rab tu grag/ zhing rnams la la sprin gyi sgra// rin chen rgya mtsho'i 'od zer dang // nor bu'i
204a6(phal chen): shing gi gzugs sgra dang / / rol mo'i sgra yos kun tu khyab// 'od zer klong gi sgra rnams dang // sangs rgyas sprul pa mi zad dang // byang chub sems dpa'i snga dag dang // 'od
204a7(phal chen): zer sgra ni snyan pa 'byung / / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dang // kha cig zhing na bsam yas pa'i// smon lam rgya mtsho'i ro dang // spyod pa'i sgra yang snyan pa 'byung // dus
204b1(phal chen): gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ / mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang // de dag zhing rnams 'byung ba'i sgra// zad pa med pa'i dbyangs su sgrog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi
204b2(phal chen): stobs sgra dang / / tshad med sa dang pha rol phyin// chos kyi rang bzhin smra dag kyang // kha cig zhing na rab tu grag/ kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi// sgra ni zhing rnams bye
204b3(phal chen): ba 'byin/ / bskal par gnas shing rab tu sgrog/ sgra dbyangs 'byin pa zad mi shes// zhing gi dbyings rnams la lan// sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa yi// smra
204b4(phal chen): yis chos kyi dbyings bkang ba/ / de dag kun na rab tu grag/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par dgod pa
204b5(phal chen): shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dgu pa'o/ / // bam po bcu gnyis pa// rigs kyi bu dag sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa 'jig rten gyi
204b6(phal chen): khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol/ de bas kyang pha snga'i dus de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbus su 'jig
204b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de ni rin po che'i pad+mo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rnam par dag cing kun nas 'on
205a1(phal chen): mongs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gzhi rgyan mtha'
205a2(phal chen): yas pas brgyan pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi khor yug brgya phrag gsum gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa
205a3(phal chen): ri rab dang / grong khyer dang / khang khyim dri ma med cing 'od rnam par dag par snang bas brgyan pa/ zas dang / skom dang / gos kyi longs spyod
205a4(phal chen): yid kyis bsam pas 'byung ba rgyan gyi rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/ khros chu'i rgya mtsho
205a5(phal chen): 'od rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las me tog gi ri rab me tog 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rin po che'i khri 'phang bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor cing brgyan pa zhig byung ste/
205a6(phal chen): ri rab de'i steng na nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba spos kyi rgyal mtshan stong phrag dpag tu med pa shin tu bsgreng ba'i rgyan can ma
205a7(phal chen): tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tu med pa'i 'phreng ba rnam par bres pa/ nor bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkod pa rin po che'i rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med pas kun nas
205b1(phal chen): btsun pa/ rin pa cha' ma tog prad+ha ri kA dpag tu med pa'i 'phreng gis kun nas bskor ba/ thos dang rin po tsha pad+mo mang po dpag tu med pa thams cad kyis rab tu
205b2(phal chen): brgyan pa/ rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas rgyas pa/ spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas snang
205b3(phal chen): bar byas pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sems can sna tshogs snang bas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor
205b4(phal chen): rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs logs na/ grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba zhes bya ba mi'i rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer bye ba khra khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis/
205b5(phal chen): bskor ba/ rin po che 'ba' zhig las byas pa/ chu dang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun yod pa// rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing tags dang phru ma'i ra ba bdun gyis brgyan cing
205b6(phal chen): kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i 'o bas spos chus gang ba/ rin po che'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mud dang / me tog puN+Da ri kas rnam par brgyan pa bdun gyis
205b7(phal chen): kun nas bskor ba/ shing ta la'i 'phreng brgyan sna tshogs kyi tshogs mang po 'byin pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan dang khang pa brtsegs pas rab tu brgyan pa/ stang
206a1(phal chen): nas gser gyi dra ba dang / dril bu'i dra ba dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba'i dra ba dang / in+d+ra nI la'i dra ba dang / rdo rje'i pad+mo'i dra bas kun nas yog pa
206a2(phal chen): rin po che'i shing drung me tog gi dra ba dang rol mo'i sgra mang po thams cad kyi sprin yid du 'ong bas kun tu khyab pa/ spos dang 'phreng ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yod de/ de'i 'khor
206a3(phal chen): kun na sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong phrag bcu yod de/ sgo de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa ste/ sgo de dag re re'i mdun yang rin po che'i rdo 'i rgyal
206a4(phal chen): mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa'o/ / bza' shing gi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas bskor ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de dag thams
206a5(phal chen): cad kyang spos dang rin po che'i sna tshogs kun nas spos kyi dri kun tu 'byung ba/ bya sna tshogs thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o// grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces
206a6(phal chen): bya ba der mir skyes pa thams cad kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dag ste/ nam mkha' las rgyu ba mi dang lha mnyam du spyod pa yid bzhin gyi yul la longs spyod pa sha stag
206a7(phal chen): de nas lho phyogs logs na lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba yod do/ / de nas lho phyogs logs na klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba
206b1(phal chen): yangan/ / nas rgya byags lags na banang sbyin gyi zang kyir rje'i dbul sna tshogs kyi rgyalas na zhes bya 'dud// de nas kyi phyogs logs na rje pa'i grong kyi gnal /
206b2(phal chen): khang bzang po zhes bya ba yod do// de dang 'dab chags su rnam yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon ces bya ba yod do// de dang 'dab chags su 'dab ma bzang po'i grong khyer
206b3(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba'i bya ba yod do/ / de dang 'dab chags su bram ze'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba
206b4(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'o/ / grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang rgyan mang po du mas brgyan pa nas/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig btsug gi 'khor gyis bskor
206b5(phal chen): ba'i bar du ste/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/ snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog rnam par snang ba zhe bya ba rin
206b6(phal chen): po che thams cad kyi shing yal gsug cing rgya che ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i me tog gzugs dang dbyibs rnam pa tha dad pa mang po shin tu rgyas pa
206b7(phal chen): spos dang me mar rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i 'phreng ba mang po rgya chen po'i sprin kun tu bkram pa/ rin po che'i 'od thur du 'gro bas zhing kun tu khyab pa/
207a1(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis brtan pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'od zer mang pos rnam par snang bar byas pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po
207a2(phal chen): sna tshogs mang pos sbas pa/ rol mo thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs shin tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'byung ba/ phyogs bcur me tog
207a3(phal chen): sna tshogs mang po rab tu 'byung ba yod de/ de'i mdun du pad+mo chen po me tog gi za ba 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ rgyar dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya yod pa/ rtsa ba spos dang
207a4(phal chen): rin po che dang / rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la thug pa chung rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa'i 'dab ma can
207a5(phal chen): rin po che 'od 'phro ba dang spos kyi ze ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ snying po la rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i tshon bkye ba pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i
207a6(phal chen): 'khor gyis bskor ba/ phyogs bcur 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rab tu 'gyed pa/ ze ba thams cad las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba mngon par byung ngo // 'jig rten
207a7(phal chen): gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag las bskal pa'i thog ma pa
207b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dbyangs shes bya ste/
207b2(phal chen): des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'di yongs su sbyangs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der
207b3(phal chen): lo brgyan de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshe/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de yang rgyan thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par gyur
207b4(phal chen): 'di ltar rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu gtong ba'i snying po can du gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra yang rab tu 'byed/
207b5(phal chen): phyogs bcu dag kyang 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byed// gzhal med khang dang khyim gyi rdal thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed// rin po che'i me tog dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
207b6(phal chen): g yi sprin yang rab tu 'byed sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa'i sgra dang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu
207b7(phal chen): gtong ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas
208a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu 'byin to/ / de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i ltas te/
208a2(phal chen): rgyan de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis khong du chud do// de bzhin gshegs pa las mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin
208a3(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas pa lta bar mos pa dang / snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol ba de dag thaman kyang ltas sngon du byung bas yang dag par bskul to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
208a4(phal chen): g shegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i sku can sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su skye ba rab tu 'phros
208a5(phal chen): pa sku snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa/ gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'phags shing zil gyis brko/
208a6(phal chen): pa mtshan rin po che'i me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du ston pa/
208a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis khyab par mdzad pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba kha dog mtha' ya
208b1(phal chen): pa rab tu gtong ba de pad+mo chen po de la mngon par byung bar gyur to/ / ji ltar spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa'i 'od la rab tu gnas pa'i ri rab me tog gi 'od 'phro bas brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan
208b2(phal chen): gser shin tu 'bar ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rtse mo la/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten
208b3(phal chen): gyi khams dpal gyi sgra kun tu yang ri rab bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi rtse mo la bzhugs par kun nas snang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun tu tshul rgya che ba kun gyi 'jig rten gyi
208b4(phal chen): khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag gi gling bzhi pa thams cad na'ang snying po byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngo / /
208b5(phal chen): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'od zer
208b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rab tu bkye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad nas/ 'dul ba thams cad yang dag par bskul
208b7(phal chen): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyi 'od zer de dag bkye ma thag tu de'i mod la sems can thams cad kyi 'on mongs pa thams
209a1(phal chen): cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/ bsgribs pa'i dra ba thams cad kyang shin tu bsal sangs rgyas blta ba la ba sgribs pa'i ri thams cad kyang
209a2(phal chen): rnam par bcom sems can thams cad kyi rnyog pa yang rnam par dag/ dge ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu byungamos pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang
209a3(phal chen): yongs su dag/ mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par bsal/ lus dang sems kyi gnod
209a4(phal chen): ba thams cad kyang rab tu ni sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs kyang rnam par dag/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhil ba yang shin tu thob par gyur te/
209a5(phal chen): de dag 'od zer des yang dag par bskul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'khor brgya stong du ma dag gis bskor cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na bder 'dong par
209a6(phal chen): gyur to/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la grong khyer chen po 'od 'gro ba'i 'od ces bya ba der rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros shes bya ba grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig
209a7(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po byung ste/ de la bud med bsod nams kyi dpal la sogs pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun yod do// de la bu zi brjid chen po la sogs pa lnga brgya yo
209b1(phal chen): do/ / rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid chen po la yang bud med blta na bzang ba la sogs pa stong phrag bcu yod do// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam/
209b2(phal chen): par 'phrul pa mthong nas/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rgyus chos bcu khong du chud par gyur to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya/
209b3(phal chen): ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du rung ngo // 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ tshul yang
209b4(phal chen): pa'i sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud do/ / 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po khong du chud do// 'di
209b5(phal chen): lta ste/ sgra'i sprin gyis kun nas rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i
209b6(phal chen): dga' ba chen po khong du chud do/ / 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ tshul gyi gzhi rgya chen po rgya
209b7(phal chen): mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa chen po khong du chud do/ / 'di lta ste/ mos pa rgya mtsho'i stobs dang shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i smon lam gyi tshul gyi sgo
210a1(phal chen): @chen po khong du chud do/ / 'di lta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i dkyim nas kyi lams par gzhol ba'i shugs shes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i
210a2(phal chen): ye shes chen po'i sgo khong du rud do/ / de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba de chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
210a3(phal chen): 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa nyi ma mang po stong gi rnams/ / mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa bzhin// snying po byang chub dri med la//
210a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'od ni shin tu snang // bskal pa bye ba stong dag gis// mgon po 'jig rten byung ba ni// sangs rgyas yang dag skyes pa rnams// rgyal ba sku ni rab tu snang //
210a5(phal chen): ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer la// sangs rgyas sprin ni bsam mi khyab// gnas rnams kun na kun kyang snang // de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gzhag/ 'od 'phro'i sprin rnams rab
210a6(phal chen): bkye ba/ / 'od zer sprin la zad mi shes// 'jig rten 'di dag snang bar byed// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag las// 'od zer rnams ni dri med pa/
210a7(phal chen): sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rgyas 'gengs ltos// sangs rgyas gsung ni yid 'ong ba// 'gro ba kun tu rab tu bsgrags// 'gro kun dbyangs kyi san
210b1(phal chen): lag tu/ / sangs rgyas yon tan rnam par brjod// sangs rgyas 'od kyis phog pa yis// sems can kun kyang bde bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi// 'gro ba kun kyang
210b2(phal chen): dga' ba skyes/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams// rin chen sprin rnams rab 'byed cing // bstod pa'i sprin gyis rgyal ba'i drung // phyogs bcu kun nas mngon par 'ongs// snying
210b3(phal chen): po byang chub 'di la yang / / sgra yi rgya mtsho zab mo grag/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhi/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// kun kyang srid zhu ldan gyur te// dga'
210b4(phal chen): zhing shin tu mos byas shing / / chos kyi rgyal po blta ba'i phyir// 'jig rten mgon gyi drung du 'dong // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshigs su bcad pa
210b5(phal chen): 'di brjod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas kun tu shin tu grag par gyur to// de nas rgyal
210b6(phal chen): po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ rang gi 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa zhang blon rnams dang
210b7(phal chen): gzhon nu dang / / rgyal po'i mi dang blon po dang // tshong pa rnams dang de bzhin du// yul mi rnams kyang kun 'dus shig/ grong khyer rnams ni kun tu yang // rnga sgra dag gis myur du spogs//
211a1(phal chen): kun kyang mthun par lhan cig tu// rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir deng zhig/ srang rnams thams cad kun tu yang // dge ba'i dril gyi sgra sgrogs shig/ bu dang chung
211a2(phal chen): ma 'khor bcas pa/ / rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir yang 'deng // grong khyer rnams kyang rgyan par gyis// rgyan rnams kun kyang kun tu res// rgyal mtshan dam pa bzang po'i rnams// nor
211a3(phal chen): bu sna tshogs brgyan pa sdengs/ / rin chen dra ba'i bla re rnams// nam mkha'i dkyil du bre bar gyis// nam mkha' 'di las thams cad du// sil snyan sprin gyi sgra dag phyung //
211a4(phal chen): lam gyi srang yang rgyan par gyis// rin chen char yang kun tu phob// bzhon pa rin chen bstad par gyis// rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // rang rang so so'i 'khor rnams
211a5(phal chen): kyis/ / sna tshogs sprin gyi char phob cig/ rgyan gyi sprin rnams thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyang dgab par gyis// spos dang pad+mo'i 'od kyi sprin// me
211a6(phal chen): tog gdugs rnams bsam yas dang / / se mo do dang 'phreng sprin rnams// gos kyi sprin gyi char phob cig/ ri rab rnams dang spos kyi ri// nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgyan par gyis/
211a7(phal chen): dri med tsan dan phye ma'i rnams// nam mkha'i dkyil la rab tu ston// nor bu'i 'phreng dang me tog 'phreng // rin chen 'phreng ba dri med dang // rin chen sgron ma'i sprin gyi rnams// nam
211b1(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings la sgrub par gyis/ / thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyis la// dga' zhing spro ba'i sems bskyed de// bu dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams// rgyal ba blta phyir kun/
211b2(phal chen): 'dong ngo // de nas rgyal bu blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po bsod nams dpal la sogs pa bud med stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun dang / gzi brjid chen po la
211b3(phal chen): sogs pa gzhon nu lnga brgya dang blo gros kyi stobs la sogs pa blon po stong phrag drug cu dang / de dag la sogs pa 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis bskor cing
211b4(phal chen): mdun du bdar te/ grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba nas byung nas de'i 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha'i dbyings su mngon par 'phags te/ rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
211b5(phal chen): rgyal po'i mthu chen pos nam mkha' thams cad rgyan gyi sprin thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
211b6(phal chen): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba nas kyang lha'i dbang po rab mtshe ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
211b7(phal chen): lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gan ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod
212a1(phal chen): @ro/ / klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa nas kyang / klu'i rgyal po bcu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba klu bye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan gyi/ banod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpas
212a2(phal chen): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba nas kya gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dpa' bas rgyal ba zhes bya ba gnod sbyin bye ba bdun cu rtsa bdun dang ldan cig/ dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med kha
212a3(phal chen): bzang po nas kyang dri za'i rgyal po blta na dga' ba zhes bya ba dri za bye ba dgu bcu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon nas kyang lAm
212a4(phal chen): y in gyi dbang po gzugs rnam par dag pa las sems dpa' zhes bya ba lha ma yin bye ba stong phrag lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor ba nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bza
212a5(phal chen): po'i lte ba nas kyang nam mkha'i lding gi bdag po stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bya ba nam mkha' lding gi 'khor dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig / mi'am ci'i grong khyer rtse ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa nas kyang /
212a6(phal chen): mi'am chi'i dbang po rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba mi 'am ci bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig/ lto 'phye chen po'i zong khyer rin po che rdo rje sra ba'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang lto 'phye chen po'i
212a7(phal chen): dbang po rin po che grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gsum dang lhan cig/ tshangs pa'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs nas kyang /
212b1(phal chen): tshangs pa'i dbang po gzhan gyis pham pa med pa zhes bya ba tshangs pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad byang ba
212b2(phal chen): ri rab kyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de dag
212b3(phal chen): la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grong khyer gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag nas sems can gyi ris tha dad pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po mang po 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom/
212b4(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams
212b5(phal chen): cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sems can de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho der dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i
212b6(phal chen): chos rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i mdo'i 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la yongs su bstan to/ / de nas byang
212b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos chos kyi gzhung 'di bstan pa thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sngon yang dag par
213a1(phal chen): bsgrubs pa'i chos rgya mtsho la chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ / 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgrol ye shes
213a2(phal chen): kyi snang ba rab tu tho za 'o/ / 'di lta ste/ thog ma chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa// 'di lta
213a3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po mig rnam par dag pa la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang
213a4(phal chen): zhing rnam par dbye ba'i smon lam rgya mtshal ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ / 'di lta na/ yon tan chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'drug pa
213a5(phal chen): spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ / 'di lta ste/ sgro yangs pa nas snang ba zab mo yang dag par 'byung ba rgya mtshol ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo//
213a6(phal chen): phyir mi ldon pa'i chings rten po thags tu bang po dang mthu chen po 'i rgya mtshol ye shes snang bar tuzabag/ dichos kyi dbyings mtha' dngangs
213a7(phal chen): med par sprul pas brgyan cing 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la la shes snang ba rab tu thong ngo / / 'di lta'i/ yon tan gyi kyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med par rab tu 'jug pa la man
213b1(phal chen): par sgrub pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs shing mos pa rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rgyan yang dag par bsdu ba pa rgya mtsho la
213b2(phal chen): ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad
213b3(phal chen): mngon du bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa
213b4(phal chen): thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi
213b5(phal chen): dpal gyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i chos nyid 'di thos
213b6(phal chen): nas/ / bdag gi ye shes snang ba skyes// des ni sangs rgyas sngon spyod pa// rgya mtsho rnams kyang rab tu mthong // ku tshe kun tu ji lta bur// phun sum tshogs
213b7(phal chen): 'gyur kun kyang mthong / / mtshan gyi rnam pa rnam dmigs dang // gang gis las rgyas mchod pa'ang shes// sngan chad sangs rgyas drung dag tu// bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod spyad de/
214a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mang mchod nas// zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// sku yi rgya mtsho mang po dag/ rgya chen yong su kun btang zhing //
214a2(phal chen): spyod pa'i dam pa rab spyad de// rgya mtsho'i zhing yang shin tu sbyangs// snyan dang shangs mang rgya mtsho dang // phyag zhabs dbu yang de bzhin te// rgyal srid btsun po'i 'khor
214a3(phal chen): btang zhing / / zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// zhing rnams so so re re la// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// byang chub spyod pa rab spyod de// zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs//
214a4(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis// spyod pa rgya mtsho kun spyad nas// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun drung du// zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs// ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas// nyi ma
214a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor mthong ba bzhin/ / sangs rgyas ye shes 'od snang bas// sngon gyi spyod pa rnams kyang mthong // byang chub 'tshang rgya zhi ba yi// chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang ba'i/
214a6(phal chen): zhing gi rgya mtsho dag pa'i rnams// dri med 'od can kun kyang mthong // sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs kyis// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// zhing gi rgya mtsho yangs pa'i rnams/
214a7(phal chen): de ltar bdag gis spyad par bya/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams
214b1(phal chen): cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin de mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon par khong du chud de/ 'jig rten thams cad ni snang bar byed
214b2(phal chen): sngon gyi sbyor ba'i rgya mtsho ni rab tu rjod/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul ni rab tu sgrog/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i tshul ni shin tu rjod/ chos kyi dbyings thams
214b3(phal chen): cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ba ni shin tu ston/ snying po byang chub thams cad la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni rab tu brjod/ sangs rgyas kyi sgom
214b4(phal chen): dang / mi bsnyengs pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa ni shin tu rjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs shing mthong ba ni rab tu rjod/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam
214b5(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa ni shin tu ston/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rgyan ni rab tu ston/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam ni mngon par sgrub
214b6(phal chen): pa byed cing / sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'ang yongs su 'dzin du bcung ngo //
214b7(phal chen): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ sems
215a1(phal chen): can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ / byang chub don du khyod zhugs pa// gzi brjid chen sogs so legs// bsod nams snying po grags pa che// snang ba
215a2(phal chen): khyod kyis rab tu non/ / chos kyi dbyings ni khyab byas shing // bsod nams chen po sprin ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtshor 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// zhing
215a3(phal chen): gcig na yang spyod spyad cing / / nga yi ye shes ji lta bur// khyod kyis mthong ba de ltar 'gyur// tshul 'di kun nas shes par ni// brtson 'grus rlung ngus mi nus te// brtson 'grus stobs
215a4(phal chen): chen ldan pa'i rnams/ / rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dag par byed// thams cad rdul la 'jug tshul du// bskal pa rgya mtshor su spyod pa// rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rgyan gyi rnams// de la 'di 'drar
215a5(phal chen): rab tu 'gyur/ / sems can rnams ni re re'i phyir// bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad spyod cing // 'khor kyang skyo ba med pa'i rnams// de dag 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bskal pa phyi ma'i
215a6(phal chen): mthar thug pas/ / rgyal ba re rer mchod byed kyang // gang gi sems la skyo med pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po kun// khyod kyi smon
215a7(phal chen): lam dbang gis gsal/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams na// khyod kyi lus kyang rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam dag/ mtha' dang dbus med rgya mtsho la/
215b1(phal chen): blo chen gang rnams 'jug pa ni// de dag tshul 'dir gnas par 'gyur// ngal mchod pa byas pas kyang // gzi brjid chen po'i stobs chen gyis// sems can ri rab rdul mnyam pa/
215b2(phal chen): byang chub yongs su smin par byas// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag/ kun tu bzang po dpa' ba'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing // zhing gi rgya mtsho dag par byed/
215b3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la bskal pa rgyan chen po rig pa zhes bya ba de la/ bskal pa bar ma chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed cig byung ste/ de'i dus na mi rnams kyi tshe yang
215b4(phal chen): bskal pa bar ma gnyis thub par gyur te/ rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri rab dpal gyi sprin de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag lnga bcur gyur to// de
215b5(phal chen): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i
215b6(phal chen): me tog rgyas pa de nyid la byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos
215b7(phal chen): mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang sgo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu thob bo// ye shes rgya mtsho chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang chos kyi glong gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo//
216a1(phal chen): kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po yang rab tu thobaza// dmigs par sgo'i sprin thams cad kyis
216a2(phal chen): rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying po yang rab tu thob bo/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
216a3(phal chen): yon tan rgya mtsho dang byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod ces bya ba'i dga' ba chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ / chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po yang rab tu thob bo//
216a4(phal chen): rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa'i lus shes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rab tu thob bo// chags pa med pa'i dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rjes su
216a5(phal chen): song ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yang rab tu thob bo/ / rab tu khong du chud pas dri ma med pa'i glong la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa yang rab tu thob
216a6(phal chen): bo/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu thob bo// de dag la sogs pa chos kyi sgo stong phrag bcu
216a7(phal chen): kun nas non par gyur te/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
216b1(phal chen): bskal pa bye ba bsam gyi mi khyab tu// 'jig rten gtso yi dam pa shin tu dkon// sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems can thob rab thob// de dag sangs rgyas gnyis pa 'di yang mthong //
216b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas sku las 'od rnams rab bkye ba// kha dog mtha' yal rgya chen rnams par dag/ 'od zer sprin gyis 'jig rten kun tu khyab// kun tu rgyal ba'i yon tan grags par byed/
216b3(phal chen): 'od kyi reg pa rmad kyi dga' ba skye// 'gro ba de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi// phan tshun sri zhu byams pa'i sems gyur cing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag kun kyang mthong //
216b4(phal chen): sprul pa'i dra ba'i sprin rnams bsam mi khyab// rnam pa du ma'i 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun kyang gang byas shing // sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab
216b5(phal chen): tu ston/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi spu rtse re re nas// dbyangs sprin bkye bas nam mkha' kun bkang zhing // mun nag chen po kun nas snang bar byed// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
216b6(phal chen): kun kyang rnam par sel/ / sangs rgyas dbyangs ni phyogs rnams bcu po nas// sems can rnams kyi sngon dge rgya mtsho rnams// thams cad dbyangs kyis nan tu s
216b7(phal chen): angs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ltos/ / sangs rgyas 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba/ mtha' dang dbus med yang dag rab tu byung // de nas rgyal ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/
217a1(phal chen): sems can rgya mtsho mi zad rnams kyang 'dul// tshad med rnam par 'phrul pa dag la ltos// zhing rnams kun na rgyal ba mngon par bzhugs/
217a2(phal chen): de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med// sems can don du rnam par mngon sangs rgyas// dga' zhing mos par kun kyang 'dong bar gyis// dge ba'i yid dang
217a3(phal chen): sri zhu spro ba yis/ / bde gshegs de ni blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // de mthong sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed byas shing // bkra
217a4(phal chen): ba kun la byams pa'i sems 'gyur te/ / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun btab cing // chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bar bya// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
217a5(phal chen): kyis de'i sgra la thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu khyab par gyur te/ de thos pa'i sems can tshad med pa rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to// de yang
217a6(phal chen): pa dang ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin lngas nam mkha' thams
217a7(phal chen): cad du kun nas yog par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo // 'ongs pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyar bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs
217b1(phal chen): pas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i mdo/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor can yang dag par bstan to// des de thos nas tshus
217b2(phal chen): thams cad rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa 'byung bar rab tu skyes so/ / ye shes kyi rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba yang non par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i
217b3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyan ces bya ba la yang zhugs par gyur to/ / zhing thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa dang snang ba mtha' yas pa mthong bas
217b4(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang rab tu zhugs so/ / spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nams kyi sprin dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs par
217b5(phal chen): gyur to/ / rjes su rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chos rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba la yang rjes su rtogs par gyur to// 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen
217b6(phal chen): po'i shugs kyi rgyan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs so/ / rang byung du 'gyur ba shin tu mthong ba'i shugs kyi dbang bskur ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho la yang zhugs par gyur to//
217b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od rnam par snang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang shin tu snang bar gyur to// smon lam gyi stobs tshad med pa la mos pa rgya mtsho'i snying
218a1(phal chen): po'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang rnam par dag par gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang /
218a2(phal chen): po rgyan gyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ legs so yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho can// sangs rgyas byang chub smon lam yang
218a3(phal chen): dag gnas/ / sems can kun gyi mgon dang gnas gyur pa'i// rtul ba dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// ye shes rgya mtsho chen por mngon par byung / rlos kyi
218a4(phal chen): dbyings su thams cad rgyas byas te/ / sangs rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi zad pa'i// bsam gyis mi khyab tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan smin
218a5(phal chen): mthong ba'i/ / ye shes sa yang mi zad non par gyur// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho kun gyi tshul// grags pa chen po yongs su rgyas par byed// gzungs kyi tshul rna
218a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho mang po dang / / so so yang dag rig tshul mi zad dang // spyod pa smon lam khyod kyis mngon bsgrubs pas// gzhal med ye shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin
218a7(phal chen): gyi rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur/ / smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes te// rnam 'phrul 'di la'ang shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab// chos
218b1(phal chen): dbyings dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ / bsam pargya chen rnam par spang byas te// sangs rgyas sprin la rnam par lta bar gyis/ rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dri med rnam par sbyongs/
218b2(phal chen): nga yi byang chub spyod la 'jug par gyis// sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po yi// spyod pa ngas ni ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa// de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyis shes par gyis// zhing ma
218b3(phal chen): rer sangs rgyas mang pongs/ / rgya mtsho brgya mang shin tu mchod pa byas// sngon spyad de yi 'bras bu 'di yin te// 'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i rgyan la ltos// las kyi rgya mtsho mi zang
218b4(phal chen): rgya chen dang / / zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang // smon lam bsam yas go cha bgos pas na// 'di rnams 'di 'dra'i rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur// sangs rgyas
218b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho ma lus mchod byas shing / / zhing rnams rgya chen rgya mtsho sbyangs byas nas// bskal pa 'byam klas kun tu spyad byas shing // rgyal ba'i yon tan 'od chen mnga' bar 'gyur//
218b6(phal chen): / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po de yang
218b7(phal chen): dus byas par gyur te/ rgyal bu gnon nu gzi brjid chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal sring thob par gyur to// nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas
219a1(phal chen): pazhes bya bder yang / de bzhin gshegs pa pasong rnams rgyam rgya tu 'phags shing dris kyis mngon pa zhes byang gsu bzung bzur te/ mangs
219a2(phal chen): g shegs pa de mngon par 'chang rgyu ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nasa'akhor thams cad dang dpung gi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs dang rin po che bdun dang grong gi ming pa
219a3(phal chen): yul mir bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi nor pa gang na bcugs pa der dong nas des bcom ldan 'das de la rin po
219a4(phal chen): cho khang pa brtsegs pa spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya baphul lo/ / der de bzhin gshegs pa des kun tu lta 'i spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sa
219a5(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa'ang yang dag par bshad par byur ngo // de thos nas byang chub sem
219a6(phal chen): dpa' gzi brjid chen pos bsod nams chen po rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo/ / ting nge 'dzin de thob de thob pas kyang dus gsum gyis byang chub sems dpa' wa
219a7(phal chen): cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho mngon du gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pas/ 'khor gyi
219b1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa yon tan bsod nams kun gyi gzi brjid can/
219b2(phal chen): byang chub mchog tu smon lam yid ldan pa// 'gro ba kun la snying rje rgya mtsho yis// nga yi drung du khyod 'ongs legs so legs// snying rje'i snying po khyod ni sems can rnams//
219b3(phal chen): sdug bsngal gyur pa kun grol don zhugs pas// 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su 'gyur// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul yang de yin no// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu brtan pa'i
219b4(phal chen): rnams/ / skyo med yid kyis spyad pa spyod pa dag/ mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags med pa'i// ye shes 'di 'dra shin tu thob par 'gyur// de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang
219b5(phal chen): po yi/ / mthu chen smon lam spyod par zhugs pas na/ bsod nams 'od dang bsod nams dpal yin te/ bsod nams 'byung gnas bsod nams mchog kyang yin//
219b6(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab rgyal ba rgya mtsho dag/ mtha' dang dbus med mang po khyod kyis shes// mtha' dang dbus med de dag mthong gyur nas// de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho rtogs par
219b7(phal chen): 'gyur/ / khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kyi// rgyal ba'i sprin rnams kun kyang shin tu mthong // de dag spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang // sngan chad ji lta
220a1(phal chen): @spyad pa bzhin du mthong / / 'di tshul rgya mtsha 'di la su zhugs shing // ye shes sa la su dag gnas byur ba// de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes sla bcing
220a2(phal chen): thams cad gzigs par gdon mi za bar 'gyur/ / khyod ni ning kun rgya mtsho'i rdul srid kyi// bskal ba rgya mtsho'i spyod pa spyad byas nas// rgyal bkun gyi sngon spyad rgya mtsho rnams/
220a3(phal chen): bslabs nas rang byung nyid du 'gyur bar 'ong // zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i rnams// phyogs bcu dag tu ji ltar bathong bzhin// khyod kyi zhing yang rnam par dag 'gyur te/
220a4(phal chen): smon lam kun kyang shin tu sgrog par 'gyur// 'khor gyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang // khyod kyi smon lam thos gyur rab tu dga'// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i lam dag
220a5(phal chen): gis/ / byang chub mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// mtha' dang dbus med zhing rnams 'byam klas par// bskal pa rgya mtsho dag tu spyad pa spyod// kun tu bzang po
220a6(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad dang / / smon lam rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyis/ nags tshal chen po yal ba'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid du de bzhin
220a7(phal chen): gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grag pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ / rgyal po gzi brjid chen po de yang de nas shi 'phos nas rgya mtsho'i steng na lha'i grong khyer rin po che zhi ba'i
220b1(phal chen): gnas shes bya bar phyin te/ der bsod nams dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i lha'i rgyal po chen por gyur to// de nas de lha'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang bcas te/
220b2(phal chen): rin po che'i me tog sprin gyi char 'bebs shingabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grag pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gang na bzhugs pa der dong ngo // der bcom
220b3(phal chen): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grag pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gyis rdul yangs pa'i sgo kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra
220b4(phal chen): bsnyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan to/ / des de dag thos nas dga' ba'i snying po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad rgya
220b5(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings su yang zhugs par gyur to/ / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu
220b6(phal chen): pa'o/ / bam po bcu gsum pa// / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ni de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
220b7(phal chen): g ang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni kun
221a1(phal chen): tu bzang po tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni yongs su 'dzin pa gzhan 'phrul
221a2(phal chen): dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni lhan cig spyod pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa
221a3(phal chen): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni gnas kyi dam pa/ mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbying
221a4(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ gling ni byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ zong rdal ni mdzod mtha' yas pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa
221a5(phal chen): bza' shing gi ra ba ni mya ngan dang bral ba/ snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa ni kun nas smad du med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rang
221a6(phal chen): bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa na bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar
221a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la gnas par ming mthun pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dbyibs su
221b1(phal chen): 'dug pa sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa
221b2(phal chen): thams cad nyan thos kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
221b3(phal chen): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams cad kyang
221b4(phal chen): mi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
221b5(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi cho/
221b6(phal chen): kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phrag pa'i lhun dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
221b7(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa'o/ / snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
222a1(phal chen): par grol ba chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lto dang ldan pa'o/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam/
222a2(phal chen): par grol ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu'i bu ba dang ldan pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin phrab
222a3(phal chen): snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa'o/ / nyan thos kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi brla dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham
222a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o/ / sems can gyi khams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa
222a5(phal chen): ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
222a6(phal chen): snyed kyi spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/ / chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi dpral ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thug
222a7(phal chen): rang bzhin gyis bong gsal ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdzod spu dang ldan pa'o/ / byang chub kyi lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
222b1(phal chen): shin tu phra bsnyed kyi srin tshugs dang ldan pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phran
222b2(phal chen): snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa snyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyin
222b3(phal chen): ba dang ldan pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pashangs kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna dang
222b4(phal chen): ldan pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ljags kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa'o//
222b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sku'i khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
222b6(phal chen): thugs kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yid dang ldan pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni brgya mtsho rnam
222b7(phal chen): par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sgra dang ldan pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'dul ba dang / nyan thos dang /
223a1(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi ning rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po rgya
223a2(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdog dang ldan pa'o/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o//
223a3(phal chen): chos kyi ro rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi skom dang ldan pa'o// sems can yongs su smin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
223a4(phal chen): ba snyed zas dang ldan pa'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi
223a5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yog par khegs pa'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi sprin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon par
223a6(phal chen): 'bab pa'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dril bu'i dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bla re 'jig rten gyi
223a7(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par bkram pa'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shi
223b1(phal chen): tu phra ba sbed kyis kun tu khebs par bkang ba'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o//
223b2(phal chen): debazhin du gzugs dang / s+thA dang dri dang / rodang / reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan
223b3(phal chen): pa'o/ / mig sna tshogs kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang
223b4(phal chen): lus dang / yid kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho re re nas yid kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bar re re las kyang /
223b5(phal chen): me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang puN+Da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ me tog ut+pal de dag re
223b6(phal chen): de dang me tog puN+Da ri ka de dag re re la'ang me tog ut+pa la'i 'khor dang me tog pud+d+ha ri ka'i 'khor gyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang ldan pa ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang /
223b7(phal chen): me tog pud+d+ha ri ka'i bar de dag re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab rnam par phye ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ba dag ste/
224a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ro'i rkyen dang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pad+mo'i tshal dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi smyig ma'i chal mang po dag kyang mngon par
224a2(phal chen): 'thon pag stag / nI'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rlung ste/ chu 'thung ngam khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyi
224a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di'i gzugs su snang ba 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ byi'i 'am/ che ba 'am/ rlung
224a4(phal chen): ba 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am/ thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad khongs na snang bar so so'i mig gis mngon par mthong
224a5(phal chen): bas/ de'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos
224a6(phal chen): kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o/ / ci'i phyir mig gi chu na mtshol mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ba dang khrus byed pa de dag
224a7(phal chen): thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/ gzugs su snang ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar
224b1(phal chen): byung ba 'am/ nang ba'am/ phyi'i bam/ che ba 'am/ chung ba'am/ bzang ba'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am/ thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ gang ji snyed 'ong
224b2(phal chen): pade dag thams cad nang na snang bar rang rang gi mig dang gzhan gyi mig gis mngon par mthong bas/ de'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang /
224b3(phal chen): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
224b4(phal chen): lhun shin tu brgyan pa ste/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i dpe byad bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i lus can no// /
224b5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho zab mo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig
224b6(phal chen): rten gyi kham rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du/ rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar 'byung ba'o// ci'i phyir na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin
224b7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i phyag gyi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/
225a1(phal chen): @bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i phyag gi mthil na rdul shin tu phra ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yodad/ da
225a2(phal chen): nang na rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag gi steng na chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
225a3(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ / de dag gi steng na nam mkha'i dbyings rgya mtshos mtshams yongs su chad pa med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
225a4(phal chen): phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ / de dag gi steng na me'i khams rgya mtsho drag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na chu'i
225a5(phal chen): khams kyi rgya mtsho sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ / de dag gi steng na sa'i khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i snying po can zhes bya ba
225a6(phal chen): bajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ / de dag gi steng na me tog mtshan ma med pa las skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
225a7(phal chen): ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ me tog de dag kyang so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsam gyi thag gru dang ldan pa dag ste/
225b1(phal chen): de dgas pa na 'di rgyun gyi khams rnam tsho 'di gnas pas/ rab byar 'dag can rgya mtshung bzhin pa gags rab phyugags sa nga ba mas pa dal
225b2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya'o/ / de lta de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tshad med
225b3(phal chen): ba dang ldan pa ste/ / mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na// yon tan ji snyed yod pa'i
225b4(phal chen): yonA tanA de snyed ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rAb kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba tshangs
225b5(phal chen): ba'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/
225b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sgo mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med dang
225b7(phal chen): ba'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bang rim chen po'i khri 'phang du 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o// 'jig na
226a1(phal chen): @gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ngos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/ / ci'i phyir na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po
226a2(phal chen): lathun ta bzang po zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab tun tu bzang po ngan yongs su ma dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yang med de/ der sems can gang ji med skyes pa de dag sa
226a3(phal chen): cad chos gang dang gang la yongs su dmigs pa byed pa'i dmigs pa de dang des kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu
226a4(phal chen): bzang po de la kun bzang po zhes bya'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab de ni de ltar de dag la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pa dag dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam
226a5(phal chen): den yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni 'jig rten gyi kham pa'i rab kun tu bzang po de na yod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na stong gsum gyi stong
226a6(phal chen): c hen po 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhe bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig
226a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni lha'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten
226b1(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o/ / de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zad lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' jing
226b2(phal chen): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu
226b3(phal chen): gnas pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs
226b4(phal chen): rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin
226b5(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang / 'du shes tha dad pa ma gtogs par lam gyi rgyud la tha dad pa med do// skye gnas tha dad pa med do// theg pa tha dad pa
226b6(phal chen): med do/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la/ ci'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
226b7(phal chen): khams yongs su 'dzin pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad la ngan song gyi 'jig pa'ang med/ theg pa dman par ltung ba'i 'jig pa'ang med ser snar
227a1(phal chen): @ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ tshul khrims ngan par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ mi bzod par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ le lor ltung
227a2(phal chen): 'jig pa'ang med/ rnam par 'khrug par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ shes rab 'chal par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med pas/ de'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa'i stong gsum gyi song
227a3(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ / de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa mang po
227a4(phal chen): dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su
227a5(phal chen): 'dzin pa na yod do/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba 'phrul dag
227a6(phal chen): lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de sdong
227a7(phal chen): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rgya mtsho mang po dang mi 'bral lo/ / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer
227b1(phal chen): gyi dra ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rgya mtsho dang mi bzal lo//
227b2(phal chen): rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo//
227b3(phal chen): rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad phung dud du bya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo//
227b4(phal chen): rtag tu bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba der/ sems can gang ji snyed
227b5(phal chen): cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
227b6(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// stong
227b7(phal chen): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir na lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang lhan cig grogs
228a1(phal chen): shing / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag
228a2(phal chen): thams cad du rnam par spyod pas lhan cig spyod pa de la lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya'o/ / de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de ni yon tan
228a3(phal chen): dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ stong gnyis
228a4(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yod do/ / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de na/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu
228a5(phal chen): spyod pa zhes bya ba dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bsko/
228a6(phal chen): bayod de/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skye
228a7(phal chen): kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bod snang mtha' yas kyi chos kyi sku 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba/ chos kyi dbyings
228b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba der/ sems can gang ji snyed skyes
228b2(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag ste/ / de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /
228b3(phal chen): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa
228b4(phal chen): nas/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin phra ba snyed kyi bar la rab tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
228b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/
228b6(phal chen): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes
228b7(phal chen): bya ba de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/ chos kyi khams rgya mtsho
229a1(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi khams rgya mcho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khams rgya mcho / sems can gyi khams rgyu
229a2(phal chen): mtsho gang ji sred pa de dag thams cad kun nas rnam par spyod pas kun tu spyod pa de la kun du spyod pa zhes bya'o/ / de ltar de dag la sog pa stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de ni yon
229a3(phal chen): tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu
229a4(phal chen): spyod pa na yod do/ / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de na gling bzhi pa gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling
229a5(phal chen): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni/
229a6(phal chen): snying po byang chub rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan de dag re re la yang seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i rgyan
