229a7(phal chen): ' jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas pa seng ge'i khri'i rgyan de dag re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
229b1(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed mang po 'khod pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa der/ sems can gang ji snyed skyed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
229b2(phal chen): bzang po'i lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sgo mtha' yas pa nas mngon par sgrub pa'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
229b3(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag
229b4(phal chen): go/ / ci'i phyir na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su
229b5(phal chen): 'dzin pa na/ sems can rnams kyi 'byung gnas dang gnas su bya ba'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'di mchog tu bya bas na de'i phyir gling bzhi
229b6(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya'o/ / de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni
229b7(phal chen): yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi kha
230a1(phal chen): gnas kyi dam pa de yod do/ / rdzing nga'i pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya badren rdzing byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan ces byu
230a2(phal chen): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba de
230a3(phal chen): ni rin po che'i ri khang pa brtsegs pa ltar 'dug pa rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer
230a4(phal chen): gyi dra ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
230a5(phal chen): mngon par brlan pa ste/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba der/ sems can gang ji snyed skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho snying po byang chub
230a6(phal chen): kyi rgyan gyi dam par gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ theg pa tha dad pas 'byung ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
230a7(phal chen): bsnyed la mkhas pa/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rnam par spyod pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na gling byang chub kyi rgyal
230b1(phal chen): / mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya zhe na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na byang chub kyi shing nam mkha'i rten ces bya ba byang chub kyi shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu rnam
230b2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ der skad cig skad cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
230b3(phal chen): bas de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/ / de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang
230b4(phal chen): ldan pa / mdor na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham la gnas kyi dam pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan dag ni/ gling byang chub kyi rdul mtshan den mang/
230b5(phal chen): gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba khang partsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa grong rdal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu
230b6(phal chen): r dul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa grong rdal mdzad mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu
230b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu
231a1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'o bas rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig
231a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon ta/
231a3(phal chen): gyi me tog ut+pal dang / pad+mo dang / kun mu da dang / put+ta ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o//
231a4(phal chen): grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni byang chub kyi sems rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pha gu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las brtsigs pa/ sa
231a5(phal chen): bcu'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang gzhal med khang gi 'phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba ste/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa der
231a6(phal chen): sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku dang ngang tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ skad cig skad cig cing
231a7(phal chen): s ems can gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snying yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams
231b1(phal chen): r gya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rgya mtsho'i khur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed bkur ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa sha stag go
231b2(phal chen): ci'i phyir mgrong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya zhe na/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de'i sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am
231b3(phal chen): chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rdul shin
231b4(phal chen): tu phra ba yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ma bzhag pa de lta bu gang yang med pas/
231b5(phal chen): de'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/
231b6(phal chen): mdor na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan gyi yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na yod do// grong rdal
231b7(phal chen): m dzod mtha' yas pa de na bza' shing gyi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa bza' shing gi ra ba 'jig rten gyi khams
232a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na nags tshal rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
232a2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyud las grub pa'o//
232a3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi 'od rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
232a4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa'o/ / sems can gyi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyob pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lo
232a5(phal chen): ma dang ldan pa'o/ / sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi grib ma bsil ba dang ldan pa'o//
232a6(phal chen): sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
232a7(phal chen): pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yal ga dang ldan pa'o/ / rang bzhin yongs su dag
232b1(phal chen): pa'i dar gyi lnga ldi dang chun po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o/ / dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa'i gdugs dang rgyal
232b2(phal chen): mtshan dang / ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgreng pa'o// bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni rdzing rgya mtsho 'jig rten
232b3(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su brgyan pa ste/ rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas rgya mtsho'i chu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
232b4(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o/ / rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan gyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / puN+Da ri ka
232b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o/ / bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems can ji snyed cig 'dod pa de dag thams cad
232b6(phal chen): kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sku dang thugs dang 'phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
232b7(phal chen): ba snyed rab tu thob par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/ dus gsum thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
233a1(phal chen): phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag go/ / ci'i phyir na bza' shing gi rab mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya zhe na/ shar phyogs kyi dzi
233a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de dang mthun pa'i rgyus grub pas de'i phyir na bza' shing gi ra
233a3(phal chen): ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ / de dag la sogs pa bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni yon tan chad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na
233a4(phal chen): zong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de dag kyi yon tan ni/ / bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na yod do// bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan
233a5(phal chen): dang bral ba de'i nang na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ / khang pa brtsegs pa
233a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas slad du med pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
233a7(phal chen): cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las byung ba'o/ / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tsho
233b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dam pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
233b2(phal chen): phra ba snyed rjes su 'dong ba'o/ / khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de
233b3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa/ ye shes b+ha
233b4(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis pha rol tu phyin
233b5(phal chen): pa dam pa thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su bsgrubs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams
233b6(phal chen): cad kyis sems can de dag gi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas mngon par grub pa sha stag go/ / ci'i phyir na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas slang du med pa zhes bya
233b7(phal chen): zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas slad du med pa de la kun nas
234a1(phal chen): smad du med pa zhes bya'o/ / de ltar de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas slad du med pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa /
234a2(phal chen): mdor na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas slad du med pa de na yod do// de lta bu'i pho brang
234a3(phal chen): brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lhun dang ldan pa'i seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la/
234a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi rnam
234a5(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor
234a6(phal chen): gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos kyi 'khor gyi rnam pargya
234a7(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
234b1(phal chen): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa thad
234b2(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing bzhugs so/ / rnam par spyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya
234b3(phal chen): mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
234b4(phal chen): re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
234b5(phal chen): bsnyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
234b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa nyan thos 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i 'jig rten
234b7(phal chen): du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
235a1(phal chen): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya
235a2(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang / de ltar 'khor dang 'khor gyi 'khor gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
235a3(phal chen): phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las/
235a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang lus rnam pa tha dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/
235a5(phal chen): lus rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las lus re re la yang mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
235a6(phal chen): bsnyed yod do/ / mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las mgo re re la yang mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig
235a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po rnam pa
235b1(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho'i bar du yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mamo bcu'i rdal shin tu phra ba se
235b2(phal chen): nas/ yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las/ dbang po de re la yang mig/
235b3(phal chen): gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / ltu
235b4(phal chen): lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho'i bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa/
235b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la/ rnam par shes pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rnam
235b6(phal chen): par shes pa re re la yang ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ / ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
235b7(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la ye shes ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las ye shes re res kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po'i sangs rgyas tha dad pa rnga ma ro'i ye shes
236a1(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid rab tu sor ba byed do//
236a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du nyan thos dang / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
236a3(phal chen): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la yang shes par bya ste/ ye shes la ji lta ba de bzhin
236a4(phal chen): du chos thams cad la yang shes par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
236a5(phal chen): kun gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / rgyan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed/
236a6(phal chen): cig yod pa dang / gos kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi mig gi rdul shin tu tha
236a7(phal chen): b a re re nas lus kyi rdul shin tu za ba re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par dag ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
236b1(phal chen): tsa phra bamed kyis bsal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu tha bsnyed du bstan cing brjod kyang zang bar mi rung ngo / / bam po bcu
236b2(phal chen): pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la shes gang chen mtsha rnam par snang mdzad kyis su'i baspu'i thub re re nas 'od zer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
236b3(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkye'o/ / 'od zer rgya mtsho de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pad+mo rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
236b4(phal chen): za ba snyed mngon par byung ste/ sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
236b5(phal chen): sted mngon par 'thon to/ / de dag las yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho re re zhing shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul shin tu
236b6(phal chen): phra ba ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul shin tu phra ba re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho da
236b7(phal chen): nyan thos rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
237a1(phal chen): dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la yongs su skul bar byed do//
237a2(phal chen): shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du nga de bzhin te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mchod dag dang / maM dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan
237a3(phal chen): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mcho gan/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
237a4(phal chen): gang bzhugs pa de dag la zhus te gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag re re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i
237a5(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa gang na ba der
237a6(phal chen): 'dong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag la byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig yod pa dang / mi dang mi ma
237a7(phal chen): yin pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag re re zhing yang lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
237b1(phal chen): bsnyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sed yod pa/ lus re re la yang mgo rgya mtsho 'jig rjer rtsi
237b2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ mgo re re la yang kha'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ kha'i sgo re re la yang lce rgya ma
237b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa sha stag go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho
237b4(phal chen): n gadag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la lus re res kyang g.yas phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ba
237b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba byas te/ lag pa re re nas kyang me tog rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod nas/ de bzhin du mar
237b6(phal chen): me dang / spos dang / gdug spos dang / byug pa dang / kye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten
237b7(phal chen): g yi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med kyis mchod de lce re re zhing yang bstod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par bstod nas
238a1(phal chen): rang rang gi stobs rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul pa'i stan rgya mtsho ga la 'khod par gyur to/ / 'khod nas kyang lce re re zhing nub rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
238a2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su zhu ba byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad des zhus pa de dag re re la shin tu bstan pa n+ya
238a3(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bstan pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar
238a4(phal chen): rnam pa de ltar 'dus pa de dag thams cad la chos rgya mtsho mang po rnam grangs du mar rnam par bya'o/ / rnam par bkrol lo// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag pa
238a5(phal chen): bstan to/ / de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma
238a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod do/ / de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs
238a7(phal chen): shing mchogazhes te/ thog mar yang dge/ bar du yang dge/ tha mar yang dge ba'i chos don bzang po/ yi ge bzang po/ dag pa/ yongs su gsal ba/
238b1(phal chen): yongs su byang ba/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu ston pa mdzad de/ de bzhi/
238b2(phal chen): gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye
238b3(phal chen): brgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku tshe'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba
238b4(phal chen): dang / sku yongs su bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang // chos bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag ni// sangs
238b5(phal chen): r gyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gsungs te bstan kyang zad par mi
238b6(phal chen): rung ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba de na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang
238b7(phal chen): po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bdag po lha dang mi'i dbang po yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag re re
239a1(phal chen): zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag go/ 'khor los
239a2(phal chen): sbyar ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ 'di ltar sangs
239a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi rgyun rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang / shangs dang / ljags dang / sku dang / thugs rin
239a4(phal chen): po che rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad kyis blta na yid du
239a5(phal chen): 'od ba'i bud med rin po che rgya mtsho dang / don thams cad grub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu rnam par phye ba'i blon po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha'i mthas glo ba'i
239a6(phal chen): rin po che rgya mtsho dang / yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi dbyings rdo rje'i lte ba can gyi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu snang bar byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi
239a7(phal chen): nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha'i rgyan gyis 'gengs pa'i gdugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin gyis drim med pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / zla ba'i zer la praH
239b1(phal chen): rdul yab rin po che rgya mtsho dang / shes rab kyi lam gyi ral gri rin po che rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong ba'i spyi ga rdzug bsgribs pa med pa rin po che rgya mtsho
239b2(phal chen): dang thams cad du 'gro ba'i lha ma rin po che rgya mtsho dang / / ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par bzhag pa thams cad kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos
239b3(phal chen): gang chen mtsho thams cad kyi glong dang ldan pa'i gzungs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
239b4(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ rin po che rgya mtsho de dag la rin po che ji snyed yod pa de dag las rin po che re re zhing yang las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
239b5(phal chen): phra ba snyed byed pa sha stag go/ / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu rgya mtsho kun kyang mi chen po'i mtshan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
239b6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ 'od chen po'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed dang ldan pa lus dpe byad bzang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham
239b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu gsal bar brgyan pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i sde bajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'joms pa
240a1(phal chen): sa bcu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed la rab tu gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams
240a2(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob pa/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su gnod
240a3(phal chen): pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po de la bu mo rgya mtsho kun
240a4(phal chen): kyang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa'i bud med rin po che dang 'dra ba/ yid kyi lus 'jig
240a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya cho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
240a6(phal chen): ldan pa/ / byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'
240a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi dpral ba dang ldan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
240b1(phal chen): sprin tshugs can shes rab dang ye shes yangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams /
240b2(phal chen): las thos pa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sdom pa chen po yang dag par blang ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
240b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa/
240b4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pas 'dzum par dgod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po dang
240b5(phal chen): snying rje chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don yongs su bsgrubs pas mi ngoms pa rgya mtsho
240b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyis tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
240b7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi nu ma legs pa dang ldan pa/ / chos zab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa// dmigs pa
241a1(phal chen): thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i mthar thug pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting
241a2(phal chen): nge 'dzin yangs shing mi shigs la brtan pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las bdas pa thams cad
241a3(phal chen): rim gyis legs par 'brel pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rkang pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang
241a4(phal chen): 'phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mdzes par thogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang //
241a5(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin tu bzang bar gyon pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyun
241a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis legs par brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
241a7(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spos kyis lus shin tu byugs pa/ dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu
241b1(phal chen): phyin pa'i mchog thob pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag gi kha nas ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phrab
241b2(phal chen): seng 'byung ngo / / de dag gi lus kyi bsdu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi spos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'bru'i rdul shin tu phra ba
241b3(phal chen): snyed 'byung ngo / / spos rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shil tu phra ba snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par
241b4(phal chen): 'gengs te/ de dag gi dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba'i sems can rgya mcho gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i dri zhim po rgya mtsho de dag tshor bar gyur pa de
241b5(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /
241b6(phal chen): sems can gang dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba de dag gi gzugs kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho de dag mthong ba de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
241b7(phal chen): shes rab dang / ye shes kyi sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo//
242a1(phal chen): @gang gis dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa yongs su 'dzin
242a2(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ / gang gis lag nas bzung ba de dag thams cad kyang / byams pa chen po dang
242a3(phal chen): snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ / gang gis mthong la reg pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsod nam
242a4(phal chen): dang ye shes sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snye rab tu 'thob bo/ / gang dang stan gcig la lhan cig tu 'khod pa/
242a5(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub kyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi kha dang khar phrad par
242a6(phal chen): s a pa mthamasarnam par byur marnam kyi rtsamasa'adags pa pa
242a7(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ / gang dang chos kyi dbyings su rten par
242b1(phal chen): gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ sems can gyi khams rgya mcho ga ji snyed p
242b2(phal chen): ab de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo//
242b3(phal chen): yongs su dag pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar sa bon rgya mtsho rab tu bde bas so// de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des yang dag par bskul
242b4(phal chen): ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad du khyab pa'i rna ba rgya mtshos thos nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rgya mtsho chags pa med cing bsgrib/ pa med pas/
242b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis
242b6(phal chen): la mgo rgya mtshar rgyu thos bcad de phyag 'tshal nas chos kyi dbyings rab tu sgrogs pa'i lha'i dbang po rgya mchos nu pa yongs su nus pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar sa nga/ par bskul ba'i tshogs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba de su'i mthu las byung ba lags/
242b7(phal chen): de skad ces gsol
243a1(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad
243a2(phal chen): ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
243a3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs so//
243a4(phal chen): chos kyang ston to// yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcud pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba 'di yang de'i mthus byung ngo //
243a5(phal chen): de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
243a6(phal chen): ' das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa derade bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang
243a7(phal chen): mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa
243b1(phal chen): dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
243b2(phal chen): to/ / rgyal po chen po de'i dus la dbab par shes na 'gro la rag te/ rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas
243b3(phal chen): pa der ni 'gro bar dka' ste/ der 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan par ni
243b4(phal chen): d e bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
243b5(phal chen): la rab tu gnas pas kyang bde blag tu bya bar sla ba ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po de lta ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs shes bya ba zhig yod na
243b6(phal chen): de khyod kyis sngan chad mthong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyags ni gang na 'dug/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni nye 'am ring / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs
243b7(phal chen): pa ni gang zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho ga zhes pa dang chos ston pa mdzad pa shes sam rgyal po rin chen mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
244a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho de mthong ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni nye ba'am/ ring zhig na mchis pa dang /
244a2(phal chen): da ltar de na de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho gzhes shing chos ston pa ni spos su yang ma mchis te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sngan chad bdag gis ma thos so//
244a3(phal chen): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams
244a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ji srid pa dang / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing mchog zhes pa dang / chos ston pa legs
244a5(phal chen): par soms shig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten
244a6(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas nye 'am ring ba dang /
244a7(phal chen): de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho ga zhes pa dang / chos ston pa yang ma shes te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo //
244b1(phal chen): de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la 'di skad ces gsol
244b2(phal chen): to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas
244b3(phal chen): ring ba 'am nye ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang / chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
244b4(phal chen): mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo / / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la
244b5(phal chen): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de lta bas na rgyal po chen po rnam grangs des kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de na ni
244b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par/ ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la gnas
244b7(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos kyang 'gro bar bya ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba 'am/ de la phyag bya ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur ba 'am/ de las chos mnyan pa bde blag ma
245a1(phal chen): yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad
245a2(phal chen): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni phyogs gang na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni thag ji srid cig
245a3(phal chen): na mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang chos ston pa bstan du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad
245a4(phal chen): kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nub phyogs logs kyi sa mtshams kyi
245a5(phal chen): mtha' 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/
245a6(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs so// 'tsho'o// gzhes so//
245a7(phal chen): chos kyang ston to// de nas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang // rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ma shes ma mthong nas de 'di snyam du bsams so// jig
245b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche de de ltar nye na'ang bdag la mthu'i khyad par med na/ de bas ring ba lta la ci smos snyam nas/ de ltar rjes su bsams te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis
245b2(phal chen): brlabs legs par len pa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu bsgribs pa med pa la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag go/ / de ltar
245b3(phal chen): mnyam par bzhag pa'i mod la rgyal po rin chen mang po la de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
245b4(phal chen): gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byin du brlab pa mdzad do//
245b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de ltar rgyal po rin chen mang po la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs dang /
245b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi
245b7(phal chen): mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams
246a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi stobs dam pa
246a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu shes so/ / dus gsum kun tu lta ba rnam par rgyu ba rgya mtsho la sogs pa mig rgya mtsho 'jig
246a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu mthong ste/ 'di ltar dper na lag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu bzhag pa 'am/ me long shin tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la
246a4(phal chen): ngo snang ba bzhin no/ / de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam
246a5(phal chen): par snang mdzad la yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa
246a6(phal chen): ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o//
246a7(phal chen): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i dus
246b1(phal chen): dbab par shes na song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i skyes bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen
246b2(phal chen): mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la phul cig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang //
246b3(phal chen): bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang lhan cig ste/ bu re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
246b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho
246b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
246b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed dang lhan cig/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor
246b7(phal chen): los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ stong gi
247a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdus shin
247a2(phal chen): phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ gling gcig gi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
247a3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ gling gcig gi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ khams kyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/
247a4(phal chen): khams kyi rgyal po rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'dong bar chas pa dang // 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
247a5(phal chen): bo rin chen mang po de'i chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang / bu mo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras te/ lha'i zhal snga nas gsan/
247a6(phal chen): du gsol/ bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par
247a7(phal chen): snang mdzad de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyed bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi ba gsol lo// de skad ces smras pa dang /
247b1(phal chen): rgyal po rin chen mang pos/ chung ma'i 'khor de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// ji ste khyed sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i zhal blta ba ni don du mi gnyer
247b2(phal chen): chos rgya mtsho mnyan pa ni tshol bar mi byed/ / dge 'dun rgya mtsho bsnyen bkur ba ni don du mi gnyer/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni tshol bar mi byed/
247b3(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don du mi gnyer/ nyan thos kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don du mi gnyer/ yul rgya mtsho
247b4(phal chen): 'di nas ni 'gro bar 'dod pa med/ yul rgya mtsho gzhan du ni 'gro bar 'dod pa med la/ gal te khyed sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang
247b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'am/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la yang mi gnas// sems can
247b6(phal chen): thams cad gsod phod kyang zhe sdang ngam byams pa la mi gnas/ mu stegs can thams cad kyi lta ba rgya mtsho la 'jug cing spyod kyang log pa'i ye shes sam yang dag pa'i ye shes la mi gnas/
247b7(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yang ston la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo zhe na/ deng la rag go// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po
248a1(phal chen): des bstan pa 'di shin tu bstan pa'i tshe/ chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag las chung ma re re dang / bu mo re res kyang mig gi khams re
248a2(phal chen): res chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par
248a3(phal chen): gyur to/ / rna ba'i khams re res kyang nam mkha' khong du chud pa'i rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob
248a4(phal chen): par gyur to/ / sna'i khams re res kyang gcig la rten pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par
248a5(phal chen): gyur to/ / lce'i khams re res kyang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ nyan thos kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// lus kyi
248a6(phal chen): khams re res kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// yid kyi khams ra
248a7(phal chen): res kyang sa'i dbang po'i stobs rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ stobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// de nas rgyal po rin chen
248b1(phal chen): mang po'i chung ma rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag gis theg pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi gting rnyed nas/ spyod pa rgya mtsho
248b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la gzhag gyi dring mi 'jog par byas te/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag cag kun gyis sangs
248b3(phal chen): rgyas rgya mtsho mthong / / yongs su mchod de bsnyen bkur zhu ba bgyis// 'on kyang 'di 'dra rgya mtsho'i chos ma thos// sa mang rgya mtsho 'di dag thob ma gyur// da ni sangs rgyas
248b4(phal chen): 'phrin las sgrub pa yi/ / sa mang rgya mtsho'i mig kyang thob par gyur// byang chub don du phyogs rnams kun dbyings su// rna bas spyod pa dam pa spyad par bgyi// sna yi khams
248b5(phal chen): kyis rang rgyal sa thob ste/ / rten 'brel 'byung ba'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur// lces kyang nyan thos sa mang rgya mtsho thob// des ni zhi ba'i bde ba tshor bar gyur// lus kyis
248b6(phal chen): sa mang rgya mtsho thob pas na/ / sgrub pa sna tshogs rab tu bsgrub par bgyi// yid kyis dus gsum chos mang rgya mtsho'i rnams// 'tshal bar gyur pas gzhan la bstan par bgyi//
248b7(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa phal po che'i le'u ste bcu gcig go// / bam po bcu
249a1(phal chen): lnga pa/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma ga d+ha'i chos kyi dkon pa'i snying po byang chub na bzhugs te/ blo shin tu rnam par
249a2(phal chen): dag pa mi gnyis pas yang dag par spyod pa/ chos mtshan nyid med pa la shin tu gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid bsnyes
249a3(phal chen): pa/ bsgribs pa med pas rtogs par thugs su chud pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can spyod yul 'phrogs pa med pa/ rnam par dgod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dus
249a4(phal chen): gsum mnyam pa nyid la shin tu byung ba/ pho brang kun tu 'od na seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
249a5(phal chen): snyed kun kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa/ sems can gyi khams la dpyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings la dpyod pa/
249a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams la dpyod pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la dpyod pa/ las kyi rnam pas smin pa la dpyod pa/ bsam pa'i rgyud la dpyod pa don dang yi ge la
249a7(phal chen): dpyod pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la dpyod pa/ 'du byas dang 'dus ma byas pa la dpyod pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
249b1(phal chen): pa la dpyod pa sha stag dang thabs cig go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar
249b2(phal chen): dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan kyang rung // sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bstan kyang rung //
249b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid yongs su bstan kyang rung // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bstan kyang rung / sangs
249b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos bshad pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rang bzhin yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas
249b5(phal chen): kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su bstan kyang rung / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/
249b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu'i ji ltar rnam par dgod pa de dag yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub
249b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i tshad med pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i gter rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung /
250a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub
250a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'byung
250a3(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung mi gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nye bar nyon mongs pa med par
250a4(phal chen): bya ba dang / 'du byed thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos thams cad yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya/
250a5(phal chen): pa dang / the tsom thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / nem nur thams cad shin tu bsal ba dang / gnas thams cad rab tu gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/ gong du de bzhin
250a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs bstan kyang rung / gong du de
250a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa bstan kyang rung // gong du
250b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' chen po bstan kyang rung /
250b2(phal chen): gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'phrogs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan bstan kyang rung /
250b3(phal chen): gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs bstan kyang rung // gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan kyang rung / gong du
250b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa bstan kyang rung // gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan kyang rung // gong du
250b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu bstan kyang rung snyam pa dang / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis
250b6(phal chen): yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa de dag mngon par 'du
250b7(phal chen): mdzad pas/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba
251a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi g.yo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
251a2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar phyogs su brten nas seng
251a3(phal chen): ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu
251a4(phal chen): phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems
251a5(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
251a6(phal chen): la phyag 'tshal te/ lho phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
251a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten khams pad+mo'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed bcings med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
251b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
251b2(phal chen): 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi
251b3(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed kun spyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/
251b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom
251b5(phal chen): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ byang phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten
251b6(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed nyi ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/
251b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
252a1(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te/ byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'bod do// shar lho'i
252a2(phal chen): phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed
252a3(phal chen): mtha' rgal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das
252a4(phal chen): gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas
252a5(phal chen): nas 'khod do/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mdog ces bya ba
252a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu
252a7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/
252b1(phal chen): skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i mdog
252b2(phal chen): ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dbang phyug gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin
252b3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying
252b4(phal chen): po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi
252b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams shel gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed tshangs pa'i dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal byang chub sems dpa'
252b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'og gi phyogs su brten
252b7(phal chen): nas seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// steng gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu
253a1(phal chen): phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed sna tshogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems
253a2(phal chen): dpa' bzang po'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
253a3(phal chen): la phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems
253a4(phal chen): dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun thams cad la bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa'
253a5(phal chen): 'dus pa 'di dag ni ngo mtshar thob pa dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
253a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
253a7(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
253b1(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'byung ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom
253b2(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bsam gyis mi khyab
253b3(phal chen): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu/ sems can 'dul ba rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud cing
253b4(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dag tu chos ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid dang
253b5(phal chen): de ma yin pa'i gling bzhi pa gzhan dag na'ang / sku gzhan dang gzhan/ mtshan gzhan dang gzhan/ kha dog dang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan/ chu zheng gzhan dang gzhan/ sku tshe
253b6(phal chen): tshad gzhan dang gzhan/ skye mched brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan dbang po brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/ 'byung ba'i skye mched gzhan dang gzhan sku gzugs gzhan dang gzhan du de
253b7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid na rang
254a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// seng ge'i nga ro can zhes bya
254a2(phal chen): bar rab tu shes so/ / shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// drang srong dam pa'i mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bar rab tu shes so//
254a3(phal chen): go'u ta ma'i rigs shes bya bar rab tu shes so// dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mu stegs byed ces bya bar
254a4(phal chen): rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems
254a5(phal chen): can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa shin tu bsrungs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
254a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la rdo rje zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ / dbang phyug ces bya bar rab tu shes so// blo gros mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thub par dka' ba zhes bya
254a7(phal chen): bar rab tu shes so/ / sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// skyabs mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thugs
254b1(phal chen): dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ / tshungs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// tshig gcod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs
254b2(phal chen): pa gling bzhi pa shin tu bsrungs pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan stong phrag bcur sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa
254b3(phal chen): 'di dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa bzod par dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la dbang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nor grags zhes

254b6(phal chen): so/ / dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa bzod par dka' ba na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin

261a5(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// gzhung de ltar lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang /
261a6(phal chen): de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
261a7(phal chen): de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa
261b1(phal chen): dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis
261b2(phal chen): klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes te/ sngon bcom ldan 'das
261b3(phal chen): kyis byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ yongs su smin par mdzad pa de dag gis ni spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gsung gi rnam pa tha dad pa dang / nga ro rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
261b4(phal chen): 'phrin las rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rnam par smin pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa dang // mos
261b5(phal chen): pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skye mched rab tu thob pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sems can rnams la chos yongs su bstan pa'ang rab tu shes so// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal
261b6(phal chen): po che zhes bya ba las/ / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // bam po bcu drug pa// / de nas
261b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i
262a1(phal chen): bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang byung ba zhes bya'o/ / gnod pa zhes bya'o// skal ba mi nyam pa zhes bya'o// dmigs pa
262a2(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// gsal shing gi rang bzhin zhes bya'o// gnas kyi rtsa ba zhes bya'o// gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o// shu ba'i gzebs shes bya'o//
262a3(phal chen): byis pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'di na kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang yongs su 'brel
262a4(phal chen): ba zhes bya'o/ / chud za ba zhes bya'o// tshor bar gcen pa zhes bya'o// myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o// sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya'o// nges pa zhes bya'o// dran pa can
262a5(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / brjod pa zhes bya'o// sems can gyi phyi bzhin bsnyegs pa zhes bya'o// phyin cig log gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog/
262a6(phal chen): pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang 'dzud pa zhes bya'o// rdul dang bral ba zhes bya'o// zhi ba zhes bya'o// mtshan nyid med pa
262a7(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / ma nyams pa zhes bya'o// rang bzhin med pa zhes bya'o// so sor ldan pa zhes bya'o// nub par 'gro ba zhes bya'o// rang bzhin du gyur pa zhes bya'o// rang
262b1(phal chen): bzhin la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang yang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di
262b2(phal chen): nyid na theg pa gcig ces bya'o/ / zhi bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o// dgra dang bral ba zhes bya'o// yongs su rtog pa zad pa zhes bya'o// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya'o//
262b3(phal chen): khur 'dor ba zhes bya'o// 'gro ba med par 'gro ba zhes bya'o// 'phags pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o// drang srong gi spyod pa zhes bya'o// gter bcu zhes bya ste/ kye
262b4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na'ang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag
262b5(phal chen): gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i
262b6(phal chen): bden pa zhes bya ba la/ de 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na tshol ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o// mi 'byung ba zhes bya'o// rtsa ba rtan pa zhes bya'o// bya ba ma byas pa zhes
262b7(phal chen): bya'o/ / rtsod pa thams cad ces bya'o// rnam par phye ba nyam chung ba zhes bya'o// kun gzhi dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// gsod pa'i mchog ces bya'o// 'gul zhing g.yo ba
263a1(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / dngos po'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang
263a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na las su rung ba zhes bya'o/ / ldan pa zhes bya'o// sreg pa zhes bya'o// 'jig pa zhes bya'o// 'jig pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o//
263a3(phal chen): mtshams dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// sdig pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o// 'dod pa zhes bya'o// klad pa na ba zhes bya'o// skal ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang
263a4(phal chen): sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na don ces bya'o/ / 'jigs pa sel ba zhes bya'o// yon tan thob par byed pa zhes
263a5(phal chen): bya'o/ / dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya'o// tshul bzang po zhes bya'o// 'dul ba zhes bya'o// yan lag gcig pu zhes bya'o// sdig pa med pa zhes bya'o// 'dod chags
263a6(phal chen): dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ / rtogs pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi
263a7(phal chen): khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na sde'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ / gyen du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// 'byung ba zhes bya'o// sbyor ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// lta ba mnyam pa zhes bya'o//
263b1(phal chen): mtha' las grol ba zhes bya'o// rtog par byed pa zhes bya'o// rjes su btul ba zhes bya'o// mig dam pa zhes bya'o// phyogs su snang ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal
263b2(phal chen): bapa'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag
263b3(phal chen): gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i
263b4(phal chen): bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na 'jig pa zhes bya'o/ / skal ba gcod pa zhes bya'o// smad pa'i gnas shes bya'o// nye bar bsrel ba zhes bya'o//
263b5(phal chen): rnam par sreg pa zhes bya'o// khon du 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// nad dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o// rgyud 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o// dka' bar bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o//
263b6(phal chen): rab tu brtags pa zhes bya'o// mos pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig
263b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams lhag pa na rab tu 'jig pa zhes bya'o/ / gti mug gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o// dgra dam pa zhes bya'o// bkres pa'i yan lag ces bya'o// re med pa zhes bya'o//
264a1(phal chen): kun skyed pa zhes bya'o// rang bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya'o// bkur bar bya ba zhes bya'o// mun pa khyer ba zhes bya'o// blo gros bcom pa zhes bya'o//
264a2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na don chen po zhes bya'o// phan pa'i yan lag ces

264a6(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o/ / tshul zab mo zhes bya'o// 'byung ba zhes bya'o// mi dma' ba zhes bya'o// rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya'o// grol ba'i rang bzhin zhes

264b1(phal chen): ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig
264b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bsal ba na 'gyod pa zhes bya'o/ / kun spyod pa zhes bya'o// gcig la
264b3(phal chen): gcig ces bya'o/ / kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o// ro gcig pa zhes bya'o// chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o// kun gzhi dang mngon sum zhes bya'o// log pa la gzhol ba zhes

264b6(phal chen): sdig gi kha ba zhes bya'o// lhag pa zhes bya'o// khur zhes bya'o// skyed pa zhes bya'o// sra ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa
264b7(phal chen): 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa na mi mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ / bral ba zhes bya'o// dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// rtsa ba dang bral ba zhes bya'o//
265a1(phal chen): ldan pa zhes bya'o// bsgrim pa med pa zhes bya'o// bag la nyal ba med pa zhes bya'o// 'phags pa zhes bya'o// phyi ma zhes bya'o// dgra bcom pa

265a4(phal chen): srid pa'i mtha' ma zhes bya'o// sba ba'i snying po zhes bya'o// mthar thug sar byed pa zhes bya'o// yongs su rtog pa dag pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag
