265a7(phal chen): chags kyis rgyas pa zhes bya'o/ / gtum pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o// rgya mtsho'i yan lag ces bya'o// yang dag pa las 'das pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// skal ba med pa'i rtsa ba zhes
265b1(phal chen): bya'o/ / 'phro ba zhes bya'o// skye zhing 'jig pa zhes bya'o// sgrib pa zhes bya'o// ral kr-i'i dngo zhes bya'o// tshul stug po zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang

265b7(phal chen): par byung ba na zhi bar byed pa brjod pa zhes bya'o/ / khyab par 'gro ba zhes bya'o// mngon du bya ba la sbyor ba zhes bya'o// bde bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o// tshe tshad med pa zhes bya'o//
266a1(phal chen): shin tu bsgoms pas mthar phyin pa zhes bya'o// lam gyi dam pa zhes bya'o// thob par dka' ba'i yan lag ces bya'o// pha rol gyi mtshams shes bya'o//
266a2(phal chen): brgal dka' ba zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag

266b1(phal chen): / can zhes bya'o// 'bras bu la gnas pa zhes bya'o// brjod du mi rung ba zhes bya'o// tha dad pa med pa zhes bya'o// rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/

266b5(phal chen): tshul nyams pa med pa zhes bya'o// rnam par rig pa'i lam zhes bya'o// bsngo ba dge ba zhes bya'o// rgya chen po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rnam par phye ba'i tshul zhes bya'o//
266b6(phal chen): nam mkha'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o// zil bar 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// ye shes kyi bdag po zhes bya'o// don yongs su shes pa zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de
266b7(phal chen): ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'phro bar byed pa na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams
267a1(phal chen): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dus so/ / me rgyal pa'i sras dag// gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bde
267a2(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na khur tsa ba'i khur zhes bya'o/ / snying po med pa zhes bya'o// rkun po lta bu zhes bya'o// rga shi zhes bya'o// chags pa'i rang
267a3(phal chen): bzhin zhes bya'o/ / shin tu mched pa zhes bya'o// ngal bar byed pa zhes bya'o// ngom zum gnag pa zhes bya'o// kun tu 'phel ba zhes bya'o// ral gri dang 'dra ba zhes
267a4(phal chen): bya'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na 'jig pa zhes bya'o// 'khrugs pa zhes
267a5(phal chen): bya'o/ / bskyod pa zhes bya'o// nyam chung ba zhes bya'o// 'phrog pa zhes bya'o// bral ba zhes bya'o// mi ldan pa zhes bya'o// 'thab mor 'gyur ba zhes bya'o//

267a7(phal chen): phan pa na kun spyod pa zhes bya'o/ / yang dag pa zhes bya'o// zhum pa med pa zhes bya'o// yan lag g.yogs pa zhes bya'o// smad pa spangs pa zhes bya'o// rjes su
267b1(phal chen): mthun pa zhes bya'o/ / gzhir 'gro ba zhes bya'o// yan lag spangs pa zhes bya'o// tha dad pa med pa zhes bya'o// glags med pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
267b2(phal chen): gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na snang ba brjod pa zhes bya'o/ / thams cad kyi rgya zhes bya'o//
267b3(phal chen): bsam gtan gyi gter zhes bya'o// snang ba yod pa zhes bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can zhes bya'o// dngos po zad pa zhes bya'o// lam yangs pa zhes bya'o//
267b4(phal chen): dul ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o// dge ba yod pa zhes bya'o// rtsa ba rgyu ba med pa zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
267b5(phal chen): phan pa na/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo//
267b6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sra sa dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na bsam pa thibs po zhes
267b7(phal chen): bya'o/ / gnas sna tshogs kun tu bkram pa zhes bya'o// skye gnas su skyed pa zhes bya'o// rim par 'dug pa zhes bya'o// ngo tsha ba med pa zhes bya'o// shes par
268a1(phal chen): bya ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ / gang+gA'i ro zhes bya'o// rtsig pa zhes bya'o// rtag tu 'jig pa zhes bya'o// mgal me'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o// rtsa ba'i
268a2(phal chen): sgo zhes bya'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na shin tu g.yo ba zhes bya'o//
268a3(phal chen): rig pa med pa zhes bya'o// blo gros dang ring ba zhes bya'o// 'phongs par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// 'jig pa zhes bya'o// kun tu 'dren pa zhes bya'o// nye bar bsgrub pa
268a4(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / rten du gyur pa zhes bya'o// dngos po'i bdag po zhes bya'o// mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags
268a5(phal chen): pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na ngoms pa zhes bya'o/ / bdud rtsi zhes bya'o// rgyu ba med pa zhes bya'o// rang gi med pa zhes bya'o//
268a6(phal chen): rtog pa byang ba zhes bya'o// yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya'o// rgyu ba dang bral ba zhes bya'o// mched pa med pa zhes bya'o// lam med pa zhes bya'o// mi gnyis pa
268a7(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na snang bar byed
268b1(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o/ / bstan pa rgya mtsho zhes bya'o// don dam par gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o// chos dang phrad pa zhes bya'o// 'khor ba med pa zhes bya'o// 'brel ba med pa
268b2(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / lam rgya chen po zhes bya'o// yang dag par phyin par 'gro ba zhes bya'o// sbyor ba dag pa zhes bya'o// mthong ba'i bdag po zhes bya ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
268b3(phal chen): de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de// de dag gis sems can rnams bsam
268b4(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams
268b5(phal chen): yongs su dga' ba na skye bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rnam par bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// chags shing zhen pa zhes bya'o// khur khyer ba zhes bya'o// mi sdug pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// nang
268b6(phal chen): thibs po zhes bya'o/ / sdig pa byed pa zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin ces bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden
268b7(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na gzhir gyur pa zhes bya'o/ / sbyor ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// tshod las 'das pa zhes bya'o// chos 'phel ba zhes bya'o//
269a1(phal chen): rtog pa med pa zhes bya'o// sdud pa med pa zhes bya'o// sdud par byed pa zhes bya'o// yang du red pa zhes bya'o// chos kyi gzhi zhes bya'o// lta ba chung ba
269a2(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / mthong ba chung ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na
269a3(phal chen): gnas zhig pa zhes bya'o/ / rmongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// yang dag pa zhes bya'o// des shin tu rtog pa zhes bya'o// dge bar byed pa zhes bya'o// skyon med pa zhes bya'o// 'khor
269a4(phal chen): ba med pa zhes bya'o/ / mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o// bdag nyid rtogs pa zhes bya'o// ma skyes pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
269a5(phal chen): 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba nas mtshams nye bar gyur pa zhes bya'o/ / sel ba dang 'grogs pa zhes bya'o// skal ba mi mnyam pa'i
269a6(phal chen): don can zhes bya'o/ / rang bzhin yangs pa zhes bya'o// yongs su rtogs pa zad pa zhes bya'o// byin gyis brlabs kyi lam zhes bya'o// tshogs kyi tshul zhes bya'o// dran pa dang
269a7(phal chen): bral ba zhes bya'o/ / rtag pa'i lam zhes bya'o// grol ba sgrub pa zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na/
269b1(phal chen): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
269b2(phal chen): gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na 'tshogs pa zhes bya'o/ / rdza ma lta bu zhes bya'o// nad dang mnyam
269b3(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o/ / lus la yod pa zhes bya'o// rab tu 'phel ba zhes bya'o// sogs pa'i sgo zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal gyi skyon can zhes bya'o// brtag par bya ba zhes bya'o// rang la
269b4(phal chen): gzhog pa med pa zhes bya'o/ / 'gro zhing 'ong ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba
269b5(phal chen): na 'tshe ba zhes bya'o/ / mdud par 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// rab tu sbyar ba zhes bya'o// tshor ba'i yan lag ces bya'o// a na sems pa zhes bya'o// rab rab byed pa zhes bya'o//
269b6(phal chen): bdud par byed pa zhes bya'o// rnam par bral ba zhes bya'o// shin tu gdung ba zhes bya'o// kyi hud na'o zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags
269b7(phal chen): pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na sogs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ / g.yo ba med pa zhes bya'o// skyon med pa zhes bya'o// ma nyams pa zhes bya'o//
270a1(phal chen): 'grogs pa med pa zhes bya'o// tshad med pa zhes bya'o// yangs pa zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi yan lag ces bya'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o//
270a2(phal chen): ma chags pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na bstan pa'i spyod yul
270a3(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o// bden pa la thug pa zhes bya'o// don rab tu chud pa zhes bya'o// rang bzhin la gtugs pa zhes bya'o// lta ba yong
270a4(phal chen): su dag pa zhes bya'o/ / dran pas sgrub pa zhes bya'o// grol bas sdud pa zhes bya'o// skyob pa'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o// 'khrug pa med par 'gro ba zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
270a5(phal chen): de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ming bye ba brgya phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
270a6(phal chen): du 'dul lo/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na
270a7(phal chen): bsam pa nub pa zhes bya'o/ / shin tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o// yan lag gnas pa zhes bya'o// g.yo sgyu che ba zhes bya'o// 'brel ba zhes bya'o// 'dod pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// myang du mi
270b1(phal chen): rung ba zhes bya'o/ / skye gnas ma rungs pa zhes bya'o// nye bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o// dngo skam zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'bags pa'i
270b2(phal chen): bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na gdul ba'i gzhi zhes bya'o/ / sems kyi tshul zhes bya'o// bcings pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// rjes su dran pa
270b3(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / nges par rtogs pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rnal 'byor dang mi mthun pa zhes bya'o// brtag par bya ba zhes bya'o// sgo zhes bya'o// rtogs par bya ba zhes bya'o// bsgrib
270b4(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na gnas med pa zhes bya'o// sbyin
270b5(phal chen): sreg gi dam pa zhes bya'o/ / phyir log pa zhes bya'o// mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o// kun tu song ba zhes bya'o// chen po zhes bya'o// du ba med pa zhes bya'o// mi zad pa zhes
270b6(phal chen): bya'o/ / yangs pa zhes bya'o// shin tu mchod pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig
270b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na mthong bas mthong ba zhes bya'o/ / spangs pa'i don ces bya'o// rnam par sgom pa'i rgya zhes bya'o// mtshan nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// rnyed par
271a1(phal chen): dka' ba zhes bya'o/ / de ma thag pa'i don ces bya'o// mkhas pas brtag pa zhes bya'o// 'grogs pa'i don ces bya'o// mi g.yol ba la mngon du 'gyur ba
271a2(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ / khyad par gyi don ces bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba
271a3(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/
271a4(phal chen): ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/
271a5(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
271a6(phal chen): dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na yang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba
271a7(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang /
271b1(phal chen): de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs
271b2(phal chen): mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad
271b3(phal chen): med pa/ / grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mtshungs pa med pa// kun tu mtha' yas pa// mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med dang / brjod du med pa/
271b4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su bstan pa yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags
271b5(phal chen): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba
271b6(phal chen): de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shar phyogs nas steng gi phyogs shes bya ba nas/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams par dag na yang / 'phags pa'i bden
271b7(phal chen): pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang sdug bsngal gyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa
272a1(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ / kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i ming dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa'i ming dang / lam gyi bden pa'i ming dag kyang de bzhin no//
272a2(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum mo// // de nas bcom ldan
272a3(phal chen): 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya bkye ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag
272a4(phal chen): brgya bstan to/ / shar gyi lus 'phags gling bye ba phrag brgya dang / nub kyi ba glang spyod bye ba phrag brgya dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya
272a5(phal chen): bstan to/ / khor yug rdo rje'i ri bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// mngon par 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// de bzhin gshegs
272a6(phal chen): pa rnam par 'tshang rgya ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to//
272a7(phal chen): ri rab ri'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i khams kyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to//
272b1(phal chen): mtshe ma'i lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// 'phrul dga'i lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
272b2(phal chen): kyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// gya nom snang ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// 'bras bu
272b3(phal chen): chen po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ / 'og min bye ba phrag brgya bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis
272b4(phal chen): bstan to/ / ji ltar 'di na bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/
272b5(phal chen): bskor cing mdun du byas par snang ba byas pa de bzhin du/ 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ngo // de dag thams cad du'ang
272b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba
272b7(phal chen): dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang /
273a1(phal chen): chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams
273a2(phal chen): ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad+mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ut+pa la'i mdog dang /
273a3(phal chen): sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang / shel gyi mdog dang / 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag
273a4(phal chen): thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi bskyod pa dang / rig byed
273a5(phal chen): bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed sgrib pa med pa dang // rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed
273a6(phal chen): tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
273a7(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin te/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid rjod de/
273b1(phal chen): gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// 'jig rten kun dang mi ldan zhing / bral bar gyur te dngos med pa'i/
273b2(phal chen): yang dag sangs rgyas sus shes pa// de dag mig gi lam mi gnas// shes rab chen po sus mthong zhing // dngos po'i 'du shes mi 'jug la// rnam par bsgoms shing shes gyur pa//
273b3(phal chen): de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// 'jig rten khams 'di mthong gyur te// sangs rgyas che ba nyid dag la// gang gi sems ni mi g.yo ba// de dag mi yi mchog tu 'gyur//
273b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos la gang gi rnams// nyams pa'i sems su rab 'jug cing // mi gnyis mngon 'gyur brtan pa'i rnams// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// gang rnams bdag
273b5(phal chen): dang sangs rgyas dag/ rang bzhin mnyam par rab gnas shing // mi gnas len pa med pa'i rnams// de dag bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / rnam
273b6(phal chen): par shes dang sems dpa' dag/ grangs med de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams// de dag thub pa chen por 'gyur// blta bar bya las 'das pa dang // rnam par blta las de bzhin te//
273b7(phal chen): chos la gang dag rmongs med pa// de dag rab tu 'od byed 'gyur// gang gis shes rab chen po'i rnams// sems bskyed kun la rab gnas shing // thams cad mthong yang skye med pa//
274a1(phal chen): / de dag grags pa chen por 'gyur// sems can rnams la skye ba med// 'jig pa'ang yod pa ma yin te// de ltar gang gis shes pa ni// de dag blan med par 'gyur/
274a2(phal chen): gang gis gcig la mang shes shing // mang po'ang gcig tu rab rtogs te// gnas kyi rnams su'ang byung gyur pa// de dag 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// de nas 'od zer de dag
274a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas 'das te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams
274a4(phal chen): bcu bcu snang bar byas so/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs
274a5(phal chen): dang / steng gi phyogs dag tu yang 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag
274a6(phal chen): brgya bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad de dag ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
274a7(phal chen): kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba
274b1(phal chen): phrag brgya kun na'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa'/
274b2(phal chen): bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang // nor dpal dang /
274b3(phal chen): rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go/
274b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang /
274b5(phal chen): pad+mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ut+pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang / shel gyi mdog dang /
274b6(phal chen): 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring nas tshangs pa'i spyad pa
274b7(phal chen): spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi bskyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed bsgribs pa med
275a1(phal chen): pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba dag go/
275a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/
275a3(phal chen): gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid rjed de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod do//
275a4(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// gang gis 'gro ba shin tu gtses gyur cing // srid pa'i gsal shing ldan par kun shes nas// rang byung kun mkhyen yon
275a5(phal chen): tan tshol ba'i rnams/ / de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di bzhin no// chos kyi rang bzhin gnas pa mthong gyur nas// mtha' gnyis gang gis rab tu spang gyur cing // ldog pa med cing
275a6(phal chen): dgos pa kun shes pa/ / de dag nga yi 'khor lo mtshungs med bskor// gang rnams chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yis// 'khor bar skye dgu kun gyi don gyi phyir// bskal pa bsam
275a7(phal chen): yas rgya chen go gyon pa'i/ / drang srong chen po'i longs spyod 'di 'dra'o// gzhan gyi mi pham dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan can// bdud rnams thams cad mthar 'byin mgon po rnams
275b1(phal chen): byams pas gang dag mi 'jigs sgra 'byin pa/ / de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di yin no// 'di dag nang nas byung ngo zhes bya bar/ nyon mongs sel ba'i sems ni skad cig tu// thams cad
275b2(phal chen): shes pa su yi rgyud shes pa/ / de dag rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag ston// gang rnams chos kyi rnga ni rdung byed cing // byang chub sems kyang srog chags thams cad la// phyogs bcu'i zhing
275b3(phal chen): rnams kun tu shes byed pa/ / rang byung de dag tshul ni 'di 'dra'o// gdul bar dka' ba mtha' yas spyod yul can// zhing rnams bye ba gang dag spyod gyur cing // nam yang dngos po dag
275b4(phal chen): la mos med pa/ / de dag de bzhin gshegs bzhin rnam par 'phrul// gang rnams dka' zhing mos pa mtha' yas pas// rgyal ba rnams ni shin tu rnam dag cing // de bzhin gshegs
275b5(phal chen): pa mkhas 'dra rjes 'dra ba/ / de dag la ni smon lam 'di yang gtad// sems can don la gang rnams mos gyur cing // re re dag gi mnar med sdug bsngal ba// bskal pa dpag med
275b6(phal chen): smin par bya dad pa/ / de dag skyon med pa ma med shin tu srung // gang rnams lus dang srog la mi lta zhing // sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu brtul zhugs te// mkhas pa bdag med rnam
275b7(phal chen): bar su spyod pa/ / de dag sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di thob bo// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
276a1(phal chen): brgya snang bar byas pa nas/ gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling
276a2(phal chen): bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril
276a3(phal chen): gyis bstan to/ / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig pa de bzhin
276a4(phal chen): du'ajig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlab/
276a5(phal chen): kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang /
276a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes
276a7(phal chen): dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhe bya ba dag nas 'ongs te/ 'di ltar gser gyi
276b1(phal chen): mdog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad+mo'i mdog dang / tsam ba ka'i mdog dang ut+pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang rdo rje
276b2(phal chen): mdog dang / shel gyi mdog dang / 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes
276b3(phal chen): bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi bskyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang
276b4(phal chen): rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba dag gi/ byang
276b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig gi ji
276b6(phal chen): lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ / thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid rjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod do// de'i
276b7(phal chen): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// thugs su chud nas bsgribs pa med gzigs te// zil gyis ma non cha
277a1(phal chen): pa mi mnga' bar/ / skye dgu rab tu 'dul bar shin tu snang // la las gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba de// sku tsher skye bar gyur pa rab tu mthong // skye dgu'i zla ba
277a2(phal chen): rnam par mdzes pa de/ / tha ma'i sku yang 'dzin par la las mthong // yon tan tshad las 'das pa kun mnga' zhing // dgongs pa mkhyen bzhin shin tu mkhas gyur pa// skye dgu'i
277a3(phal chen): seng ge don yod gshegs pa de/ / la las 'chag cing gshegs par shin tu mthong // phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par snang ba de// la las mthon mthing spyan du de bzhin mthong //
277a4(phal chen): 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i skye dgu rnams// gzigs nas bzhad par de bzhin la las mthong // gzi brjid mtshungs med mnga' la la la yis// seng ge'i nga ro gsung ba de bzhin
277a5(phal chen): mthong / / zil gyis ma non ma log gsung mnga' ba// sku yi tha mar ston pa la las mthong // bcings pa kun las rnam par grol ba de// la las khab nas byung bar rab tu
277a6(phal chen): mthong / / sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyod pa rnams// gzigs shing zhi ba der gzhol la las mthong // la las byang chub snying po dam pa la// chos rnams thams cad
277a7(phal chen): mngon par sangs rgyas shing / / yon tan thams cad pha rol phyin pa dang // mun pa rdul bsal nyon mongs sbyangs pa mthong // la las chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang /
277b1(phal chen): thugs rje chen po brnyes pa de mthong ngo // la las skye dgu tshad med rnam 'dul bar// skyes bu'i dam pa de ni de bzhin mthong // la las gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa de/
277b2(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis mnan mdzad de// rdzu 'phrul chags med bla med stobs mnga' ba// seng ge'i nga ro sgrog par de bzhin mthong // la las rab tu zhi ba'i thugs mnga' ba
277b3(phal chen): 'jig rten sgron ma mya ngan 'das par mthong / / rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong nas kyang // bstobs bcu'i stobs mnga' de dag rab tu shes// de nas 'od zer de
277b4(phal chen): dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong snang bar byas pa nas/ gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
277b5(phal chen): stong gi bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams
277b6(phal chen): de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ba de
277b7(phal chen): bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi
278a1(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes
278a2(phal chen): bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal gyi bar du'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di
278a3(phal chen): zhes bya ba nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /
278a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go//
278a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin
278a6(phal chen): thams cad do/ / thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid rjod de// gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod do// de'i tshe tshigs
278a7(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ / gang gis bde gshegs rnams kyis chos zab pa// zil gyis non pa med pa brjod pa'i rnams// gang la 'jig rten rtag tu myos
278b1(phal chen): 'gyur ba/ / de dag thams cad rim gyis rab tu ston// gal te bdag cig med du zin na ni// de yi spyod yul stong pa zhi pa'ang med// rab byung rdul rnams shin tu
278b2(phal chen): bsal ba yi/ / bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yang ji ltar 'byung // mkhyen dang rnam grol zhabs dang ldan pa'i rnams// mtshungs pa med pa grangs kyang nam yang med// de ni
278b3(phal chen): 'jig rten 'di na la la dag/ rgyu la thogs pa med par 'dod phyir ro// gang la phung po med cing khams med de// skye mched dag dang skye zhing 'chi med pa// de yi grangs ni 'jig rten
278b4(phal chen): 'di brnyes pas/ / skyes bu'i seng ge rnams su rab tu brjod// nang dang phyi bzhin bya bar gdags pa rnams// de dag rang bzhin dngos nyid stong pa ste// rtog pa med cing rnam rtog
278b5(phal chen): de bzhin med/ / gzhal du med pa'i chos nyid 'di 'dra'o// de dag la ni g.yo ba nam yang med// snyems shing ldeg dang sgrib pa gang yang med// 'jig rten thams cad rjes su
278b6(phal chen): rab tu mkhyen/ / mtha' yas 'dul ba'i tshul ni 'di 'dra'o// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin spyod yul dgyes pa'i rnams// rtse gcig gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin te// yid kyis sogs
278b7(phal chen): pa'ang de la gang yang med/ / 'dir ni sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa'o// rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba rnam dag dang // las kyi rnam smin sems can spyod pa yis// rgyal ba rnams
279a1(phal chen): kyi ye shes mi ldog ste/ / bde gshegs chos ni de ltar bsam mi khyab// phyogs rnams bcun ji ltar 'khod pa yi// 'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs kun gzig
279a2(phal chen): shing / / sems can tshad med yongs su 'brel mdzad kyang // skyes bu'i dbang po de dag rtogs mi mnga'// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gser gyi mdog/ de yang kun tu rnam par kun
279a3(phal chen): tu gnas/ / de dag bsam pa ci 'dra ji bzhin du// thub pa rnams ni de ltar chos kyang ston// // bam po bcu bdun pa// / de nas 'od
279a4(phal chen): zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu bsnang bar byas so// gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
279a5(phal chen): khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi
279a6(phal chen): khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing // byang chub
279a7(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang // de bzhin
279b1(phal chen): gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis// phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to//
279b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal nas/ bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag
279b3(phal chen): thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog gi bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa'
279b4(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang / / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs
279b5(phal chen): shes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad re re zhing yang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig tu phyin pa dag
279b6(phal chen): ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid rjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang
279b7(phal chen): rjod do/ / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// lha dang 'jig rten bcas pa zil mnan te// snying rje la ni gang zhig sems gtong zhing // 'gro ba thams
280a1(phal chen): cad bskyab par zhugs pa rnams/ / de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // bde gshegs rnams la snying nas dad bskyed cing // gang gis sems ni
280a2(phal chen): nam yang mi ldog par/ / sangs rgyas spyod pa yongs su mi gtong ba// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ongs// gang rnams gang du'ang 'jug pa yod med cing // sangs rgyas
280a3(phal chen): yon tan rnams las mi ldog pa/ / shin tu bstan pa blo gdung med pa rnams// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gang rnams 'gro zhing 'dug dang 'chag pa'i tshe// nyin
280a4(phal chen): mtshan rgyun du rjes su sems byed cing / / sangs rgyas bdag nyid che la sems spel pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // dus gsum thams cad rab tu gzhal byas kyang //
280a5(phal chen): gang gi sems ni zhum par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas yon tan rjes su slob mos pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su gzhal byas shing /
280a6(phal chen): thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed pa dang / bdag dang bdag med 'dod chags bral ba'i sems// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su gzhal
280a7(phal chen): byas shing / / rtog dang rnam rtog thams cad rab spangs te// spyod pa 'di 'dra dag dang ldan gyur pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zhing
280b1(phal chen): 'jal zhing / / sems can rgya mtsho yid kyis 'thung byed cing // blo chen rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan gyur pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gang gis zhing rnams
280b2(phal chen): rnam par bsam pa na/ / gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes yod med pa// thams cad grangs su nye bar 'gro ba ni// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gang rnams/
280b3(phal chen): zhing gi rdul du gzhig byas shing // thams cad phyogs su bkang zhing bgrang byas te// de dag nang du rgyal ba 'dzud byed pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong //
280b4(phal chen): de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das nas/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya snang bar byas pa nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig
280b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i bar du snang bar byas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan
280b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la
280b7(phal chen): bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba dag dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag
281a1(phal chen): na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/
281a2(phal chen): phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/
281a3(phal chen): bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste// 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces
281a4(phal chen): bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod
281a5(phal chen): pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing
281a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
281a7(phal chen): dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid rjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba
281b1(phal chen): mthu chen la/ / gang dag kha dog rigs kyis lta 'dod pa// mig nyams log par lta bar gyur pa ste// de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mi shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dbyibs
281b2(phal chen): dag ni/ / 'jig rten kun na'ang shes par nus pa med// gang gis bskal pa bye ba bsams byas kyang // mthu chen rnams kyi kha dog mtha' med do// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid
281b3(phal chen): mi mnga' ste/ / chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med cing dben// yan lag kun ldan blta na nyams med pa// bsam pa bzhin du kun na rab tu snang // sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhal
281b4(phal chen): du yod pa min/ / gang rnams ci yang 'di yi tshul bshad de// ldan pa ma yin mi ldan ma yin pas// sangs rgyas chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu dben// de bzhin gshegs pa phung po
281b5(phal chen): 'jig pa med/ / 'byung dang 'jig par spro ba mi mdzad de// mnga' brnyes mnga' sgyur rnam pa gdon mi za// brjod du med pa rten pa rnam par spyod// lus dang sems kyang mnyam par
281b6(phal chen): rab gyur cing / / nang dang phyi yis rnam par dben pas na// gnyis po bgrangs du mi rung shes pa'i rnams// chags med bcings med bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// gya nom snang
281b7(phal chen): zhing thugs gsal 'od mdzad pa/ / spyod yul yongs dag kun tu snang gyur te// thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs kun na bzhugs// skye dgu'i don yang rgya chen yangs pa mdzad//
282a1(phal chen): gcig tu gyur cing mang por rab tu 'gyur// mang por gyur cing gcig tu de bzhin 'gyur// 'gro ba'i khams ni du mar thugs chud cing // thams cad tshul dang
282a2(phal chen): 'dra bar rab tu 'gyur/ / sku med de la chags pa gang yang med// byon pa med cing bsags pa yod min yang // kha dog mtha' yas rnam par dkod byas shing // 'gro ba sna tshogs
282a3(phal chen): lus su de dag snang / / 'jig rten thams cad sems kyis brtags pa yin// sems ni rtog pa nam yang ma yin te// bde gshegs ye shes de 'dra'i rang bzhin no// de phyir
282a4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sku ni 'di 'drar snang / / de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu
282a5(phal chen): snang bar byas pa nas/ / gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling
282a6(phal chen): bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad
282a7(phal chen): ril gyis bstan to/ / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig/
282b1(phal chen): par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang
282b2(phal chen): ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
282b3(phal chen): cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten
282b4(phal chen): gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de
282b5(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/
282b6(phal chen): rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
282b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin du thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag de/
283a1(phal chen): 'di nyid rjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// 'jig rten rang
283a2(phal chen): byung de las mchog med pa/ / mi gnas dam pa bul dang mchog gi rnams// drang srong chen po srid pa'i rgyud 'grel pa/ yon tan kun ldan rnam dag 'di yin no// 'du 'dzi med cing
283a3(phal chen): chags pa mi mnga' la/ / 'du shes dngos med gnas pa med pa'i rnams// phun sum dge ldan smad pa mi mnga' ba// mgon po rnams kyi chos nyid thub par dka'// shin tu
283a4(phal chen): 'od snang dag par gyur pa'i rnams/ / brgal du glags med rnyog pa med pa'i rnams// g.yo med mtha' ma rnam par spangs pa yi// bde gshegs rnams kyi ye shes tshul 'di yin//
283a5(phal chen): lus dang sems la rnam par rtog med cing // bde gshegs chos la gang zhig 'jug 'gyur ba// de dag chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la// nam yang nem nur dbang du mi 'gre'o// /
283a6(phal chen): 'jig rten dag na dmigs pa gang yod pa// de dag kun la bstan pa'i chos 'jug ste// gang dag phyir rgol med pas bstan mdzad kyang // rang bzhin ldog par 'gyur ba gang yang med//
283a7(phal chen): dngos por rabashes las rnams yod min par// the tsom thams cad rnam par spangs byas te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu rtog pa'i tshe// sems la rnam par 'byed pa nam yang med//
283b1(phal chen): mi shes chos rnams rnam par phye ba dag/ byung med tshig gi lam gyis rab brjod pa// sangs rgyas gsung gi rjes su 'brang byas na// gcig kyang ma yin mang po'ang ma yin no// mang dang
283b2(phal chen): gcig pa nam yang yod min te/ / mang po rnams la gcig pa yong med do// mang dang gcig pa rnam par bsgom byas na// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas shes par 'gyur// 'jig
283b3(phal chen): rten kun tu sems can zhing rnams dang / / shin tu zhi ba'i chos rnams rnam bltas te// mi gnas sems la rtog pa med pa yi// dran ldan sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur//
283b4(phal chen): sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing gi rnams// de dag rang bzhin ji bzhin brtag byas na// gcig dang tha dad gyur pa ma yin te// de ltar sangs rgyas tshul 'di shes pa yin//
283b5(phal chen): de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te// shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang bar byas pa nas// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
283b6(phal chen): khams bye ba'i bar du snang bar byas te/ / 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas// 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi
283b7(phal chen): khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing
284a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa byed
284a2(phal chen): phrag brgya kun nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo / / thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis//
284a3(phal chen): phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes
284a4(phal chen): bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gsar
284a5(phal chen): gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring
284a6(phal chen): na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas// ri ka byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
284a7(phal chen): kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// /
284b1(phal chen): thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid rjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so//
284b2(phal chen): nas smra bar gyur to// shes rab dpag med chos rnams mtha' yas pa// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa dag/ tshe ring nad med mnyam med mtshungs med 'od// yon tan che mnga' de dag sbyor
284b3(phal chen): 'di'o/ / gang gis sangs rgyas chos rnams dngos rtogs shing // dus gsum kun tu brtags kyang mi ngoms te// dmigs pa shes byed rnam par mi rtog pa// bsam yas mos pa de dag sbyor 'di'o// /
284b4(phal chen): sems can yul mos sems can 'du shes med// 'jig tshogs chos shes lam gyi rgyud dang bral// bsam gtan nang dang sems la bcings pa med// chags med yid ldan de dag sbyor 'di yin//
284b5(phal chen): rtog mkhas rab tu rtogs pa'i chos can rnams// mya ngan 'das spyod rigs la brtson pa dag/ thar pa'i lam brtson mnyam pa nyid ldan pa// zhi ba thob pa de dag spror 'di'o// ded dpon rjes song sangs
284b6(phal chen): rgyas byang chub mchog/ thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings bzhin rtogs shing // bden 'jug mkhas pas sems can rnam 'dul ba// bde gshegs bsam gtan de dag sbyor 'di'o// sangs rgyas
284b7(phal chen): don tshigs rjes su shes bya zhing / / chags med blo yangs rtogs shing bsam gtan byed// kun tu 'gro bar song bas rtsol spyod pa// rang byung spyod pa de dag sbyor 'di'o// nam mkha'i dbyings dang sprul
285a1(phal chen): pa yid ldan rnams/ / gnas dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid shes pa dag/ mya ngan 'das rigs spyod pa mkha' 'dra rnams// thob dka' thob pa rnams kyi sbyor 'di'o// zla ba zla phyed
285a2(phal chen): nyin dang nub bgrang zhing / / lo dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin su sems pa// 'jig rten 'du zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba dang // grangs tshul sus rtogs de dag sbyor 'di'o// zhing gi sems can ji snyed
285a3(phal chen): skye 'chi ba/ / gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes 'du shes med// de dag ming dang gnas pa rtogs shes pa// bsam gyi mi khyab rtogs pa'i sgor 'di'o// 'das pa'i dus dang ma 'ongs da ltar la//
285a4(phal chen): ngag gi lam gyis gang na rtog byed cing // dus gsum rang bzhin ji ltar rtogs gyur pa// mnyam med de dag sbyor ba 'di yin no// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
285a5(phal chen): nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu snang bar byas nas/ steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi
285a6(phal chen): khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa
285a7(phal chen): de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs
285b1(phal chen): gcig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag kun na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo //
285b2(phal chen): thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes
285b3(phal chen): bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag
285b4(phal chen): nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan
285b5(phal chen): 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de//
285b6(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams
285b7(phal chen): cad do/ / thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid rjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
286a1(phal chen): dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ / 'das dus gang gis bsgrub dka'i brtul zhugs che brtsams shing // nam yang zhum pa'i sems su gtong bar mi byed de/
286a2(phal chen): brgal dka' brgal te bdag gis sems can kun 'dul zhes// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// gang zhig 'dod dang sred pa 'byung zhing 'jug pa dang // ma rig gzhol ba
286a3(phal chen): gti mug mang bsgribs 'jigs chen rnams/ / sems can rang bzhin bdag med brtan pa bzod par 'jug/ bdag kyang 'jig rten mgon 'gyur zhes pa de yul 'di// 'jig rten sems can
286a4(phal chen): mang po 'dod dregs 'dam bying ba/ / med pa'i chos la rtog pas sdug bsngal mthong gyur nas// sangs rgyas spyod yul chos la bag yod gang spyod cing // bdag gis sems can kun bsgral
286a5(phal chen): de dag spyod yul 'di/ / mngon mtha' shes dka' tshad med brtan pas mthong gyur cing // bdag rten sems can pha rol mtha' yas 'khor gyur pa// de dag rgyal bas theg pa zhi ba mchog la bko
286a6(phal chen): bdag gis de 'dra'i chos bstan de yi spyod yul lo/ / sems can khams rnams mgon med nad kyis gzir gyur cing // ngan song gzhol ba 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gdungs// me lce
286a7(phal chen): 'bar phung 'jigs gzugs mi bzad bsregs gyur pa/ / mthong nas dgrol phyir zhugs pa de dag spyod yul 'di'o// lam gol lam ma yin pa'i rkyen la spyod gyur cing // mun pa chen po rtol
286b1(phal chen): bar dka' rnyed 'gro mthong nas/ / snang ba chen po bskyed de sangs rgyas chos bstan ces// 'di skad tshig brjod de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// srid pa'i mtshos g.yengs sems can rab tu
286b2(phal chen): mang ba dag/ mtha' ma mi mthong skyabs med do zhes mi dga' ba// mthong nas brtson 'grus stobs bskyed chos kyi gru sbyar cing // pha rol su 'gro zhes brjod de dag spyod yul 'di'o//
286b3(phal chen): sems can rtsa ba med la gnas pa mi mkhas kun// g.yang sa chen por lhung zhing sems nyams rmongs mthong nas// snying rjes chos kyi zam la mkhas pa su dgod cing // dran par gyis shes
286b4(phal chen): su smra de dag spyod yul 'di'o/ / shin tu dog pa'i btson rar sdug bsngal sems can rnams// na dang rga bas gzir cing tsham gyis mnar ba dag/ mthong nas bdag gis thabs kyi chos rnams
286b5(phal chen): kun brtsams te/ / sems can kun dgrol sems pa de dag spyod yul 'di'o// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad thos gyur the tsom med// chos dbyings spyod yul phyogs bcu kun tu
286b6(phal chen): rgyas bkang ste/ / 'di dag thams cad brtags na gsog kyang mi gzigs shing // sems can kun la snyoms byed de yi spyod yul lo// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi
286b7(phal chen): khams de dag nas 'das te/ / shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye
287a1(phal chen): ba brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig
287a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong snang bar byas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa snang bar byas so// 'jig rten
287a3(phal chen): gyi khams gzhal du med pa snang bar byas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar byas so// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu
287a4(phal chen): mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa dag kyang snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
287a5(phal chen): mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/ / gzhung de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs
287a6(phal chen): mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nas/
287a7(phal chen): steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas pa nas/ nam mkha'i mthas
287b1(phal chen): gzugs pa'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/ / de ltar phyogs bcu shin tu rgyas par byas nas/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so//
287b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ gzhung de bzhin du 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang
287b3(phal chen): rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
287b4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhug
287b5(phal chen): bar snang ngo / / thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming
287b6(phal chen): 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas
287b7(phal chen): 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya/
288a1(phal chen): ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems
288a2(phal chen): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ cig ji lta ba de bzhin
288a3(phal chen): thams cad do/ / thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid rjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
288a4(phal chen): 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ / bskal pa gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab sems kyi skad cig la// gang gis mthong yang bsags med 'gro dang dngos po'i tshul med pa'i//
288a5(phal chen): lam du rab tu 'jug pa de ni thams cad shes gyur te// stobs bcus tshul 'di ji ltar mkhyen bzhin 'jigs med sangs rgyas 'gyur// grags pa snyan par phyogs rnams kun tu mtshungs
288a6(phal chen): med grags gyur cing / / bgegs rnams kun las 'das te chos nyid 'di la dkar spyad de// tshad med thams cad so sor zhi zhing don rnams kun rtogs pas// de phyir phyogs rnams kun
288a7(phal chen): bkang bde gshegs chos nyid 'di ston to/ / dgongs pa ji bzhin de ni spyad pa'i 'bras bu mthun pa ste// 'jig rten don 'gyur de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa yang byas shing // de dag tha
288b1(phal chen): cad so sor mthun par ye shes rnam bsgoms pas/ / sems can dam pa sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra phyogs bcur ston// thog mar nyan 'dod bla ma bsnyen bkur bzod pa des byas
288b2(phal chen): shing / / rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab rtog bsam gtan bsnyen byed pa// bde gshegs 'di ni rtogs 'gyur 'gro ba rnam sgom sems tshim byed// chos nyid de 'dra spyod pa myur du bde
288b3(phal chen): gshegs thob par 'gyur/ / snying nas 'dri zhing phyogs rnams rgyas byed rtse gcig thub byed cing // rgyal ba'i yon tan mos las mi zlog spyod pas mi byed pa// dngos dang dngos med thams
288b4(phal chen): cad shes byas spangs shing dngos zad pa'i/ / sangs rgyas bdag med dpe med mthong ba de dag lus 'di yin// bzang po'i spyod yul can gyi sems kyis phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing //
288b5(phal chen): zhing rnams thams cad chos kyi gter gyis khyab byas tshim byed pa// ji bzhin chos gnas chos nyid mtha' la the tsom med pa'i rnams// stobs bcu ci 'dra de bzhin gyur pa'i lus ni 'di dag go//
288b6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang sgra brjod de la 'jug byed cing // chos kyi 'khor lo ji bzhin blta dka' gzhal yas rtag bskor ba// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsungs kun byang
288b7(phal chen): chub yan lag rtogs/ / de ltar 'jug pas rtag tu sangs rgyas sku rab 'di dag mthong // mthong yang mig gi rnam shes tshul du rdul med mthong ba med// rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin pas mig stong
289a1(phal chen): stobs bcu mi mthong ngo / / 'du shes thams cad rnam rtog yin gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba yin// shin tu chags med yul med de ni rgyal ba mthong ba yin// sems can las
289a2(phal chen): mang bsags pa de dag shin tu blta dka' ste/ / nang dang phyi dang dbyibs dang mdog tu phyogs bcu kun na med// de bzhin rang byung sku ni gzhal yas phyogs rnams kun 'gengs pa// shes rab
289a3(phal chen): dka' ba 'dren pa chen po bsgribs pa med pas brnyes/ / nam mkha' dag la zhing rnams bye ba dngos por gnas par snang // de nas 'ong ba med cing phyogs bcu kun tu 'gro ba med// tshig cing
289a4(phal chen): gnas par 'gyur yang de dag ci la'ang gnas pa med/ / de bzhin rang 'byung rnams kyi sku ni mkha' dbyings rtag tu 'gengs// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba lnga//
289a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer las rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems
289a6(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras rang bzhin gcig pa'i sems la bye brag tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'di lta ste/ bde 'gror 'gro ba dang
289a7(phal chen): ngan song du 'gro ba dang / dbang po tshang ba dang // dbang po ma tshang ba dang / skye ba mthun pa dang / skye ba mi mthun pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bde ba myong ba dang // sdug bsngal
289b1(phal chen): myong ba snang ba dgu la ltos/ las kyis ni sems mi shes so// sems kyis nI las mi shes so// tshor bas ni rnam par smin pa mi shes so// rnam par smin pas ni tshor ba mi shes so//
289b2(phal chen): sems kyis ni tshor ba mi shes so// tshor bas ni sems mi shes so// rgyus ni rkyen mi shes so// rkyen gyis ni rgyu mi shes so// dngos pos ni dmigs pa mi shes so// dmigs
289b3(phal chen): pas ni dngos po mi shes so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
289b4(phal chen): sems can bstan par bya ba'i phyir// gang 'di yongs su dris pa dag/ chos rnams chos nyid ci 'dra ba// 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis// chos rnams 'di dag g.yo ba med//
289b5(phal chen): shin tu dngos po med pa ste// de phyir gzhan gyis gzhan dag gi/ ngo bo nyid kyang mi shes so// ji ltar chu klung rgyud kyi rnams// gzhan dang gzhan du 'grogs rgyu yang // gcig gis gcig ni
289b6(phal chen): mi shes te/ / chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar 'bar ba'i mtshan ma can// 'od 'phro gzhan dang gzhan 'grogs kyang // gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te// chos kyi chos nyid
289b7(phal chen): de bzhin no/ / ji ltar rlung gi sten tshul gyis// gzhan dang gzhan du rab tu rgyu// gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar sa yi khams kyi rnams//
290a1(phal chen): gcig la gcig ni gnas gyur kyang // gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// mig dang rna ba sna dag dang // lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnams/
290a2(phal chen): 'di dag las ni rgyu 'khod kyang // byed pa po ni gang yang med// 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa yis// 'byung ba nye bar bstan byas kyang // bstan par byas pa gang yang med// bstan pa la ni dngos med do//
290a3(phal chen): mig ni rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // rna ba sna yang rang bzhin gyis// lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyang // med de yongs su brtags pa yin// gang yig rang bzhin dngos med par// tshul bzhin
290a4(phal chen): rab tu rtog byed pa/ / de yi mig la 'khrul pa med// chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// yang dag pa dang yang dag min// bden nas 'on te brdzun yang rung // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten kun/
290a5(phal chen): tshig gi lam gyis brjod pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can
290a6(phal chen): thams cad sems can med mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'dul ba'i dus la ji ltar bab pa dang / sems can gyi tshe ji lta ba dang / lus ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta/
290a7(phal chen): pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / sems ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis sems ca
290b1(phal chen): 'dul ba'i phyir mthong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang rnams rab tu zhi spyod cing /
290b2(phal chen): thos dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yin/ 'di don ci 'dra de bzhin du// 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis// bdag gi lus la su gnas shes// gang gis nang ni rab shes pa// yang dag yod dam
290b3(phal chen): med pa'i don/ / des ni rab tu shes pa yin// lus kyi rnam par dgod pa ni// phyogs na mi gnas brjod pa yin// de bas shes pa de gnas la// nam yang chags par mi byed do// lus ni rnam par
290b4(phal chen): spyod pa yis/ / dngos po kun kyang rnam par bsgoms// sems ni phyir ldog mi 'gyur te// dngos po kun ni brtags pa'o// gang gi tshe ni rjes su 'brang // gang gi tshe ni phyir ldog 'gyur// ji ltar
290b5(phal chen): mgal me 'khor lo yi/ / thog ma tha ma 'khor ba bzhin// dngos po thams cad mi rtag par// skye bo gang rnams rtogs pa yang / lus la bdag kyang med pa'i phyir// 'du shes phyir yang ldog par 'gyur/
290b6(phal chen): bdag med rmi lam lta bu yi// las ni kun tu rab tu 'byung // rnam par smin pas rab tu 'byung // phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin// sems ni dbang byed yin par bshad// dad pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin
290b7(phal chen): du/ / tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ 'jig rten thams cad ston par byed// ji snyed 'jig rten brda yod pa// de dag thams cad brtags pa ste// chos nyid de ni nam du yang //
291a1(phal chen): chos gcig la yang mi gnas so// rkyen rnams la ni rten bcas te// chos rnams so sor rab tu 'byung // de dag ldog par de bzhin 'gyur// khyim ji bzhin
291a2(phal chen): sngon de bzhin/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can thams
291a3(phal chen): cad kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams yongs su 'dzin pa med cing / / bdag gi med la mnyam pa yin yang / 'on kyang bde ba'i tshor ba dag kyang snang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag kyang snang / yid du
291a4(phal chen): 'ong bar byed pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang / nang du byed pa dang / phyi rol tu byed pa dang / tshor ba chung ba dang / tshor ba che ba dang / tshe 'di la myong ba dang / tshe gzhan la myong
291a5(phal chen): ba dag kyang snang la/ chos kyi dbyings la ni yid du 'ong ba 'am/ yid du mi 'ong ba yang med pa 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis/ byang chub
291a6(phal chen): sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar las rnams byas gyur pa// tshor ba de bzhin 'byung 'gyur gyi// 'di la byed pa gang yang med// 'di ni sangs rgyas
291a7(phal chen): bstan pa'o/ / shin tu phyis pa'i me long la// ngo ni ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin// de la de ni de bzhin snang // chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar zhing dang sa bon dag/ gcig gis gcig
291b1(phal chen): ni mi shes kyang / / rang bzhin nye bar ston par byed// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa zhig/ lam po cher ni song 'dug ste// gzugs rnams ston par byed pa
291b2(phal chen): bzhin/ / las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar shing gi 'khrul 'khor rnams// sna tshogs smra mang rjod byed kyang // de ni bdag dang bdag med min// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar byan ma
291b3(phal chen): mang po yi/ / sgo nga'i sbubs ni phye ba las// sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan 'gyur ba// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar ma yi mngal du yang // bu ni 'pho bar mi 'gyur te// 'od kyang
291b4(phal chen): dbang po sna tshogs 'gyur/ / las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar sems dmyal 'jigs pa na// gshin rje'i rigs gtogs sdug bsngal ba// de dag la ni 'ong ba med// las kyi rang
291b5(phal chen): bzhin de bzhin no/ / ji ltar rin chen mchog rnams dang // lha yi bu rnams kun ldan yang // 'pho bar snang ba gang yang med// de bzhin las kyi rang bzhin no// ji ltar 'jig rten la la dag/
291b6(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab 'bar gyur kyang // de dag 'ong bkang yang med// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sa
291b7(phal chen): dpa' yon tan dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig mngon par sangs rgyas na/ 'on kyang chos tshad med pa yang yang dag par
292a1(phal chen): ston cing tshad med pa yang rnam par ston/ sems can tshad med pa yang rab tu ston/ gsung tshad med pa yang shin tu sgrog/ sku tshad med pa yang shin tu ston/ bsam
292a2(phal chen): pa tshad med pa yang thugs su chud/ rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa yang shin tu skyod/ rgyan tshad med pa yang byin gyis rlob/ spyod yul
292a3(phal chen): tshad med pa yang shin tu ston la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam pa tha dad du mi snang ba 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
292a4(phal chen): 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gnas 'di shes par dka' ba ste// rgyal ba'i sras kyis bdag la dris// de ni mkhas pas rnam par shes// yon tan mos pa dpyod par byed// /
292a5(phal chen): ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang // sems can mang po rab tu rgyu// de la gcig dang tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar me ni gcig pu yang // 'jig rten kun na kun kyang 'bud//
292a6(phal chen): de la me lce tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar rgya mtsho gcig pu yang // chu klung tshad med 'bab gyur kyang // de la chu yi bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no//
292a7(phal chen): ji ltar rlung ni gcig pu yang // 'jig rten kun tu rgyu zhing ldang // de la gcig dang tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// sprin chen rnams ni 'brug bsgrags shing // sa rnams kun
292b1(phal chen): kyang ngoms par byed/ / de yi char la bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang // myu gu sna tshogs 'byin cing ston// sa la bye brag 'byed pa med// sangs rgyas
292b2(phal chen): chos nyid de bzhin no/ / ji ltar sgrib med nyi ma ni// phyogs bcu kun na snang bar byed// de la 'od zer tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar nam mkha'i zla ba ni// 'jig rten kun
292b3(phal chen): la rab tu snang / / gnas nas 'gyur ba gang yang med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar tshangs pa mi mjed bdag/ stong gsum na ni 'dug mod kyi// de la lus ni bye brag med//
292b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de
292b5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba bskyed par gcig kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams// gzugs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / rigs
292b6(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / dbang po sna tshogs dang / longs spyod sna tshogs dang / dbang sna tshogs dang / 'khor sna tshogs dang / phyug dbul sna tshogs dang / yon tan sna tshogs dang / shes
292b7(phal chen): rab sna tshogs su'ang snang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang la'ang mi mnyam pa 'am// tha dad du dgongs pa gang yang med na 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig
293a1(phal chen): gi dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar sa ni ro gcig kyang // sa bon tshul bzhin myu gu ston// byams dang sngang
293a2(phal chen): bar sems pa med/ / sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar chu ni ro gcig kyang // snod kyi dbang gis rnam par 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// rgyud kyi rnams la rnam
293a3(phal chen): par 'gyur/ / ji ltar sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ni// rtag tu 'khor yang mgu bar byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// shin tu sbyangs pa dga' bar byed// ji ltar mkhas pa'i
293a4(phal chen): rgyal po dag/ 'gro ba mang po shes par byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// ji ltar bskyed bzhin shes par byed// ji ltar dri med me long la// ci 'dra'i gzugs rnams
293a5(phal chen): de bzhin snang / / de bzhin sems can bsam tshul du// sangs rgyas yon phul rnam dag 'gyur// ji ltar dug phan sman gyi rnams// dug nad thams cad sos par byed// de
293a6(phal chen): bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ / nyon mongs dug ni chen po sel// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba ni// 'gro ba 'di dag snang bar byed// mun pa dag kyang rnam par sel// sangs rgyas yon/
293a7(phal chen): phul de bzhin no// ji ltar zla ba dri med pa// kun tu mnyam pa nyid byas te// sa ni rab tu snang bar byed// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar chu yi stobs shugs kyis//
293b1(phal chen): sa ni thams cad g.yo 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin du// srid gsum 'khor ba rnams kyang spyod// 'bar dang 'od 'phro bcas pa'i me// thams cad dag tu sreg pa'i dngas/
293b2(phal chen): debazhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// 'du byed thams cad sreg par byed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal
293b3(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa gcig na thams cad lta ba mthun pas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur/ de dag
293b4(phal chen): kun la yang gzugs ni gzugs nyid du zad/ tshor ba yang tshor ba nyid du zad/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes nyid du zad/ 'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed rnams nyid du zad/ rnam par
293b5(phal chen): shes pa yang rnam par shes pa nyid du zad/ 'dod pa'i khams kyang 'dod pa'i khams nyid du zad/ gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams nyid du zad/ gzugs med pa'i khams
293b6(phal chen): kyang gzugs med pa'i khams nyid du zad/ ma rig pa yang ma rig pa nyid du zad/ sred pa yang sred pa nyid du zad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang phan par byed pa 'am/ gnod
293b7(phal chen): bar byed pa ma yin na/ de ci'i phyir// de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
294a1(phal chen): de ltar khyod kyis gang dris pa// la la myur du rnam 'grol zhing // la la dka' bar 'grol 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas sras po bdag la nyon// 'di ni dpag tu
294a2(phal chen): med pa yi/ / sangs rgyas bstan gyi nyes ma yin// dad dang brtson 'grus nan tan gyis// rtag tu khyad par 'gyur ba yin// ji ltar rtswa dang shing gsher ba// mer bcug shin tu nyam chung
294a3(phal chen): zhing / / ring por mi thogs 'chi bar 'gyur// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar gtsub nas gtsub pa'i tshe// ma byung ba ni myur bteg na// myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba bzhin// de ltar
294a4(phal chen): le lo bstan pa la/ / nyi ma'i nor bu lci ba la// yang dang yang bzhag bteg pa ni// de la me 'byung me 'gyur te// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i tshe// byis pa rnams ni
294a5(phal chen): mig btsums shing / / mi mthong ci phyir zhes smras pa// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// rkang lag med par skyes pa'i mo// ji ltar smyig mda' kha bug gis// sa ni dbug par 'dod pa bzhis
294a6(phal chen): de ltar le lo bstan pa la/ / ji ltar byis pas rgya mtsho las// yang dang yang du bcu byas shing // skam par la la 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar bum pa chus bkang
294a7(phal chen): bzhin/ / bskal pa'i me ni byung ba'i tshe// la la gsad par 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar la la phyogs bcu yi// nam mkha' ji snyed tha mal pa'i// gzugs kyis rgyas
294b1(phal chen): bar dgang smra ba/ / de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i
294b2(phal chen): sras chos kyi tshul nyon mongs pa thams cad skems pa 'di nyid blangs kyang / sems can la la 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro// la la zhe sdang gi dbang du 'gro/ la la gti mug gi dbang du 'gro/
294b3(phal chen): nga rgyal gyi dbang du 'gro/ 'chab pa'i dbang du 'gro/ khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gro/ phrag dog gi dbang du 'gro/ ser sna'i dbang du 'gro/ sgyu'i dbang du 'gro zhing / g.yo'i dbang du 'gro la
294b4(phal chen): chos de dag kyang sems med par gzung du yang mi nus te/ nyon mongs par gdags pa kun tu sems kyi rgyun du zad na/ de ji lta bu// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos
294b5(phal chen): dpal gyis/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gi don du dris pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas sras po nga las nyon// yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa
294b6(phal chen): 'di/ / thos pa tsam gyis mi 'grub bo// la la stobs med chu klung gis// nad kyis khyer bar gyur pa dag/ skoms zhing shi bar gyur pa bzhin// ma bsgoms chos kyang de bzhin no// ji/
294b7(phal chen): ltar 'gro ba mang po la// zas dang skom dag sbyin byas kyang // bdag nyid bkres pas shi ba ltar// de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o// ji ltar sman pa la la zhig/ sman rnams thams/
295a1(phal chen): cad 'dog bzhin du// lha mi nad kyis shi ba bzhin// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar dbyig gi mdzod dag tu// rin chen mang po bzang byed kyang // nam byed/
295a2(phal chen): tsam yang mi 'thob pa// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar bde ba kun ldan pa'i// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor skyes kyang // zas dang skom dag mi bdog pa// de bzhin chos la ma
295a3(phal chen): bsgoms pal/ / dzi ltar 'on ma rol ma yi// seMs gan smras mkhas pa 'o// gzhan dag rnams dka' byed pa// chos lam bams de bzhin no// dz+ha skar dmyas la ba ma mkhan
295a4(phal chen): tshong dus dbus su 'drir 'jug kyang / / bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ba// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar mtsho chen mnyan pa zhig/ skye bo mang po sgrol byed kyang //
295a5(phal chen): bdag nyid de nang 'chi 'gyur ba// chos lam bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar lam gyi bzhi mdor yang // phun sum tshogs pa kun rjod cing // bdag gis thos par mi 'gyur ba//
295a6(phal chen): chos la mi bsgoms de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i
295a7(phal chen): sras de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sems can lal la ni sbyin pa brjod pa mdzad/ la la la ni tshul khrims/ la
295b1(phal chen): la la ni bzod pa/ la la la ni brtson 'grus/ la la la ni bsam gtan/ la la la ni shes rab brjod pa mdzad/ la la la ni byams pa/ la la la ni snying rje/ la la la ni dga' ba/
295b2(phal chen): la la la ni btang snyoms brjod pa mdzad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni chos gcig 'gas 'byung bar mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems
295b3(phal chen): dpa' ye shes dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sems can gzhan gyi bsam shes pa// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste// de ltar
295b4(phal chen): gang gi don dris pa/ / sangs rgyas sras po bdag las nyon// smra ba'i cho ga ni gang yang rung // chos gcig gis ni byung ba med// gang yang 'byung ba yod pa min// 'byung bar
295b5(phal chen): 'gyur ba de bzhin med/ / skal ba gang la gnas pa yi// bsam pa rnams ni mkhyen mdzad cing // gang la ci dag tshul mthun pa// de bzhin chos kyang bstan pa mdzad// ser
