295b6(phal chen): sna can la sbyin pa brjod/ / tshul khrims ngan la tshul khrims rnams// mi bzod la ni bzod dang des// brtson 'grus 'byor pa le lo la'o// rnam par 'khrugs la bsam
295b7(phal chen): gtan brjod/ / shes rab 'byor pa shes med la'o// gdug pa'i sems la byams pa bshad// 'tshe ba rnams la snying rje ste// zhum pa la ni dga' ba bshad// 'khyor ma'i
296a1(phal chen): sems la btang snyoms te/ / sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyang // rim pas de ltar 'byung ba yin// ji ltar sa la las bya ba// khyim gyi dngos la rim pa
296a2(phal chen): yin/ / de bzhin sbyin pa tshul khrims dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar 'gro// rgyal po'i gnas dang grong rdal rnams// rub pa'i phyi ni ra ba ste// de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus dag/
296a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rungab phyir ro// ji ltar gdugs gcig rgyal po ni// sa rnams thams cad skyong bar byed// de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs bzhin no//
296a4(phal chen): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni// bde ba thams cad ster ba ltar// de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba 'byin// de nas byang chub
296a5(phal chen): sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'byung ba gcig na/
296a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dag 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can 'dul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
296a7(phal chen): tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / bstan
296b1(phal chen): pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rnam pa tha dad pa dag ci'i phyir snang bar gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
296b2(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
296b3(phal chen): chos kyi rgyal po'i chos nyid ni// 'jam dpal rtag tu gcig pa ste// bsgribs pa med pa gzigs pa yi// 'byung ba de yang gcig pu'o// sangs rgyas thams cad sku gcig ste// de
296b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku/ / shes rab thugs kyang gcig pa ste// mi 'jigs stobs kyang de bzhin no// sngan chad byang chub zhugs pa'i tshe// ji ltar yongs su bsngo mdzad pa//
296b5(phal chen): 'khor du chos rnams bstan pa dang // de dag zhing yang de bzhin 'gyur// zhing gi phun sum gang yod pa// sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad 'grub// sems can ji ltar sbyangs pa'i
296b6(phal chen): rnams/ / de yi rnam pa de ltar mthong // ji ltar sangs rgyas chos nyid du// kun gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ste// sangs rgyas zhing dang sku dag dang // 'khor du chos bstan de bzhin no//
296b7(phal chen): gang rnams smon lam phun ldan zhing // sngan chad bsam pa yongs sbyangs pas// thams cad gzigs pa'i tshul gyis rnams// ji lta ba bzhin thams cad mthong // sems can
297a1(phal chen): bsam pa ji bzhin dang / / las dang stobs kyang ji bzhin pa// de lta de ltar mthong 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas zhing la rtog
297a2(phal chen): mi mnga'/ / de dag byams sdang yod pa min// bsam pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du// srog chags rnams kyi de bzhin mthong // rnam pa tha dad 'jig rten khams// de ltar snang bar gyur
297a3(phal chen): pa de/ / drang srong chen po kun gzigs pa'i// nyes pa'i skyon las gyur pa med// gang na 'dul ba yod pa yi// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// skyes bu drang srong
297a4(phal chen): rnams kyang snang / / de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces
297a5(phal chen): smras so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag gis rang rang gi spobs pa bstan pa'i rnams smras pa yin na/ da khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul la rtsoms te
297a6(phal chen): spobs par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi yul ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshogs ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la
297a7(phal chen): 'jug pa ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul shin tu bstan pa ni gang / sangs
297b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi yul shes par byed pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rtogs pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ji tsam du yangs/
297b2(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nam mkha'i yul dang 'dra ba ste// kun tu 'ong la 'dra ba med//
297b3(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'jug pa ste// chos nyid la ni 'jug pa med// tshogs rnams thams cad bstan par ni// bskal pa bye bar mi nus te// ji snyed rgyal ba'i tshogs mnga' ba// de
297b4(phal chen): ni sangs rgyas yul yin no/ / blo gros sems kyang de bzhin na// sems can thams cad rab tu 'jug/ de la bstan pa thogs pa med// de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// 'jig rten thams
297b5(phal chen): cad 'jug pa dang / / 'jig rten rgyu ba gang yod pa// de dag kun la ye shes gnas// gzugs med snang ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas ye shes chags med de// dus gsum kun la chags
297b6(phal chen): pa med/ / nam mkha' 'byung dang mtshungs pa yin// de ni ye shes yul yin no// chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dad// sems can khams rnams rtogs par mkhyen// dbyings rnams thams
297b7(phal chen): cad rab tu bsnyes/ / don sangs rgyas yul yin no// sgrar gdags ji snyed yod pa dang // sems can kun gyi sgra skad du// sgra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang // rnam par rtog pa gang yang
298a1(phal chen): da/ / rnas shes rnam pa shes pa med// sems kyis brjod pa'angs yin te/ ye shes rang bzhin shin rgyu // sems can rnapas la'ang rab tu bshang / nyon
298a2(phal chen): mongs med cing las med de/ / dngos po med cing gnas pa med// snang ba med cing rgyu ba med// 'jig rten dag tu'ang mnyam par spod// sems can kun gyi sems kyi rnams// dus
298a3(phal chen): gsum kun tu rab yangs pa/ / sems gcig la ni rab 'jug pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'jugade nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems
298a4(phal chen): can gyi chung ji snyed pa dang / chos kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / las kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / lus kyi rgyud ji skyed pa dang / dbang po'i chung ji snyed pa dang /
298a5(phal chen): ba'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / tshul khrims log pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
298a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu sdang bar gyur te/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rab tu snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad
298a7(phal chen): med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa// kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du
298b1(phal chen): med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyu ba ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras
298b2(phal chen): bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nu phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de
298b3(phal chen): bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin
298b4(phal chen): du 'og gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med
298b5(phal chen): pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na
298b6(phal chen): sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu snang bar gyur to//
298b7(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpas dris pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / bam po
299a1(phal chen): bco brgyad pa/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i
299a2(phal chen): sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan
299a3(phal chen): pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ lus kyi las ma smad pa yin/ ngag gi las ma smad pa
299a4(phal chen): yin/ yid kyi las ma smad pa yin/ lus kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ lus kyi las mi zlogs pa yin/ ngag gi
299a5(phal chen): las mi zlogs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi zlogs pa yin/ lus kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ lus kyi las
299a6(phal chen): bsngags pa yin/ ngag gi las bsngags pa yin/ yid kyi las bsngags pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par dag pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par dag
299a7(phal chen): pa yin/ lus kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ ngag gi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ yid kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba
299b1(phal chen): yin/ ngag gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/
299b2(phal chen): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dran pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dga' ba phun
299b3(phal chen): sum tshogs pa yin/ blo phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros mchog tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros dam par gyur pa yin/ blo gros rab tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros tshad med pa yin/ blo gros
299b4(phal chen): grangs med pa yin/ blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ blo gros mtshungs pa med pa yin/ blo gros gzhal du med pa yin/ blo gros brjod du med pa yin/ rgyu'i stobs can yin
299b5(phal chen): bsam pa'i stobs can yin/ sbyor ba'i stobs can yin/ rkyen gyi stobs can yin/ dmigs pa'i stobs can yin/ dbang po'i stobs can yin/ rnam par lta ba'i stobs can
299b6(phal chen): yin/ zhi gnas kyi stobs can yin/ lhag mthong gi stobs can yin/ nges par rtog pa'i stobs can yin/ phung po la mkhas pa yin/ khams la mkhas pa yin/ skye mched la
299b7(phal chen): mkhas pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'dod pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mkhas
300a1(phal chen): pa yin/ 'das pa la mkhas pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa yin/ da ltar byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin//
300a2(phal chen): chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas
300a3(phal chen): ba yin/ rab tu byang ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la
300a4(phal chen): mkhas pa yin/ stong pa nyid yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ mtshan ma med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ smon pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/
300a5(phal chen): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/
300a6(phal chen): byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes par bya
300a7(phal chen): ba khong du chud pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ dbang po dang brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongs su
300b1(phal chen): rdzogs par bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa khong du chud pa yin/ khams sna tshogs dang khams du ma'i shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ mos pa sna tshogs dang mos pa du ma shes par bya/
300b2(phal chen): ba khong du chud pa yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas
300b3(phal chen): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i mig chags pa
300b4(phal chen): med pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ klu'i dbang
300b5(phal chen): pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ nam
300b6(phal chen): mkha' lding gi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos yongs su bzung
300b7(phal chen): ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ klu'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/
301a1(phal chen): dri za'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang pos
301a2(phal chen): bkur ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos bkur ba yin// sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin/ skyabs su gyur
301a3(phal chen): pa yin/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin/ mgon du gyur pa yin/ sgron mar gyur pa yin/ snang bar gyur pa yin/ 'od du gyur pa yin/ 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongs su
301a4(phal chen): 'dren par gyur pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin/ gtso bor gyur pa yin/ thu bor gyur pa yin/ rab tu gyur pa yin/ dam par gyur pa yin/ phul du gyur pa yin/ bla na med
301a5(phal chen): pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub
301a6(phal chen): sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod de ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams
301a7(phal chen): kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde bar rnam par gzud spyod pa'i phyir zhugs shing / de ltar khyod rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas dag yongs su dri bar sems pa ni/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
301b1(phal chen): leg so legs so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dag gi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag/
301b2(phal chen): thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
301b3(phal chen): da ltar byung ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba
301b4(phal chen): yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / kun tu bzang zhing kun tu
301b5(phal chen): mdzes pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing srog chags thams cad la ston pa gnyis par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi las yid la byed
301b6(phal chen): pa'i sbyor ba yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad thob par 'gyur
301b7(phal chen): ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sems can thams
302a1(phal chen): cad rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas/ khyim gyi thibs pos zil gyis mi non par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// pha ma dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
302a2(phal chen): dpa' sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bu dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub
302a3(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa dang shin tu bral bas dga' ba dang mi dga' ba dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/
302a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dod pa'i gsal shing rnam par sel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// glu dang / gar dang / rol mo dang /
302a5(phal chen): sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gar mkhan gyi tshon lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod pa rab tu thob par gyur cig
302a6(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do/ / chung ma'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i gsal shing dang bral zhing / 'phags pa'i sar chud par gyur
302a7(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed do/ / rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad srid par 'byung ba 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin par khur bor bar gyur cig ces sems
302b1(phal chen): bskyed do/ / khang tog tu byin pa'i ma/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing // chos kyi khang stengs su phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed pa/
302b2(phal chen): sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdag gir bya ba med de/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems med cing / bdag gi thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur cig ces
302b3(phal chen): sems bskyed do/ / ma bral zhing 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar phyin te/ 'du ba dang shin tu bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed
302b4(phal chen): do/ / btson ra la kha na ma tho bar mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la spyod cing gang du dga' bar 'dong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khyim nas khyim
302b5(phal chen): med par 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems bcings pa dang grol ba med cing / chags pa med de mi dgos pa dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
302b6(phal chen): dge 'dun gyi ra ba'i mtshams 'da' ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gal ba med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing / mthun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems
302b7(phal chen): bskyed do/ / mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi drung du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la rtsom zhing cho ga la mkhas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab tu
303a1(phal chen): 'byung bar gsol ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bar chad med cing / phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gos
303a2(phal chen): dkar po 'dor ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sdig pa la brtson pa spangs te dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sgra dang kha spu 'dreg pa'i
303a3(phal chen): tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing nyon mongs pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gos ngur smrig gon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
303a4(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad drang srong chen po'i sems dang ldan zhing rnyog pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
303a5(phal chen): skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bar rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang
303a6(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba la mos pa mngon par bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad pa'i don du brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos
303a7(phal chen): la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos kyi gter rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/
303b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chags pa'i gnas dang bral zhing dge 'dun yongs su sdud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bsgrub pa'i tshig yang dag par len pa'i ma
303b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad tshul bzang po la yang dag par spyod cing / bslab pa thams cad la shin tu bslab par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// slob dpon
303b3(phal chen): gyis bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad log pa ma yin pa'i las la spyod cing tshul dang spod yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
303b4(phal chen): mkhan pos bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems
303b5(phal chen): bskyed do/ / bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin te/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu
303b6(phal chen): phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / gtsug lag khang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'phrogs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ bla ma/
303b7(phal chen): med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// stan 'ding ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing
304a1(phal chen): legs par bkod pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / 'dug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi gnas pa'i sems kyis/
304a2(phal chen): snying po byang chub la 'dug par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// skyil mo krung 'cha' ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi g.yo ba'i sa la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par
304a3(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / zhi gnas yongs su spong ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa la brtson zhing zhi ba dang dul ba la
304a4(phal chen): rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / lhag mthong yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos can du
304a5(phal chen): gyur te/ chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// skyil mo krung 'jig pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par
304a6(phal chen): gzhag cing / 'du byed thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa rnam par mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang mthil gzhog pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
304a7(phal chen): thams cad sems rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / rkang mthil 'degs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kha na
304b1(phal chen): ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa thob ste/ khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba las 'thon par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// smad g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad /
304b2(phal chen): shes shing khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang ldan zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ska rags 'ching ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
304b3(phal chen): cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu 'brel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bla gos gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
304b4(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste/ gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sbyar ma gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
304b5(phal chen): can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ thabs dam pas mngon par bkab par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// so shing len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
304b6(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dngos po 'thob pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// so shing za ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
304b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa shin tu bcom ste/ sems dul zhing sems dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dben par 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
305a1(phal chen): cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs te/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu ngogs su 'gro ba'i tshe/
305a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gtsang sbra'i las byed pa'i rtse/ byang chub
305a3(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa'i dngos pos gtsang zhing nges pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / lag pa 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
305a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gzung zhing bcang ba'i phyir/ bkra shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ngo 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub
305a5(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing / chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'khar ba len pa'i tshe/
305a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mchod sbyin byas shing / lam ston par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lhung bzed len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
305a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis mchod par 'os shing snod du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / spyod yul du mngon par zhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
305b1(phal chen): sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon du phyogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam du zhugs pa'i tshe
305b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyi na ma lus par 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
305b3(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos bsgribs pa med pa grub par gyur pas/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems
305b4(phal chen): bskyed do/ / lam mtho ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu zhum pa med de/ khams gsum las gyen du 'phags par gyur cig ces sems
305b5(phal chen): bskyed do/ / lam dma' ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu brtan cing / sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu 'dud par gyur cig
305b6(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do/ / lam nyam nga ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lta ba yo zhing mi drang ba dang bral te/ nyam nga ba yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces
305b7(phal chen): sems bskyed do/ / lam drang po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad g.yo med cing sgyu med de/ sems drang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam
306a1(phal chen): rdul chen po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rdul med pa'i chos yang dag par thob ste/ 'dod chags par gyur pa'i chos
306a2(phal chen): las rnam par 'grel par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / rdul med pa'i lam mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su
306a3(phal chen): bsgoms pa dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / g.yang sa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa rtogs
306a4(phal chen): par khong du chud cing sdig pa'i chos thams cad bsal te/ dge ba'i chos la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'khor mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
306a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad dus gsum du gtogs pa'i chos zab mo bstan pa dang mthun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / ka ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
306a6(phal chen): cad khro zhing khon du 'dzin pa dang bral te/ khengs pa dang 'khrug pa dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
306a7(phal chen): thams cad lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / ri mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thob par dka' ba dang
306b1(phal chen): thibs po med pa rab tu thob cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing tsher ma can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
306b2(phal chen): cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug med cing / tsher ma dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing lo ma can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
306b3(phal chen): thams cad bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis rab tu yog par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// me tog mthong ba'i tshe/
306b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas pas/ me tog lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// me tog gi shing mthong ba'i
306b5(phal chen): tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gsum cu rtsa gnyis kyi me tog shin tu rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing thog mthong ba'i tshe//
306b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying po byang chub tu gzhol zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba thams cad 'bras bu yod de/ 'bras bu'i dam pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/
306b7(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// chu klung mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong ste/ chos kyi rgyun la mnyam par gzhag par
307a1(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / lu ma mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/ se
307a2(phal chen): gol gtogs pa tsam gyis khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / rdzing su mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi tshig shin tu bstan
307a3(phal chen): pa la mkhas shing / chos thams cad kyis rgyas pa'i tshig gi las dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khron pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
307a4(phal chen): chos thams cad 'byor pa dang ldan zhing spobs pa mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / mtsho mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gong nas gong du dmigs
307a5(phal chen): pa la rab tu brtson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / zam pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su
307a6(phal chen): bsgral pa la zam par red par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / yur ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi sems dang bsam pa la mkhas shing bag la
307a7(phal chen): nyal ba dang / kun nas 'khor ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / rong
307b1(phal chen): reg bya la sred pa rab tu byang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / mya ngan med pa'i nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa shin tu med cing mya ngan
307b2(phal chen): med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / bza' shing gi ra ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtang ba la
307b3(phal chen): shin tu brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / sems can rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gsum cu rtsa gnyis
307b4(phal chen): kyis brgyan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / rgyan med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas rgyan
307b5(phal chen): par mas rdzung pa/ 'a mang da sems sa mdzu sabyang na mam sa dpas sems sa bsas rnam la dasa' na ma pa nga
307b6(phal chen): bas dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / mi dga' ba mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dus byas kyi dngos po
307b7(phal chen): thams cad la mi dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / sems can bde ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i pha
308a1(phal chen): byad thams cad rab tu thob pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
308a2(phal chen): thams cad ye shes kyi rtsa ba rab tu thob ste/ sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nad med pa ma yin pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
308a3(phal chen): sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ tha dad pa men pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can sdug gu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
308a4(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mos pa mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mi sdug pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe//
308a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba la mos pa chung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// drin gzo ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang
308a6(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mdzad pa shes par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// drin gzo ba med pa'i sems
308a7(phal chen): can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lta ba la drin du gzo ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge sbyong mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
308b1(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing / zhi ba dang dul ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bram ze mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
308b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dam par gyur te/ sdig pa spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dka' thub can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
308b3(phal chen): ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing dka' thub la shin tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / brtul zhugs la zhugs pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
308b4(phal chen): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir/ brtul zhugs dam por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// go gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
308b5(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad rang byung gi chos yongs su btsal ba la go cha bzang po shin tu bgos par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / go ma gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang
308b6(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i las bya ba thams cad la go gyon pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / rgol ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
308b7(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / 'tsho ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
309a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad spyod lam bcos pa med cing 'tsho ba dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / rgyal po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
309a2(phal chen): thams cad thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / rgyal po'i bu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
309a3(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi sras chos las skyes pa/ chos kyi sprul par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khyim bdag mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rnam par
309a4(phal chen): gdon mi za ba'i blo can du gyur te/ grong gi chos spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// blon po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i
309a5(phal chen): chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la bzang po yid la byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / grong khyer mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gdul dka'
309a6(phal chen): ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ mthu bo che'i lus dang 'dra bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyal po'i gnas mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
309a7(phal chen): yon tan gyi rjes su 'brang bar mthun pa la mos pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / nags tshal gyi 'dab mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
309b1(phal chen): thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsngags par 'os par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / slong du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs
309b2(phal chen): pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ chos kyi dbyings su chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sgor phyin pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
309b3(phal chen): kyi sgor phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / nang du phyin pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dus gsum du mnyam pa nyid kyi nang du phyin par gyur cig/
309b4(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// mi sbyin no zhes ma byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing phyir spang ba med par gyur cig ces sems
309b5(phal chen): bskyed do/ / mi sbyin no zhes byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las
309b6(phal chen): phyir spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / lhung bzed stong pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis stongs par gyur
309b7(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed do/ / lhung bzed gang ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos dkar po thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas par gyur cig ces sems
310a1(phal chen): bskyed do/ / rim gror byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la rim gro byed par gyur cig ces
310a2(phal chen): sems bskyed do/ / rim gror ma byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos mchod pa thams cad la rag ma lus par gyur cig ces sems bskyed
310a3(phal chen): do/ / khrel yod pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dbang po dben pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
310a4(phal chen): ngo tsha med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas shing ngo tsha med pa yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed
310a5(phal chen): do/ / kha zas bsod pa thob pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing smon lam thams cad phun sum tshogs par
310a6(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / kha zas mi bsod pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin nyams su bde ba thams cad thob par gyur
310a7(phal chen): cocig ces sems bskyed do/ / kha zas snum bag thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sems
310b1(phal chen): 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / snum bag med pa'i kha zas thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi sred pa dang bral te snum bag med
310b2(phal chen): pa'i sems su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / kha zas za ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bas yongs su rgyas
310b3(phal chen): shing bsam gtan gyi zas za bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / ro myang ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros ngoms par gyur cing skyes bu chen
310b4(phal chen): po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / zan zos pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin cing
310b5(phal chen): bya ba byas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / chos ston pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing //
310b6(phal chen): spobs pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// phyir 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong
310b7(phal chen): / khams gsum thams cad nas byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu 'bog pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
311a1(phal chen): kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'bog par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / khrus byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'od mtha' yas
311a2(phal chen): pa dang ldan zhing / lus dang sems dri ma med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dro ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mu med par phyin te/
311a3(phal chen): yongs su gdung ba sel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bsil ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu bsil bar gyur te/ bla na med pa'i
311a4(phal chen): bsil ba'i dngos po khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / chos thob par byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gtam gyi rjes su
311a5(phal chen): 'gro zhing / chos kyi dbyings dang 'dris par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad
311a6(phal chen): dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob ste/ bsgribs pa med pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mig mi 'gebs par lta ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
311a7(phal chen): cad kun tu mdzes pas kun tu bzang por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / mchod rten mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os shing
311b1(phal chen): mchod rten lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / lta ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis blta bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
311b2(phal chen): spyi bos 'thug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis spyi gtsug ltar mi snang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// g.yas phyogs su
311b3(phal chen): bskor ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don dang mthun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lan gsum skor ba'i tshe/ byang
311b4(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mos pa'i rab dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjod pa'i tshe/ byang chub
311b5(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yon tan mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / mtshan rnams rjod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
311b6(phal chen): can thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la gzhol zhing yan lag dam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / rkang pa 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
311b7(phal chen): can thams cad dri ma med pa'i mthar phyin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / lus spyong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
312a1(phal chen): cad bsam pa la rnyog pa med cing lus kyi 'du byed shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ / gnyid sad pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
312a2(phal chen): thams cad thams cad phyogs bcu tham cad du mthu chen po thob par gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces sems
312a3(phal chen): bskyed do/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang gzhan thams cad kyang
312a4(phal chen): thob par 'gyur zhing / lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / skye dgur bcas pa dang /
312a5(phal chen): lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur pa'i byang chub
312a6(phal chen): sems dpas sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba rnams so/ / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste cu
312a7(phal chen): drug pa'o/ / // bam po bcu dgu pa// yon tan yangs pa'i spyod yul yongs dag pa// de skad smras nas sems can dri med pa/
312b1(phal chen): 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub yon tan rnams// sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la dris// spyod yul yongs dag rgyal bas spyad pa'i rnams// bdag gis rgyal sras rnams
312b2(phal chen): la 'dir bshad do/ / yon tan spyod pa ji snyed gang yod pa// rgyal sras rnams la da ni khyod kyis shod// bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon// yon tan mtha' yas de dag
312b3(phal chen): yon tan las/ / mtsho las thigs pa ji bzhin nyung shas shig/ mgo smos tsam du cung zad brjod par bya// byang chub don du rang byung 'gyur bya zhes// thog mar byang chub sems
312b4(phal chen): skyes gyur pa yi/ / yon tan brjod pa'ang mtha' yas dpag tu med// dpe zla med pas brjod kyang zad ma gyur// pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan la// bskal pa mang por spyad pa ci
312b5(phal chen): zhig smos/ / de dag yon tan chu bo thams cad ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bstan kyang zad mi 'gyur// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las// dpe tsam cha shas cung tsam brjo bar
312b6(phal chen): bya/ / mkha' las 'dab chags lam ltar shin tu chung // sa chen lhung las rdul phran gcig kyang 'dra// byang chub yon tan bsam pa'i sems skye ba// chu med ma yin gyin 'byung ba sim
312b7(phal chen): rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs chos rnams dang / / dge 'dun rnams la dad pa bskyed pas skye// de yang 'dod pa skyid pa rgyal srid dang // bdag bde'i don dang grags dang snyan phyir min/
313a1(phal chen): 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus gzhil ba'i phyir// 'jig rten phan bskyed sems ni yongs su skye// de ni sems can rtag tu bde don dang // zhing sbyangs sangs
313a2(phal chen): rgyas mang po mchod pa'i chur/ / yongs su chos 'dzin byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing // ye shes rnam par sbyong ba'i sems skye'o// rgyal ba kun dang chos dang dge 'dun dang // de bzhin bla mar
313a3(phal chen): gyur pa thams cad la/ / dad dang mos pa dga' ba bskyed byas te// sri zhur mchod byas byang chub sems kyang skye// rgyal ba bde gshegs chos la yid ches nas// rgyal sras spyod
313a4(phal chen): pa rnams la yid ches te/ / byang chub bla na med la yid ches shing // skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi sems skye'o// dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar skyed pa ste// yon tan thams yongs su skyong
313a5(phal chen): zhing 'dren/ / nem nur rnam sel nang las rab tu sgrol// dad pa bde ba'i grong du phyin par byed// dad pa sems gsal rnyog pa med pa ste// nga rgyal rnam spangs sri zhu'i rtsa ba yin// dang
313a6(phal chen): pa spyod mchog nor dang gter yin te/ / lag pa lta bur dge sdud rtsa ba yin// yongs su gtang la dad pa dga' bar byed// rgyal ba'i chos la dad pa spro ba skyed// yon tan ye shes khyad
313a7(phal chen): par dad pa byed/ / sangs rgyas lam la ston pa'ang rnyed par byed// dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal ba dang // gzhan gyis mi thub dngos la dad pa stobs// nyon mongs thub pa med la
313b1(phal chen): gnas yin te/ / dad pa rang byung yon tan tshol ba yin// dad pa chags pa'i sgo dang mi 'grogs te// mi khom spong zhing 'du 'dzi med par byed// dad pa bdud kyi lam las zlo ba ste// thar
313b2(phal chen): lam dam pa yongs su ston pa yin/ / yon tan rgyu yin sa bon ma rul bzhin// dad pa byang chub shing rab rnam par skyed// ye shes khyad par sgo rnams 'phel bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba
313b3(phal chen): rnams kyi ston pa yin/ / de bas dad mos khyad par dga' ba la// spyod pa rim gyis rnam par rjod par byed// chos tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten rnams na dkon// rin chen seng ge'i rgyal
313b4(phal chen): po ji bzhin no/ / dad pas sangs rgyas sr-i zhu gang byed pa// de dag tshul khrims slob pa mi gtong ngo // tshul khrims slob pa gang rnams mi gtong ba// de dag yon tan gnas pas yon
313b5(phal chen): tan ldan/ / tshul khrims byang chub shes rab ston pa ste// bslab pas sa yi yon tan legs la brtson// tshul khrims bslab pa yongs su ma btang na// rgyal ba rnams kyis
313b6(phal chen): bstod cing bsngags par 'os/ / dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i mchod pa yangs pa byed// rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa su byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas /
313b7(phal chen): mos pa bsam mi khyab// dad pas chos la phud dud gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms nyan// rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms su nyan pa// de dag bsam gyis
314a1(phal chen): mi khyab chos la mos/ / dad pas dge 'dun phud dung su byed pa// de dag mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la mos/ mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la su mos pa/
314a2(phal chen): de dag dang pa'i stobs kyis phyir mi ldog/ dad pa'i stobs kyis gang rnams mi ldog pa// de dag dbang po rab tu gsal zhing no// gang rnams dbang po rab tu gsal rno ba// des ni sdig
314a3(phal chen): pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs/ / gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa// de dag chos kyi bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin// chos kyi bshes gnyen gang gis yongs bzung ba//
314a4(phal chen): de dag dge ba rgya chen yongs su sogs// dge ba rgya chen yongs su gang sogs pa// bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyu mthu ldan// bdag nyid che ba rgyu mthu gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par
314a5(phal chen): yangs pa 'thob/ / mos pa yangs pa'i khyad par sus thob pa// de dag rtag tu rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs// rgyal ba'i byin gyis gang rnams brlabs gyur pa// de dag byang chub don du
314a6(phal chen): sems kyang skye/ / byang chub don du gang gis sems skyes pa// de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson// drang srong chen po'i yon tan su brtson pa// de dag sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan
314a7(phal chen): skyes/ / sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan gang skyes pa// de dag 'du dang 'bral ba rnam par spangs// 'du dang 'bral ba gang gis rnam spangs pa// de dag bsam pa dang zhi rnam par dag/
314b1(phal chen): gang gi bsam pa dang zhing rnam dag pa// de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i mchog/ lhag bsam dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa// de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin pa spyod// pha rol phyin la rtag tu
314b2(phal chen): su spyod pa/ / de dag theg pa chen po 'di la spyod// theg pa chen po 'di la su spyod pa// de dag nan tan dam pa sangs rgyas mchod// nan tan dam pa sangs rgyas su mchod pa// de dag sangs
314b3(phal chen): rgyas rjes dran phyed pa med/ / sangs rgyas rjes dran gang la mi phyed pa// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong // rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas sus mthong ba// de dag rtag tu
314b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas mi 'grogs min/ / rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'grogs su ma yin// de la chos nub 'gyur ba nam yang med// gang la chos nub 'gyur ba med gyur pa// de dag spobs pa bsgrib pa
314b5(phal chen): med dang ldan/ / spobs pa bsgribs pa med dang su ldan pa// de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yang yas// gang gis chos rab bstan pa mtha' yas pa// de dag 'gro la byams pas
314b6(phal chen): phan pa tshol/ / 'gro la byams pas phan pa su tshol ba// de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba bsten// snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba su bsten pa// de dag chos kyi dga' bas dbang po gang dga' ba//
314b7(phal chen): de dag 'du byed nyes la btang snyoms so// 'du byed nyes pa gang gis btang snyoms pa// de dag nga rgyal rlom sems bag med spangs// nga rgyal rlom sems bag med sus spangs pa//
315a1(phal chen): de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson// bdag dang gzhan don rtag tu su brtson pa// de dag 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med// gang la 'khor bas yongs su
315a2(phal chen): skyo med pa/ / de dag brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang ldan// brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa// de dag mngon shes rnam dag mngon par skyes// gang gi mngon shes rnam dag
315a3(phal chen): mngon skyes pa/ / de dag spyod pa mchog gi dra bar zhugs// spyod mchog dra bar gang rnams zhugs gyur pa// de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin par mkhas// 'gro ba yongs su smin par gang
315a4(phal chen): mkhas pa/ / de dag 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la mkhas// 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la su mkhas pa// de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson// bsdu dngos bzhi la gang rnams brtson gyur
315a5(phal chen): pa/ / de dag 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas byed// 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas su byed pa// de dag shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog ldan// shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog su
315a6(phal chen): ldan pa/ / dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas// bla med lam la dpa' bo gang gnas pa// de dag bdud kyi dpung gis thub pa min// gang rnams bdud kyi dpung gis thub min pa/
315a7(phal chen): de dag bdud lam bzhi las yongs su 'das// bdud lam bzhi las yongs su su 'das pa// de dag phyir mi ldog gi sar yang phyin// mi ldog sar ni gang gis phyin gyur pa// de
315b1(phal chen): dag mi skye'i bzod pa thob pa yin/ / mi skye'i bzod pa gang gis thob gyur pa// 'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung yang bstan// 'jig rten sgron ma rgyal bas lung bstan pa// de dag rgyal ba
315b2(phal chen): kun dang mngon du gnas/ / rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas pa// de dag rgyal ba'i 'phrul pa gsang la mkhas// rgyal ba'i 'phrul pa gsang la su mkhas pa// de dag rgyal ba kun gyis
315b3(phal chen): dgongs pa yin/ / gang rnams rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis brgyan// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis su brgyan pa// de dag bsod/
315b4(phal chen): nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs// bsod nams dam pas gang gi lus sbyangs pa// de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar// gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba// de dag
315b5(phal chen): mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan/ / mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang su ldan pa// de dag dpe byad bzang pos lus kyang bris// dpe byad bzang pos gang gi lus bris pa// de dag
315b6(phal chen): lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas so/ / gang gi lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas pa// de dag 'od zer rgyan kyang bsam mi khyab// gang la 'od zer bsam yas rgyan yod pa// de dag 'od
315b7(phal chen): las pad+mo mang po 'byung / / gang gi 'od las pad+mo mang 'byung ba// de dag rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang // don yod rnam par spyod
316a1(phal chen): cing sems can 'dul/ / gang rnams rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// ston cing de dag phyogs bcu kun tu yang // don yod rnam spyod sems can 'dul byed
316a2(phal chen): pa/ / de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// gang gi mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // sems can bsam gyis mi
316a3(phal chen): khyab dgar byed pas/ / bsam gyis mi khyab zhing na rnam par spyod// gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zhing ston cing // bsam yas sems can dga' bar su byed pa// de dag bsam
316a4(phal chen): pa ji bzhin 'jig rten na/ / tha dad yang dag shes mthus sems can 'dul// tha dad yang dag shes pa'i ye shes mthus// bsam pa ji bzhin sems can su 'dul ba// de dag
316a5(phal chen): lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su/ / ye shes sngon du 'gro bar shin tu 'byung // gang gi lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su// ye shes sngon du 'gro bar rab tu 'byung // de dag smon lam
316a6(phal chen): stobs kyis ci dga' bar/ / sems can rgyud du gzugs mang yongs su ston// smon lam stobs kyis gang rnams ci dga' bar// sems can rgyud du gzugs mang ston byed la//
316a7(phal chen): de dag tshig tu brjod cing smra ba yang // sgra la dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam mi khyab// tshig tu brjod cing ci dang ci smra yang // gang gi sgra dbyangs yan lag bsam yas pa// de dag
316b1(phal chen): 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi/ / bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam par shes// gang gis ma lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi// bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam shes pa//
316b2(phal chen): de dag skye dang shi 'pho nam yang med// nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang de bzhin skye ba med// skye dang shi 'pho gang la med gyur cing // nyon mongs rgyud kyang de bzhin skye med pa// de dag yon tan chos nyid
316b3(phal chen): ye shes lus/ / chos kyis spros par 'jig rten kun tu spyod// yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus ldan zhing // chos kyis spros par 'jig rten su spyod pa// de dgas bcu rnams dang dbang bcu
316b4(phal chen): yi/ / pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar la spyod// gang rnams sa bcu dbang rnams bcu po yi// pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar spyod pa// de dag mngon shes rgyan gyis rnam par
316b5(phal chen): 'phrul/ / ting 'dzin dam pas rnam par spyod pa thob// mngon par shes pa'i rgyan gyis rnam 'phrul zhing // ting 'dzin mchog gis rnam spyod sus thob pa// de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal
316b6(phal chen): thams cad las/ / dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su nod// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad nod byed pa/
316b7(phal chen): de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang yang bskur// gang gis spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud
317a1(phal chen): rtsis mngon par dbang bskur ba/ / de dag ma lus nam mkha' rgyas byas shing // phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas pa byed// gang rnams nam mkha' ma lus rgya bkang
317a2(phal chen): zhing / / phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas byed pa// dpe med de dag spyod yul shes par ni// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas mi nus so// dpe med gang gi spyod yul shes bya bar//
317a3(phal chen): 'dzin rten lha dang bcas pas mi nus pa// de dag brtson 'grus thams cad don kyang yod// mthong dang mi thos spobs pa'ang don yod do// gang rnams brtson 'grus thams cad don yod
317a4(phal chen): cing / / mthong dang ming thos spobs pa don yod pa// skyes chen de dag sbyin bdag gtong ba yin// sbyin pa'i gnas te thams cad don kyang yod// skyes bu dam pa de dag byin mthu yis//
317a5(phal chen): dam chos tshul ni mi jig brten par gnas// dge ba'i las lam dam pa mchog rnams kyang // rin chen 'dra mthus kun na rgyu zhing gnas// rdo rje stug po'i rin chen tshogs yod pas//
317a6(phal chen): de yi mthu yis rgya mtsho rin chen rnams// mi zad 'phel zhing 'gribs pa gang yang med// de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yon tan mtsho// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing rnams gang
317a7(phal chen): yod pa/ / de dag kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston// phyogs rnams gang na dam chos med gyur pa// de dag kun tu'ang chos kyi gter ston to// de dag mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste//
317b1(phal chen): lhun gyis grub par phyogs rnams thams cad du// zla ba lta bur gzugs brnyan ston byed cing // thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag skad cig re rer byang chub tu/
317b2(phal chen): rnam par sangs rgyas phyogs bcu kun tu ston// 'khor lo skor dang mya ngan 'das zhi dang // sku gdung rgya chen de bzhin dpa' bo ston// mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyal sa// sangs rgyas
317b3(phal chen): rnam 'phrul rgyan rnams mtha' yas pa/ / yongs su ston cing bskal pa bsam yas su// theg pa gsum gyi sgo nas sems can 'dul// khye'u dang bu mo de bzhin bud med lus// skyes pa
317b4(phal chen): lha dang lha min klu rnams dang / / gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs// mos pa thams cad tshul mkhas yongs su ston// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rgya yi sgo dag nas// 'gro ba'i
317b5(phal chen): gzugs mang rgyud ni ji snyed dang / / cha byad spyod pa sgra dbyangs tshul gyi rnams// thams cad ma lus dpa' bo ston pa byed// de dag zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste// phyogs bcu'i rgyal
317b6(phal chen): ba thams cad mchod pa byed/ / de dag 'od zer mang po bsam mi khyab// sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes mtha' yang yas// tshig gi rnam 'phrul ye shes rnam 'phrul dang // lus
317b7(phal chen): kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ / sbyin pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa dang // bzod pa brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag bsam gtan shes rab rnam 'phrul
318a1(phal chen): dang / / thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas tshogs kyi ting 'dzin sgo dag nas// yon tan kun gyi rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas/
318a2(phal chen): de dag rdul phran 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin rnams// rdul phran kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // rdul phran rtse gcig bsam yas zhing gi rnams// ston pa byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med/
318a3(phal chen): rdul gcig rtse la'ang sangs rgyas bzhugs zhing dang // sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing yang de bzhin ston// kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag dog pa dang // yangs shing phra dang che
318a4(phal chen): ba'i zhing yang ston/ / zhing rnams la la 'jig cing 'du ba dang // la la spyi'u tshugs rim gyis gnas par ston// la la snrel zhi smig rgyu lta bu ste// de bzhin gzhan rnams
318a5(phal chen): mig 'phrul lta bur ston/ / de dag rdul gcig rtser ston ji bzhin du// ma lus rdul rnams kun la de bzhin to// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// mtha' yas
318a6(phal chen): grags pa'i rnam thar de 'dra'o/ / rgyal ba mchod pa'i rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin// rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed kyang // lag pa'i mthil gyis stong gsum rgyas
318a7(phal chen): bkang zhing / / skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed// phyogs bcu kun na me tog 'phreng ba dang // spos dang byug pa rin chen rin che ba// de dag byang chub shing drung bzhug
318b1(phal chen): pa yi/ / rgyal ba mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'gyed// na bza' phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang // rgyal mtshan pa dan gdugs dam sna tshogs dang // gser gyi rgyan dang rin chen tha
318b2(phal chen): re dag/ lag mthil de nas char du mngon par 'bebs// phyogs rnams mtha' yas kun gyi yo byad rnams// drang srong che la mchod par gang 'os pa// de dag lag mthil de nas char du 'bebs//
318b3(phal chen): byang chub shing drung rgyal ba mchod pa byed// rol mo'i rnam pa phyogs na ji snyed pa// rnga chen rnga dang pi wang sgra snyan dang // rol mo brdung dkrol gling bu sgra rab rnams// de dag lag mthil de nas
318b4(phal chen): sgra yang sgrog/ phyogs bcu'i dpe med ji snyed bzhugs pa yi// bde gshegs yon tan legs pa sna tshogs dang // bstod pa'i tshigs bcad bsgrubs pa sna tshogs kyang // lag
318b5(phal chen): mthil de nas sgra rab snyan par 'byung / / de dag 'od zer las dges yongs bsags pa// lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed byed cing // rgyal ba'i zhing rnams spos chus ma lus par//
318b6(phal chen): kun tu btab cing 'jig rten sgron ma mchod// 'od zer yid 'ong snang zhing brgyan ldan pa// lag pa'i mthil bkye pad+mo bsam mi khyab// pad+mo rgyan 'phyang mtshan sdug du ma'i gzugs//
318b7(phal chen): mang po bkye zhing rgyal ba mchod pa byed// 'od zer me tog rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // me tog rgyan dang me tog bla re dang // me tog sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che
319a1(phal chen): pa de dag rgyal ba mchod/ / 'od zer spos kyi rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // spos kyi rgyan dang spos kyi bla re dang // sna tshogs spos kyis kun tu yongs bkang zhing /
319a2(phal chen): bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer phye ma'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // phye ma'i rgyan dang phye ma'i bla re dang // phye ma sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag
319a3(phal chen): rgyal ba mchod/ / 'od zer na bza'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // na bza'i rgyan dang na bza'i bla re dang // na bza' sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod//
319a4(phal chen): 'od zer rin chen rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // rin chen rgyan dang rin chen bla re dang // rin chen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer
319a5(phal chen): pad+mo rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / / pad+mo'i rgyan dang pad+mo'i bla re dang // pad+mo sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer 'phreng ba'i rgyan
319a6(phal chen): rnams rab bkye zhing / / 'phreng ba'i rgyan dang 'phreng ba'i bla re dang // 'phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer rgyal mtshan
319a7(phal chen): mchog rgyan rab bkye zhing / / de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang // sngo dang sna tshogs rnam mang rgyan can gyis// rgyal ba'i zhing rnams kun nas rgyan pa byed// de dag bde
319b1(phal chen): gshegs dbu la gdugs kyi mchog/ rin chen dra ba sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa// dar gyi lda ldi pa dan yongs sbyangs shing // dril 'phreng rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog 'dzin pa byed// lag
319b2(phal chen): pa'i mthil nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ / mchod pa rgyal ba gcig la byed pa ltar// ma lus rgyal ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag 'gro
319b3(phal chen): ba yongs sdud ye shes kyis/ / rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin mngon bsgrubs shing // bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du// thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed// la
319b4(phal chen): la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang / / sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gting ban sgo// sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun gyi tshul khrims s+ho// bzod pa mi zad mi bskum sgo dag dang / 2
319b5(phal chen): brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson 'grus sgo/ / bsam gtan rab tu zhir gnas sgo dag dang // don rnams rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab sgo// tshul rnams kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang //
319b6(phal chen): tshangs pa'i spyod pa dag dang mngon shes sgo// bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan tshol sgo dag dang // bsod nams yongs su bsags dang ye shes sgo// bden pa rten pa'i rnam thar sgo dag dang //
319b7(phal chen): la la stobs dang dbang po lam gyi sgo// nyan thos theg pa rnam grol sgo dag dang // rang rgyal theg pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo// theg pa dam pa rnam 'phrul sgo dag dang // la la mi rtag pa dang
320a1(phal chen): sdug bsngal s+ho/ / la la bdag med srog med sgo drug dang // maM sdug 'du shes 'dod chags sprul pa'i'o// la la ni 'gog ting 'dzin sgo dkAn+tu/ 'gro ba /
320a2(phal chen): sgo ji snyed yod rgyu ba// de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te// de dag kun gyi sgo yi sgo dag nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang rnams kun gyi sgo yi sgo dag nas//
320a3(phal chen): bsam pa ji bzhin sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mtshan ma gzung bar mi nus te// ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul tshul ni de 'dra'o// de dag dga' ba'i rgyan gyi ting 'dzin mchog/ 'gro ba
320a4(phal chen): thams cad yongs smin byed 'thun pa/ / dga' ba de spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas// bsam gyis mi khyab yongs ston sems can 'dul// gang tshe lo nyes thams cad dkon gyur pa/
320a5(phal chen): de tshe 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad rnams// thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir// sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing 'gro don byed// de dag zas mchog skom dpo mchog dang // gos
320a6(phal chen): dang dgab pa rin chen sna tshogs dang / / rgyal srid nor dang bdag sdug yongs btang bas// sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba byed// de dag mtshan rab kun gyis lus brgyan cing //
320a7(phal chen): gos dang rgyan mchog yongs su bgos btags te// 'phreng bas rnam brgyan spos kyis bsku byas pa'i// gzugs rnams yongs su bstan pas sems can 'dul// mthong bas
320b1(phal chen): dga' bde rab tu mos pa la/ / de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang cha byad mdzes// gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing // gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul
320b2(phal chen): pa byed/ / de dag ka la bing ka'i sgra snyan dang // ko ki la kun ngang pa'i sgra dbyangs dang // rnga dang tshangs pa mi 'am ci yi sgras// mos pa thams cad tshul bzhin chos kyang ston//
320b3(phal chen): de dag stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po// gang gis rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul//
320b4(phal chen): de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed// don dang don med grogs kyang de bzhin te// sems can dgos la grogs su 'gyur byas shing // grogs kyi sgo nas sems can
320b5(phal chen): rnam par 'dul/ / sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams// grogs kyi don du de dag bzod par byed// 'gro ba kun la phan don bde don du// de dag grogs don mi
320b6(phal chen): bde nyams su len/ / gang na 'byung ba med cing chos med de// dgon pa'i yon tan thar pa mi dmigs pa// de dag kun tu rgyal srid che spangs shing // zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas
320b7(phal chen): med mngon par 'byung / / de dag khyim gyi btson ra sred gnas pa'i// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par// mngon par byung
321a1(phal chen): zhing thar pa yongs su brjod/ / de dag spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing // skyes chen rnams kyi chos la de dag spyod// drang srong spyod pa thams cad ma lus par/
321a2(phal chen): yongs su sgom zhing 'gro ba 'ad kyang byed// gang na sems can tshad med che ldan pa// bde ba phun ldan nyon mongs chung yod pa// de dag kun tu nang gzer nad bu can// bdag la dbang
321a3(phal chen): med tsam gyi dbang sgyur ston/ / 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang 'bar gyur te// gti mug rgyu las 'jig rten mer 'bar zhing // rga shi nad kyis rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i// 'jig
321a4(phal chen): rten bstan cing sems can 'dul ba byed/ / de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi// chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang // sangs rgyas bdag nyid che ba
321a5(phal chen): rjod byed cing / / sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyi 'gro don byed// de dag yongs ston rdzu 'phrul rjed ston gyis// gzugs rnams byin rlob mthu yis mthu che ba// de bzhin gshegs
321a6(phal chen): ba'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing / / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul// de dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyi// 'gro ba'i don du 'jig rten rim gror byed// 'jig
321a7(phal chen): rten mi chags chu la pad+mo bzhin/ / dga' ba mos pa skye bar rnam par spyod// de dag rjod byed brjod pa'i rgyal po byed// gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan// mdzes shing sdug
321b1(phal chen): pa bzhan gang byed pa dang / / sbyar mkhan gzugs mang kun tu ston pa byed// grong pa grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba dang // ded dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag de bzhin te// rgyal po blon po mda' rab po
321b2(phal chen): nya dang / / sman pa mi 'jigs gtsug lag mkhas pa byed// de dag nags tshal sdong po chen por 'gyur// sman dang rin chen mi zad gter dag dang // yid bzhin nor bu 'dod pa 'byin shing dang //
321b3(phal chen): lam gol 'khyams la de bzhin lam ston 'gyur// 'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing // sems can las kyi tshul la mi shes pa// de dag kun la rmos thabs tshong thabs dang //
321b4(phal chen): sna tshogs bzo rnams kun kyang rjod pa byed// 'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams// sems can bde skyed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa// rig mthu sman dang gtsug lag sna tshogs
321b5(phal chen): rnams/ / kun kyang drang srong de dag rnam par brjod// drang srong rnams kyi spyod pa dam pa'i mchog/ gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten dang 'gyur dang // brtul zhugs dka' spyod dka' thub
321b6(phal chen): mchog gi rnams/ / kun kyang mkhas pa de dag ston pa byed// de dag rgyu dang kun rgyu mu stegs can// dka' thub spyod yul mi smrar spyod pa dang // sgren mo gos med ri yi dge sbyong la//
321b7(phal chen): mu stegs can gyi mkhan po mkhas pa byed// de dag yongs 'tsho chos la spyod pa dang // bla na yod dang bla na med pa'i rnams// ral pa ring dang byis pa'i brtul zhugs can// de dag tu
322a1(phal chen): yang de dag mkhan por 'gyur/ / nyi ma'i rjes 'brang dka' thub lnga ldan dang // khyi dang ba grang brtul zhugs ri dgas spyod// rje rnga can mu stegs bcu gsum spyod par
322a2(phal chen): narnams/ / de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// lha rnams ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang // mu stegs khrus byed yul du rgyu ba dang // rtsa ba 'bras bu chul spyod pa'i rnams//
322a3(phal chen): chos sems nang na de dag dam par 'gyur// gnas bteg gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang // tsher ma rtswa dang thal ba'i mal can dang // dbyig pa'i mal can gcig pu spyod pa'i rnams//
322a4(phal chen): de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa// de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing // bsgrub dka' mi bzad drag shul dka' thub kyi//
322a5(phal chen): mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bas 'dul// 'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas// lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can// kun la phra ba'i tshig dang thabs
322a6(phal chen): tshul gyis/ / bden pa ston pa de dag kun tu byed// la lar dra byi la yi sngags tshig tu// shin tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bden pa ston// la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis//
322a7(phal chen): la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig gis// la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang // don nges rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang // rgol ba 'dul ba'i ye shes tshig rnams dang // bstan pa
322b1(phal chen): thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ / la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang // kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams dang // la la dag la lha yi tshig rnams dang // klu yi tshig
322b2(phal chen): gnod sbyin tshig rnams dang / / la la dag la srin po 'byung po dang // dri za grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i tshig/ mi ci lha min nam mkha' lding tshig gis// bden pa bstan cing thar par
322b3(phal chen): 'dren par byed/ / de dag bden pa'i nges tshig tshul shes bzhin// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston// de dag ting
322b4(phal chen): 'dzin rnams 'phrul de 'dra'o/ / de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin// 'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste// 'od zer
322b5(phal chen): bkye nas sems can de dag 'dul/ / 'od zer mthong na legs pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa// de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te// bla na
322b6(phal chen): med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu/ / sangs rgyas bstan te chos rnams yongs bstan nas// dge 'dun bstan nas mi rnams lam bstan te// rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten
322b7(phal chen): bstan pas na/ / des ni mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer grub// lha yi 'od zer zil gyi gnon pa yi// 'od zer 'od byed rab tu bkye byas shing // mun pa kun dang rdul rnam kun bsal
323a1(phal chen): te/ / 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang // 'od des sems can ji snyed yongs bskul ba// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar 'dzin// rgyal ba mchod phyir
323a2(phal chen): me mar bzung byas pas/ / 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'bru mar me mar mar gyi me mar dang // shing dang rtsa dang smyig ma spa yi sgron// spos dang ro mchog rin
323a3(phal chen): chen sgron ma dag/ rgyal ba rnams gsol 'od byed de thob bo// 'od zer sgrol zhes bya ba rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// de dag sred pa rnam yangs srid pa'i
323a4(phal chen): mtshor/ / sems can bsgral don go cha brtan pa gyon// gang rnams sred pa rnam yangs srid pa'i mtshor// sems can bsgral phyir go cha brtan gyon pa// de dag chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba byed//
323a5(phal chen): mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong yang ston// stegs dang zam pa gcig min byas pa dang // chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru byin te// 'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags pas na// des ni sgrol ba'i 'od zer
323a6(phal chen): de grub bo/ / 'od zer skom pa sel ba rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs shing // chos kyi rnam grol ro la don du gnyer// 'dod
323a7(phal chen): pa'i yon tan sgom pa rab spangs te/ / chos kyis grol ba'i ro la don gnyer bas// sangs rgyas bdud rtsi char pa 'bebs par 'gyur// 'jig rten sred pa'i skom pa rnam par sel// rdzing dang
323b1(phal chen): chuklung khron pa lu ma dang / / mtsho rnam byang chub don du byed btsud de// 'dod pa rnam smad bsam gtan bsngags pas na// skom pa rnam sel de ni de sgrub bo// 'od zer dga' bar byed pa rab
323b2(phal chen): bkye zhing / / sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// dga' bas rgyal shing byang chub mchog don du// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyod do// thugs rje mnga' ba rnams kyi sku
323b3(phal chen): gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/ / pad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs pa byas bsgrubs shing // rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan brjod pas na// dga' ba byed pa'i 'od ni des sgrub bo// 'od zer mos par byed
323b4(phal chen): pa rab bkye zhing / / sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// de dag thams cad sangs rgyas mos pas dga'// chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos pas dga'// de dag rtag tu sangs
323b5(phal chen): rgyas mos dga' ste/ / chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos dga' bas// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun dang // rtag tu 'grogs 'thob bzod pa bla med 'thob// sangs rgyas
323b6(phal chen): rjes dren chos dang tshogs mchog la/ / sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas te// byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pas na// des ni 'od zer mos par byed pa grub// 'od zer
323b7(phal chen): bsod nams bsags pa rab bkye zhing / / sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing // sbyin pa sna tshogs dum yongs su gtong // de dag
324a1(phal chen): mchod sbyin lhug pa byed pa'i tshe/ / slong mo pa yi bsam pa rdzogs byas te// bsam pa kun tshul sbyin pa byin pas na// des ni 'od zer bsod nams bsags
324a2(phal chen): grub bo/ / 'od zer ye shes ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// chos gcig sgo nas chos gcig min pa yi// chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis rjes
324a3(phal chen): su shes/ / chos kyi bye brag sems can 'dzin btsud de// nges rtogs don gyi ye shes rnam phye zhing // chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas na// des ni ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer
324a4(phal chen): grub/ / 'od zer shes rab sgron ma rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung ba'i// rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug
324a5(phal chen): dngos po med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa// sprin dang smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba'i dngos// rmi lam lta bu gzugs brnyan rang bzhin rnams//
324a6(phal chen): bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo// 'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// mi zad gzungs kyi mdzod rnams rab thob cing
324a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin/ / chos 'chang rnams la yongs su phan btags te// drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrung byas shing // 'gro ba kun la chos bzhin
324b1(phal chen): ban btags pas/ / 'od zer chos kyi rnam 'phrul de grub bo// 'od zer gtong dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can 'jugs pa ji snyed de bskul ba// skyid pa mi brtan mi rtag
324b2(phal chen): shes gyur nas/ / de dag rtag tu sbyin mos dga' bar 'gyur// 'jungs pa 'dul dka'i sems can ma dul dang // nor rnams rmi lam sprin tshul shes gyur nas// dga' ba'i yid kyis
324b3(phal chen): sbyin pa rnam spel bas/ / gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo// 'od zer yongs su gdung med rab bkye zhing // tshul ngan sems can ji snyed des bskul ba// tshul khrims
324b4(phal chen): rnam dag rab tu gnas gyur te/ / rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems skyed do// dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang // tshul khrims bzang la sems can mang bskul cing //
324b5(phal chen): byang chub sems la yang dag bskul byas pas// yongs su gdung med 'od zer de grub bo// bzod pas rnam brgyan 'od zer rab bkye zhing // mi bzod sems can ji snyed des bsku
324b6(phal chen): ba/ / khro ba'i tha ba nga rgyal yongs spangs shing // de dag bzod mos rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// sdig sems ldan la nyes pa bzod byas te// byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas
324b7(phal chen): shing / / bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu brjod byas pas// des ni bzod pas rnam brgyan de grub bo// 'od zer brtson dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // le lo'i sems can ji snyed nges
325a1(phal chen): bskul ba/ / rigs par brtson nang dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba rgya ma mchod pa byed par 'gyur// rigs par btsun pas dkon mchog
325a2(phal chen): gsum rnams la/ / sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las yongs 'das te// myur du byang chub bla med rab tu thob// sems can mang ba
325a3(phal chen): brtson 'grus bskul byas te/ / dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas// tha ma'i dus su dam chos yongs bzung bas// des ni brtson ldan 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer
325a4(phal chen): zhi bar byed pa rab bkye zhing / / rnam 'khrugs sems can ji snyed des bskul ba// de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// nyams su mi gnod mnyam bzhag sems su
325a5(phal chen): 'gyur/ / sdig to'i grogs po nyes ldan spyod can dang // 'du 'dzi yongs su rnam par spang byas te// bsam gtan zhi ba'i dgon pa rab bsngags pas// des ni zhi byed 'ong
325a6(phal chen): zer de grub bo/ / 'od zer shes rab rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // shes rab 'chal pa ji snyed nges bskul ba// bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs
325a7(phal chen): par shes par 'gyur/ / bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po rgyus la rtogs par shes gyur cing // nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas// shes rab 'a
