325b1(phal chen): gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ / rgyal srid nor dang bdag 'phangs yongs btang ste// byang chub don du chos rnams gang btsal ba// de dag rim gror rab tu brjod byas pas// shre
325b2(phal chen): rab rnam brgyan 'od zer des grub bo/ / 'od zer sangs rgyas ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab shin tu pang ba'i
325b3(phal chen): rnams/ / pad+mo mchog la bzhugs par rab tu mthong // sangs rgyas bdag nyid che dang rnam thar dang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas yongs bstan te// sangs rgyas stobs
325b4(phal chen): dang rdzu 'phrul brjod byas pas/ / sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo// 'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa rab bkye zhing // 'jigs mnar sems can ji snyed des phog pa//
325b5(phal chen): 'byung po gza' dang gsad cing brdeg pa dang // nad kyi 'jigs pa kun las rab tu 'grol// mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can bskyab pa dang // srog gcod las las sems
325b6(phal chen): rgyud phyir bzlog cing / / 'jigs pas skyabs tshol rnams la bskyab byas pas// 'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa des grub bo// 'od zer thams cad bde ba rab bkye zhing // nad pa
325b7(phal chen): na ba ji snyed des reg pa/ / thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par 'grol// bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob// nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang // rin chen
326a1(phal chen): ro mchog spos dang byug pa dang / / bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang // 'bru mar zas skom byin pas de grub bo// 'od zer sangs rgyas ston pa rab bkye zhing /
326a2(phal chen): tshe zad mthar ni ji snyed des bskul ba// sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'gro// 'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran
326a3(phal chen): byas te/ / dgar 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing // 'chi kar sangs rgyas skyabs su btang byas pas// sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer des thob bo// 'od zer chos
326a4(phal chen): rab brjod pa rab bkye zhing / / sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// chos nyan rjod cing de bzhin 'dri ba byed// chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// chos kyi mu ge'i
326a5(phal chen): dus su chos brjod de/ / chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing // mos pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis shig/ brjod pas chos rab rjod pa de thob bo// sangs rgyas sras
326a6(phal chen): rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir/ / 'od zer dbyangs dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // khams gsum sgra rgyud ji snyed yod pa dag/ kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos//
326a7(phal chen): gsal ba'i dbyangs spar drang srong che bstod de// rol mo sgra chen dril gyi sbyin pa rnams// 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba'i gsung don du// yongs su btang bas 'od zer dbyangs ldan thob// 'od
326b1(phal chen): zer 'chi med sbyin pa rab bkye zhing / / sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// bag med spyod pa thams cad rnam spangs te// yon tan kun la rnal 'byor nyams su len// 'dus
326b2(phal chen): byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste/ / sdug bsngal 'tshe ba mang pos yongs su gang // 'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi dga' zhes// brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob bo// 'od zer khyad par
326b3(phal chen): ldan pa rab bkye zhing / / sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul pa// tshul khrims khyad par ting 'dzin khyad par dang // shes rab khyad par rgyal po rnams la nyan// tshul khrims 'bas
326b4(phal chen): pa ting 'dzin 'phags pa ste/ / shes rab 'phags pa thub pa'i rgyal chen zhes// byang chub don du bsngags shing bstod byas pas// des ni 'od zer khyad par ldan pa thob//
326b5(phal chen): 'od zer rin chen rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// rin chen gter mang mi zad thob gyur te// drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod// rgyal
326b6(phal chen): ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ / rin chen phul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs la// rin chen bsdud de rin chen sbyin btang bas// rin chen rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer grub// 'od zer
326b7(phal chen): spos mchog snang ba rab bkye zhing / / sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// mi la med pa'i spos dri tshor gyur nas// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur// mi
327a1(phal chen): dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/ / mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te// spos kyis rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten dag/ byas pas 'od zer spos mchog
327a2(phal chen): snang ba grub/ / 'od zer sna tshogs rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs mchog/ rol mo sgra snyan spos dang bdug spos kyis// pho brang dam pa
327a3(phal chen): yongs brgyan me tog 'gengs/ / sngan chad rgyal ba rol mos bsu byas te// me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan mchog dag gis// mchod
327a4(phal chen): pa byas pas sna tshogs rgyan 'grub bo/ / 'od zer shin tu dang byed rab bkye zhing // sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed// mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyang
327a5(phal chen): byas pas/ / des ni 'od zer shin tu dang byed grub// 'od zer chen po'i sprin ldan rab bkye zhing // spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun nas gnas// mchod rten gam yo spos chus
327a6(phal chen): yongs btab pas/ / 'od zer sprin dang ldan pa rab tu thob// 'od zer lhab lhub rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // gos med gos yod rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur// gos dang bgo ba 'phreng ba sna tshog
327a7(phal chen): dag/ yongs su btang bas lhab lhub rnam brgyan grub// 'od zer bro mchog ldan pa rab bkye zhing // bkres pa kha zas bro mchog thob par 'gyur// zas dang skom dang bro mchog sna tshogs
327b1(phal chen): rnams/ / byin pas bro mchog ldan pa'i 'od kyang thob// 'od zer nor ston rab tu dgye byas shing // 'phongs pa rin chen gter rnams thob pa 'gyur// gnas dang gter rnams mi zad dkon mchog
327b2(phal chen): gsum/ / gsol bas non ston 'od zer de thob bo// 'od zer mig sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // long ba de tshe sna tshogs gzugs mthong 'gyur// rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod sten la/
327b3(phal chen): mar me gsol bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub// rna ba rnam sbyong 'od zer rab bkye zhing // rna ba nyams pa sgra mang thos par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod sten la// sil snyan
327b4(phal chen): phul bas rna ba rnam sbyong thob/ / 'od zer sna sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // sngan chad ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur// rgyal ba rnam dang rgyal ba'i mchod stan la// spos zhim gsol bas
327b5(phal chen): sna sbyong 'od zer grub/ / 'od zer lce sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // sgra snyan yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas bstod// mi snyan brlang bar smra ba rnam spangs te// 'jam par smra bas lce sbyong
327b6(phal chen): 'od zer grub/ / 'od zer lus sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod sten la// lus kyis rab btung lus sbyong
327b7(phal chen): 'od zer thob/ / 'od zer sems sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // smyos pa thams cad rang bzhin sems su 'gyur// ting 'dzin rjes su sems 'gro rab byas pas// des ni sems sbyong
328a1(phal chen): 'od zer de grub bo/ / 'od zer gzugs sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // bsam yas sku mnga' mi yi dbang po mthong // sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang /
328a2(phal chen): mchod rten rgyan byas gzugs sbyong thob par 'gyur// 'od zer sgra sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu shes// rkyen las byung bas sgra brnyan 'dra'o zhes// sgra rnams
328a3(phal chen): bstan pas 'od zer de grub bo/ / 'od zer dri sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur// spos mchog rab chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag/ khrus byas byang chub shing
328a4(phal chen): gi 'od de yin/ / 'od zer bro sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la// bro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin//
328a5(phal chen): 'od zer reg sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // reg na mi bde thams cad 'jam bder 'gyur// tri shul mdung dang ral gri mda' yi char// 'phreng ba yid 'ong ut+pal pad+mor 'gyur// gos mang
328a6(phal chen): 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i rnams/ / rgyal ba gshegs pa'i lam du bting bkram ste// me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam pa dang // 'phreng ba bla re gsol ba'i 'od de yin// 'od zer chos
328a7(phal chen): spyong rab tu dgye byas shing / kha spu kun na 'jig rten phan mdzad pa'i// bsam yas chos mang 'byung ba thos par 'gyur// mos pa'i lam tshul bzhin du dga' bar byed// rkyen las
328b1(phal chen): byung bas ma skyes rang bzhin yin/ / rgyal ba'i sku ni chos kyi sku yin te// chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin du rtag gnas shes// brjod pas chos skyong 'od zer de thob bo// 'od zer sgo mo de dag la sos
328b2(phal chen): ba/ / drang srong rnams kyi ba spu sgo gcig nas// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'od zer 'byung // kun kyang tha dad las kyi tshul can no// ji ltar ba spu gcig gi sgo gcig nas// 'od zer gang+gA'i bye snyed
328b3(phal chen): yongs 'byung ba/ / de bzhin ma lus spu rnams thams cad nas// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// yon tan gang gis 'od zer grub gyur pa'i// yon tan de la bstang grogs
328b4(phal chen): sus byas pa/ / de dag 'od zer de dag nyid kyang 'byung // drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag bsod nams bstang grogs byas pa la// rjes su yi rang gsol ba sus
328b5(phal chen): btab dang / / gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa// de dag kun kyang 'od zer de dag shes// gang gis bsod nams byas shing dge bsags te// sangs rgyas yang dang yang
328b6(phal chen): du mchod byas shing / / sangs rgyas yon tan 'dod cing don gnyer ba// de dag kun la 'od zer de dag skul// dmus long rnams kyis nyi ma mi mthong yang // de med ma yin 'jig
328b7(phal chen): rten kun tu 'char/ / mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas// kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug/ de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kyang // byed pa ma yin kun tu
329a1(phal chen): 'phro ba ste/ / de dag mos med log pas mnar ba yin// phal gyis mi mthong blo gros yangs la mod// rgyan dang nor bu bzhon pa gzhal med khang // rin chen m
329a2(phal chen): chog spos dang byug pa'i rnams/ / de dag che bar gyur la yod mod kyi// nyon mongs 'phongs pa rnams la yod pa min// gang gis 'od zer bye brag 'di thos te// dang la yid ches
329a3(phal chen): mos pa skyes gyur na/ / bdag ni yon tan chen po'i rgyal mtshan du// mi 'gyur snyam du nem nur des mi bskyed// de dag 'khor gyi brgyan du rnam 'phrul bar// ting 'dzin dam pa mngon
329a4(phal chen): par sgrub byed cing / / phyogs bcu kun tu dpe zla med pa yi// rgyal sras 'khor rnams yongs su ston pa byed// de dag pad+mo mdzes pa stong gsum tsam// 'od kyis rnam brgyan byin
329a5(phal chen): gyis bairlab byas shing / / lus gcig skyil mo krung gi pad+mo de// yongs su rgyas ston ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul// de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad+mo gzhan// 'khor dang bcas
329a6(phal chen): la byin gyis brlab byas shing / / rgyal sras kun gyis kun nas yongs bskor bar// de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par spyod// drang srong des ni yongs su smin byas te// rgyal
329a7(phal chen): pa'i legs la yongs su gang bsgrubs pa/ / de dag pad+mo chen po'i 'khor byed cing // kun kyang thal mo sbyar te ngor yang lta// skyes bu chen po'i chos nyid de 'dra ste// gang rnams
329b1(phal chen): ting 'dzin rnam spyod zhugs gyur pa/ / kun yang rang rang slob mas bskor 'gyur te// zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba bzhin// de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig 'jug byed cing //
329b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas sras kyi 'khor rnams ston byed pa// de bzhin ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// ston te ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag ting 'dzin rnams rab sngon sgrub
329b3(phal chen): cing / / phyogs kyi dra bar snrel zhing spyod pa byed// la la mnyam bzhag la la rnam langs par// rang rang lus kyang phyogs rnams kun tu ston// de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam
329b4(phal chen): bzhag cing / / dpa' bo de dag nub kyi phyogs nas sdang // nub kyi phyogs su de bzhin mnyam bzhag cing // shar gyi phyogs nas bdag nyid che ba sdang // de bzhin phyogs bcu kun
329b5(phal chen): tu 'jug byed cing / / phyogs rnams gzhan du mnyam par bzhag byas shing // ye shes yon tan mang po gzhan las sdang // drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// shar
329b6(phal chen): phyogs zhing bgrangs ji snyed yod pa'i rnams/ / ma lus de dag kun gyi rang byung gi/ spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la// zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang // der ni
329b7(phal chen): mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas/ / nub kyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo'i rnams// langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na// mchod pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang /
330a1(phal chen): nub kyi zhing bgrangs ji snyed yod pa'i rnams// ma lus de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi// spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la// zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang /
330a2(phal chen): der ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas// shar gyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo'i rnams// langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na// mchod pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang // phyogs
330a3(phal chen): bcu'i zhing du 'jug pa de 'dra ste/ / phyogs rnams kun tu ma lus dpa' bo'i rnams// la la mnyam gzhag la la rnam par langs// 'jig rten sgron ma kun la mchod byed snang // de dag
330a4(phal chen): mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / / bdag nyid che ba gzugs kyi lam las ldang // 'jig rten lhur bcas myos par 'gyur ba yi// bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kyang kun tu ston//
330a5(phal chen): gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa mig gi lam las ldang // mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa ste// de dag rna ba'i
330a6(phal chen): lam la mnyam bzhag cing / / bdag nyid che ba sgra yi lam las ldang // sgra dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan bzhin du shes// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// sgra yi lam la
330a7(phal chen): mnyam par bzhag byas shing / / dran dang ldan pa rna ba'i lam las ldang // rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong par byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag sna yi lam la mnyam bzhag
330b1(phal chen): cing / / bdag nyid che ba dri yi lam las ldang // dri rab mchog la 'jug par rab tu zhugs// 'jig rten lhur bcas de la mos par 'gyur// dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran
330b2(phal chen): dang ldan pa sna yi lam las ldang / / sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag lce yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bro mchog kun gyi lam las ldang
330b3(phal chen): ba byed/ / bdag nyid che ba de dag bro mchog shes// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// bro ba'i mchog la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa lce yi lam las ldang
330b4(phal chen): lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ / stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba reg gi lam las ldang // 'jig rten bde ba bskyed/
330b5(phal chen): pa'i reg la zhugs// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// reg gi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa lus kyi lam las ldang // lus ni ma skyes
330b6(phal chen): ma byung rang bzhin te/ / stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba chos kyi lam las ldang // chos sgrub 'jug par bya la
330b7(phal chen): rab tu zhugs/ / 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// chos kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa sems kyi lam las ldang // sems ni ma skyes ma
331a1(phal chen): byung rang bzhin te/ / stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// byis pa'i lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing // gzhon nu dar la bab pa'i lus su ldang // gzhon nu dang
331a2(phal chen): la bab par mnyam bzhag cing / / rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus su rnam par ldang // rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge bsnyen dang ma'i lus su rnam par ldang pa//
331a3(phal chen): dge bsnyen dang ma'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge bsnyen dad pa'i lus su rnam par ldang // dge sa snyen dad pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge slong ma yi lus su rnam par ldang //
331a4(phal chen): dge slong ma yi lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus su ldang // dge slong mang thos lus su mnyam bzhag cing // slob dang mi slob lus su rnam par ldang //
331a5(phal chen): slob dang mi slob lus su mnyam bzhag cing // rang rgyal lus las de dag rnam par ldang // rang rgyal lus la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // sangs rgyas sku mchog phul du rnam
331a6(phal chen): par ldang / / sangs rgyas sku mchog phul la mnyam bzhag cing // lha yi lus su de dag rnam par ldang // lha yi lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing // 'phrul chen klu yi lus su rnam par nga
331a7(phal chen): 'phrul chen klu yi lus su mnyam bzhag cing / / 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su rnam par ldang // 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su mnyam bzhag cing // 'byung po kun gyi lus su rnam par
331b1(phal chen): ljang / / 'byung po kun gyi lus su mnyam bzhag cing // swa rtse gcig/ gi sgonas rnam par ltung // sU rtse gcig gi sgo la mnyam bcug cing // sU tse kun gyi ston sa rnam par ldang //
331b2(phal chen): kun gyi sgo la mnyam bzhag cing // skra rtse gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang // skra rtse gcig gi sgo ni mnyam bzhag cing // skra rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang // skra rtse kun gyi sgor ni mnyam bzhag
331b3(phal chen): cing / / rdul phran gcig las de dag rnam par ldang // rdul phran gcig la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // rdul phran ma lus kun las rnam par ldang // rdul phran kun la de dag mnyam bzhag
331b4(phal chen): cing / / rgya mtsho'i rdo rje gzhi las rnam par ldang // rgya mtsho'i rdo rje gzhi la mnyam banag cing // rin chen shing gi 'bras las rnam par ldang // rin chen shing gi 'bras la mnyam bzhag cig
331b5(phal chen): rgyal ba'i 'od zer rnams las rnam par ldang / / rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing // rgya mtsho'i chu dang chu klung kun nas ldang // rgya mtsho chu klung kun la mnyam bzhag cing /
331b6(phal chen): bdag nyid che ba me yi lam las ldang // me yi lam la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // dran dang ldan pa rlung gi lam las ldang // rlung gi lam la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // bdag
331b7(phal chen): nyid che ba sa yi gzhi las ldang / / sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // lha yi gzhal med khang nas rnam par ldang // lha yi gzhal med khang du mnyam bzhag cing // dran dang
332a1(phal chen): ldan pa klu yi gnas nas ldang / / yon tan mtha' yas bsags pa de dag gi/ ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas
332a2(phal chen): su/ / bstan pa mdzad kyang zad par mi rung ngo // rgyal ba kun gyis de skad ma gsungs min// 'gro ba'i las kyi rnam smin bsam mi khyab// klu yi rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul
332a3(phal chen): dang / / bsam tan pa yi rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag la yang dpe bstan brjod par bya// de la 'dra ba'i dpe lta yod min te// mkhas shing gsal ba'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis// /
332a4(phal chen): bstan na myur du rnam par don shes 'gyur// sems kyi lam la rnam thar brgyad gnas pa'i// nyan thos gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur// mang por gyur cing de bzhin gcig gyur te//
332a5(phal chen): nam mkha' 'di la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar// 'og nas 'bar yang steng nas chu yi rgyun// steng nas me 'bar 'og nas chu yi rgyun// 'gro 'dug nyal zhing 'greng ba de bzhin te// skad cig
332a6(phal chen): gcig la lus 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ / de ni snying rje chen po ldan pa yin// byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yal bar gzhog/ 'on kyang lus 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ston// 'jig rten
332a7(phal chen): phan tshol ci phyir de mi ston/ / nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dong zhing // phyogs rnams kun gyi mtsho dang lu ma dang // lteng ka khron pa rin chen rgya mtsho snod// chu klung kun tu gzugs brnyan ston
332b1(phal chen): pa byed/ / de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kun kyang // skyes bu dpa' bo de dag phyogs bcur ston// ting 'dzin rnam par kun gyi tshul la mkhas// de la de bzhin gsheg pa rang byung
332b2(phal chen): dpal/ / mtshogasal dang bar yan lag bzhi yi dpung // so sor rang rang gzugs brnyan tshul bzhin mthong // ral gri shang lang sogs ka mde'u thung mda'// bzhon pa theg pa go cha
332b3(phal chen): bcas par mthong / / gang gi gang gzugs cha byad ci 'dra ba// chu gsal de la de bzhin ma nor mthong // chu la zhe sdang byams pa rtog pa med// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o//
332b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra dang ldan yod pa// sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes pa'i rnams// de dag sgra yi yan lag dbyangs tshul shes// sgra skad kun tu rang rang skad du brjod// dbyangs ldan
332b5(phal chen): de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang can/ / 'on kyang sgra kun dbyangs kyi tshul la mkhas// gzugs dang chos kyi stobs dang dbang thob rnams// 'jig rten lhur bcas ci phyir mgur mi byed//
332b6(phal chen): dga' byed chung ma sgra snyan ldan pa mo// tshangs pa'i bu mo sems las byung ba ste// dam tshig bden sgrub mi 'tshe dga' ba yi// sems yid ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa byed// sgra snyan lnga/
332b7(phal chen): pa 'dod chags zhe sdang can// brtul zhugs grub la dbyangs kyi rjes su 'brang // 'jig rten yid 'ong smras kyang tshim par byed// ye shes yon tan mang ba cir mi ston// sngags kyi
333a1(phal chen): tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang / / sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs mang ston pa byed// nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo brgya dang // khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes
333a2(phal chen): ba ston/ / 'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang // sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten dga' bar byed// bsam gtan mngon shes rnam 'phrul rab byang rnams// spyod pa'i tshul mkhas
333a3(phal chen): ci phyir dga' mi byed/ / lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe// lha min lha yang rung ste gang 'pham pa// de dag bzhon pa theg pa gdugs bcas par// go cha gyon bzhin 'jigs pas
333a4(phal chen): kun tu byer/ / lha dbang de dag 'dod chags sdang ldan yang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ston// dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang la gnas pa'i dpa' bo rnams// lus kyi rnam
333a5(phal chen): 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i glang po shugs ldan pa// 'phrul chen glang chen dbang po'i 'khor gyur pa// mgo mang sum cu rtsa gnyis sprul pa byed// mgo rnams kun
333a6(phal chen): la'ang ba che ba drug drug ste/ / so rnams re re kun la'ang rdzing gi rnams// bdun bdun chus rgyas yongs su sprul pa byed// rdzing rnams re re kun tu pad+mo rnams// bdun bdun rgyan
333a7(phal chen): gyis rnam brgyan sprul pa byed/ / pad+mo re re la yang lha yi bu mo dag/ sgyu rtsal kun mkhas bdun bdun sprul pa byed// de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas// sum cu rtsa gsum
333b1(phal chen): dbang po de dang ce/ / glang po de yang klu yi lus btang zhing // lha rnams kun dang mnyam zhing 'dra bar rdzu// spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun dang mthun// glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul ci
333b2(phal chen): 'dra ltos/ / de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na// shes rab thabs kyi stobs la byang 'gyur rnams// ting 'dzin brgyas kyang ci rab
333b3(phal chen): 'phrul mi byed/ / sgra gcan ci dga'i tshul du lus rdzu na// rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa'i mthil bor zhing // rgya mtsho'i zabs ring lte bar phyin tsam byed// ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyom//
333b4(phal chen): de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na// 'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams yongs 'dul ba// rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci rob ston mi byed//
333b5(phal chen): bsam yas brgya byin 'phrul yang ltos shig dang // lha dang lha dbang 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe// lha min bye ba 'phyes pa ji snyed pa// de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus 'phrul byed//
333b6(phal chen): lha min dbang po lha min phal kun gyis// brgya byin rang rang mdun na 'dug par shes// de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung gyur ces// lha min dbang po kun kyang mgo myos so// 'jigs
333b7(phal chen): pa'i gzugs kyi mig stong rab bstan te/ / rdo rje me lce 'bar bar rab gzas shing // lus la go bgos gzi brjid thub dka' ba'i// brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byer
334a1(phal chen): de ni bsod nams phal gyi stobs dang mthus/ / lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi mgon gyur pa'i// bsod nams mi bzang rnam/
334a2(phal chen): ko cir mi 'phrul// lha rnams bskul ba lha rdzas rnga yod pa// lha yi las rnams rnam par smin pas byung // lha rnams bag med spyod par shes gyur nas// mkha' las rnga yi dbyangs
334a3(phal chen): kyang rab tu sgrog/ 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag mi bstan te// 'jig cing mi gnas dbu ba'i rang bzhin 'dra// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu yi zla ba bzhin// srid pa kun kyang rmi lam sprin gyi
334a4(phal chen): dngos/ / bag med thams cad gcugs can mya ngan ldan// tsham gyi lam yin 'chi med lam ma yin// ji snyed bag med rnam par spyod pa'i rnams// bdud kyi chu srin chen pos
334a5(phal chen): zos pa yi/ / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad sdug bsngal rtsa// skye ba thams cad 'phags pa kun gyis smin// 'dod pa'i yon tan mthar zad rang bzhin gyis// chos la
334a6(phal chen): mos pas rtag tu dga' bar gyis/ / brgya byin lhar bcas rnga yis bskul byas nas// kun kyang chos bzang 'dun sar dong phyin te// lha mang kun la chos gtam zhi ba'i rnams//
334a7(phal chen): 'dod chags bral dang rjes su mthun pa brjod// rnga rab de ni gzugs med mi mthong yang // don chen rnga yi sgra ni sgrog byed na// bsam pa'i tshul bzhin gzugs mang ston byed pa/
334b1(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyi don chen cing mi byed// lha dang lha min 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe// g+ha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis// lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas dza yi mchog
334b2(phal chen): rnams 'jigs sa re zhes sgra yang sgrog/ rngas bskul lha rnams yongs su dga' ba skye// 'jig med stobs dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur// lha min dbang po 'jigs shing dngangs gyur/
334b3(phal chen): nas// de ma thag tu 'jigs shing kun tu 'byer// de bzhin rnga 'dra 'chi med stobs pa'i rnams// 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang dpung 'gyur te// bdud dang nyon mongs bcom pa'i snying
334b4(phal chen): rje can/ / zhi ba'i sgra sgrog nyon mongs rab tu sel// dbang po'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te// dbang po sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur// gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin
334b5(phal chen): rtse bar shes/ / gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no// lha mo kun kyang dga' bar gnas snang yang // chos bzang 'dun sa kun na'ang de bzhin 'dug/ lha rnams kun la chos
334b6(phal chen): rab ston par yang / / brgya byin skad cig gcig gis rnam par 'phrul// brgya byin 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na// 'gro don mi
334b7(phal chen): skyo spyod pa ci yi phyir/ / rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten dgar mi byed// bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba// de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dong // las dang
335a1(phal chen): nyon mongs kun tu 'khri zhags kyis/ / so so'i skye bo bdud 'khrug des kyang bcings// de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'gro ba mang po bdud kyi dbang
335a2(phal chen): byed na/ / dbang bcu'i dbang thob gyur pa ci rob ste// 'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi gzhog/ stong gsum bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang // stong gsum kun gyi tshangs pa'i
335a3(phal chen): gnas rnams na/ / ma lus kun tu 'dug par rab tu snang // tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong rnams kyang sgrog/ de ni 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi// bsam gtan mngon par
335a4(phal chen): shes pas rnam par 'phrul/ / 'jig rten yongs 'das bla na med pa yi// bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cir mi 'phrul// dbang phyug chen po'i ye shes rnam 'phrul ltos// rgya/
335a5(phal chen): mtsho'i sprin gyis char rnams rab bkye ba// skad cig gcig gis thams cad bgrang ba byed// thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma lus des shes na// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab tshul
335a6(phal chen): bslabs te/ / sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med thob rnams// ci rob 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi// skad cig gcig la sems bsam shes mi 'gyur// sems can las smin
335a7(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ / rlung las 'jig rten thams cad yongs su byung // rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med dang // sa bon rnams mang kun kyang de las byung // rlung las sprin
335b1(phal chen): 'byung char pa kun tu 'bab/ / sprin mang zhi bar 'gyur ba'ang rlung gis 'gyur// lo tog rnam par 'phel ba'ang rlung gis te// 'jig rten kun la rlung ni bde ba skyed// de ni pha rol phyin la
335b2(phal chen): ma bslabs te/ / sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gis bslabs min na'ang // 'jig rten rnam grub bsam yas ston byed na// rang nyam thob pa ci rob ston mi byed// rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra smin
335b3(phal chen): gyi chu tshogs ni/ / bya skad rnams dang ji snyed ri dgas skad// khye'u dang bu mo bud med skyes pa'i skad// thams cad sgra bzhin 'gro ba rnam par sgrog/ de bzhin sgra brnyan rang bzhin
335b4(phal chen): smras shes nas/ / bsgribs pa med pa'i spobs pa rab ldan pas// 'gro ba kun tu sgra brnyan brjod byas shing // 'jig rten thams cad yid 'ong sgras tshim byed// rgya mtsho 'di
335b5(phal chen): la ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ / 'gro ba thams cad rgya dang mnyam snang zhing // chu dang 'byung po rin chen yong mi zad// chu rnams bzung bas yongs su ngoms pa med// de bzhin de dag
335b6(phal chen): 'gro kun rgyar gsal te/ / bsod nams bsam gtan rnam thar zad mi shes// shes rab ye shes yon tan de bzhin kun// bsod nams yon tan tshogs kyis ngoms pa med//
335b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i klu ni rnam par rtse byed na// sa yi gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar// gling bzhi bcas par sprin chen rgyas par 'gengs// de dag kun kyang rgyan mang sna tshogs ldan// /
336a1(phal chen): de ni dbang sgyur gnas su 'dzam bu chu klung gi/ gser gyi mdog tu sprin mang rnam par sgrub// 'phrul dgar mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu// dga' ldan gnas
336a2(phal chen): su kha ba ba mo'i mdog/ mtshe mar mthon mthing bai DUR+Ya yi mdog/ sum cu gsum du asma gar ba 'dra// rgyal chen gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu// rdo rje mi phyed sra mdog rgya mtshor ro//
336a3(phal chen): mi ci gnas su spos mchog 'dres par te// klu yi gnas su pad+mo'i mdog lta bu// gnod sbyin gnas su ngang pa chu skyar mdog/ ri yi mdog tu lha min gnas su'o// byang du gser gyi kha
336a4(phal chen): dog 'od ston te/ / gling rnams gzhan du'ang sna tshogs rgyan tu ston// 'dzam bu'i gling du ri ga nag 'dra bar te// sprin rnams gang rnams ji ltar grub pa bzhin// dbang sgyur gnas
336a5(phal chen): su gser gyi sprin bstan nas/ / nyi ma'i mdog 'dra glog kyang rab tu 'gyed// dbang sgyur gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang // dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog ston//
336a6(phal chen): kha ba ba mo'i mdog tu mtshe mar te// sum cu rtse gsum gnas su gser mdog tu// rgyal chen gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ mu tig dmar po'i mdog tu rgya mtshor ro//
336a7(phal chen): mi ci gnas su mthon mthing bai DUR+Ya// klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ gnod sbyin gnas su shel gyi kha dog ste// asma'i mdog tu lha min gnas su'o// byang du
336b1(phal chen): gis snang ba'i rin chen mdog/ gling rnams gzhan du'ang rnam phye gzhan dang gzhan// 'dzam bu'i gling du 'od 'phro an da rnyil// sprin gyi mtshan nyid tshul mthun glog kyang 'gyed// de ni
336b2(phal chen): tshangs pa'i dbang rgyur gnas su tshangs dbyangs su/ / 'brug sgra sgrog byed 'phrul dga' rnga yi dbyangs// rol mo'i sgrar yang dga' ldan gnas su ste// lha mo'i dbyangs su mtshe ma dag
336b3(phal chen): tu'o/ / sum cu gsum du mi ci'i skad du ste// rgyal chen gnas su dri za'i skad du'o// ri 'thab dbyangs su rgya mtsho kun tu ste// mi 'am ci yi gnas su gling bu'i sgra// klu yi gnas
336b4(phal chen): su thal mo brdabs pa'i sgra/ / gnod sbyin gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra// lha min gnas su lha rdzas rnga yi sgra// rgya mtsho shugs sgrar mi yi gnas su'o// dbang sgyur gnas su lha rdzas
336b5(phal chen): bsung zhim pa'i/ / me tog sna tshogs rgyan mang char yang 'bebs// zla ba bzang po'i 'od 'dra 'phrul dgar te// me tog man da ra ba'i 'phreng ba'i char 'bebs so// dga' ldan
336b6(phal chen): gnas su rin chen po yi char/ / rgyan gyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang // gtsug gi rin chen zla ba 'dra ba dang // gser 'od bzang po'i char pa rab tu 'bebs// rgyal mtshan gdug
336b7(phal chen): dang ba dan bzang po dang / / 'phreng ba byug pa rgyan gyi dam pa dang // mu tig dmar po la ltar btags mdog tu// rol mo yid 'ong char pa mtshe mar 'bebs// sum cu gsum du r-in
337a1(phal chen): chen sna tshogs te/ / tsan dan dam pa'i spros dang a ka ru// gur kum ge sar lha rdzas ta ma la// spros chu'i rgyun dang me tog 'dres par 'bab// nyam du 'gyur ba'i/
337a2(phal chen): kha zas sgom gyi rnams// kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang // de min rin chen char 'bab bsam yas kyang // rgyal chen bzhi yi gnas su klu dbang 'bebs// de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun du
337a3(phal chen): yang / / char rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa gnya' shing tsam// mi zad rin chen shin tu rnam rgyal ba'i// rin chen char ni mtha' yas rgyun du 'bab// mi ci gnas su 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang //
337a4(phal chen): pad+mo ut+pal dngos dang rin chen dang // me tog bar shi ma li phye ma spos// pi wang rnga dang gling bu snyan par ro// klu yi gnas su mu tig dmar po ste// gnod sbyin gnas su rin chen dang
337a5(phal chen): snang ba/ / lha min gnas su ral gri mde'u thung mdung // dgra 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char 'bebs so// byang du de ni 'phreng ba rin chen dang // me tog bar shi ma li tsam pa ka'i//
337a6(phal chen): 'phreng ba bzang po ku ran mug ta ka/ gling rnams gzhan du'ang char pa sna tshogs so// 'dzam bu'i gling du chu' dang rab gsal gyi// char rnams chos bzhin shin tu phra bar 'bebs//
337a7(phal chen): me tog 'bras bu sman dang spos dang shing // lo zas de bzhin 'jig rten bde 'phel byed// de ltar sprin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // glog dang 'brug dang char pa rnam byed kyang //
337b1(phal chen): khyim nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med// klu yi 'phrul yang de ltar bsam mi khyab// de ltar chu yi rgya mtsho gnas pa yang // klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas skyon byed na// chos kyi rgyu
337b2(phal chen): mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan bdag/ mtha' yas rnam 'phrul mang po cir mi ston// dper bya de dag kun gyis mgo smos tsam// skyes bu de dag yon tan brjod byas te// dpa' bo d
337b3(phal chen): ag dpe dang rnam par bral/ / de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang sgyur ro// mtha' yas blo gros yangs pa'i blo gros can// ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can// ye shes mchog
337b4(phal chen): dang khyad par blo ldan pa'i/ / rnam thar dam pa de 'dra'i tshul du bshad// gang gis rnam thar 'di dag thos gyur nas// yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog pa ni// ngo mtshar rmad
337b5(phal chen): kyi chos dang de ldan te/ / mi yul kun na de ni dka' ba byed// 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa// so so skye bo'i tshogs na'ang shin tu dkon// dge bsags bsod
337b6(phal chen): nams byas pa de dag ni/ / rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la yid ches 'gyur// gang rnams nyan thos theg la'ang yid ches pa'i// mi rnams 'jig rten kun tu dkon pa ste// de bas
337b7(phal chen): rang rgyal theg la dad pa dkon/ / theg chen dang byed de pas shin tu dkon// theg chen 'di la zhugs pa dkon pa ste// 'di 'dra'i chos la dad pa shin tu dkon// 'dzin cing spel byed spos kyang ci dgos te// yang dag
338a1(phal chen): ma nor 'jug pa smos ci dgos/ / la la stong gsum ri dang mtshor bcas pa// bskal par 'dzin cing mgo la khyer byed na'ang // 'di 'dra'i chos la dad
338a2(phal chen): par byed pa las/ / de 'dra de ni dka' bar brtsi ba ma yin no// la la stong gsum rdul snyed sems can rnams// bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyed bkur na'ang // bde 'dra'i
338a3(phal chen): chos la yid ches dang byed pa'i/ / bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de las min// la la zhing bcu ri dang mtshor bcas pa// lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings 'dzin kyang //
338a4(phal chen): 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i// dka' ba de 'dra de la yod pa min// la la zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can rnams// bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur
338a5(phal chen): kyang / / 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa'i// bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de la min// la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams// bskal par bde ba kun gyis
338a6(phal chen): bsnyen bkur te/ / la las le'u 'di yongs su bzung byas nas// bsod nams 'di ni de las khyad par 'phags// rnam thar de dag yongs su bstan pa'i tshe// phyogs
338a7(phal chen): bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad g.yos par gyur/ / lha dang bdud kyi gnas rnams zil gyis mnan// 'od mang bkye bas ngan song rab tu zhi// phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng ge
338b1(phal chen): rnams/ / thams cad kun gyis mngon par zhal bstan te// phyag brkyang mtha' yas yon tan mang mdog pa// bzang po'i dpal gyi mgo la bzhag par gyur// phyag gi mthil gyis mgo
338b2(phal chen): la byug mdzad de/ / sangs rgyas de dag kun gyi gsung brjod pa// rnam thar 'di dag khyod kyis legs bshad kyis// legs par bstan la rjes su nged dgyes so// shin tu rgyas pa chen
338b3(phal chen): po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ bzang po'i dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun no// // bam po nyi shu pa/ de nas sangs
338b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar
338b5(phal chen): lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/
338b6(phal chen): gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa re re na yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag de bzhin du bzhugs par snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi
338b7(phal chen): rlabs kyis chos ston cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par yang so so nas shes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ma brtul
339a1(phal chen): bar byang chub kyi shing drung nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa rnam par rgyal ba gang na ba der gshegs par snang ngo // ji ltar bcom ldan 'das
339a2(phal chen): gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyi rlabs snga ma
339a3(phal chen): dag kyang mnyams par snang ngo / / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa logs su mngon par gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong
339a4(phal chen): nas/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i nang du rings pa'i gzugs su rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin/ seng ge'i gdan phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po can/ bog re stong phrag bcus brgyan pa/ gser gyi
339a5(phal chen): dra ba stong phrag bcu kun tu bres pa/ gnam yol stong phrag bcus bla rer bres pa/ gdugs stong shin tu bzung ba/ dar gyi lda ldi stong phrag bcu rab tu sbyangs pa/ mu tig gi se mo de stong phrag
339a6(phal chen): bcus dga' dga' ltar byas pa/ gos stong phrag bcus mngon par bkab pa/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcus mdun du byas pa/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'od zer stong phrag
339a7(phal chen): bcus shin tu snang bar gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bshams so// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnam pa rgyal bar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/
339b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bshams pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ri rab kyi rtse mo dag tu yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan dag tshul de 'dra
339b2(phal chen): ba dang rgyan de 'dra bar bshams par gyur to/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bcas nas/ rjes dang rim gro chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
339b3(phal chen): thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs
339b4(phal chen): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam zhes gsol to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis spyan drangs nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang
339b5(phal chen): par gshegs so/ / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha'i khang pa dag tu'ang gshegs par snang ngo // de nas lha'i
339b6(phal chen): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang pa thams cad du glu dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan brgya phrag mang po dag btang ste/ zhi bar byas nas yang dag par
339b7(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snga ma rnam la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// thugs rje chen po
340a1(phal chen): mnga' ba 'od srungs rigs skyes pa/ / rnam par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// gser
340a2(phal chen): thub bsgribs pa med par rab tu gzigs pa de/ / rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// gsod skyabs
340a3(phal chen): gser gyi ri bo 'bar ba 'dra ba de/ / rtse mo mchog tu gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// thams cad mnga' ba dgra
340a4(phal chen): bcom dri ma gsum sel ba/ / mdzod spu'i rtse mor gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgo'/
340a5(phal chen): pa zil gyis ma non pa// rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// rnam par gzigs pa skyes
340a6(phal chen): bu'i zla ba mi yi mgon/ / rin chen rgyan du gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// shin tu rgyas pa don dam mkhas
340a7(phal chen): shing bstan pa de/ / ma la ya yi rtser gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas ston mchog thogs pa mi mnga'
340b1(phal chen): ba/ / dri med zla bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// grags pa dri ma med pa mgon po pad+mo'i bla// dri ma med par
340b2(phal chen): gshegs gyur pa/ / des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' ba de// 'od zer dra bar gshegs gyur
340b3(phal chen): pa/ / des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa glu
340b4(phal chen): blangs te tshigs su bcad pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lha'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa' mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis yang
340b5(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa dag glur len cing tshigs su bcad par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs
340b6(phal chen): nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gdan de dag la bzhugs
340b7(phal chen): bar snang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa de yang sum cu rtsa gsum thams cad kyi khang pa dang / lha'i ris tsam du
341a1(phal chen): che bar snang bar gyur te/ 'din jis pa ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin no// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyag ngas po che zhes bya ba las
341a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs
341a3(phal chen): par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang
341a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar chos kyi
341a5(phal chen): blo gros dang / thams cad blo gros dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / yon tan blo gros dang / brtson 'grus blo gros dang / dge ba'i blo gros dang / ye shes blo gros dang / bden pa'i blo
341a6(phal chen): gros dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / dam pa'i blo gros dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/
341a7(phal chen): 'di ltar dbang po'i me tog dang / pad+mo'i me tog dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / ut+pa la'i me tog dang / rdo rje'i me tog dang / spos kyi me tog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i me tog dang /
341b1(phal chen): 'od zer gyi me tog dang / ldum pa'i me tog dang / nam mkha'i me tog dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring /
341b2(phal chen): na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar zla ba gzhan ma yin pa dang / zla ba ma nyams pa dang / zla ba mi g.yo ba dang / zla ba mi bskul ba dang / zla ba chu'i lha dang / zla ba thogs pa med pa dang /
341b3(phal chen): zla ba 'od zer dang / zla ba rdul med pa dang / zla ba rnam par grub pa dag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas kyi
341b4(phal chen): mthus phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang nas/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su bstan te/ seng ge'i khri rnam par snang ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// ji ltar
341b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / lha'i dbang po'i khang
341b6(phal chen): pa kun na yang de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ming de skad ces bya ba sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de skad ces bya ba nas 'ongs pa sha stag go// de bzhin gshegs pa
341b7(phal chen): yang mtshan de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa sha stag go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bong gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba phrag stong bkye ste/
342a1(phal chen): phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten khams thams cad kyang bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang / 'jig
342a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to//
342a3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bstas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad smras so// snang ba
342a4(phal chen): dri ma med la ltos/ / ri rab rtse mo thams cad la// mgon po dag ni rab tu snang // rnam par rgyal ba kun na bzhugs// lha yi rgyal po thams cad kyis// spyan drangs shing ni
342a5(phal chen): gshegs par gyur/ / kun kyang sangs rgyas bcu dag gis// rab tu gshegs pas mngon par bstod// kun gyi 'khor kyang gcig pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' mang po
342a6(phal chen): lhags/ / phyogs bcu dag nas 'ongs gyur cing // yid du 'ong ba'i stan la 'khod// kun gyi ming yang 'di nyid de// ji ltar nged la btags pa bzhin// 'jig rten khams
342a7(phal chen): kyi ming dag kyang / / de skad dag nas kun kyang 'ongs// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na// drang srong chen po'i mtshan kyang de// de na tshangs spyod bla yar la// the tsom
342b1(phal chen): med par de dag spyod/ / kye ma rgyal sras khyed ltos shig/ drang srong chen po'i byin gyi rlabs// 'dzam bu'i gling rnams thams cad na// rgyal ba 'di ni bzhugs snyam byed// bdag
342b2(phal chen): cag rnams ni 'di snyam du/ / ri rab rtse la bde gshegs snyam// 'jig rten khams rnams kun na yang // sangs rgyas ngo mtshar rmad re che// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad
342b3(phal chen): na/ / byang chub mchog tu sems btang zhing // de dag smon lam 'di btab ste// byang chub spyad pa rab tu spyod// kha dog mdog ni tshad med pas// gang zag mchog ni spyod
342b4(phal chen): byed kyang / / chos kyi dbyings la mi chags te// de dag sus kyang mi shes so// gang gis 'jig rten mun bsal cing // thams cad dus su rnam snang ba// de la 'dra ba gang yang
342b5(phal chen): med/ / de ni shes par ji ltar rung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blo gros kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
342b6(phal chen): smras so/ / 'dren pa rnams ni mthong nas kyang // bskal pa mang po 'das gyur te// 'jig rten mgon skyob de dag gi/ chos nyid de ni shes pa min// mtshan ma dag la spyod pa'i
342b7(phal chen): rnams/ / gti mug dra ba 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas gang gis ma mthong ba// 'khor ba'i btson rar mdongs pa yin// chos rnams 'di dag brtag byas na// rang
343a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs par mi rung ste/ / skye dang shi 'phor gyur pa'i rnams// ming tsam du ni bstun pa yin// chos rnams gang yang 'pho ba med// gang yang
343a2(phal chen): bzhin skye ba med/ / chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur na// sangs rgyas kun na rab tu snang // gzung du med cing bltar med de// chos kyi rnams ni rang bzhin med// dngos med pa yi
343a3(phal chen): mtha' shes na/ / sangs rgyas rnams la tshad kyang med// tshad med pa yi chos rnams kyi// rang bzhin gang gis yongs shes pa// des ni ci zhig yod ces par// mthong bar
343a4(phal chen): gyur pa gang yang med/ / gang rnams mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang ba// de dag byis pa'i chos nyid de// de phyir mtshan nyid kun med pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyang med mthong ngo //
343a5(phal chen): dus gsum byung ba'i thub pa rnams// mtshan rab kun dang ldan pa ste// mi gnas tshul du bzhugs pa yin// chos kyi dbyings la g.yo ba med// la la dag gi chos nyid shes//
343a6(phal chen): la la dag la chos kyang brjod// gang la the tsom mi mnga' ba'i// yang dag sangs rgyas de ring mthong // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid 'di// chos kyi blo gros 'dis brjod de//
343a7(phal chen): de thos nas kyang bdag gis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam yas shes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
343b1(phal chen): brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba'i// ye shes shes rab shin tu che// de la 'jig
343b2(phal chen): rten shin tu rmongs/ / sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab// tshul bzhin ma yin 'du shes kyis// byis pa rnams ni sems byed pas// de phyir 'du shes kun sbyangs pa'i//
343b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams ni mi mthong ngo // shes rab chung ba thams cad ni// phung po'i 'du shes rnams la gnas// phung po rnam par ma bsgoms pas// de bzhin gshegs pa mi
343b4(phal chen): mthong ngo / / dngos med dngos su bshad pa ni// bdag gi dngos shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad shes bgyis shing // rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ltos// sngun
343b5(phal chen): chad phung po'i tshul bzhin du/ / ma 'ongs rnams kyang sus mthong ba// ma 'ongs pa'i tshul shes pas// sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// ji ltar snang ba med pa yi//
343b6(phal chen): mun pa'i nang na gzugs mi snang // de bzhin chos rnams ma bshad pa// mkhas kyang shes par mi rung ngo // ji ltar dri ma ldan mig gis// gsal ba'i gzugs kyang mi
343b7(phal chen): mthong ba/ / de bzhin sems ni ma sbyangs pas// sangs rgyas chos ni mi mthong ngo // ji ltar nyi ma bsgribs med pa// rab rib can gyis mi mthong ba// de bzhin phug na gnas/
344a1(phal chen): sems kyis// sangs rgyas dag ni mi mthong ngo // de bas mig ni rnam par sbyongs// gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bsgoms// chos rnams mthong ba
344a2(phal chen): med pa yin/ / 'od mdzad rab tu mthong ba yin// ji ltar kun blos sngon bshad cing // bdag gis ji ltar thos pa bzhin// sangs rgyas byang chub mi bsnyed pa// rnam par
344a3(phal chen): snang mdzad rab tu mthong / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
344a4(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / gnas med pa yi chos rnams la// gnas ni yongs su brtags pas na// de phyir srid pa'i btson ra na// byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'khor// brjod
344a5(phal chen): pas brjod du mi rung chos/ / blo zhan rnams kyis rnam par brtags// des ni yongs su bsgribs byas pas// bdag gi sems kyang rab rmongs byed// shes rab chung ba'i lam nor
344a6(phal chen): cing / / bdag gi sems la mi mkhas pa// phyin ci log gi blo dag gis// mi bzang lus ni 'phel bar byed// gang gis stong pa ma mthong ba// de dag 'khor zhing nyam yang ba/
344a7(phal chen): chos mig bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i// mig kyang de la yod pa min// de bas mig ni sbyang bar gyis// bsam pa rnams kyang rnam par soms// gang phyir bdag cag sngan chad du/
344b1(phal chen): bde gshes ma mthong chud kyang zos// yang dag sangs rgyas mthong na'ang // gang gi sems la chags med pa// des ni sangs rgyas cis byung ba'i// chos rnams de dag rab tu mthong // gang
344b2(phal chen): gis shes rab che mnga' ba/ / chos su bde gshegs mthong ba'i rnams// de dag 'jig rten mig can te// gang gis mthong ba mthong zhes bya// lhag mthong med par mthong ba ni// chos
344b3(phal chen): rnams ngan par mthong ba ste/ / lhag mthong gis ni mthong gyur na// thams cad mthong ba med pa yin// kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni// yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// de ni
344b4(phal chen): rang bzhin thams cad du/ / shi ba med cing 'tsho ba med// sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'dra ba// dpal gyi blos ni sngon bstan to// de las bdag gis thos nas kyang // sangs rgyas chos
344b5(phal chen): nyid shes ma gyur/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam
344b6(phal chen): par rtog la spyod pa yi/ / mig ni shin tu 'khrul pa yin// 'khrul par mthong ba log pa ste// sangs rgyas la ni log mi mnga'// gang gis log par shes gyur te// yang dag
344b7(phal chen): ji bzhin ma nor la/ / yang dag ma yin bden shes na// sangs rgyas dri med mthong ba yin// mthong ba dag gis dri mar gyur// rnam par mthong na de med de// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong
345a1(phal chen): dang bral/ / de bas rnam par gzigs shes bya// de ni 'jig rten spyod pa ste// 'jig rten de yang rnam par brtags// 'jig rten 'jig pa shes gyur na//
345a2(phal chen): snang ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten rnams kyi snang ba ni// 'jig rten mtshan nyid snang ba ste// yang dag ji bzhin mnyam byas shing // de ltar mthong nas mthong ba'o// de ltar
345a3(phal chen): mthong na nyon mongs med/ / dbang du gyur cing zag pa med// gang gis tha dad med mthong ba// dngos por brtags pa ma yin no// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa ni// sangs rgyas chos
345a4(phal chen): rnams brjod pa ste/ / de dag yod pa ma yin pas// rang bzhin de phyir sbyangs pa yin// de dag rang bzhin rnam par dag/ nam mkha' bzhin du mtshan nyid med// de dag la ni ston
345a5(phal chen): pa med/ / mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar ltos// chos rnams la ni mos med de// chos kyi 'du shes rnams bsgoms shing // shes pa de yang ma bsgoms pa// des ni thub chen
345a6(phal chen): mthong ba yin/ / ji ltar yon tan blos brjod pa// de ltar yang dag sangs rgyas mthong // de mthong bas na 'du byed kun// rang bzhin gyis kyang rnam par zhi// de nas
345a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma
345b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas dpa' chen rnams/ / de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med do// rnam grol thugs ni sdig mi mnga'// 'jig rten mthar phyin rgal ba'o// yang dag ji bzhin ma nor bar// bskal pa
345b2(phal chen): rnams ni tshad med pas/ / ji ltar mkhas pas mthong ba bzhin// 'jig rten sgron mas rab tu gzigs// 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma// so so'i skye bo de dag 'gengs// nam
345b3(phal chen): mkha'i khams ni bzung byas shing / / de dag de phyir khom pa med// khom pa med ces bya ba ni// ci yang brjod du med pa ste// khom pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// khom pa bsam gyis/
345b4(phal chen): mi khyab thob// gang la dngos po med pa yi// mi zad khom pa med par bshad// yod pa'i rang bzhin shes gyur na// des ni grags chen mthong ba yin// mthong ba med pa mthong zhes
345b5(phal chen): bya/ / yod pa med pa'ang yod ces bya// mthong ba dag gam yod pa ni// ma bsgoms pa ni rnam par bsgoms// ji ltar blta ba sus mthong ba// de dag gis ni lta ba bshig/ gang las
345b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas smos pa yi/ / de dag chos rnams zhig pa med// ji ltar thub pas bstan pa bzhin// sangs rgyas yongs su sus mthong ba// de ni 'jig rten snang bar byed// rgyal
345b7(phal chen): ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhin/ / chos rnams kyi ni snang ba gcig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bstan// des ni brtson blo brtan pa de// chos mang bye ba rab tu ston// yod dang med
346a1(phal chen): pa shes byas te/ / gang gi 'du shes rnam bsgoms pa// des ni sangs rgyas mthong ba ste/ yang dag mtha' la rab tu gnas// de nas byang chub
346a2(phal chen): sems dpa' ye shes blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di thos pas// snang
346a3(phal chen): ba bdag cag shes par gyur/ / phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba yi// yang dag sangs rgyas des kyang mthong // sems can rang bzhin yod gyur pa// de ni sems can g.yang sa ste// 'di la
346a4(phal chen): ci yang yod pa min/ / tshig gi lam rnams bsdus pa'o// byis pa 'dzin dang bcas pa'i rnams// bdag lus yang dag 'dzin pa la// sangs rgyas snang bar mi 'gyur te// de
346a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa gzung ba med/ / yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing // gang rnams mig yod ma yin pa// de skad bskal pa grangs med du// srid pa'i gang chen mtshon 'khor//
346a6(phal chen): nyon mongs can ni 'khor bar bshad// nyon mongs med pa mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yang // rang bzhin rnyed par mi rung ngo // 'khor zhes bya ba brda yin te// mya ngan
346a7(phal chen): 'das pa brjod pa yin/ / 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma skyes pa// bla ma dag ni mi shes so// 'di ni sangs rgyas rgyal ba 'di// 'di yin 'di 'dra'i 'du shes can// de dag sangs
346b1(phal chen): rgyas mi mthong ste/ / tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ zhi ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bar// gang gis zhi ba shes gyur pa// des ni tshig gi lam 'das pa'i// yang dag sangs rgyas rab tu
346b2(phal chen): mthong / / chos rnams kun gyi spyod pa ni// rab tu brjod kyang bstan pa med// 'od kyang mnyam pa nyid du blta// rgyal ba chos rnams kun dang mnyam// yang dag sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med//
346b3(phal chen): thog ma dag dang tha mar yang // 'gal med rtsa ba med pas na// de ni sangs rgyas de phyir brjod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas
346b4(phal chen): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyan pa'i phyir// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab
346b5(phal chen): par/ / sems can dmyal bar gnas kyang sla// de ni bde ba bsam mi khyab// ci phyir zhe na bskal pa'i rnams// grangs med sdug bsngal sngan chad byung // 'on kyang bde gshegs
346b6(phal chen): ma thos pas/ / bdag cag 'khor las ma grol lo// de bzhin ma nor chos kyi rnams// yang dag nyid du rtogs gyur te// gang la 'grogs pa med pa'i rnams// de dag byang chub bla na
346b7(phal chen): med/ / sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon sum pa// sngan chad ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// gang phyir sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos// de dag mtshan nyid med pa'o// chos rnams blta dka'
347a1(phal chen): ji bzhin du/ / gang zhig de ltar rtog pa ni// de dag sangs rgyas kun gzigs pa// yang dag lta bas shin tu mthong // yang dag la ni yang dag gzigs// yang dag
347a2(phal chen): min par yang dag min/ / 'di yi mtha' ni ston pas na// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas shes kyang bya// khong du ma chud chos bstan te// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod// 'di ni sangs
347a3(phal chen): rgyas bsgoms pa ste/ / gcig tu dmigs pa ma yin no// de ltar mang dang gcig gnas pa// mang po dag tu rnam par shes// gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis// bsags pa dag
347a4(phal chen): kyang rab tu byas/ / byas pa med cing byed pa med// las kyi 'du shes rnams bsgoms shing // las 'di ji bzhin shes byas na// rnam pa dag kyang mi dmigs so// gang la sangs rgyas
347a5(phal chen): bzhugs pa yi/ / nges pa'i gnas ni dmigs med pas// gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis// sangs rgyas g.yo ba gang yang med// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
347a6(phal chen): mchog gi blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can chen po bla na med// sems
347a7(phal chen): can 'du shes rnam par bsgoms/ / 'jug par bya ba gang yang med// de bas bla na med ces bya// gang la phra ba yod min pa// de la sbom pa'ang yod pa min// de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis
347b1(phal chen): bsnyes/ / rnam par mi rtog 'dus ma byas// gang ni sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// de la phra ba yod pa min// yang dag sangs rgyas bgrang dang bral// de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// mun pa
347b2(phal chen): rnams ni rnam bsal cing / / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang // de la snang ba gang yang med// mi snang ba yang ci yang med// thams cad chos la kun nas dga'// skyes pa med cing
347b3(phal chen): gnas pa med/ / 'dod chags med cing brten pa med// chos nyid de yang sbed pa med// gang la gnyis su bgrang med cing // gcig kyang yod pa ma yin pas// ji bzhin rab tu gnas
347b4(phal chen): pa yi/ / shes rab chen po legs par mthong // mi gnyis pa la gnyis pa med// gnyis pa med pa stong pa ste// stong pa de yang khams gsum kun// de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o//
347b5(phal chen): byis pas byang chub mi shes kyang // de dag de la rab tu gnas// gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis// rang gi lus ni rjes su blta// lus med pa ni lus su bshad// 'byung ba med/
347b6(phal chen): cing bstan du med// 'jig tshogs mang po bltar med pa// sangs rgyas sku ni bla na med// sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin nyid// de skad bden pa'i blo smras te// de thos pas ni mig kyang
347b7(phal chen): sbyangs/ / shin tu 'od kyang dang zhing snang // de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par
348a1(phal chen): bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ drin gzo med pa'i sems can phyir// skyes bu drang srong mchog gi rnams// dpa' chen sems can gtso bo dag/
348a2(phal chen): 'od mdzad pa ni rab tu byung // thugs rje chen po bskyed mdzad de// sems can khams la rnam gzigs kyang // srid pa'i bcings pas sdug bsngal ba'i// sems can rnams ni de nas
348a3(phal chen): gzigs/ / 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa na// yang dag sangs rgyas dpa' mnga' ba// sems can gtso bo ma gtogs par// skyob pa bzhin ni gang yang med// gal te sangs rgyas ma
348a4(phal chen): skyes la/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag/ med na 'jig rten khams kun na// sems can bde ba gcig mi 'byung // sems can gtso bo 'dren mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs
348a5(phal chen): pa skyes pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag/ 'byung ba 'jig rten bde ba'i rgyu// gang gis de bzhin gshegs mthong ba// de dag 'thob pa legs par thob// gang gis thos
348a6(phal chen): shing dad 'gyur ba/ / de yang 'jig rten mchod rten no// gang gis sangs rgyas mthong gyur pa// bdag cag rnams kyis 'thob legs thob// 'di dang 'dra ba'i tshul thos pas// kun
348a7(phal chen): kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ / 'das pa'i dus na'ang dpal 'di yod// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs pas// spyod yul 'di dag mthong
348b1(phal chen): bar 'gyur/ / rnam par snang mdzad thub mthong nas// da rung phyir zhing dad pa skye// de yi ye shes mtha' yas pas// da rung brjod du yod pa min// gang gis mchog gi blo smras dang // rgyal//
348b2(phal chen): sras gzhan gyis bshad pa'i rnams// de dag da rung bdag gis kyang // bskal pa bsam yas bshad par bya// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ ri
348b3(phal chen): rab kyi rtse mor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // shin tu
348b4(phal chen): rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po nyi shu gcig pa/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi
348b5(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs kyis sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/ / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor
348b6(phal chen): ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas/ sangs
348b7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang chos kyi blo gros shes bya bar mthun pa sha stag gis zhal mngon par bstan pa mthong bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas
349a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la mnyam
349a2(phal chen): par gzhog pa legs so legs so/ / de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan mthun pa
349a3(phal chen): sha stag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang khyod bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar bstan pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bstan
349a4(phal chen): par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings su chud par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par bsgoms pa dang / chags pa med pa nyid
349a5(phal chen): du chud par bya ba dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul thob par bya ba dang / kun nas sbyor ba thob par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang / chos thams
349a6(phal chen): cad khong du chud par bya ba dang / dbang po thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
349a7(phal chen): dgod pa bcu la rtsom par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la
349b1(phal chen): spobs pa skyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la/ chags pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// zog/
349b2(phal chen): pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// chod pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// rmongs pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// tha dad pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// kha na ma tho ba med
349b3(phal chen): pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ / dpag tu med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// zhum pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// 'phrog pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
349b4(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi spyi bo la phyag g.yas pas byug pa
349b5(phal chen): mdzad de/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi phyag gis reg ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
349b6(phal chen): de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs shes bya ba 'di ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas la/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pas shin tu yangs pa
349b7(phal chen): ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
350a1(phal chen): rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson par
350a2(phal chen): byed pa gang la bsams te/ de skad du smras pa de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
350a3(phal chen): byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
350a4(phal chen): dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / cher skyes pa'i byang chub
350a5(phal chen): sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa
350a6(phal chen): dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod
350a7(phal chen): pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
350b1(phal chen): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la sems dang po bskyed/
350b2(phal chen): paba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas mdzes pa dang / bzang ba dang / mig
350b3(phal chen): tu 'ong ba dang / kha dog rgyas pa dang / thub par dka' ba dang / mthu che bar mthong ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
350b4(phal chen): rjes su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba 'am/ sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin
350b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i chos rgya chen po thos par gyur nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing / snga phyi med par byang chub tu sems bsnyed de/ sems bskyed pa dang po des ni thub par dka'
350b6(phal chen): ba'i gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam
350b7(phal chen): par byang ba shes pa dang / dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs pa mchog dang tha ma shes pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa dang mos pa du ma shes pa dang / khams tha dad pa/
351a1(phal chen): dang khams du ma shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
351a2(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa dang / rjes su dran pa bsgribs pa med pa shes pa dang / chags pa med pa'i lha'i mig shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du zag
351a3(phal chen): pa med pa shes pa'o/ / thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su zin par 'gyur te/ de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar byang
351a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa la sbyar bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bsten par bde ba yang de la brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi nang na gtso bor gyur
351a5(phal chen): pa yang de la brjod par bya'o/ / phul du phyin pa yang de la brjod par bya'o// zil gyis mi non pa'i gnas kyang de la brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba yang de la bstan par bya'o// /
351a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas tshad med pa dang 'phrad par 'gyur ba yang de la bstan par bya'o// rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yang de la brjod par bya'o// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las ldog par 'gyur ba yang
351a7(phal chen): de la brjod par bya'o/ / sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang de la brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la de bas kyang shas cher sems skye bar
351b1(phal chen): bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i
351b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
351b3(phal chen): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la rnam pa bcur sems nye bar gzhog ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go// snying brtse ba'i
351b4(phal chen): sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / gnas pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i sems dang / mnyam pa'i sems dang / slob
351b5(phal chen): dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go// rnam pa bcu po de dag gis sems can thams cad la sems nye bar gzhog ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni las dang po pa'i
351b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de ni thog ma nyid du kha ton la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// mang du thos nas dben par gnas
351b7(phal chen): pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ / rab tu dben par gyur nas dge ba'i bshes su 'gyur bar yongs su bskul bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes su gyur nas nga lo bde ba la yongs su bskul bar
352a1(phal chen): bya'o/ / dang lo bde bar gyur nas shes pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// dus shes nas mi 'jigs pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// mi 'jigs par gyur nas
352a2(phal chen): don shes pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ / don shes nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// chos kyi rjes su 'gro bar gyur nas rmongs pa med pa la yongs su
352a3(phal chen): bskul bar bya'o/ / rmongs pa med par gyur nas rnam par dgod pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad la de bas kyang shas cher sems can
352a4(phal chen): thams cad la snying rje chen po mngon du gzhog par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/
352a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
352a6(phal chen): dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i rnam pa bcus chos thams cad la brtson par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
352a7(phal chen): ltar chos thams cad mi rtag pa dang / chos thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa dang //
352b1(phal chen): chos thams cad myong ba med pa dang / chas thams cad parda med pa dang / chos thams cad gnas pa med pa dang / chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / chos thams cad la chengs/
352b2(phal chen): byed pa med pa ste/ dmigs pa'i rnam pa rnam pa bcu po de dag gis chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul du brtson par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub
352b3(phal chen): sems dpa' 'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskal bar bya'o// chos kyi
352b4(phal chen): khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// sa'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// chu'i khams
352b5(phal chen): brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ / me'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskulabar bya'o// rlung gi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// 'dod pa'i khams
352b6(phal chen): brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ / gzugs kyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
352b7(phal chen): de de bas kyang chos la snang ba 'byung ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rnam
353a1(phal chen): 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/
353a2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung rab la yongs su smin pa bcus skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar phyir mi zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas la shes pas
353a3(phal chen): mos pa'i mthar phyin pa dang / chos nges par rtogs pa dang / sems can rnam par bsgoms pa dang / zhing rnam par bsgoms pa dang / 'jig rten gyis khams rnam par bsgoms pa dang /
353a4(phal chen): las rnam par bsgoms pa dang / rnam par smin pa rnam par bsgoms pa dang / 'khor ba rnam par bsgoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par bsgoms pa ste/ yongs su smin pa bcu po
353a5(phal chen): 'di dag gis 'phags pa'i gsung rab la skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o// de ltar cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni
353a6(phal chen): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rnam par bsgoms pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// da ltar
353a7(phal chen): byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrubs pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o//
353b1(phal chen): ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam par bsgom pa la
353b2(phal chen): yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bya ba rnam
353b3(phal chen): par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid rnam par
353b4(phal chen): bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de bas kyang sems 'jug par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor ba dang /
353b5(phal chen): bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
353b6(phal chen): dag/ de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad
353b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir rtsom mo/ / sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad bde bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can
354a1(phal chen): thams cad la snying brtse bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tsam mo// sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir
354a2(phal chen): rtsom mo/ / sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad drang ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad dang bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can
354a3(phal chen): thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rtsom mo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub
354a4(phal chen): sems dpa' ste/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni sems can mtha' yas pa brjod par bya'o// sems can tshad med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can grangs
354a5(phal chen): med pa brjod par bya'o/ / sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod par bya'o// sems can gzugs med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can dpag tu med pa brjod par bya'o// sems
354a6(phal chen): can stong pa brjod par bya'o/ / sems can byed pa med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can dngos po med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can rang bzhin med pa brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
354a7(phal chen): de'i sems de bas kyang shas cher mngon par zhen pa la mi gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/
354b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang
354b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu nyan na bsam pa nges pa rab tu 'thob pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas la snyan
354b3(phal chen): ba 'am/ mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos la snyan pa 'am mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems
354b4(phal chen): dpa' la snyan pa 'am mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la snyan pa 'am mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam
354b5(phal chen): pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams chung ba dang sems can gyi khams che ba brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa
