354b6(phal chen): dang sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa med par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams skyo bar sla ba dang sems can gyi khams skyo bar dka'
354b7(phal chen): ba brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings chung ba 'am chos kyi dbyings che bar brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbying
355a1(phal chen): 'grub pa'am chos kyi dbyings 'jig par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings yod pa 'am chos kyi dbyings med par brjod kyang
355a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ de ltar bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub
355a3(phal chen): sems dpa' de la chos la 'jug pa bcu brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / chos
355a4(phal chen): thams cad dngos po med pa dang / chos thams cad yod pa ma yin pa dang / chos thams cad brdzun pa dang / chos thams cad dben pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang /
355a5(phal chen): chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / chos thams cad rtog pa med par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i bsam pa de bas kyang shes
355a6(phal chen): cher mi 'phrogs pa la rnam par bsgrub par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/
355a7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
355b1(phal chen): sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa bcu nyan pa'i tshe brtan pa rab tu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas
355b2(phal chen): yod ce'am/ sangs rgyas med ce na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// chos yod ce 'am/ chos med ce na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// byang chub
355b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa yod ce 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa med ce na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
355b4(phal chen): 'byung zhe 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi 'byung zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she 'am/ de bzhin
355b5(phal chen): gshegs pa ma 'das she na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go/ / de bzhin gshegs pa byon ce 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma byon pa yin zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos
355b6(phal chen): las phyir mi ldog go/ / sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba zhe la/ sangs rgyas dasgyur byung ba ma yin zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zang ma
355b7(phal chen): shes so na 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zed shes so zhen yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig ce'am/ dus gsum mtshan nyid ba dang /
356a1(phal chen): cen yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
356a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de la ni chos 'byam klas pa bcu brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gcig las rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur bar brjod par bya'o// mang po las tha dad
356a3(phal chen): par brjod par bya'o/ / don dang 'thun pa'i yi ge brjod par bya'o// yi ge dang 'thun pa'i don brjod par bya'o// dngos po med pa yod pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// dngos
356a4(phal chen): po yod pa med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/ / mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtshan ma mtshan ma med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o//
356a5(phal chen): mtshan nyid med pa mtshan nyid dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtshan nyid mtshan nyid med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ci nas kyang de bas kyang
356a6(phal chen): shas cher mkhas pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'byung bar bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur bar
356a7(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la gzhon nur gyur
356b1(phal chen): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus kyi spyod pa kha/
356b2(phal chen): na ma tho ba med pa yin/ ngag gi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba sgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan
356b3(phal chen): gyi bsam pa shes pa yin/ gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa rtogs pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ las kyi byin gyi rlabs tha dad pa rab tu rtogs pa
356b4(phal chen): yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'grub pa dang 'jig pa yongs su 'jal ba yin/ gar dga' bar 'gro ba la myur ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i
356b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni chos dngon par bsgrub pa bcu brjod par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/
356b6(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bskyod pa brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byin gyi rlabs brjod par bya'o//
356b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par brgyu ba brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su mnan pa brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba brjod par bya'o// chos grang
357a1(phal chen): med pa yongs su dri ba brjod par bya'o/ / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus mngon par bsgrub pa brjod par bya'o// dbyangs kyi sbyor ba rab tu dgye ba brjod par bya'o// sems
357a2(phal chen): bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas grangs med pa bsnyen bkur bar bya ba brjod par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de de bas kyang shas cher chos thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i mkhas pa 'byung bar
357a3(phal chen): bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni gzhon nur gyur
357a4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang
357a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' chos bcu rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyud rtogs
357a6(phal chen): par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams 'brel pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod yul rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ chos sna tshogs rtogs par
357a7(phal chen): bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shes
357b1(phal chen): pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa brtag pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ don dam pa'i bden pa brtag pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin//
357b2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba de la ni gnas bcu brjod par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i
357b3(phal chen): gnas la mkhas pa brjod par bya'o/ / rgyal po'i gnas kyi tshul brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i gnas su gnas pa brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i gnas su 'gro ba brjod par bya'o// rgyal
357b4(phal chen): po'i gnas su spyad pa brjod par bya'o/ / chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i byin brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i mthu brjod par bya'o//
357b5(phal chen): chos kyi rgyal srid la gnas pa brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang de'i sems bsgribs pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa
357b6(phal chen): la de bas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
357b7(phal chen): dag/ 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal
358a1(phal chen): ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
358a2(phal chen): med pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis brlab pa'i
358a3(phal chen): sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'da' bar bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems
358a4(phal chen): can grangs med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa rnam par brtag pa'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po rtogs par bya/
358a5(phal chen): ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa yongs su gzud pa'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa gdul ba'i sems mang ba yin te/ de'i lus ni byang chub
358a6(phal chen): sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba la gnas pa'i bar gyis kyang shes par mi nus te/ lus kyi las shes par mi nus so// rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa shes
358a7(phal chen): par mi nus so/ / 'das pa blta ba 'am shes par mi nus so// ma 'ongs pa blta ba 'am shes par mi nus so// da ltar byung ba blta ba 'am shes par mi nus so// zhing mngon par 'du byed pa
358b1(phal chen): shes par mi nus so/ / sems kyi yul shes par mi nus so// ye shes kyi spyod yul yang byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la gnas pa'i bar gyis shes par mi nus so// kye rtul ba'i sras
358b2(phal chen): dag/ 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba de la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ye shes la 'jug
358b3(phal chen): pa bcu bka' stsal te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dus gsum gyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa brjod pa
358b4(phal chen): mdzad do/ / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa brjod pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba brjod pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya/
358b5(phal chen): ba brjod pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa brjod pa mdzad do// sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// chos thams cad
358b6(phal chen): yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod pa mdzad do/ / sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang de'i sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du de bas kyang shas cher
358b7(phal chen): gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di
359a1(phal chen): ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ / de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
359a2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go// rab tu ldeg/
359a3(phal chen): go/ kun tu ldeg go/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig/
359a4(phal chen): go/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi char
359a5(phal chen): mngon par bab bo/ / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo//
359a6(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra mngon par byung bar gyur to// lha rdzas kyi snang ba rab tu byung bar gyur to// lha rdzas kyi nga ro shin tu grag
359a7(phal chen): par gyur to/ / gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang par ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang phyogs bcur rgyas par byung ste/ chos bstan pa 'di
359b1(phal chen): yang thams cad du byung ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang lhags te/
359b2(phal chen): phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos nyid de lta bu ston pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras
359b3(phal chen): bdag cag kun kyang ming chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag gi zham ring 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba sha
359b4(phal chen): stag nas 'dir byin te/ thams cad na'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di nyid 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag tu tshig 'di dag dang / yi ge 'di dag dang / khong du chud
359b5(phal chen): par bya ba 'di dag gis don 'di nyid mngon par smos shing lhag chad me par ston te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar bdag cag dbang du gyur pa sha sdug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dir
359b6(phal chen): phyin to/ / ji ltar bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mo'i
359b7(phal chen): lha'i dbang po'i khang pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po phyin par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo
360a1(phal chen): gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
360a2(phal chen): rang byung sangs rgyas thugs mchog rab mnga' ba// sku gzugs sku mdog shin tu mdzes ldan zhing // mtshan bzang thug pa med pa mthong gyur nas// byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// dpe
360a3(phal chen): zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs chen dang / / yongs su bstan dang rjes su bstan mthong ste// srid lam kun tu sdug bsngal gyur mthong zhing // byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// de bzhin sa
360a4(phal chen): pa yon tan kun mnga' ba/ / kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur cing // nam mkha'i dbyings mnyam rtog pa med pa yi// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do// khams gsum kun na gnas ni/
360a5(phal chen): 'di dag yin// gnas min rang bzhin dag kyang 'di yin zhes// ma nor dngos po khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba dang //
360a6(phal chen): dkar gnag las rnams ji snyed yod pa dag/ de kun mnyam nyid rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir// bstan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do// bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa dang // mnyam gzhag de bzhin
360a7(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs dang / / rnam byang rnam par ldang ba khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do// sems can kun gyi dbang po ci 'dra dang // brtson 'grus stobs kyang de bzhin ci 'dra ba/
360b1(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs de dag rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// sems can kun gyi mos pa ci 'dra dang // 'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa sna tshogs rnams// rnam pa kun tu thams cad
360b2(phal chen): rtogs bya'i phyir/ / byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// 'gro ba rnams kyi sna tshogs khams rnams dang // 'jig rten kun gyi khams mang du ma dag/ khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir//
360b3(phal chen): brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// kun tu 'gro ba'i chos rnams ci 'dra dang // lam rnams ci 'dra 'dus byas 'di dag gi/ ma nor rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa
360b4(phal chen): sems sgyur ro/ / zhing rnams thams cad mthong bar bya ba dang // sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'khor gyur ces// chags med mig ni rnam par dag bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems/
360b5(phal chen): sbyar ro// 'das pa'i dus na gang rnams ci byung yang // mtshan nyid gang yin ci 'dra ci dngos pa// sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// 'jig/
360b6(phal chen): rten kun na kun sbyor ji snyed dang // don gyi mtshams 'brel bag chags de bzhin te// nyon mongs zad bya mthar thug shes bya'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// 'gro ba rnams kyi tha snyad
360b7(phal chen): gdags pa dang / / tshig lam skad du brjod pa ji snyed pa// brda yi bden pa rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// chos rnams ji ltar brjod du med pa dang // stong pa
361a1(phal chen): byed med rang bzhin dben pa'i rnams/ / de dag dngos nyid khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sgyur ro// zhing rnams thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang //
361a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su bskyam bya bar// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// spu rtse re re'i sgo nas pang zer rnams/ phyogs
361a3(phal chen): bcu kun tu ji ltar dgye bya ba/ / de 'dra'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// zhing rnams brjod med bsam gyi mi khyab pa// bdag gi lag pa'i mthil du
361a4(phal chen): gzhag bya bar/ / sgyu ma'i rnam pa thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// ji ltar zhing gi sems can yangs pa kun// gnod pa med par skra rtser gzhog byed
361a5(phal chen): par/ / srog med chos rnams khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// rgya mtsho thams cad chu chen gang rgyas pa// skra rtses blangs shing kun tu dor bya bar// mthar thug
361a6(phal chen): ma lus khong du chud bya'i phyir/ / brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// ji ltar bsam gyis mi khyab zhing gi rnams// rdul blags ma lus bgrang bya bar// rdul phran grangs rnams khong du
361a7(phal chen): chud bya'i phyir/ / brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// 'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang // 'jig rten tshig cing 'grub pa de bzhin te// bskal pa zad cing gnas pa shes bya'i
361b1(phal chen): phyir/ / brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// dus gsum byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang // rgyal sras rang rgyal nyan thos thams cad kyi// chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa
361b2(phal chen): byang chub don du sems sbyar ro/ / brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// sgra yi nyag mas bcings shing tshad gdab par// dngos po'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub
361b3(phal chen): don du sems sbyar ro/ / brjod med khor yug shin tu yangs pa dag/ ba spu'i khung du ji ltar gzung bya bar// phra dang yangs pa khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro//
361b4(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// ji ltar dbyangs gcig kun tu grags 'gyur bar// dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam dag shes bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du
361b5(phal chen): sems sgyur ro/ / sems can kun gyi sgra skad ji snyed pa// dbyangs gcig brjod pas ji ltar brjod bya bar// sgra yi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems
361b6(phal chen): sbyar ro/ / 'jig rten thams cad ma lus shes byed cing // ji ltar 'gro kun zhi zhes bstod 'gyur ba// lce yangs khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro//
361b7(phal chen): zhing rnams thams cad rab tu 'tshig pa dang // kun nas gnas pa ma lus mthong 'gyur bar// rnam rtog chos ni khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// zhing
362a1(phal chen): rnams thams cad sangs rgyas gcig bzhin du/ / de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar rgyas bya bar// rang byung chos ni rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du
362a2(phal chen): sems sbyar ro/ / zhing rnams thams cad rdul mchog phrar blags pa// de snyed lus su ji ltar sprul bya bar// thams cad yid kyi dngos su shes bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems
362a3(phal chen): sbyar ro/ / kun gzigs 'das pa ji snyed byung ba dang // ma byon sangs rgyas de bzhin bzhugs pa'i rnams// skad cig sems kyis thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems
362a4(phal chen): sbyar ro/ / tshig gcig btsams te brjod cing bshad byas kyang // bskal pa brjod med thams cad zad 'gyur bar// chos kyi rnam grangs khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du
362a5(phal chen): sems sbyar ro/ / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten ma lus rnams// 'byung zhing ji ltar rjes su 'brang ba dag/ sems kyi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems
362a6(phal chen): sbyar ro/ / lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // phyogs kun spyod tshe chags par mi 'gyur bar// dus gsum stong pa khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems
362a7(phal chen): sbyar ro/ / de ltar byang chub don du sems bskyed pa// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brjod du med pa kun// mchod par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams
362b1(phal chen): ngag go/ / 'khor ba dag na byang chub don spyod tshe// byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba ji snyed pa// de dag de la yongs su brjod par bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go// 'jig rten
362b2(phal chen): gtso bo 'jig rten ji snyed pa/ / phyogs bcu'i tha dad tshad med yod pa'i rnams// de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go// mchog gi chos
362b3(phal chen): dang ji snyed dam pa'i chos/ / 'phrul gyi chos dang bla na med pa'i chos// de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan// 'di ni skyon med rnams kyi gdams ngag go// gzhan gyis mi thub
362b4(phal chen): ji snyed gnas yod pa/ / 'jig rten kun gyis zil gyis mi non rnams// de la gnas par rgyal sras de brjod de// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
362b5(phal chen): yon tan kun ldan pa/ / 'jig rten mgon po'i bdag nyid che ba kun// de la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhag ste// 'di ni skyes bu khyu mchog gdams ngag go// sangs rgyas grangs med
362b6(phal chen): brjod du med pa dang / / ji ltar 'grogs par 'gyur ba thams cad kyang // byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go// ting 'dzin zhi ba ji snyed gang
362b7(phal chen): yod pa/ / de dag gdams ngag ji snyed ma lus par// byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan par bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par 'gyur ba dang /
363a1(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor bar 'gyur ba dang // 'jig rten kun gyis chags par mi 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan par bya// sems can sdug bsngal
363a2(phal chen): gzer ba ji snyed dang / / ji snyed ngan song gtses par gyur pa yi// skyabs dang mgon dang rten du 'gyur bar yang // byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya// rnam pa 'di 'dras rgyal sras dang
363a3(phal chen): po de/ / byang chub don du sems rab skyer 'gyur te// de ltar gdams ngag rjes su bstan par bya// 'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyis rnam bkod pa'o// de nas gnyis pa las kyi dang po pa// thog ma nyid du
363a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad la/ / sems bcu nye bar gzhog cing smon byed pa// 'di ni skyon dang bral ba'i gdams ngag go// phan pa'i sems dang de bzhin bde ba'i sems// snying rje'i sems dang de
363a5(phal chen): bzhin byams pa'i sems/ / bsrung ba'i sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i sems// slob dpon sem dang de bzhin ston pa'i sems// de 'dra'i sems rnams nye bar gzhag pa la// kha ton lung la
363a6(phal chen): yongs su bskul bar bya/ / mang du thos pa mgon par gnas par bskul// dben par gyur pas dge ba shes bsnyen 'gyur bya// dge ba shes gyur nas dang bder 'gyur bar bya// ngang tshul bde
363a7(phal chen): bas dus tshul shes par bya/ / dus rnams shes nas mi 'jigs 'gyur bar bya// mi 'jigs gyur nas don la brtson par bya// don shes gyur nas chos rjes shes par bya// chos shes gyur nas
363b1(phal chen): rmongs pa med par bya/ / rmongs med gyur nas legs par bshad chos la// rgyal sras des ni rnam par gnas par bya// de tsam gyis na las kyi dang po pa// byang chub don zhugs byang chub sems dpa' 'o//
363b2(phal chen): gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa'ang de yin te// sangs rgyas sras po de ltar slob par byed// gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gsum brjod pa// chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung la shin tu brtson// mi rtag sdug
363b3(phal chen): bsngal de bzhin stong pa nyid/ / bdag med de bzhin byed pa med pa dang // chos rnams thams cad de bzhin ro med dang // 'du byed ma yin de bzhin gnas med dang // ched du spyod med de bzhin rtog med par//
363b4(phal chen): kun la byang chub sems dpa' dpyod pa byed// de ni 'gro khams yongs su brtag pa dang // de bzhin chos dbyings brtag par bskul bar bya// 'jig rten khams yangs ma lus mthar thug pa//
363b5(phal chen): brtag par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya// sa dang me dang de bzhin chu rnams dang // de bzhin rlung dang phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' dang // 'dod pa'i gzugs dang de bzhin gzugs med pa// brtag par bya la
363b6(phal chen): yongs su bskul bar bya/ / khams rnams yangs pa de bzhin kun rtog cing // khams kyi rang bzhin ma lus mthar phyin pas// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu brtson byed pa// des na der 'gyur gdams ngag de yin/
363b7(phal chen): no// cher skyes pa yi byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'phags pa'i gsung rab 'di la skyes pa ste// dngos po rang bzhin med rtogs dran pa can// chos kyi rjes byung rigs ldan legs par skyes// de yi gnas
364a1(phal chen): las phyir ldog mi 'gyur te/ / sangs rgyas rnams la shin tu mos pa yin// chos rnams de bzhin nges par rtogs pa ste// sems can rang bzhin med par rnam par sgom// chos dang 'jig
364a2(phal chen): rten de bzhin zhing rnams dang / / rnam smin 'khor ba de bzhin mya ngan 'das// rnam sgom rgyal sras de ltar cher skyes pa// thugs las byung ba'i sangs rgyas sras shes bya// 'das dang ma byon da ltar byung ba yi//
364a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos rnams rnam par bsgom pa'i phyir// yongs su bsdu ba ci 'dra mthar thug dang // de ltar de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba dang // sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs shing // dus
364a4(phal chen): gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes song bas/ / mnyam pa nyid la sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // dus gsum kun la tha dad med par 'jug/ de tsam gyis ni rgyal sras bzhi pa ste// de yi bsngags pa rnam pa de/
364a5(phal chen): 'dra'o// de ltar 'di la nan tan bsgrub byas shing // byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog tu 'byung // de las gzhan yang rgyal sras lnga pa ni// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs shes brjod pa ste// thabs
364a6(phal chen): mkhas tshul la rjes su zhugs gyur cing / / bsod nams las rnams brtsams pa'i mthar phyin byed// 'jig rten dag na bsod nams gang byed kyang // sems can kun gyi skyabs su 'gyur ba dang //
364a7(phal chen): phan chol de bzhin bde ba skyed pa dang // snying brtse skye dgu 'grol bar 'gyur ba dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi gartse ba bsal ba dang // drang zhing de bzhin dang bar bya ba dang // sems can mang po thams
364b1(phal chen): cad gdul mos shing / / mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis mthu yang che// sems can thams cad kun tu mtha' yas dang // de bzhin tshad med grangs las 'das pa dang // bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal med
364b2(phal chen): dpag med pa/ / de 'dra'i chos rnams de la brjod par bya// de tsam gyis na rgyal sras lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa snying rje can// de yi gdams ngag tshul ni de 'dra ste// yon tan thams cad
364b3(phal chen): mnga' bas bstan pa yin/ / gang yang bsam pa phun sum tshogs bya'i phyir// chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rmongs med cing // rnam rtog rtog bral dran dang ldan pa de// lhar bcas 'jig rten kun gyis/
364b4(phal chen): bslu mi nus// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang // spyod pas bsngags sam rnam par smad kyang rung // sems can nyung zhe 'am 'on tam mang ngo zhes// thos par gyur/
364b5(phal chen): kyang bsam pa zhum mi 'gyur// sems can nyon mongs nyon mongs me ce'am// gdul snga 'on tam shin tu gdul dka' dang // chos kyi dbyings de chung ngam rgya che dang //
364b6(phal chen): kun nas 'grub 'gyur rnam par 'jig ce 'am// chos dbyings de ni yod dam med ces kyang // byang chub sems dpa' thos gyur dus gsum tshul// nges par rtogs byed
364b7(phal chen): thams cad rnam rtog cing / / sangs rgyas chos la bsam pa shin tu nges// mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang // dngos med yod min brdzun pa bden pa dang //
365a1(phal chen): sgyu ma rmi lam mi rtog rang bzhin med// 'di 'dra'i chos tshol de dag nyan pa byed// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// sangs rgyas chos
365a2(phal chen): dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang / / spyod pa yod med rtag tu rnam par bsgom// 'byung ngam mi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she'am ma 'das
365a3(phal chen): dang / / ma byon to zhe'am ma byon ma yin dang // skyes so ma skyes zad 'gyur zad mi 'gyur// de bzhin mtshan gcig tha dad mtshan de bzhin// gcig pa rnam pa tha dad mang
365a4(phal chen): po dang / / don drang de bzhin yi ge'i dngos rnams dang // thams cad phan tshun yongs su 'dzud byed pa// mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' bstan par bya// mtshan ma med
365a5(phal chen): la mtshan gyis dmigs pa dang / / rnam phye phan tshun yongs su sbyar ba'i rnams// thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug pa byed// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhon
365a6(phal chen): gyur pa/ / lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kun gyis// kha na ma thor 'gyur ba rnam yang med// ci 'dod tshul bzhin de ni skye bar byed// gzhan gyi bsam pa ji bzhin
365a7(phal chen): rab tu shes/ / de dag mos pa yongs su rtogs par byed// phyogs rnams gang du yid kyis smon byed pa// kun tu mngon shes myur ba yid bzhin 'thob// bde ba
365b1(phal chen): gshegs pas bsngags pa'i chos thos shing / / de la zhum pa skyed pa gang yang med// zhing rnams yongs su bskyod pa shes pa dang // de bzhin byin rlabs rnam par rgyu ba dang //
365b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas zhing rnams yongs su mnan pa dang // grangs med kun tu 'gro ba brjod par bya// grangs med chos rnams yongs su dri ba dang // ci nas yid kyi rang bzhin lus
365b3(phal chen): 'gyur zhing / / dbyangs kyi rnam pa shin tu yangs 'gyur dang // sems gcig sangs rgyas grangs med bsnyen bkur brjod// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba brjod pa
365b4(phal chen): ni/ / sems can rnams kyi skye ba rab tu shes// nyon mongs rgyud dang rnam par rgyu ba shes// de 'dra'i spyod yul de 'dra'i sbyor ba can// chos kyi rgyud mang rnam pa
365b5(phal chen): tha dad dang / / sngon mtha' byi mtha' 'jig rten rnam phye dang // brda yi bden pa don dam bden pa dag/ ma lus rtogs par bya la mkhas pa yin// de ni rgyal po'i
365b6(phal chen): gnas la mkhas par bskul/ / der yang ji ltar yongs su spyad pa dang // 'gro bar bya dang gnas par bya ba dang // rgyal po'i gnas su ji ltar rnam spyad brjod//
365b7(phal chen): de la chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur dang // byin gyis brlabs dang de bzhin mthu chen dang // chos su gnas dang 'gro bar bya ba dag/ brjod par bya ste/
366a1(phal chen): rgyal tshab de 'dra yin// de tsam gyis na de yi mthar thug ste// gdams ngag des kyang rlom sems byed pa med// khong du chud byed dran
366a2(phal chen): ldan rgyal tshab de/ / rgyal ba kun gyi drung na slob pa byed// bde gshegs sras po gtso bor dbang bskur ba// thu bo mchog dang dam par gyur pa ni// 'jig
366a3(phal chen): rten khams mang grangs med bskyod pa dang / / yongs su snang bar bya ba'i sems kyang mang // byin gyis brlab dang yongs su 'da' bya dang // yongs su sbyang ba'i sems kyang
366a4(phal chen): rab tu mang / / grangs med 'jig rten shes par bya ba dang // dbang po phun ldan rnam par dpyad la mkhas// de dag gzud cing rnam par gdul ba dang // thams
366a5(phal chen): cad mkhyen gyi sems kyang shin tu mang / / zhing mang brjod du med par 'gro byas shing // dam chos khams rnams ma lus rnam par dpyod// de yi lus dang lus kyi
366a6(phal chen): las rnams dang / / rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'ang shes par mi nus te// dus gsum shin tu rgyu ba'i sems dag kyang // rgyal tshab gyur pa'i bar gyis shes mi nus//
366a7(phal chen): de la thams cad gzigs pas dus gsum dang // sangs rgyas chos shes chags med de bzhin brjod// chos dbyings mtha' yas mtha' dang dbus med pa// rgyas
366b1(phal chen): par 'gengs par bde gshegs brjod pa mdzad/ / ci nas 'jig rten khams kun ma lus par// yongs su snang byed byin gyis rlob pa dang // sems can chos rnams de bzhin
366b2(phal chen): ma lus dang / / sangs rgyas mtha' yas de bzhin brjod pa mdzad// rgyal sras bstan pa rnam pa bcur bgrangs pa// rnam par dgod la gnas pa de dag kun// rang rang
366b3(phal chen): spyod yul rab tu brtson byed pa/ / 'jig rten lhar bcas kun gyis shes par dka'// 'on kyang dang por sems bskyed mtha' yas pas// phyogs bcu ma lus thams
366b4(phal chen): cad rgyas par bya/ / dus gsum kun tu gang tshe sems gtong ba// de tshe thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs 'gyur// zhing rnams kun la mu mtha' yod pa min//
366b5(phal chen): sems can chos dang 'jig rten kun de bzhin// las dang nyon mongs gnas kyang mtha' yas te// byang chub sems rab de la gnas pa yin// skad cig sems
366b6(phal chen): la byang chub gzhol ba'i sems/ / gang skyes 'jig rten kun gyis shes mi nus// rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos kun gyis min// de nas gong du spyod pa ji skad
366b7(phal chen): brjod/ / gang zhig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// spus bcings srang la tshang du 'jal byed pa// des ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes
367a1(phal chen): 'on kyang sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su tshol/ / phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho ji snyed yod pa kun// spu rtse'i thigs kyis yongs 'jal shes byed
367a2(phal chen): pa/ / de ni rgyal sras spyod pa 'di 'dra dag/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sgrub par byed// ji ltar zhing rnams rdul rab phrad glags shing // sems can la la ma lus
367a3(phal chen): bgrang byed de/ / 'di snyed yod ces grangs su gcod byed pa// de 'drar rgyal sras spyod pa brjod pa'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin ma byon dang // gang rnams phyogs
367a4(phal chen): bcu'i byung bar gyur pa dang / / rang rgyal de bzhin nyan thos rab mang bar// rnam par dmigs shing byang chub sems skye'o// sems can khams rnams ma lus
367a5(phal chen): rgyas bkang zhing / / byang chub don du thog mar sems bskyed pa// de yang bgrang bar nus pa ma yin na// de las gong du ci zhig smos kyang dgos// shin tu
